It's less trouble than it sounds, I'm happy to take my sister back. I just wanted to sort this out first—my messy family. I guess I'll just have to get used to it, haha.
dialogue_tracker.char_1040_blaze2_CN_008: The image I have of my dad is a silly guy around my age—subsisting on crumbs, and saving his lunch money to get some treats for his baby girl. Huh? Sounds like something I'd do? Mm...I guess, but he could be such a coward, I feel like I just wanna punch him. I'm more like my mom there.
dialogue_tracker.char_1040_blaze2_CN_009: Yeah, you're the contact listed on my ID. When the day comes, I hope you're the first to hear the news, hehe. You know every single thing I haven't said, all my unfinished business. With this, I can throw myself into battle with no regrets. Wait, how did you know—I said I dropped it somewhere!
dialogue_tracker.char_1040_blaze2_CN_010: These sleeves are so tight, I can't stand it! Phew… Much better. *Ssh* Don't tell Leizi, or she's going to nag my ears off about disrespecting her clothes again…
dialogue_tracker.char_1040_blaze2_CN_011: Ta-da, I'm back! Yep, signing with my real name this time—Gu Zhuhuang. After stashing it away for so many years, I can finally write this name out in public. I'm still the same old me though, so just call me Blaze like you used to, Doctor.
dialogue_tracker.char_1040_blaze2_CN_012: Doctor, you know I've pored over these battle records, studying them inside and out, so you don't have to drag me into a watch session, you know? Wait, these are—No! Not the one where my tail caught fire! That's when I was totally green, I learned quick after that!
dialogue_tracker.char_1040_blaze2_CN_013: Phew—Gave me a fright, I thought you were gonna talk about work. So, this means you think I'd make a good Caster? Yay! That's an extra six hours of training for me now!
dialogue_tracker.char_1040_blaze2_CN_014: Yes, I accept. I know what you're up to with this whole setup. We've got an unspoken understanding, right? Uh, you're really just giving me the medal without a word?
dialogue_tracker.char_1040_blaze2_CN_017: There's something I want to try. Send me out on a mission, Doctor!
dialogue_tracker.char_1040_blaze2_CN_018: I'll BLAZE the trail for you.
dialogue_tracker.char_1040_blaze2_CN_019: The flames in the furnace are jumping for joy!
dialogue_tracker.char_1040_blaze2_CN_020: Surrender now, and I can still turn down the heat.
dialogue_tracker.char_1040_blaze2_CN_021: You know, it wasn't easy learning Originium Arts Automation either!
dialogue_tracker.char_1040_blaze2_CN_023: Got the situation down crystal clear!
dialogue_tracker.char_1040_blaze2_CN_024: Air's burning my lungs. Temp's just right.
dialogue_tracker.char_1040_blaze2_CN_025: Step right up and taste my fireballs' power!
dialogue_tracker.char_1040_blaze2_CN_026: Triple flames, scorch the heavens! The furnace... how did the rest go? Who cares, won't affect my flames!
dialogue_tracker.char_1040_blaze2_CN_027: Daybreak? That's my boiling blood turning the horizon red!
dialogue_tracker.char_1040_blaze2_CN_028: Better run faster, before my fire swallows you whole!
dialogue_tracker.char_1040_blaze2_CN_029: I got your back, Doctor. Doesn't matter who's picking fights with who. Even bigwigs have to own up to their mistakes!
dialogue_tracker.char_1040_blaze2_CN_030: My furnace flame will burn as long as I'm still standing!
dialogue_tracker.char_1040_blaze2_CN_031: Let's go eat! There's nothing a good meal can't resolve—my favorite Yanese saying, haha.
dialogue_tracker.char_1040_blaze2_CN_032: If you're unsatisfied with the results, I'm ready to move out anytime.
dialogue_tracker.char_1040_blaze2_CN_033: Where did my drinks in the fridge go? I was only gone a few days!
dialogue_tracker.char_1040_blaze2_CN_034: Yikes! That's cold! My skin's too hot? Your hands are practically ice!
dialogue_tracker.char_1040_blaze2_CN_036: This furnace even has medical uses. They say it heals any illness if you smoke yourself over it every morning and night, with... what did they call it again—Aizhi? Aijiu? What is that smell?!
dialogue_tracker.char_1040_blaze2_CN_038: It's just fire, wh-what's got you all so into it—Uh... Amiya, Doctor, and you guys... Fine, just don't stand too close to me, or you might get burned. One, two! Wait, I did it? So peacetime flames can look as pretty as fireworks…
dialogue_tracker.char_1040_blaze2_CN_042: Hey. Gotta go train, see you later!
dialogue_tracker.char_1040_blaze2_CN_043: Doc—tor—C'mon! Put more oomph into it! I'm at my limit, it's over for me—Doctor, I didn't think you were this good at arm wrestling... Huh? I let you win? No, you beat me for real, I—Yeesh, just wanted to make you happy on your birthday is all, why not just play along!
dialogue_tracker.char_1040_blaze2_CN_044: I'm only third on this year's Training Room user rankings? Who's number one—DOCTOR?! Oh, so newbies use admin login before they get their own passes. Scared me for a sec there. Wait, then who's number two? C'mon! Tell me, no way I'm losing this year too!
dialogue_tracker.char_1041_angel2_CN_001: Leader, I left a package at your door, so remember to scan and sign for it when you manage to pull your head out of that stack of documents! Huh, weird... didn't you delegate a whole bunch of work already? How are you even busier than before?
dialogue_tracker.char_1041_angel2_CN_002: A—Achoo! Wut? Sheesh, my sister just texted to check if I'm good. Nah, overempathy's a pain sometimes, you know? It feels like you've been living in my head, sis. I need some personal space, you know!
dialogue_tracker.char_1041_angel2_CN_003: Would I be sad if everyone couldn't stay together? Leader, you're overthinking it. Look at it this way: if we went our separate ways all across the lands, then I'd get to meet up with a friend anywhere I went, right? Keeps me on that logistics grind! And it's the perfect chance to throw a party!
dialogue_tracker.char_1041_angel2_CN_004: How come the shop's still shuttered? Ahh... the disaster repairs will take too long, and everyone's going to need time to get used to the new empathy now that the Law's changed... who knows what the future's gonna be like? Ey, is that an ice cream truck I see? Leader, quick! After it! The future? It's right there, in the new flavor we're about to try!
dialogue_tracker.char_1041_angel2_CN_005: I always try to stay upbeat in a crowd, no matter the vibes. All the pain and sorrow stop right here with me, while I'll give out all the joy I have... Don't I get tired? Course not, I love hanging out.
dialogue_tracker.char_1041_angel2_CN_006: Yep, I saw the Sankta 'Lord'. The Lord was talking about stuff like genesis, crisis, future... But eh, it's a whole thing, you know. Who's supposed to keep track of all that? I think the Lord's better off staying put in 'The Saints' Travels', and leaving the future for us to decide!
dialogue_tracker.char_1041_angel2_CN_007: You found my diploma?! Yeah, I could've become an intercity network expert for the Notarial Hall, or maybe a mobile confessional designer, if I hadn't run off. Do I have any regrets? Duh! But dwelling on them is pointless. If I hadn't joined Penguin Logistics or met you—Nope, not thinking about it!
dialogue_tracker.char_1041_angel2_CN_008: I didn't expect the halo to light up again after all that. Does it mean our Law and faith had nothing to do with it the whole time? I don't really get it, and we're stuck with it either way. There're no streetlights on our little path, so without the halo, we'd be smacking right into utility poles.
dialogue_tracker.char_1041_angel2_CN_009: You're asking what's so fun about sitting alone in a confessional? There's oodles of fun to be had, like a maple bar in my hand, the breeze blowing in from outside, the sun shining from on high, it's perfect! Of course, there's you popping up all of a sudden. Even if you're barging in on my private moment, turns out I'm still glad you came to say hi.
dialogue_tracker.char_1041_angel2_CN_010: Lord, please bless the Leader with a long and wonderful dream, and let that dream... come true some day.
dialogue_tracker.char_1041_angel2_CN_011: Long time no see, Leader! Radiant as ever, aren't you? If you've got anything that needs delivering in Laterano, you come straight to me!
dialogue_tracker.char_1041_angel2_CN_012: Relax, Leader. I'm going to one-up my lame old performances in these battle records.
dialogue_tracker.char_1041_angel2_CN_013: Giving me such a long list? Hmm... I'm not worried about finishing it, of course. I'm worried I might do such a good job that you'll drop all your delivery work on me next time, you know?
dialogue_tracker.char_1041_angel2_CN_014: Leader, I can tell how important this thing is to you, so I swear on this gun in my hand, it'll reach its destination safely.
dialogue_tracker.char_1041_angel2_CN_017: Relax, Leader. I'll make sure your package gets there intact. That's not what you're worried about? Oh... I get it now. Whatever you want blown up, I'll wipe it off the face of this land.
dialogue_tracker.char_1041_angel2_CN_018: Don't worry, just follow me and you'll never get lost, there's no place in Laterano I haven't blown up at least once... Why the face, Leader? It's easier to understand something once you crack it open for a look-see, right?
dialogue_tracker.char_1041_angel2_CN_019: Need some lighting? All good, this light on my head will illuminate the path ahead... long as it doesn't die out. I don't think it will. Probably.
dialogue_tracker.char_1041_angel2_CN_020: Get in line for my bullet buffet—!
dialogue_tracker.char_1041_angel2_CN_021: I knew you'd come straight to me, Leader!
dialogue_tracker.char_1041_angel2_CN_022: Uh... maybe you didn't come straight to me, but don't forget to pay my fee straight away.
dialogue_tracker.char_1041_angel2_CN_023: Real estate question: this wonderful realm or a panoramic view of hell—which did you want again?
dialogue_tracker.char_1041_angel2_CN_024: Okaaay... this is awkward, but I'm the only one who knows how to handle the chaos I created, haha.
dialogue_tracker.char_1041_angel2_CN_029: Yes! No place is beyond reach.
dialogue_tracker.char_1041_angel2_CN_030: Leader, don't forget to invite me out for drinks on your tab, okay!
dialogue_tracker.char_1041_angel2_CN_031: No biggie. Out of bullets? Get a new mag. Gun jammed? Just use another.
dialogue_tracker.char_1041_angel2_CN_032: Ahem, I'll compensate any losses suffered during delivery, so just relax.
dialogue_tracker.char_1041_angel2_CN_033: It's a little messy here... we're prepping packages to deliver—oh yeah! Leader, my hands are all full, so could you cut me some tape?
dialogue_tracker.char_1041_angel2_CN_036: An apple a day means seven apples a week, yay!
dialogue_tracker.char_1041_angel2_CN_038: Hey, I'm always the one making you laugh, so why don't we switch it up for New Year's? You're awfully quiet, Leader. We've fought side-by-side so many times, I'm sure you know my weak spots. Don't tell me... you don't have a clue what gets me laughing?
dialogue_tracker.char_1041_angel2_CN_043: Phew... I drove for two weeks plus straight, and fi... finally made it to your birthday party! Good, good, hah, this means I get to shove your face into a cake before the clock strikes twelve! So don't you hide, Leader! It's an expensive custom job, so it's not going to waste!
dialogue_tracker.char_1041_angel2_CN_044: Going somewhere new and meeting new friends is fun and all, but going back to your usual turf to hang out with old friends is even better. Going somewhere new with old friends? Now that's the best. So, Leader, wanna go on a trip with me?
dialogue_tracker.char_1042_phatm2_CN_001: Doctor, I've brought myself here in the flesh. You may stop watching my videotapes.
dialogue_tracker.char_1042_phatm2_CN_002: Ever since doing away with the suppressor on my throat, Miss.Christine has deigned to lead my vocal training, teaching me how to sing unto people's minds without damaging their psyches. You'd like to hear the results? Hm. You did once request a lullaby, which... isn't my forte. I'll need practice still.
dialogue_tracker.char_1042_phatm2_CN_003: It never struck the Crimson Troupe just how their rejection of critique, their scorn of video, laid bare their cowardice and mediocrity. I used to avoid watching anything I performed in, such was my disgust... But perhaps it's time for a better seat. I see you holding those film tickets, Doctor; you needn't hide them. I accept your invitation.
dialogue_tracker.char_1042_phatm2_CN_004: There are people after me. They are disenchanted and voracious, screaming in chaos, dying to find the maker for their crazèd flock. For how could Tragodia truly die? He is but one of countless graven images to fall on the steps—He and all his kind are wholes made of shards, idols formed from syncretism. As it was with that mad and lonely stage director, snobbish soul, old friend of mine.
dialogue_tracker.char_1042_phatm2_CN_005: I've read that evaluation report; Dr. Folinic is suggesting I exit from the frontline for the time being. I can't maintain constant sobriety, that much is true; after years with these hallucinations for company, they are among the few friends I can count on my fingers. But I remain your assassin... Call me, and let me see to the work I know best.
dialogue_tracker.char_1042_phatm2_CN_006: Upon his followers, the troupe leader bestowed masks. Before long, I will set out in companionship to find those followers, one and all. Abandon reason and surrender to violence as they may, I will simply create, perform, and weave their dreams. Till they awaken from despair, till they can reexamine their souls in the mirror, wretched yet free, for better and for worse.
dialogue_tracker.char_1042_phatm2_CN_007: Some unfamiliar operators invited me to a 'movie night' after I reboarded, and the Vampire madame from Engineering seems somewhat soft on me too. So generous is the drama, it bathes its actors in halo even outside of the silver screen. Pardon? Rhodes Island's operators trust me on principle...? Mmm. They ought to be a little warier than that.
dialogue_tracker.char_1042_phatm2_CN_008: It is harder to resist destroying beauty than demonstrating it. It's a notion I try to stifle, but is it so simple to shake my bloodstained creative impulses? They were the one excuse in the troupe to touch on love and hate; they were a poison to tempt the audience; they are an inextricable yet unwordable part of me.
dialogue_tracker.char_1042_phatm2_CN_009: I must recall—the conspiracy, the slaughter, the false performances. Does creation break me free of the shadows about me, or does it bring me closer to them? Perhaps my thirst, reignited by death, will one day finally catch fire and rage. Doctor... Witness it. Grasp it. Endorse or reject it. Do not stop it.
dialogue_tracker.char_1042_phatm2_CN_010: Close your eyes. The dark of night now shrouds your consciousness; the sharp discomfort fades. So tell me, what is it you long to see... a ship, a sea of flowers, and us... That is all you want?
dialogue_tracker.char_1042_phatm2_CN_011: Permit me to shirk our operators' curious gazes for a spell. The curtain has finally fallen on the longest play, and I need some time to reorganize my thoughts. I'm sure you understand, Doctor... Pardon? I have to sign the returnee ledger with my Wrankwood autograph?
dialogue_tracker.char_1042_phatm2_CN_012: Would that they could break free of the slaver that is Hate, what then would they do...
dialogue_tracker.char_1042_phatm2_CN_013: I've woken from a nightmare, yet I still am in the night. Would you journey with me even then, dear Doctor?
dialogue_tracker.char_1042_phatm2_CN_014: The symbol of a troupe member's honor was a medal bearing Tragodia—a sentencing to days with thought and taste imprisoned, a painful past I tried again and again to cut away. But you give me a present to delight... and I will cherish it.
dialogue_tracker.char_1042_phatm2_CN_018: To lead or to dominate—they are but a hair apart.
dialogue_tracker.char_1042_phatm2_CN_019: Alas, the scent of strife; I know it well.
dialogue_tracker.char_1042_phatm2_CN_020: Below the stage stirs not a soul.
dialogue_tracker.char_1042_phatm2_CN_022: The apron and the wings are but the same.
dialogue_tracker.char_1042_phatm2_CN_024: The shadow beneath your feet is not your own.
dialogue_tracker.char_1042_phatm2_CN_025: The killing urge doth seize your flesh.
dialogue_tracker.char_1042_phatm2_CN_026: The burning hate doth speak your minds.
dialogue_tracker.char_1042_phatm2_CN_027: Resist me not; come to my song.
dialogue_tracker.char_1042_phatm2_CN_029: Heeding your direction always leads so simply to ideal results. I ought to be on guard...
dialogue_tracker.char_1042_phatm2_CN_030: Stay the curtain call... the time is not yet come.
dialogue_tracker.char_1042_phatm2_CN_031: Flee... until your nightmares catch up to you again.
dialogue_tracker.char_1042_phatm2_CN_032: If this is not the ending in your heart, then rewrite it.
dialogue_tracker.char_1042_phatm2_CN_033: ...Could you take some of those film posters off the walls?
dialogue_tracker.char_1042_phatm2_CN_034: Yes, this attire is too formal.
dialogue_tracker.char_1042_phatm2_CN_036: Once this one-act play is... roughly ready, would you like to be the first to watch?
dialogue_tracker.char_1042_phatm2_CN_038: On and on do new days come, yet shadows squat in the crevices of bygone days, so loath to leave. Doctor, be careful, please. Don't wallow too deeply in feelings of regret, in cursing fate. Accept failure, unease, fear... and then carry on walking.
dialogue_tracker.char_1042_phatm2_CN_042: History and murders aside, Wrankwood is a fine vacation spot.
dialogue_tracker.char_1042_phatm2_CN_043: Pierced by Originium crystal, this larynx of mine is a ruthless weapon, and proof of how the arts intoxicate me. Now that I've finally recovered my singing technique, I wonder, would you mind if... As you wish, then. Allow me to dedicate this long-overdue ballad to you. Happy birthday, Doctor.
dialogue_tracker.char_1042_phatm2_CN_044: Perhaps this sailing ship we stand on is a clear glass reflection, and Rhodes Island is but a fantasy woven by you... Yet oneiric emotions can move just as deeply as waking ones; if you believe this is all one beautiful dream, don't wake so soon.
dialogue_tracker.char_1043_leizi2_CN_001: 把文件交给我吧。行笃而后思远，我闭关期间每天会为天师们批满九十九份作业——慢着，你去哪里？你也准备像他们一样，把工作丢给我就去偷懒？很好，你不想知道这样做的后果。
dialogue_tracker.char_1043_leizi2_CN_002: 旧案已了，我只希望煌不再受过往牵绊，可她那样的心性又很难让人放心。没什么，我这次来只是顺路拜访——她还要半个月才能回来？咳，多待几日倒也无妨，有什么我帮得上忙的工作就交给我吧。
dialogue_tracker.char_1043_leizi2_CN_003: 小到快速充电，大到唤风祈雨——全都不是雷法的追求！这身天师服吸引来不少好奇的追问，我必须逐一解释——修理烧坏的电路？......给我。这也与雷法无关！只是熟能生巧罢了。
dialogue_tracker.char_1043_leizi2_CN_004: 左乐在司岁台的责任渐重，可还是一副少年心气。平时看似持重，关键处又总会意气用事，叫人如何放心。为何这样看我？我答应过义姐要关照左乐，故而有些担忧罢了——为什么要这样看着我？
dialogue_tracker.char_1043_leizi2_CN_005: 在天师府求学时，无论是钻研雷法还是记诵律法，我都不敢怠慢。但是大理寺的工作，却变成了与人打交道。我也曾感到迷茫，最终却想通了——究其根本，二者之所求，无非一个“真”字。
dialogue_tracker.char_1043_leizi2_CN_006: 我虽已脱下官服，却并无心结。作为曾经的执法者，我清楚律法的不完美。剑有缺口，雷有喑时，律法、雷法、剑法，说到底都是惩奸除恶的工具。只要使用者内心坚定，便不成阻碍。
dialogue_tracker.char_1043_leizi2_CN_007: 天师当然是常人，天师府设立在山巅，只是寻一处僻静之地好让大家专心治学。不便？炼丹房里产出的源石装置完全可以满足日常所需，乘天师翼往返百灶市集也不过一炷香的工夫，倒也没什么不便。
dialogue_tracker.char_1043_leizi2_CN_008: 你很忧虑。若觉世事艰难心头苦闷，便随我回天师府闭关修心。选择中意的研究项目，被异想天开又充满干劲的天师折磨个几年，内心势必通透澄亮——这么正式地拒绝我，我的玩笑还是太严肃了吗？
dialogue_tracker.char_1043_leizi2_CN_009: 我曾看见一个狡猾脱罪的恶徒在归家途中被一道天雷劈中，在不远处是不应路过此地的师叔。我本想向他追问，最终还是将这件事藏在了心底——那为什么说出来？不是在交换秘密吗？！
dialogue_tracker.char_1043_leizi2_CN_010: 不要强撑，作为领头人，更应及时休整，思敏以察微。工作做不完？要我帮你？岂有此理？！......拿来吧。
dialogue_tracker.char_1043_leizi2_CN_011: 我来终止与贵司的搜查协议，这是我的申请......太好了？我申请的是以普通访客的身份来交流。大炎天师府惊蛰，今后将继续叨扰。
dialogue_tracker.char_1043_leizi2_CN_012: 在复杂的战场环境里使用源石技艺，这些思路确实值得参考。
dialogue_tracker.char_1043_leizi2_CN_013: 我不轻易交付信任，但罗德岛已证明了自己是值得信赖的组织，不要让我失望。呃，抢了你该说的话？抱歉，请说。
dialogue_tracker.char_1043_leizi2_CN_014: 初入大理寺时我万事都想争先，以为站得越高，能成之事就越多。而如今离开大理寺也是出于同样的考虑。遗憾？不。你听这雷声隆隆，何处不闻，何处不至？
dialogue_tracker.char_1043_leizi2_CN_026: 三元归一剑贯魑魅，一点浩气霆击祸祟！
dialogue_tracker.char_1043_leizi2_CN_027: 斩妖除奸恶，雷霆动乾坤！
dialogue_tracker.char_1043_leizi2_CN_028: 天雷滚滚，你想往哪里逃！
dialogue_tracker.char_1043_leizi2_CN_029: 往后也要维持刚才那样的高水准。当然是对你的认可，但你绝不可因此掉以轻心！
dialogue_tracker.char_1043_leizi2_CN_030: 有进步。以后少说你几句？这样自满，我收回刚才的夸赞！
dialogue_tracker.char_1043_leizi2_CN_031: 呼——你需要的是静思。作为罗德岛的领头人之一，同样的错绝不可再犯，这点你要记住。
dialogue_tracker.char_1043_leizi2_CN_032: 站起来，和我一起战斗！我知道你不会轻易被击败！
dialogue_tracker.char_1043_leizi2_CN_033: 我平日里需要潜心研究，要是门外再发生爆炸——不会？好，我信你。
dialogue_tracker.char_1043_leizi2_CN_034: 心静则神清——不和你计较。
dialogue_tracker.char_1043_leizi2_CN_036: 只是握个手，无需小心翼翼，我已经很久没电到人了。啊，静电不算。
dialogue_tracker.char_1043_leizi2_CN_038: 春雷焕新意，众志且成城——怎么样，需要再激昂一点吗？唔，结尾也得加一个有力的握拳动作。好了，再来一遍。什么叫可以了？既然罗德岛邀请我参与新年表演，我定会全力以赴！
dialogue_tracker.char_1043_leizi2_CN_042: 从日程表来看，你现在不该在这里休息，博士。
dialogue_tracker.char_1043_leizi2_CN_043: 恭贺诞辰。天师府惊蛰奉上的是这件法宝，相信你定会善加使用。只要按下这个按钮——别对着自己......你没事吧？醒醒！我是说遇险时按下这个按钮，我存在里面的雷就会释放......
dialogue_tracker.char_1043_leizi2_CN_044: 我承认，先前因那案子的关系，我对罗德岛多有戒备。如今再参与罗德岛的任务，已不是为了考察。向弱势者提供援助，寻求公平，我们所求之事本无差别，大可继续合作。
dialogue_tracker.char_1044_hsgma2_CN_001: 和以前一样，有我在，你就是安全的。
dialogue_tracker.char_1044_hsgma2_CN_002: 我换了新的武器？没有，般若只是被重铸过了，这把刀早年也和我有些因缘。除了电单车，东西我都喜欢老套的——话是这么说，我换掉的车，其实也都擦得干干净净，在车库里停着呢。
dialogue_tracker.char_1044_hsgma2_CN_003: 有一次我穿了现在这身上班，全龙门的黑道见了我都特别乖。可惜Missy勒令我换掉，因为近卫局的电话被市民打爆了，他们要求近卫局处理“未知危险人物”......真遗憾哪。
dialogue_tracker.char_1044_hsgma2_CN_004: 僧人口中的“般若”是超越凡俗的大智慧，但东国人更熟悉的“般若”是盾上这张狂怒的脸。生为东国鬼族对萨卡兹而言已是幸运，至于有多少鬼求得解脱，又有多少横死沙场，谁也说不清。
dialogue_tracker.char_1044_hsgma2_CN_005: 侠客？东国的《忠臣藏》，大炎的“伏尸二人，流血五步”，说的都是侠客，但唯独和我无关。侠以武犯禁，要是警察被迫当了侠客，或者侠客不得不和警察联手，那这世道——确实，早已经乱套了。
dialogue_tracker.char_1044_hsgma2_CN_006: 没错，我最后还是选龙门。这么多年了，我早就不奢求御机的酒风味如初。可我怎么也没想到，它的香气已经在反复的蒸馏中彻底跑丢，只剩一股冲鼻子的酒精味。这样的酒，我喝不来。
dialogue_tracker.char_1044_hsgma2_CN_007: Missy从汐斯塔回龙门后，我请她吃了顿饭。当时她还没上任，我随口叫了声“局长”，把她窘得——诗怀雅局长！您大驾光临罗德岛——痛痛痛，诗大小姐，不是，Missy，手下留情啊！
dialogue_tracker.char_1044_hsgma2_CN_008: 临终前，阿发拜托老陈照顾好我，但其实老陈才是不让人省心的那个。事到如今，我背后仍然有整个近卫局撑着，可她呢？唉，答应我，博士，要是她有求于罗德岛，你可绝对不能让她丢架。
dialogue_tracker.char_1044_hsgma2_CN_009: 我不轻易跟人许诺。对错本就一团乱麻，按别人的心意做事，更是乱上加乱。但你，我信得过。我信你能分清是非对错。我既然说过会听从你的指挥，那就永远如此。一诺千金，你听见我说的了。
dialogue_tracker.char_1044_hsgma2_CN_010: 给，咖啡机。看你一趟一趟往那边跑太麻烦，我就给你搬过来了。反正也不重。
dialogue_tracker.char_1044_hsgma2_CN_011: 重装干员星熊，再次向您报到——特别督察组组长？没错，我会在近期接任这一职务。不过在罗德岛上，我就是重装干员星熊，这样我会轻松一些。
dialogue_tracker.char_1044_hsgma2_CN_012: 在如何指导别人这一点上，我还是得向你学习。
dialogue_tracker.char_1044_hsgma2_CN_013: 不论有没有这枚勋章，我都会保护好你......话虽如此，能得到您的表彰仍是我的荣幸。非常感谢。
dialogue_tracker.char_1044_hsgma2_CN_014: 又是勋章？别这么拘泥于形式了。要是真想感谢我，不如在重铸的般若内面写点什么。我保证，只要般若在，你留下的笔迹就永远在。
dialogue_tracker.char_1044_hsgma2_CN_017: 有任务？正好最近文书工作太多，也该活动活动了。
dialogue_tracker.char_1044_hsgma2_CN_018: 你们只要想好怎么进攻就行。对，怎么折腾都没问题。放手去做吧，你们的安全由我负责。
dialogue_tracker.char_1044_hsgma2_CN_019: 要是实在没有思路，那就把最艰巨的任务交给我。
dialogue_tracker.char_1044_hsgma2_CN_020: 做好心理准备。待会儿我动起手来，场面可能会有点过激。
dialogue_tracker.char_1044_hsgma2_CN_023: 最棘手的敌人是哪个？我来会一会。
dialogue_tracker.char_1044_hsgma2_CN_024: 最危险的战场在哪里？我会顶上去。
dialogue_tracker.char_1044_hsgma2_CN_025: 墓碑上要刻的戒名，想好了吗？
dialogue_tracker.char_1044_hsgma2_CN_026: 没被吓倒，说明你还有点骨气，但也就这么多了。
dialogue_tracker.char_1044_hsgma2_CN_027: 我要找的人不是你。滚开。
dialogue_tracker.char_1044_hsgma2_CN_029: ......就像许多年前一样？不，这次服从的是你的命令，我不会后悔。
dialogue_tracker.char_1044_hsgma2_CN_030: 不必费心巡视战场了。每个敌人的下场我都看在眼里。
dialogue_tracker.char_1044_hsgma2_CN_031: 到此为止？稍等，我还没尽兴，需要稍微调整下状态——呼......怎么样，看起来是不是好多了？
dialogue_tracker.char_1044_hsgma2_CN_032: 不用着急，只要有我在，他们就过不来。一会儿见。
dialogue_tracker.char_1044_hsgma2_CN_033: 博士，我进来了。嗯？哦，这么长时间过去，该怎么进这间屋子，早就变成肌肉记忆了。
dialogue_tracker.char_1044_hsgma2_CN_036: 小心，我的角也是很锋利的。
dialogue_tracker.char_1044_hsgma2_CN_038: 博士，来试试看，这是我送你的电单车。为什么？呃，这一款的广告做得实在太诱人，正好新年又有限时促销......对，这边是加速，这边是......别拧——整个人跟着车蹿出去了？！
dialogue_tracker.char_1044_hsgma2_CN_042: 来喝一杯吗？只是薄荷茶而已。哪怕是我，也没有这个时候就喝酒的习惯啊。
dialogue_tracker.char_1044_hsgma2_CN_043: 仅限你生日这天，博士，想闯什么龙潭虎穴，不管多危险、多没道理，哪怕你应该对自己要面临的危险负全责，我都会陪你去。想好要去哪了吗？
dialogue_tracker.char_1044_hsgma2_CN_044: 我讨厌时间带走我身边的人，反过来说，经过漫长的时光，仍然留在我身边的人，每一个都值得我珍惜，你当然也一样......在时间将一切冲刷褪色之前，博士，来陪我坐一会儿吧。
dialogue_tracker.char_1044_hsgma2_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_001: 同以前一样，有我喺度，你就系安全嘅。
dialogue_tracker.char_1044_hsgma2_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_002: 我换咗新武器？冇啊，般若只不过系重铸咗啫，而呢把刀早年亦都同我有啲因缘。除咗电单车，我不遱都钟意啲老套嘢嘅——话系噉讲，其实我啲旧车架架都抹到爉爉令，停嗮喺车库度。
dialogue_tracker.char_1044_hsgma2_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_003: 有次我着成噉返工，成个龙门嘅黑道见到我都特別听话。不过Missy就勒令我换咗佢，因为啲市民打爆咗近卫局嘅电话，话要近卫局处理“未知危险人物”㖞......谂起就觉得可惜啊。
dialogue_tracker.char_1044_hsgma2_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_004: 僧人口中嘅“般若”系超越凡俗嘅大智慧，但系东国人更加熟悉嘅“般若”系盾上面呢个狂怒嘅面孔。对萨卡兹嚟讲生为东国鬼族已经系一种幸运，至于有几多鬼求得解脱，又有几多横死沙场，冇人讲得清。
dialogue_tracker.char_1044_hsgma2_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_005: 侠客？东国嘅《忠臣藏》，大炎嘅“伏尸二人，流血五步”，讲嘅都系侠客，但唯独与我无关。侠以武犯禁，如果警察真系被逼改做侠客，或者侠客一定要同警察联手，噉呢个世道——冇错，早就乱嗮大龙。
dialogue_tracker.char_1044_hsgma2_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_006: 冇错，我最后都系拣咗龙门。都咁多年喇，我早就唔奢求御机嘅酒风味如初。但系我点都谂唔到，佢嘅香气经过反复蒸馏已经彻底消散，得返啲攻鼻嘅酒精味。噉嘅酒，我饮唔落。
dialogue_tracker.char_1044_hsgma2_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_007: Missy由汐斯塔返嚟龙门之后，我请佢食咗餐饭。当时佢仲未上任，我随口嗌咗声“局长”，佢当堂尴尬到——诗怀雅局长！你大驾光临罗德岛——痛痛痛，诗大小姐，唔系，Missy，手下留情啊！
dialogue_tracker.char_1044_hsgma2_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_008: 临终嗰阵，阿发拜托老陈照顾好我，但其实老陈先至系最需要人照顾嗰个。到到今日，我都仲有成个近卫局帮我撑腰，佢呢？唉，应承我，博士，假如佢有求于罗德岛，千祈唔好搞到佢冇面。
dialogue_tracker.char_1044_hsgma2_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_009: 我唔会轻易同人承诺啲乜。对错根本就讲唔清，按照人哋嘅心意做事，只会令件事更加复杂。但系你，我信得过。我信你分得清是非对错。我既然应承会听你指挥，噉就永远都会听。一诺千金，讲得出做得到。
dialogue_tracker.char_1044_hsgma2_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_010: 嗱，咖啡机。见你揗嚟揗去咁麻烦，咪索性帮你搬过嚟啰。横掂又唔重。
dialogue_tracker.char_1044_hsgma2_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_011: 重装干员星熊，再次向你报到——特别督察组组长？冇错，我近排会接任呢个位。不过喺罗德岛，我就系重装干员星熊，噉样我会轻松啲。
dialogue_tracker.char_1044_hsgma2_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_012: 喺指导其他人呢方面，我仲要向你学习。
dialogue_tracker.char_1044_hsgma2_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_013: 无论有冇呢枚勋章，我都会保护好你......讲系噉讲，可以得到你嘅表彰依然系我嘅荣幸。好多谢你。
dialogue_tracker.char_1044_hsgma2_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_014: 又系勋章？唔使咁执着于呢啲形式嘅。真系想多谢我嘅，不如喺重铸过嘅般若背面留几只字。我保证，只要般若仲喺度，你嘅笔迹永远都会喺度。
dialogue_tracker.char_1044_hsgma2_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_017: 有任务？最近成日对住啲文书工作，都系时候喐动下喇。
dialogue_tracker.char_1044_hsgma2_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_018: 你哋只需要考虑点样进攻。冇错，就算乱嚟都得。即管放手去做，你哋嘅安全有我睇住。
dialogue_tracker.char_1044_hsgma2_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_019: 实在谂唔到嘅话，就将最艰巨嘅任务交畀我啦。
dialogue_tracker.char_1044_hsgma2_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_020: 做好心理准备。阵间我喐手嘅时候，场面可能会有啲过激。
dialogue_tracker.char_1044_hsgma2_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_023: 边个敌人最恶鲠？我嚟会下佢。
dialogue_tracker.char_1044_hsgma2_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_024: 边度嘅战场最凶险？我嚟顶上去。
dialogue_tracker.char_1044_hsgma2_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_025: 刻喺墓碑嘅戒名，谂好啦嘛？
dialogue_tracker.char_1044_hsgma2_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_026: 冇吓到跪低，都算你有啲骨气，可惜就系得咁多。
dialogue_tracker.char_1044_hsgma2_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_029: ......同好多年前一样？唔一样，今次服从嘅系你嘅命令，我唔会后悔。
dialogue_tracker.char_1044_hsgma2_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_030: 唔使嘥心机巡视战场喇。每个敌人嘅下场我都睇得一清二楚。
dialogue_tracker.char_1044_hsgma2_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_031: 到此为止？等阵，我仲未尽兴，等我调整下状态先——呼......点啊，噉睇落系咪好好多？
dialogue_tracker.char_1044_hsgma2_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_032: 唔使急，有我喺度，佢哋就过唔到嚟。阵间见。
dialogue_tracker.char_1044_hsgma2_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_033: 博士，我入嚟喇㖞。嗯？哦，都咁耐喇，点入呢间房，早就变咗做肌肉记忆。
dialogue_tracker.char_1044_hsgma2_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_036: 小心，我只角都好鎅手㗎。
dialogue_tracker.char_1044_hsgma2_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_038: 博士，试下吖，呢架系我送畀你嘅电单车。点解？呃，呢只款嘅广告真系做得太吸引喇，咁啱新年又有限时促销㖞......冇错啊，呢边系加速，呢边......唔好扭啊——人同车一齐猋咗出去？！
dialogue_tracker.char_1044_hsgma2_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_042: 过唔过嚟饮返杯啊？薄荷茶咋。就算系我，都唔会喺呢个钟数饮酒啰。
dialogue_tracker.char_1044_hsgma2_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_043: 净系你生日呢日㗎咋，博士，想闯咩龙潭虎穴，唔理几危险、几冇道理，就算你应该为自己要面临嘅危险负全责，我都会陪你去。谂好去边度未啊？
dialogue_tracker.char_1044_hsgma2_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_044: 我讨厌时间带走我身边嘅人，不过调返转嚟讲，经过漫长嘅时光，仲留喺我身边嘅人，个个都值得我珍惜，你当然都唔例外......喺时间冲淡一切之前，博士，过嚟陪我坐一阵吖。
dialogue_tracker.char_1045_svash2_CN_001: 你的精力与时间应该用在更重要的地方，难道你还没有找到合适的人来替你处理这些工作？好吧，如果是你的话，我愿意代劳。
dialogue_tracker.char_1045_svash2_CN_002: 诺希斯和锏接手了喀兰贸易的工作，这本不是我许诺他们的事业，我可以体谅他们有些怨言。手段与目的不总是界限分明，至少当我拿起这柄剑斩断退路的时候，我是清醒的。
dialogue_tracker.char_1045_svash2_CN_003: 在为观测站选址作考察的时候，我就知道这样的风景势必会引来许多目光。变革当前，畏缩的守旧者与盲目的投机者下场不会有太大区别。而我必须要确保，谢拉格不会再一次被时代抛下。
dialogue_tracker.char_1045_svash2_CN_004: 我见到了那位议长大人，有相似理想的人总是有相似的困惑，甚至相似的......血亲？父亲当年前往维多利亚时应该不曾想象过与这个国家为敌的未来，那的确是一个简单，也不复存在的时代。
dialogue_tracker.char_1045_svash2_CN_005: 野心家因胆怯而逐权，最终只会发现权力的峰顶空无一物。我？朋友与对手可以让我不至于忘记自己所作所为的意义。不过我很期待，当我踏出了最极端的那一步，你会是那个站在我对面的人。
dialogue_tracker.char_1045_svash2_CN_006: 谢拉格在追求更优越的制度，但国家不会因制度而伟大。在真正的危机面前，我开始相信雪境孕育的民族所拥有的力量。其实恩雅说得对，我并非对信仰毫无敬畏，我只是早已找到了自己的信仰。
dialogue_tracker.char_1045_svash2_CN_007: 没有变数的棋局根本不存在，从某种意义上讲，我们所做的一切事业都是在“赌”。要如何将自己的胜算提升到最高，才是见手段的地方——是我押的驮兽先冲线了，按规矩，你应该干了这杯酒。
dialogue_tracker.char_1045_svash2_CN_008: 恩希亚很珍视与你的友谊。当初请你代为照顾她本是有些无理的请求，但现在看来，是再正确不过的选择。不必再谈什么隔阂，比起所谓的理解，我更期待她去征服下一座高峰。
dialogue_tracker.char_1045_svash2_CN_009: 你在忧虑。掌权者不可不知责任之重，但更不可因此踌躇不前。有时候你要做的只是决定方向，然后交出信任，最简单和最困难的事莫过于此。孤独？不，虽然我的确期待着一个可以并肩而立的对手。
dialogue_tracker.char_1045_svash2_CN_011: 许久不见了，这片大地上变故横生，但谢拉格和罗德岛都不曾倒下。准备好了吗？我相信我们很快就能找回从前共事的默契。银灰，你的盟友，前来助力。
dialogue_tracker.char_1045_svash2_CN_012: 罗德岛的手段总能让我耳目一新。
dialogue_tracker.char_1045_svash2_CN_013: 当你接受我的协议时，你又如何确信罗德岛不在我的谋划当中？不过想来你也乐于接受这样的挑战。
dialogue_tracker.char_1045_svash2_CN_014: 这份合作关系的尽头会是什么？是你我携手征服一切，或者是一场在棋局终点无可回避的对决？不论是哪一种可能，结局都令人期待。
dialogue_tracker.char_1045_svash2_CN_017: 对于战场，我有一些新的体悟。
dialogue_tracker.char_1045_svash2_CN_018: 他们会知道自己将要面对什么。
dialogue_tracker.char_1045_svash2_CN_020: 结局已定，只是他们还看不清。
dialogue_tracker.char_1045_svash2_CN_025: 你们不曾怀疑自己深陷歧途。
dialogue_tracker.char_1045_svash2_CN_026: 你们会后悔自己曾践踏净土。
dialogue_tracker.char_1045_svash2_CN_029: 这样的斗争是否已经无法令你满足？我十分期待你执掌更广阔的棋盘。
dialogue_tracker.char_1045_svash2_CN_030: 令人惊讶的成果，我本以为对于你带来的胜利我早已习以为常。
dialogue_tracker.char_1045_svash2_CN_031: 我是否该相信这是你有意为之......？
dialogue_tracker.char_1045_svash2_CN_032: 输赢不只在这一处，你更应当关注全局。
dialogue_tracker.char_1045_svash2_CN_034: 有兴致对弈的话，我随时奉陪。
dialogue_tracker.char_1045_svash2_CN_038: 恩雅在罗德岛上很开心，有恩希亚陪着她，甚至算得上她最开心的时候......加入她们就免了。不过，这种建议也只有你提才不算越界。我们就在外面看一看雪吧，新年快乐，盟友。
dialogue_tracker.char_1045_svash2_CN_043: 喀兰贸易与商业联合会的会议？你的确很清楚我的日程。不过很显然，今天我有更重要的安排。不用质疑，你当然值得银灰这么做。生日快乐，我的盟友。今天准备怎样度过呢？
dialogue_tracker.char_1045_svash2_CN_044: 罗德岛的事业会改变这片大地的格局，这或许超出了绝大多数人的理解，但我很清楚这一点。我想我们都收到过许多类似的评价，但真正能改变这片大地的人，往往是那些自以为可以做出改变的狂人。
dialogue_tracker.char_1046_sbell2_CN_001: 助理工作啊......呣，现在看来，归类档案的文书类工作和蔓珠院的大家所做的经书整理并无区别，我知道应该如何完成，但......你确定没有更重要、更需要我去做的工作吗？
dialogue_tracker.char_1046_sbell2_CN_002: 我在蔓珠院时，总要用梯子爬上爬下，查阅比砖头还厚的史籍与经书，不过从圣女选拔的仪式看来，能够成为圣女的姑娘本来就有一副健康有力的好身体。唔，果然这些传统都是有原因的呢。
dialogue_tracker.char_1046_sbell2_CN_003: 呣？这个吗？这个是我前不久在工作空余时织的，给恩希亚的生日礼物。就像小时候一样，每隔三年我和父亲都会为全家人编织新的斗篷或是围巾......我知道你要问什么，但是别问。
dialogue_tracker.char_1046_sbell2_CN_004: 怎么还会有使者以为谢拉格是一个遍地精怪的地方......哼，那我也只好按他们的期待，摆出一副吓人的样子，“不想被山雪鬼抓走的话就要表现出诚意”，然后他们就乖乖地在合同上签字了。
dialogue_tracker.char_1046_sbell2_CN_005: 那算是“神迹”吗？唔，谁知道呢。或许只是一阵晚风、一道漂亮的彩虹，但是足以让虔诚的人振奋，让心怀罪孽的人畏惧。当你真的感到无助时，祈祷吧，存在于你心中的“神明”会给你力量的。
dialogue_tracker.char_1046_sbell2_CN_006: 并非耶拉冈德教会了人们美德，而是人们心中的美德借由祂显现，一切的怠惰与罪孽也都借此找到了解释的出口。怎么会责怪呢，认清自身本来就是很难的事，而祂总会在风雪中为孩子们指出一条路。
dialogue_tracker.char_1046_sbell2_CN_007: 宿舍的维修经费不足？让我代表蔓珠院来资助吧，资金会从喀兰贸易董事长的私账......不，别这么说，罗德岛的医疗支援对谢拉格民众的帮助是有目共睹的，恩希欧迪斯先生绝无怨言。
dialogue_tracker.char_1046_sbell2_CN_008: 要帮我梳头发吗？嗯......这个工作可不容易哦？如果没有雅儿和侍女帮忙，我每天不知道要花费多少时间在这上头。我也想过剪短，但我听说有一部分民众会因此难过，所以......
dialogue_tracker.char_1046_sbell2_CN_009: “慈悲的耶拉冈德”，明明是贪玩才跑到这片雪山来的......或许等到她休养好精神就会再次醒来吧。那时候谢拉格又会变成什么样呢？如果真的有神明的话，就请帮她找到回来的路吧。
dialogue_tracker.char_1046_sbell2_CN_010: 嗯？需要审批的文件？呣......博士正在参加一个临时会议，晚点给你回复可以吗？好，我会转交的......呼，Dr.{@nickname}想睡个午觉也真是不容易呢。
dialogue_tracker.char_1046_sbell2_CN_011: 雪境终年环绕的风，飘落不止的雪——谢拉格的初雪，正站在您的面前......这样的开场白，听起来怎么样？让我先进去吧，我们有的是时间寒暄。
dialogue_tracker.char_1046_sbell2_CN_012: “在雪地中要寻找前行者的脚印”——这是耶拉冈德朴实的智慧。
dialogue_tracker.char_1046_sbell2_CN_013: 不，贺礼和新装饰品就免了，圣女的披挂已经足够沉重了。你会希望我轻松点的，不是吗？
dialogue_tracker.char_1046_sbell2_CN_014: “放下得到的一切的一切，忘记失去的一切的一切，只带着对真理的求索、对我们自身的叩问，在最后的终点，我们会回到祂的怀抱。”
dialogue_tracker.char_1046_sbell2_CN_017: 胜利属于心怀信仰之人。
dialogue_tracker.char_1046_sbell2_CN_019: 净化不洁之物，吹散迷瘴之风。
dialogue_tracker.char_1046_sbell2_CN_027: 这是群山许诺于我的力量。
dialogue_tracker.char_1046_sbell2_CN_029: 圣山所见证的胜利。披挂风雪的战士啊，我们即将踏上归途。
dialogue_tracker.char_1046_sbell2_CN_030: “辛苦劳作之后要好好睡一觉”——这是圣女的旨意。
dialogue_tracker.char_1046_sbell2_CN_031: ......利大于弊的结果。在风雪掩盖行迹之前，我们会分辨出需要扬弃的习惯。
dialogue_tracker.char_1046_sbell2_CN_032: ......风雪会隐藏我们的痕迹，给我们重返的机会。
dialogue_tracker.char_1046_sbell2_CN_033: 这儿是不是比之前宽敞了一些？
dialogue_tracker.char_1046_sbell2_CN_034: “耶拉冈德在上，惩戒恶作剧者下午茶吃不到点心。”
dialogue_tracker.char_1046_sbell2_CN_036: 来，摸摸头，摸摸头......赐福？不，不是圣女的赐福，是初雪的赐福才对——某种意义上来说，这个才更稀有呢。
dialogue_tracker.char_1046_sbell2_CN_038: 新年快乐，博士。按照往年谢拉格的习惯，我现在应该正在圣山上彻夜祈福，但......现在是我难得的假期，你应该不会在这个时候和我谈工作吧？嗯？
dialogue_tracker.char_1046_sbell2_CN_042: 老规矩。别告诉任何人我在你这儿，然后给我一条毛毯......啊，这是我最喜欢的一条，你注意到了？......哈......确实，我们在偷空休息这方面一直都很默契。
dialogue_tracker.char_1046_sbell2_CN_043: 按照我知道的情况，写着你名字的礼物都足够堆满一个小宿舍了，所以......把手伸出来吧，罗德岛的第一片雪花会落在你手上。在融化之前，它都是属于你的礼物。
dialogue_tracker.char_1046_sbell2_CN_044: 马特洪峰的积雪不是一日落成的，向前延伸的路途也一样。罗德岛已经在这条路上行过许久，时至今日，还有什么能够阻拦你们的脚步呢？继续前行吧，我的祝福会永远伴随你们。
dialogue_tracker.char_1047_halo2_CN_001: 博士的助理工作我已经轻车熟路啦。不过，别因为我这么说，就把所有事情都推给我哦。
dialogue_tracker.char_1047_halo2_CN_002: 罗德岛的工作轻松多了，你不知道我在观测站有多忙！不但经常干到通宵，同事有问题也爱找我聊，还说什么推荐我去竞选主任......你说我肯定能做得很好？嗯哼——现在想这些还是太早啦。
dialogue_tracker.char_1047_halo2_CN_003: 谢拉格吗？我蛮喜欢那里的，大家都很照顾我。就是第一次和当地助手们合作测试源石样本时，他们突然集体低头，把我吓了一跳。后来才知道，他们是为了我和实验在向耶拉冈德祈祷。
dialogue_tracker.char_1047_halo2_CN_004: 现在莱茵生命的同事们会半开玩笑地和新人聊起我的事，说我曾不顾源石液泄漏也要坚持记录数据，“然而够危险不意味着够重要”之类的。跟你说，其实我一直不服气，重不重要只有未来说了算。
dialogue_tracker.char_1047_halo2_CN_005: 初雪是一位很好的朋友。我可能永远都不会像她和其他谢拉格人那样，对耶拉冈德抱有崇高的敬爱。不过，我能感受到他们澄澈而坚韧的内心，毋庸置疑，这是“神明的存在”。
dialogue_tracker.char_1047_halo2_CN_006: 在谢拉格，有位研究员告诉我，他开始害怕任何新的发现，因为它往往会让已有的科学框架变得难堪。我知道，并不是每一个崇尚科学的人都崇尚进步，但我始终热爱新的可能。
dialogue_tracker.char_1047_halo2_CN_007: 我的父母，最近寄给了姐姐一封长信和许多家乡特产，让她一定要转交给我。尽管我还没有下定决心......不过想问一下博士，罗德岛有什么伴手礼适合送给有些古板的长辈吗？
dialogue_tracker.char_1047_halo2_CN_008: 嗯......啊，博士。这是姐姐给我的星图，我想结合谢拉格的观测数据修正一下......什么时候对星象学感兴趣了？这是前人的一种探索，即使上面有许多谬误，也不意味着它全无价值。
dialogue_tracker.char_1047_halo2_CN_009: 在谢拉格，我第一次见证了无法理解的力量。在科学的道路上走得越远，也就意味着把未知的边界拉得越长......不用担心，我尊重所有对未知的解释，也坚信有一天我会祛除其中的神秘。
dialogue_tracker.char_1047_halo2_CN_010: 欸？博士睡着了吗？那我正好也去打个盹。
dialogue_tracker.char_1047_halo2_CN_011: 博士，很高兴再次见面。我特地回顾了一遍在罗德岛上的生活工作流程，这次什么事我都能做得井井有条了。嗯？之前也对我很满意？嘿嘿......
dialogue_tracker.char_1047_halo2_CN_012: 还有要提高的地方，回去有的忙了。
dialogue_tracker.char_1047_halo2_CN_013: 奖章的款式还是老样子啊，很好看。
dialogue_tracker.char_1047_halo2_CN_014: 万物并不独立于我们而存在，我们观察并改变着一切——这是我对科学的信念。
dialogue_tracker.char_1047_halo2_CN_017: 好久不见，又能和大家一同行动了。
dialogue_tracker.char_1047_halo2_CN_018: “更换火力位置！”......都背下来了，一定没问题。
dialogue_tracker.char_1047_halo2_CN_019: 放心，我记得预定好的时间。
dialogue_tracker.char_1047_halo2_CN_020: 接敌位置符合预期，拿起武器。
dialogue_tracker.char_1047_halo2_CN_028: 人能知晓的力量，绝无止境。
dialogue_tracker.char_1047_halo2_CN_029: 精彩的指挥！嗯？你是说我刚才的表现也......哎呀，只是这次我准备得比较充分嘛。
dialogue_tracker.char_1047_halo2_CN_030: 审慎谋划后达成预期的胜利，现在可以放松啦。
dialogue_tracker.char_1047_halo2_CN_032: 别担心啦，分析出问题就会有解决方法。
dialogue_tracker.char_1047_halo2_CN_036: 不要告诉别人我在这偷懒——你本来不知道的？啊......
dialogue_tracker.char_1047_halo2_CN_038: 哈喽博士，我在实验室待迷糊了，出来透透气，你也是来休息的吗？嗯？新年快乐？都过零点了吗？！本来我还想和姐姐提前去买一些零食......先不管那么多了，新年快乐博士！
dialogue_tracker.char_1047_halo2_CN_042: 你好博士，有空去实验室看看我的新成果吗？
dialogue_tracker.char_1047_halo2_CN_043: 生日快乐！我的礼物是自己做的星象仪哦，我曾经好不容易修复过一个，那时父母还不让我做呢。快关灯看看，它还会发光——觉得有点俗套？就算是开玩笑也不能这么讲啦博士！
dialogue_tracker.char_1047_halo2_CN_044: 人们从纸上所得到的一切，都不比踏足大地或仰望星空更加真实。我期待继续从未知的迷雾中见证奇迹，在莱茵生命，也在罗德岛。
dialogue_tracker.char_106_franka_CN_001: We're changing shifts right now, Doctor. Just ignore me and get on with your work.
dialogue_tracker.char_106_franka_CN_002: Back in BSW, I was appointed as a BPRS... you know, Biochemical Protection Response Staff. You can probably imagine what it was like... bulky hazmat suit and all that...
dialogue_tracker.char_106_franka_CN_003: Hmm? You think I'm a clean freak? Well, Doctor, I see you're unexpectedly direct! I admire your courage.
dialogue_tracker.char_106_franka_CN_004: Some of the Operators' rooms are in dire need of cleaning. For example, the one belonging to that high-and-mighty teacher's pet. What do you think?
dialogue_tracker.char_106_franka_CN_005: You want to see the intricate pattern on my sword up close? Sure, hold it tight, then. Don't let go—it'll heat up to 2,500 degrees Celcius in 3 seconds! Haha, just kidding! Don't be scared!
dialogue_tracker.char_106_franka_CN_006: Stay clear of that room full of chemical haze, toxins and harmful radiation... that's right, I mean Dr. Kal'tsit's lab.
dialogue_tracker.char_106_franka_CN_007: You're asking me for advice regarding the prevention of biochemical contamination? Well, for example... always brush your teeth after eating?
dialogue_tracker.char_106_franka_CN_008: Liskarm's been looking so flashy since she got her promotion. 'Hey! Hot girl here! Get your gunsight on me!' I bet that's how she greets the enemies.
dialogue_tracker.char_106_franka_CN_009: Good golly, if this is how free life is at Rhodes Island then I might just quit my job at BSW. Liskarm would be upset, though.
dialogue_tracker.char_106_franka_CN_010: There's a mosquito on your arm, Doctor.
dialogue_tracker.char_106_franka_CN_011: I'm chemical specialist operator, Franka, here to do my bit to help minimize the pollution wrought by Originium.
dialogue_tracker.char_106_franka_CN_012: I could perform these techniques anywhere, anytime!
dialogue_tracker.char_106_franka_CN_013: Wooow, you're giving me a promotion? I'm having a lot more fun here than at BSW.
dialogue_tracker.char_106_franka_CN_014: *Giggle*, you want to see my sword at its most glorious? Too bad, Doctor—you're not qualified yet! If you work at it, maybe one day you'll gain the privilege!
dialogue_tracker.char_106_franka_CN_018: The best thing about training capable subordinates, is that I get to let them handle all the annoying stuff for me.
dialogue_tracker.char_106_franka_CN_020: Too bad... these people have already been contaminated. In that case...
dialogue_tracker.char_106_franka_CN_023: Offense isn't what I trained for, but hey...
dialogue_tracker.char_106_franka_CN_024: Heavy defenders are SO scary... Hehe, just kidding.
dialogue_tracker.char_106_franka_CN_029: Obsession with power is a fool's game.
dialogue_tracker.char_106_franka_CN_030: That was perfect from start to finish. Well done.
dialogue_tracker.char_106_franka_CN_032: What, you still have time for that upset face? Fall back now.
dialogue_tracker.char_106_franka_CN_033: Say, do you have black tea here?
dialogue_tracker.char_106_franka_CN_036: Want to hear about my time at BSW?
dialogue_tracker.char_106_franka_CN_038: Thanks for the end-of-year bonus, Doctor! It motivates me to work even harder next year. If you've got any tough missions, leave them to me! (Now to get a bonus from Blacksteel too...)
dialogue_tracker.char_106_franka_CN_043: Happy birthday, Doctor! Here's your gift, no tricks attached. Don't forget to make your wish and make it come true! You only live once, after all.
dialogue_tracker.char_106_franka_CN_044: Rhodes Island is a more interesting place than Blacksteel. The medics always look like they're attending my funeral when I get a checkup. It scares me... Yeah, yeah, I know, I'll be good and listen. I have too much on my bucket list to give up now.
dialogue_tracker.char_107_liskam_CN_002: Take all missions seriously: that's the guiding rule for us security professionals.
dialogue_tracker.char_107_liskam_CN_003: I'm actually not that good at dealing with people like Franka. I'm not even sure how we became partners in the first place...
dialogue_tracker.char_107_liskam_CN_004: There's a strict selection process before you qualify for BSW. I'm short, have no outstanding Arts talents, and I'm not from any particularly prestigious bloodline. No one believed that I would make it... not even myself, once upon a time.
dialogue_tracker.char_107_liskam_CN_005: BSW is a top security contractor and a great fit for me, I think. But I do enjoy a little more freedom here when dispatched to Rhodes Island.
dialogue_tracker.char_107_liskam_CN_006: Isn't it amazing how far I've come? I feel like a real dragon... uh, ahem, forget I said that... Anyway, I'm okay with whatever as long as it helps our side in battle!
dialogue_tracker.char_107_liskam_CN_007: Thank you, Doctor, for trusting me this much.
dialogue_tracker.char_107_liskam_CN_008: People who know me always say I'm more easygoing than I seem. Do you think so too, Doctor?
dialogue_tracker.char_107_liskam_CN_009: Franka is telling you about our time at Blacksteel again?  Ahhh, for the love of... Just don't believe anything she says, okay?
dialogue_tracker.char_107_liskam_CN_011: Defender Liskarm, awaiting orders. I've been involved in multiple special operations like VIP protection, assaulting fortified positions, rescuing hostages, and clearing out threats.Your safety is my mission, and I will use every tool at my disposal to guarantee it.
dialogue_tracker.char_107_liskam_CN_013: Thank you for appointing me to this position, Doctor.
dialogue_tracker.char_107_liskam_CN_014: Thank you, Doctor! I will devote myself to defending Rhodes Island, as your trusted Operator.
dialogue_tracker.char_107_liskam_CN_018: Understood. I will ask my team to rigorously adhere to the guidelines and procedures of Rhodes Island.
dialogue_tracker.char_107_liskam_CN_029: This is nothing. Franka and I have been through much worse.
dialogue_tracker.char_107_liskam_CN_031: All green. This area has been secured.
dialogue_tracker.char_107_liskam_CN_032: Emergency squad, retreat with the injured Operators! Everyone who can still fight, follow me and hold back the enemy!
dialogue_tracker.char_107_liskam_CN_033: Is this room protected against electrical discharge?
dialogue_tracker.char_107_liskam_CN_034: Watch out you don't get shocked.
dialogue_tracker.char_107_liskam_CN_036: Doctor, is Franka still being treated? By the way, you need to rest after work.
dialogue_tracker.char_107_liskam_CN_038: Happy New Year! Doctor, Franka says the speech I had prepared before was too standardized and plain, and nobody would go out of their way to ready a New Year's greeting in advance... I don't know what I should say, in that case, so simply wishing you a Happy New Year will have to do. *ahem* Happy New Year.
dialogue_tracker.char_107_liskam_CN_043: Doctor, watch out for Franka's birthday gift. Not one gift she's ever given me has been normal. A two-meter steel sword, a pair oversized paw-shaped woolly slippers... I mean, these quirky presents are clearly up to something! She must be expecting to see me make a fool of myself. Anyway, my present was picked out in earnest. Here, a solar-powered flashlight.
dialogue_tracker.char_107_liskam_CN_044: And I'm done writing. I won't go wrong following this plan—by this time next year, Rhodes Island and I will have made even more notable progress. Restricted? Yes, I put editing privileges in place, or else Franka would've probably added her plans in too and made a whole mess of things.
dialogue_tracker.char_108_silent_CN_001: Doctor, these are your tasks for the day. Yeah. A whole pile of work. Let's get to it.
dialogue_tracker.char_108_silent_CN_002: Is Ifrit making trouble again? Sorry. I'll discipline her later.
dialogue_tracker.char_108_silent_CN_003: Zzzzz… Sorry, I was taking a nap… I'm still not used to working during the day.
dialogue_tracker.char_108_silent_CN_004: My reasons for quitting Rhine Lab? So much happened since I signed on, I don't even know where to start…
dialogue_tracker.char_108_silent_CN_005: Have you ever heard of a woman named Saria? Like me, she was once a scientist at Rhine Lab, and she was one of the people responsible for the creation of Ifrit…
dialogue_tracker.char_108_silent_CN_006: Our biology research at Rhine Lab went so far as to implant Originium Shards into living bodies… Sorry, we'd better change the subject.
dialogue_tracker.char_108_silent_CN_007: Saria? You mean she's here at Rhodes Island too? Is she here for Ifrit…? After she walked out on us like that, why would she come here right now…?!
dialogue_tracker.char_108_silent_CN_008: I will not allow Ifrit to see Saria. Please trust me, this is for Ifrit's own good…!
dialogue_tracker.char_108_silent_CN_009: Are you trying to cure Oripathy too? I heard that you were involved in the development of medical technology at Rhodes Island. Heheh… you must be looking forward to a breakthrough, as a researcher yourself.
dialogue_tracker.char_108_silent_CN_010: …Asleep already? All right. I'll handle the rest of the work.
dialogue_tracker.char_108_silent_CN_011: I am Olivia Silence, an Originium scientist from the Rhine Lab Medical Research Institute. My hope is to rid the world of Oripathy… even if it means risking my life in the process.
dialogue_tracker.char_108_silent_CN_012: I will make good use of this new power.
dialogue_tracker.char_108_silent_CN_013: Is my medicine effective? Wonderful. This news brings me even greater joy than my promotion.
dialogue_tracker.char_108_silent_CN_014: Doctor, I am looking forward to the day when the world is finally cured of Oripathy. In fighting and studying with you, I think that day may not be far off.
dialogue_tracker.char_108_silent_CN_018: Come on, team, let's fight with all our might.
dialogue_tracker.char_108_silent_CN_019: Originium… Are you to blame for this battle?
dialogue_tracker.char_108_silent_CN_020: Observe and determine the form of Infection. Such data will be useful for research.
dialogue_tracker.char_108_silent_CN_029: In order to defeat stronger enemies, must we make further use of Originium's power…?
dialogue_tracker.char_108_silent_CN_030: Medical team, please take tissue samples from the Infected, we need to see the composition of the Infection in this area.
dialogue_tracker.char_108_silent_CN_031: All wounded personnel, please remain calm. The medical team will get to you.
dialogue_tracker.char_108_silent_CN_032: …Now is not the time for despair. We must withdraw immediately.
dialogue_tracker.char_108_silent_CN_033: This room… Ugh… It's like it's designed to make me sleepy!
dialogue_tracker.char_108_silent_CN_038: Have you seen Ifrit, Doctor? They're shooting off fireworks outside, so I'm a little worried… Yes, I'm going back to the lab after I put her to bed. No, I haven't forgotten what day it is. This is just how I want to welcome the new year. Oh right, happy New Year.
dialogue_tracker.char_108_silent_CN_043: Doctor, I have a proposal for your review: a new medical drone model. Oh, and I've heard it's your birthday. I didn't mean it like this, but hopefully you find it a practical gift.
dialogue_tracker.char_108_silent_CN_044: There's no lack of ambition and idealism in the field of life sciences… I myself was drawn by those ideals before I found my true calling. But thanks to Rhodes Island, I now know what I'm researching and fighting for.
dialogue_tracker.char_109_fmout_CN_001: Alright, Doctor, your tarot card for today is...
dialogue_tracker.char_109_fmout_CN_002: Would you like to learn more about your future?
dialogue_tracker.char_109_fmout_CN_003: Bear it in mind that excessive reliance on unfathomed power will eventually backfire on us.
dialogue_tracker.char_109_fmout_CN_004: Tarot cards aren't divine, all-seeing tools. Instead, we use them for guidance when we feel lost.
dialogue_tracker.char_109_fmout_CN_005: Destiny is like the world we walk upon—no one can escape it.
dialogue_tracker.char_109_fmout_CN_006: Humans might never be able to escape this world... but we can change it. Our actions belie endless possibilities.
dialogue_tracker.char_109_fmout_CN_007: There are countless topics for which you can consult the tarot, the most common one being your luck in card games. To change it, however, you must be brave enough to change your fate first.
dialogue_tracker.char_109_fmout_CN_008: We have a ritual among diviners that's all the rage these days. We call it the 'Hand of Fate.' Would you like to try it?
dialogue_tracker.char_109_fmout_CN_009: It's a divination taboo to do readings concerning death. But I don't believe death is the end—it's the beginning of something new.
dialogue_tracker.char_109_fmout_CN_010: Dreams can often enlighten you in strange ways. If you have an enlightening dream like that, you'd best remember every detail, Doctor.
dialogue_tracker.char_109_fmout_CN_011: Following the guidance of the arcana, our paths have finally converged. Nice to meet you, Doctor.
dialogue_tracker.char_109_fmout_CN_013: I'd already foreseen this promotion in my crystal ball. Heheh, just kidding.
dialogue_tracker.char_109_fmout_CN_014: You want to know your destiny, Doctor? Too bad, I can't help you. I'm not the one to share it with you, for the fate forbids me to do so.
dialogue_tracker.char_109_fmout_CN_017: Wait a minute, let me predict the results of this battle.
dialogue_tracker.char_109_fmout_CN_018: Well then, let me pray for everyone.
dialogue_tracker.char_109_fmout_CN_019: Fate is a fickle thing... only the victorious will be forever revered.
dialogue_tracker.char_109_fmout_CN_020: I can see the outcome. Victory belongs to Rhodes Island.
dialogue_tracker.char_109_fmout_CN_028: All will fall before the Priestess's might.
dialogue_tracker.char_109_fmout_CN_029: Will fate have us in a chokehold… or will we turn the table?
dialogue_tracker.char_109_fmout_CN_030: I have moved all of them to the graveyard.
dialogue_tracker.char_109_fmout_CN_032: Impossible... this isn't what I saw in the cards...
dialogue_tracker.char_109_fmout_CN_033: Bad omens seem to lurk inside this room. May I use my powers to help you manage them?
dialogue_tracker.char_109_fmout_CN_034: Hm? What can I do for you?
dialogue_tracker.char_109_fmout_CN_036: Want me to do a reading on your future? All right, please give me a minute.
dialogue_tracker.char_109_fmout_CN_038: Happy new year, Doctor. I bet you are eager to learn your fortune this year from me, aren't you? I have, truth be told, stolen a peek into it. My divination was reliable, as always. Still, only by unveiling the fate's mask with your own hands will you discover what lies beneath, don't you agree? No need to worry, I will be there to help you.
dialogue_tracker.char_109_fmout_CN_042: Doctor, you're blessed by the winds of luck.
dialogue_tracker.char_109_fmout_CN_043: Happy birthday, Doctor. As my birthday gift for you, I will answer any one question from you about the future. Yes, anything will be fine. I would like to remind you though, that I don't offer this knid of chance everyday, so think twice before you ask.
dialogue_tracker.char_109_fmout_CN_044: There's no preordained path where one shall walk, nor predestined fate which one shall suffer. And everyone on Rhodes Island has proved that many, many times. Here, Doctor, Peek into the crystall ball. As long as your heart is not shadowed by the clouds, you will see the light of hope at the end of the haze.
dialogue_tracker.char_110_deepcl_CN_001: Good morning, Doctor. Can I paint a portrait of you? And don't worry, I'll try not to... bring it to life. Besides, it's not like I can bring everything to life, you know.
dialogue_tracker.char_110_deepcl_CN_002: Maybe I wasn't supposed to appear here?…
dialogue_tracker.char_110_deepcl_CN_003: Doctor... what color are you, reflected in my eyes?
dialogue_tracker.char_110_deepcl_CN_004: There are lots of fun, creative things here at Rhodes Island. I'm feeling inspired…
dialogue_tracker.char_110_deepcl_CN_005: See my lovely 'assistants'? Hehe… What? You think they're scary? But, but they're so cute!
dialogue_tracker.char_110_deepcl_CN_006: Heh, so these are the colors of your soul…? Alright then, look at me. And paint me in those colors, your colors.
dialogue_tracker.char_110_deepcl_CN_007: That's right. Even if no one understands me, I'll keep making art. No matter what kinds of monsters my works might become…
dialogue_tracker.char_110_deepcl_CN_008: We artists are a unique breed… We spend at least thirty days a month stuck in a rut, thinking all our work is trash. And we only make any progress when inspiration strikes after midnight.
dialogue_tracker.char_110_deepcl_CN_009: In the end, the mottled world sleeps peacefully in the dark depths—Yes, that's the true color of the ocean. Black is the only color you see? Looks like I still have more to share with you…
dialogue_tracker.char_110_deepcl_CN_010: Are you... dreaming? Is the world in your dreams as colorful as the beings of this world, Doctor…?
dialogue_tracker.char_110_deepcl_CN_011: I'm Deepcolor, a painter. Yes, just a 'painter', nothing more.
dialogue_tracker.char_110_deepcl_CN_013: Um, could you just... stop caring about me? If you keep treating me so well... I-I don't know what I might become…
dialogue_tracker.char_110_deepcl_CN_014: Thank you, Doctor. Now, let's complete this work of art, shall we?
dialogue_tracker.char_110_deepcl_CN_017: You're sending me to fight? Seriously?!
dialogue_tracker.char_110_deepcl_CN_018: I can't lead so many people.
dialogue_tracker.char_110_deepcl_CN_024: Aww, I just need a minute!
dialogue_tracker.char_110_deepcl_CN_027: You'll have to get past my 'assistants' first.
dialogue_tracker.char_110_deepcl_CN_028: Can you defeat my little ones?
dialogue_tracker.char_110_deepcl_CN_029: If you really make me mad... you won't like what happens next.
dialogue_tracker.char_110_deepcl_CN_030: Let me sketch these triumphant heroes.
dialogue_tracker.char_110_deepcl_CN_031: Aw, got my clothes dirty again...
dialogue_tracker.char_110_deepcl_CN_032: If only battles were like sketches. I'd just erase that one and redo it…
dialogue_tracker.char_110_deepcl_CN_033: This room's got a nice design.
dialogue_tracker.char_110_deepcl_CN_036: Doctor, since we happen to have some time off, want to see my latest work?
dialogue_tracker.char_110_deepcl_CN_038: Happy New Year, Doctor. What colors do I see for the coming year? Hm… the aroma of food, smiling operators, and presents full of kindness… a warm, tender turmeric? It's like nothing I've ever felt. I have to get this onto a canvas.
dialogue_tracker.char_110_deepcl_CN_043: Here's a hand-drawn birthday card. Do you like it? Heheh. I have two birthdays myself, in a way. I achieved a new form, after accepting the gift. Here, Doctor, look—I created this color, but it is entirely yours.
dialogue_tracker.char_110_deepcl_CN_044: What day is it? Oh, of course. I see my 'assistants' are all joining in on the fun. Alright, why don't we let them make an even more beautiful piece for Rhodes Island?
dialogue_tracker.char_112_siege_CN_001: You're still not done assigning tasks? I'll wait a bit longer then.
dialogue_tracker.char_112_siege_CN_003: Our meals used to be fairly nice in the past... but the quality's gone downhill since we joined Indra's group.
dialogue_tracker.char_112_siege_CN_004: I had a dream... a dream where the sun rises, and in the distance beyond the horizon... there was my hometown. The place I might never get to return to, ever again.
dialogue_tracker.char_112_siege_CN_005: Before I knew it, I'd gotten accustomed to this drifter's life... It's a strange thing. In the past I never imagined this was how I'd end up.
dialogue_tracker.char_112_siege_CN_006: Gawain and company? I wouldn't say they ran into me, more like they picked me up off the streets.
dialogue_tracker.char_112_siege_CN_007: I used to stand side by side with Indra's team when we fought in the streets of Victoria... Looking back, I suppose it's a fairly fond memory to me.
dialogue_tracker.char_112_siege_CN_008: Stay on your guard! I know you've done the best you can, but there may be unknown dangers beyond our abilities.
dialogue_tracker.char_112_siege_CN_009: If we're ever put in a tough situation... then I may well act on my own motives. And if it comes to that, Doctor, I hope you'll join me too in... no, never mind for now.
dialogue_tracker.char_112_siege_CN_010: Hm? You fell asleep?... I wonder if you ever dream of your hometown, too.
dialogue_tracker.char_112_siege_CN_011: I've passed the strength test, right? So assign me some missions. Don't let this hammer get too bored. My codename? They call me the Siege. Curious name, but it's got a nice ring to it.
dialogue_tracker.char_112_siege_CN_014: Another promotion? All right, thanks... Life is strange like that, you know? Once upon a time, I was the one assigning new ranks to people.
dialogue_tracker.char_112_siege_CN_017: Tell me, is this battle inevitable?
dialogue_tracker.char_112_siege_CN_018: You'd better get used to my combat style.
dialogue_tracker.char_112_siege_CN_019: For want of a nail... the kingdom was lost.
dialogue_tracker.char_112_siege_CN_020: Run while you can. Better to be a coward with a pulse than a martyr with a grave.
dialogue_tracker.char_112_siege_CN_024: We'll take them out all at once.
dialogue_tracker.char_112_siege_CN_025: My weapon chooses its worthy wielder.
dialogue_tracker.char_112_siege_CN_027: A warrior must be ready to face death on the battlefield!
dialogue_tracker.char_112_siege_CN_028: My rule is the balance your lives hang in.
dialogue_tracker.char_112_siege_CN_029: Can bluff, can't take one blow.
dialogue_tracker.char_112_siege_CN_030: Those who refuse to surrender don't deserve mercy.
dialogue_tracker.char_112_siege_CN_032: I'm... more tired than I thought. I apologize...
dialogue_tracker.char_112_siege_CN_033: Do you mind if I get my forty winks in here?
dialogue_tracker.char_112_siege_CN_036: It's too noisy out there for my tastes... I think the silence of your office suits me more. Let me stay in here for a bit, will you?
dialogue_tracker.char_112_siege_CN_038: It's like I can hear an all-too-familiar chime again... I hope the new year's sun will be enough to tear through the hazy Londinium skies.
dialogue_tracker.char_112_siege_CN_043: Happy birthday, Doctor. I look back fondly on the way I used to celebrate this sort of thing with Indra and the gang. We'd drink ourselves half to death, right on the street, and make a racket to match, but that doesn't seem so appropriate now... Still, I've got some lollipops on me. Want one?
dialogue_tracker.char_112_siege_CN_044: Doctor, as a leader, do you ever find yourself confused too? Do you feel the same heavy burden when your choices can impact the fates of so many? I'm not one to flee from my duty, but there is so much that requires careful consideration... I may want some guidance from you.
dialogue_tracker.char_113_cqbw_CN_001: Truthfully, I've thought up countless possibilities about coming back here, looking out at the same scenery that she saw that day... But I never could have imagined that I'd actually be standing here with you. Heh, It's just too outrageous, 'Doctor.'
dialogue_tracker.char_113_cqbw_CN_002: Where'd I go? Can't tell you. Kal'tsit bypassed you and gave me a secret order... I'm lying? Oh my, I'm almost touched by how much you trust her. Fine, fine. I just went to splurge on a bunch of clothes, that's all. And I've already gone through inspection. What, are you surprised?
dialogue_tracker.char_113_cqbw_CN_003: Some of your little cuties are always glaring at me through gritted teeth. But when are they actually gonna find the balls to pick a fight...? Kal'tsit already explained the situation? They're dealing with it? C'mon, show some respect for the needs of your staff. Just let 'em come at me. I'm bored out of my skull here anyway.
dialogue_tracker.char_113_cqbw_CN_004: You used to like working with us mercs a whole bunch. Mercenaries are efficient instruments of war. Just like fast food, ready to eat and easily disposable. You want to know what happened in the past? Hmm, some people would prefer I keep my mouth shut about that topic. Say, it must be such a blessing to not remember anything, right?
dialogue_tracker.char_113_cqbw_CN_005: Save the Infected? Almost all the Sarkaz in Kazdel are infected, and you haven't even seen the kinds of oppression and conflict that go on there... So, how far do you plan to go with this 'salvation'? You got Kal'tsit, who can't even protect ONE single Sarkaz. And you, a goddamned hooded amnesiac. Now, tell me, what are you gonna do?
dialogue_tracker.char_113_cqbw_CN_006: Look at these fresh operators of yours, starry eyes, full of naïvety. Can't help but wonder, if they had to watch those kind and gentle folk die, one by one, would they still do things the same way, with the same old song and dance? Hey, I'm not trying to look down on anyone. I'm just reminding you, don't just go twisting her ideas into some stupid little joke.
dialogue_tracker.char_113_cqbw_CN_007: Hey you, ever noticed those little thingies Amiya wears? You do know that Kal'tsit is keeping stuff from you, right? Man, I thought you were super smart and observant and good at getting everyone to trust you, considering you don't remember a thing. Honestly, it's kinda weird that you can even trust other people. Makes me wonder what those two jerks would say if they saw you like this.
dialogue_tracker.char_113_cqbw_CN_008: This place sure does get all kinds, huh? A lot more weirdos here than before. Oh, don't get me wrong. I don't give a shit what they're thinking. But I gotta say, Amiya's doing a pretty good job. At least she's working hard to become more like a certain someone, and I can't say I hate that.
dialogue_tracker.char_113_cqbw_CN_009: Dr. {@nickname}, since nobody's ever mentioned this to you before, I'm pretty curious how you'll react when you start to remember what happened— Don't give me that confused look. For now, just remember this name: Theresa. Yeah, Theresa.
dialogue_tracker.char_113_cqbw_CN_010: Somebody's got it easy. Never thought there'd come a day when the {@nickname} would be napping here completely defenseless... The past doesn't bug you at all, huh? Sleeping like a baby…
dialogue_tracker.char_113_cqbw_CN_011: Sarkaz mercenary, W. It's been a while, but I guess 'a while' might be something totally different for you. Aw, don't worry, the 'you' here isn't the 'you' I'm looking for. So you're safe, for now. Just for now.
dialogue_tracker.char_113_cqbw_CN_012: This is all too familiar. Kinda scarily familiar. Be straight with me, did you really lose all your memories?
dialogue_tracker.char_113_cqbw_CN_013: Yeah, yeah, I'm listening. Didn't think you'd be this hands-on with stuff. Honestly, I'd rather snatch a medal off someone else than suffer this honor from your hand.
dialogue_tracker.char_113_cqbw_CN_014: It's a funny little thing that I get to fight alongside this version of you. And look, it turns out the two of us can get along. At least, until you remember what happened that day…
dialogue_tracker.char_113_cqbw_CN_017: Hey everybody, let's try to stay alive.
dialogue_tracker.char_113_cqbw_CN_018: A mercenary's leadership is about practicality. Don't expect a babysitter.
dialogue_tracker.char_113_cqbw_CN_020: Kill them all to finish the job, right? Not that simple? What a pain in the ass...
dialogue_tracker.char_113_cqbw_CN_023: Who knows, I might sneak off somewhere.
dialogue_tracker.char_113_cqbw_CN_024: Nice, nice, I'll take a power nap over here.
dialogue_tracker.char_113_cqbw_CN_025: Who's gonna hit the jackpot today?
dialogue_tracker.char_113_cqbw_CN_026: Step right up, plenty of surprises for everyone!
dialogue_tracker.char_113_cqbw_CN_027: You've got until 'three' to surrender. THREE!
dialogue_tracker.char_113_cqbw_CN_029: Seeing you pull a hundred and ten percent out of everyone out there… I feel the nostalgia.
dialogue_tracker.char_113_cqbw_CN_030: Did you see that guy's face just now? The total despair when he realized he was gonna get blown to bits, no matter what he did? Wasn't that hilarious?!
dialogue_tracker.char_113_cqbw_CN_031: You don't usually make mistakes like that. Are you getting rusty, or is there too much on your mind?
dialogue_tracker.char_113_cqbw_CN_032: Retreat? Keep casualties to a minimum? Heh, can't believe those words are coming out of your mouth.
dialogue_tracker.char_113_cqbw_CN_033: This door seems to be repaired, huh.
dialogue_tracker.char_113_cqbw_CN_034: Looks like there's a lot more stuff here, but far fewer people.
dialogue_tracker.char_113_cqbw_CN_036: ...Which side of you is the real one?
dialogue_tracker.char_113_cqbw_CN_038: I hardly ever see Rhodes Island this lively. I take it you guys are fine with kicking back and relaxing then? Unfortunately, I only managed to prepare a few 'surprise' gifts. You should already know what's inside, right? Don’t want any? You sure? Your loss then.
dialogue_tracker.char_113_cqbw_CN_042: Dr. {@nickname}, what would you like to do for Rhodes Island today? The usual?
dialogue_tracker.char_113_cqbw_CN_043: It's today, isn't it? It was a cinch to get my hands on the detailed profile of Rhodes Island's 'Doctor', which means your security sucks as bad as the bombs I made when I was three years old. And look at this, it's your birthday? How many birthday songs packed full of love have you heard by now?
dialogue_tracker.char_113_cqbw_CN_044: What a merry little get-together. This how you and Kal'tsit celebrate the status quo, holding a dinner party in the safety of this place? You know who should really be seeing this? Definitely not the current you, absolutely not the current me, and sure as hell not Kal'tsit, with that perfect memory of hers.
dialogue_tracker.char_113_cqbw_epoque#7_CN_001: Cook this, cook that, my turn to cook again… Oh, it's snowing.
dialogue_tracker.char_113_cqbw_epoque#7_CN_002: Hoederer, what's wrong? The book you wanted me to check out? How should I know? What's that pile of ash in the fire? That's... Oh, I 'mistook' the book for tinder a little while ago. Eh, it's fine. We're cooking dinner with knowledge tonight. It's gonna taste way better than usual, don'tcha think?
dialogue_tracker.char_113_cqbw_epoque#7_CN_003: How much ammo I got? I just used ten grenades, so I have fifteen left. And three mines spent yesterday, so six remaining... See, the numbers are correct. Hold it, I know what you're about to say. 'If only you applied that memory to study and read.' Seriously, Hoederer, you should've been a teacher.
dialogue_tracker.char_113_cqbw_epoque#7_CN_004: Check this potato, Ines got a head like so-Hmm... now that I think of it, you could probably squeeze a bomb into a potato. Maybe a good trick to play on some miserable dumbass. Hey, Hoederer, you want a potato?
dialogue_tracker.char_113_cqbw_epoque#7_CN_005: Hey Hoederer, I've been thinking. If the two of us went at that nasty Kal'tsit together, how do you figure our chances taking her out? I mean, you guys are always planning for all contingencies, so we gotta have a plan for that one too, right? Hah, now that's a funny look on your face.
dialogue_tracker.char_113_cqbw_epoque#7_CN_006: Hey Ines, maybe you should try to learn a thing or two from that {@nickname}. There's not a whole lot of people who could get away with using you as bait. I mean, you only figured it out halfway through. Me? One look at you and Hoederer's faces had my in stitches! Makes me wanna gift the Doctor a potato next time.
dialogue_tracker.char_113_cqbw_epoque#7_CN_007: My name... my name... Hey, Hoederer, you're always reading books, so why don't you come up with a name for me? Theresa said I should come up with a new one... Wait a second, what's with all those books? Pick a name myself?! Go to hell!
dialogue_tracker.char_113_cqbw_epoque#7_CN_008: 'Hoederer, if you've got a death wish, just say so.' 'Ines, trust me. My head's reserved for just you, okay?' That's how your lovers' spat went last time, Ines. I'm just giving you my best impression. What? You mad?
dialogue_tracker.char_113_cqbw_epoque#7_CN_009: As soon as I'm done cooking, Ines always makes me help put up the tent, then Hoederer always drags me somewhere for recon. After that, there's always some kind of strategy meeting... Huh? Hey, Hoederer. Nothing. I was just talking about how I'll come collect your corpses when the two of you drop dead.
dialogue_tracker.char_113_cqbw_epoque#7_CN_010: Haghhh... I'll get some sleep before my next mission...
dialogue_tracker.char_113_cqbw_epoque#7_CN_011: I know what it means to take up the weapons of the dead, naturally.
dialogue_tracker.char_113_cqbw_epoque#7_CN_012: Your acting's too lame. Let me spice things up a little.
dialogue_tracker.char_113_cqbw_epoque#7_CN_013: How many pieces of candy am I worth now? I actually kinda like that method of valuing people. You sure we shouldn't go with that?
dialogue_tracker.char_113_cqbw_epoque#7_CN_014: Theresa called me over and told everyone what an amazing fighter I am, but she didn't look happy at all. How can I make her happy...? What if I invited her over and cooked her a nice dinner?
dialogue_tracker.char_113_cqbw_epoque#7_CN_017: Who's the unlucky one this time?
dialogue_tracker.char_113_cqbw_epoque#7_CN_018: As long as I'm not on the same team as Ines.
dialogue_tracker.char_113_cqbw_epoque#7_CN_019: I'll blow up what I want. You guys do whatever you please.
dialogue_tracker.char_113_cqbw_epoque#7_CN_020: Let me plant some potatoes first.
dialogue_tracker.char_113_cqbw_epoque#7_CN_021: Yeah, yeah, coming. Don't rush me.
dialogue_tracker.char_113_cqbw_epoque#7_CN_022: The plan is to blow them all up, right?
dialogue_tracker.char_113_cqbw_epoque#7_CN_023: I'm in a good mood. Sucks to be you.
dialogue_tracker.char_113_cqbw_epoque#7_CN_024: I'm in a bad mood. Sucks to be you.
dialogue_tracker.char_113_cqbw_epoque#7_CN_025: I wouldn't move that foot, if I were you.
dialogue_tracker.char_113_cqbw_epoque#7_CN_027: Take a guess. Is this potato a bomb?
dialogue_tracker.char_113_cqbw_epoque#7_CN_029: Theresa always says the {@nickname} volunteers for these missions. Must be dying to die.
dialogue_tracker.char_113_cqbw_epoque#7_CN_030: Not a single one left. Babel oughta pay me extra for this.
dialogue_tracker.char_113_cqbw_epoque#7_CN_031: Hmm... If memory serves, I have some potatoes planted over where they're running.
dialogue_tracker.char_113_cqbw_epoque#7_CN_032: If only I brought a few more mines, things would've been different.
dialogue_tracker.char_113_cqbw_epoque#7_CN_033: How come this door still hasn't been fixed?
dialogue_tracker.char_113_cqbw_epoque#7_CN_036: Isn't that the bunny who always follows the Doctor around?
dialogue_tracker.char_113_cqbw_epoque#7_CN_038: Hoederer, do we have another mission? Huh? Theresa's holding a small gathering to celebrate the New Year, and she invited us? Hah. I never thought there would come a day when we'd celebrate the New Year. Wait up, I didn't say I'm not going. Let me grab my camera first!
dialogue_tracker.char_113_cqbw_epoque#7_CN_043: It's bright out, the weather's great, we just knocked out a big mission, and we'll be back at Babel for debrief by sunset. What a great day. Hey, Hoederer, what do you say to a feast?
dialogue_tracker.char_113_cqbw_epoque#7_CN_044: How much longer is this war gonna last? Everyone's doing their best to survive, even though life is nothing but suffering. Or is it more like you can only suffer when you're alive? Hm. Hey, Hoederer, I think I just came up with a quote you might like!
dialogue_tracker.char_115_headbr_CN_001: I'm here to help. So? Whose ass are we kicking next?
dialogue_tracker.char_115_headbr_CN_002: You can't go out without permission? Что? Aren't you the one in charge? Screw the rules, let's just get out.
dialogue_tracker.char_115_headbr_CN_003: You said something? My headphones were on.
dialogue_tracker.char_115_headbr_CN_004: The leader of Rhodes Island looks younger than even Istina. How can you let a kid like that go to battle?!
dialogue_tracker.char_115_headbr_CN_005: Why do I stare at you all the time? 'cause I'm onto you, gotta see what you're doing.
dialogue_tracker.char_115_headbr_CN_006: Every soldier wants to be the general. And I trust you have no opinion on me taking your position someday?
dialogue_tracker.char_115_headbr_CN_007: Plans for the future? Don't have any. You got a problem with that? I'm still young, no need to plan ahead.
dialogue_tracker.char_115_headbr_CN_008: I found Istina and the girls out there in the field. We used to have a bunch more, too. What happened to them…? I dealt with 'em. Had no choice, they wouldn't play nice.
dialogue_tracker.char_115_headbr_CN_009: Huh? Chernobog? Who'd ever wanna go back to that miserable city? We've got new lives here at Rhodes Island. So, let's keep it together, Doctor.
dialogue_tracker.char_115_headbr_CN_011: I'm Zima, leader of the Ursus Student Self-governing Group. I can make do without one, but my comrades need a place to call home. Let's cut the crap, gimme a job to do. I know lodging here ain't free.
dialogue_tracker.char_115_headbr_CN_013: A promotion? Cool! So I'll keep getting promoted if I keep doing a good job knocking heads, yeah?
dialogue_tracker.char_115_headbr_CN_014: I'll be frank: if I keep getting promoted, I might end up replacing you someday. Oh, you think I'm joking? Sorry, pal, I'm dead serious here.
dialogue_tracker.char_115_headbr_CN_017: Don't care if I'm leading or following. Whatever.
dialogue_tracker.char_115_headbr_CN_022: I'm heading into the thick of it.
dialogue_tracker.char_115_headbr_CN_029: Who else has a death wish? Happy to help!
dialogue_tracker.char_115_headbr_CN_031: Anyway, this place is ours now.
dialogue_tracker.char_115_headbr_CN_033: What do you want me to do here?
dialogue_tracker.char_115_headbr_CN_036: Hey, you're getting better at giving orders these days. I bet you also see the fun in fighting now, eh?
dialogue_tracker.char_115_headbr_CN_038: Morning. Everyone's so damned noisy today. All those grown-ass people running around crazy excited for New Year's like a bunch of kids… Say, you aren't planning to waste the first day of the year sitting around here, are you? I bought a whole ton of fireworks, so you're gonna come have some fun with me.
dialogue_tracker.char_115_headbr_CN_043: Privet, this one's for you. Hey, who said you could open it right now? Whatever, not like it's anything special. It plays music, same model as mine. Gets the job done, as far as I'm concerned… You've had my back for a while, so a little token of appreciation is the least I can do. Happy birthday, Doctor.
dialogue_tracker.char_115_headbr_CN_044: Rhodes Island gave us a place to live. I'm not about to forget that. I'm gonna get stronger, strong enough to make sure I'm worthy of the 'General Zima' title - for my comrades. Now, you'd better work twice as hard from here on, or that chair's gonna be mine. I'm dead serious!
dialogue_tracker.char_117_myrrh_CN_001: Pardon, but that report you submitted to Dr. Kal'tsit... we could barely read the last few lines as they are nearly indecipherable... Please don't stay up late so much...
dialogue_tracker.char_117_myrrh_CN_002: So many things in here I've never seen before... Oh, sorry, I shouldn't be looking around... sorry...
dialogue_tracker.char_117_myrrh_CN_003: I know herbs are rather bitter, but people could pay more attention to how effective they are…
dialogue_tracker.char_117_myrrh_CN_004: Um, Doctor... is Harmonia still not getting any better? ... I see... I'll attend to her as soon as I finish work.
dialogue_tracker.char_117_myrrh_CN_005: I know my herbs aren't popular because they're bitter... Aww...but I don't know how to make them taste better... Oh, you mean I should ask around for tips? Bu-bu-but... I'm not that good at small talk... I guess I'll try my best…
dialogue_tracker.char_117_myrrh_CN_006: Harmonia and I would explore all sorts of places together when we were kids. Yeah, we grew up in the city ruins, and were really hoping to see the world outside back then...
dialogue_tracker.char_117_myrrh_CN_007: Harmonia is both my oldest and best friend... But I'm the one to blame for her Oripathy infection, and what she is right now... I will find the cure and make up for the life Oripathy has taken away from her. I promise.
dialogue_tracker.char_117_myrrh_CN_008: Ms. Perfumer suggested that I add some spices into my herbs and now they taste much better! I'm so glad I managed to summon the courage to ask everybody for their advices...
dialogue_tracker.char_117_myrrh_CN_009: Harmonia says I'm in higher spirits these days. Do you agree as well, Doctor? It's all thanks to your timely advice. I wouldn't know what to do without you…
dialogue_tracker.char_117_myrrh_CN_010: Doctor... oh, are you asleep? Yay! Now I can look around the office to my heart's content.
dialogue_tracker.char_117_myrrh_CN_011: Hello, I'm Myrrh, an herbalist. Dr. Kal'tsit gave me this title... she said myrrh symbolizes the ephemerality of life and wanted me to keep this in mind.
dialogue_tracker.char_117_myrrh_CN_012: Thank you so much! This way I'll be able to concoct even better medicine.
dialogue_tracker.char_117_myrrh_CN_013: This is called a... promotion? Is that it...? Um, I don't really know much about stuff like that…
dialogue_tracker.char_117_myrrh_CN_014: This reminds me of childhood with Harmonia, when we explored secret places and abandoned buildings. The more dangerous the place was, the rarer the ingredients we could find.
dialogue_tracker.char_117_myrrh_CN_017: Uh... I'll try my best not to drag everyone down...
dialogue_tracker.char_117_myrrh_CN_018: I'll start by doing my best to make eye contact...
dialogue_tracker.char_117_myrrh_CN_019: Ah, Doctor, I'm ready to go.
dialogue_tracker.char_117_myrrh_CN_020: I'll do my best to make sure no one gets hurt...!
dialogue_tracker.char_117_myrrh_CN_029: We won? Really? Even against those really tough opponents? Wow... you're so cool, Doctor!
dialogue_tracker.char_117_myrrh_CN_030: How's the medicine this time, everyone? ...Um, I guess I'll ask when we get back...
dialogue_tracker.char_117_myrrh_CN_031: So much to do in so little time... Thank goodness I didn't mess up too badly…
dialogue_tracker.char_117_myrrh_CN_033: Uh... I can still smell herbs on my clothes...
dialogue_tracker.char_117_myrrh_CN_036: Excuse me, Doctor. I made you some herb soup good for soothing the body and calming the mind. It's just... a bit bitter…
dialogue_tracker.char_117_myrrh_CN_038: Happy New Year, Doctor. I'm getting the seeds ready to plant my herbs once spring comes. I hope they'll grow strong and healthy, and that... that I won't even need them this year.
dialogue_tracker.char_117_myrrh_CN_043: Happy birthday, Doctor. I've prepared you some pills, based on your health records. They'll help you relax and sleep better. And don't worry, I've coated each one in cake-flavored frosting. If you like them, I can make more for you whenever you want!
dialogue_tracker.char_117_myrrh_CN_044: I came to Rhodes Island to treat my closest friend. But when I got here, I found even more people who needed my aid. I'm so glad my herbal medicine can be useful... I hope that, one day, my herbs will be the most bitter thing anyone in this land has to deal with.
dialogue_tracker.char_118_yuki_CN_002: Princess Fumizuki is my master, and you're my employer.
dialogue_tracker.char_118_yuki_CN_003: My hobby? Standing on the coast, watching the snow fall.
dialogue_tracker.char_118_yuki_CN_006: My weapon? A shuriken, the Silver Wind, made by Eastern Heavy Industries.
dialogue_tracker.char_118_yuki_CN_011: I am Shirayuki. Princess Fumizuki told me to assist Miss Ch'en and follow all your orders.
dialogue_tracker.char_118_yuki_CN_013: A promotion? I, Shirayuki, am honored.
dialogue_tracker.char_118_yuki_CN_014: I, Shirayuki, may devote greater strength to you.
dialogue_tracker.char_118_yuki_CN_020: A snowstorm will bury this battlefield.
dialogue_tracker.char_118_yuki_CN_029: The enemy dies, I advance. I advance, the enemy dies.
dialogue_tracker.char_118_yuki_CN_030: The enemy has fallen. Total victory.
dialogue_tracker.char_118_yuki_CN_031: Of their ranks, some flee. Wariness, a must.
dialogue_tracker.char_118_yuki_CN_032: Should we fight again, we will return the favor one hundredfold.
dialogue_tracker.char_118_yuki_CN_036: Your consideration, I, Shirayuki, will engrave upon my heart.
dialogue_tracker.char_118_yuki_CN_038: Happy New Year. May all proceed as you will it.
dialogue_tracker.char_118_yuki_CN_043: Happy birthday. Please take this present. No, 'tis no bidding of the Princess.
dialogue_tracker.char_118_yuki_CN_044: I, ShiraYuki, here ever keep my watch. In duty, and our bonds.
