dialogue_tracker.char_120_hibisc_CN_001: Did you call for me, Doctor? I feel so happy to be with you!
dialogue_tracker.char_120_hibisc_CN_002: Doctor! Dr. Kal'tsit said that you need to look after your health more. In two words, E-A-T L-E-S-S! So there!
dialogue_tracker.char_120_hibisc_CN_003: You know, Doctor, if my sister starts getting all bossy with you, you have to tell me! She needs my treatment or else!
dialogue_tracker.char_120_hibisc_CN_004: Dr. Kal'tsit teaches me a ton of practical stuff, although it's tough to actually learn! At least I've always had a knack for nutrition, so I think I'm doing well with that!
dialogue_tracker.char_120_hibisc_CN_005: I feel better about everyone here, compared to when I just joined Rhodes Island! And they all eat my healthy food on schedule! But... why does everyone pull these weird faces when they finish?
dialogue_tracker.char_120_hibisc_CN_007: Tadaaaaaah! A special healthy meal just for you, Doctor! Decaf coffee and a hamburger without meat, cheese, pickles, or lettuce! Oh, and a mixed salad made of 12 different vegetables!
dialogue_tracker.char_120_hibisc_CN_008: Hey, Doctor, where does your family live? Are they doing well? I know there's things you can't tell them about because they're your family... but, still, I think you've got to reach out. You have to try, at least.
dialogue_tracker.char_120_hibisc_CN_009: Isn't it lonely cooking all by yourself? Let me help you out! Oh, right, and let's get Lava in here too!
dialogue_tracker.char_120_hibisc_CN_010: Doctor, did you fall asleep? Have a good rest then. You need to sleep plenty to stay healthy.
dialogue_tracker.char_120_hibisc_CN_011: This is intern Hibiscus. From now on, I'll be in charge of managing yours and every Operator's health at Rhodes Island. Thank you for your cooperation!
dialogue_tracker.char_120_hibisc_CN_012: Oh, I see! So that's how you do it!
dialogue_tracker.char_120_hibisc_CN_013: It's my honor to be promoted! I'm looking forward to working under you for the health management of us all, Doctor!
dialogue_tracker.char_120_hibisc_CN_017: I won't fail you! I'll protect everyone!
dialogue_tracker.char_120_hibisc_CN_018: Acknowledged! I'll take good care of everyone! First, I need to get my special sustained-release medicine ready...
dialogue_tracker.char_120_hibisc_CN_019: Please take good care of yourself while I'm gone!
dialogue_tracker.char_120_hibisc_CN_026: I can heal that wound in no time!
dialogue_tracker.char_120_hibisc_CN_029: Even if everyone gets wounded, I can heal them all with my staff!
dialogue_tracker.char_120_hibisc_CN_030: Looking after everyone's health is my greatest motivation.
dialogue_tracker.char_120_hibisc_CN_036: Doctor, do you want to have a taste of my new vitamin drink?
dialogue_tracker.char_120_hibisc_CN_038: Here, Doctor, your new customized healthy daily schedule! Relax, given this full table of gourmet food we have here, I will make an exception today. I will allow you — one bite of fries! That'll be my most generous offer!
dialogue_tracker.char_120_hibisc_CN_042: Doctor! Would you mind tasting this?
dialogue_tracker.char_120_hibisc_CN_043: Stop hiding the cakes, Doctor. They aren't escaping my eyes!... Look at all these cakes you have here! It takes three full teaspoons of sugar to whip the cream for just one of them, let alone the milk and butter that went in there. I know, I understand they are just tokens of appreciation from your fellow operators. But you could have just looked at them — Hey, don't steal a bite when I'm talking!
dialogue_tracker.char_120_hibisc_CN_044: They had a celebration today? I was so occupied that I hardly noticed… Doesn't matter, as long as there are wounded looking for treatment, my job's not finished. Not to mention the goal I set for myself to become a better medic. See you then, Doctor, for I still got works to tend to!
dialogue_tracker.char_121_lava_CN_001: Need something? If you don't ,how about some divination?
dialogue_tracker.char_121_lava_CN_002: Just tell me when there's work to do. But don't ever put her and me on the same team. I hate her guts. And don't get me started on all the weird food she makes me eat... Just thinking about it makes me... euurghh...
dialogue_tracker.char_121_lava_CN_003: No one told me Hibiscus was at Rhodes Island before I got here... It's too late for me to quit now.
dialogue_tracker.char_121_lava_CN_004: If you grow up sheltered, you don't know how to taunt, how to destroy, and how to handle yourself in a real fight. Am I right, Doctor?
dialogue_tracker.char_121_lava_CN_005: Have you ever heard the saying 'little sisters are justice'? If that's true, then my big sis is evil by default... at least as far as I'm concerned.
dialogue_tracker.char_121_lava_CN_007: Instruments? I can play the piano a little. My teacher in Leithanien said learning an instrument can improve your Arts affinity. It also apparently eases the impact that Oripathy has on your mind...
dialogue_tracker.char_121_lava_CN_008: I'm starving... Huh, what's this? You keep sweets in here? Nom... I'm in the middle of training. Should I really be eating this?
dialogue_tracker.char_121_lava_CN_009: See, like, I don't have a big beef with Hibiscus... It's all water under the bridge. I'm fine with her as long as she doesn't force me to eat her medicine and food. After all, she was the one... who saved my life...
dialogue_tracker.char_121_lava_CN_010: I almost envy your ability to sleep like a log...
dialogue_tracker.char_121_lava_CN_011: I'm Lava, a Caster, here to join you simply because I'm bored and want something to do… But I heard my sworn nemesis is here too, though... Can I just quit now?
dialogue_tracker.char_121_lava_CN_013: Did you forget? I don't need a cause to work for, and I don't need a team... but... thanks, I guess...
dialogue_tracker.char_121_lava_CN_017: As far as teamwork's concerned... I don't mind, as long as nobody messes up.
dialogue_tracker.char_121_lava_CN_018: I'm not good at this sort of stuff, but if you insist...
dialogue_tracker.char_121_lava_CN_019: Let's go. Keep an eye on my back.
dialogue_tracker.char_121_lava_CN_020: I can see their souls. They're mine to reap.
dialogue_tracker.char_121_lava_CN_026: Even the dead can't save you.
dialogue_tracker.char_121_lava_CN_029: The supreme form of Arts. I'm interested in seeing what it's like.
dialogue_tracker.char_121_lava_CN_030: I foresaw this result earlier. A perfect victory.
dialogue_tracker.char_121_lava_CN_031: Well… My fortune telling isn't always right. Sometimes there's a lot of external noise that affects the outcome.
dialogue_tracker.char_121_lava_CN_032: Dammit... These evil spirits are too strong...
dialogue_tracker.char_121_lava_CN_033: Oh, come on. I'd rather be alone.
dialogue_tracker.char_121_lava_CN_036: Eh, you're not scoring any points with me like that!
dialogue_tracker.char_121_lava_CN_038: I need your help, Doctor. Tell me, Just in what world do I fall under the category of 'Out of Shape?' I was feeding myself some fried-foulbeast, and that annoying Hibiscus took it away, before peeling the coat off and handing the rest back to me! The crispy, crunchy coat! She took it! Gone! There's *NO* way I can get my hands on what I want to eat with her around! There's gonna be a fight... Ugh! Never mind.
dialogue_tracker.char_121_lava_CN_043: Happy birthday, Doctor. Here, I made you a pair of gloves. And take a look at these beautiful patterns on them! Cool, aren't they? I got them from my divination, which always comes true. You too will learn that in the future.
dialogue_tracker.char_121_lava_CN_044: My infection made my sister's life hell as well. It may not look like it, but deep inside my heart resonates with hers, because what we all want is to help those in need with our hands. Speaking of which, isn't she still on shift today? Huh, how can someone have the right to call me the one that worries when she pushes herself this hard?
dialogue_tracker.char_122_beagle_CN_001: Doctor, I'm your guard for the day! Don't worry, I won't let any sketchy people near you! Just relax!
dialogue_tracker.char_122_beagle_CN_002: My training score for today...? Um, I mean, we could talk about something else...
dialogue_tracker.char_122_beagle_CN_003: I can't shake the pre-battle jitters, and that makes Captain Fang really nervous too... What should I do? Doctor!
dialogue_tracker.char_122_beagle_CN_004: Hibiscus and Lava always complain to me about each other, but both of them are my good friends, and neither of them are wrong... Doctor, what should I do?
dialogue_tracker.char_122_beagle_CN_005: Instructor Dobermann always told us, 'Even when after you finish your training, your number one goal on the battlefield is to stay alive.' Urgh... How can I become as strong and awesome as she is?
dialogue_tracker.char_122_beagle_CN_007: I'm still a rookie Operator, but I'm working hard! Hehehe, I'd really love a compliment or two, if you agree.
dialogue_tracker.char_122_beagle_CN_008: My Oripathy? It doesn't bother me all that much, I'm used to it. I just want to be with the people I care about until my disease gets cured... Ughh...
dialogue_tracker.char_122_beagle_CN_009: I didn't have much confidence before I came here, but I'm so glad that I can protect you and everyone on Rhodes Island! It's my dream to protect everyone! I really wish days like these could last forever.
dialogue_tracker.char_122_beagle_CN_010: Aww... seeing the Doctor sleeping all vulnerable like that makes me want to doodle something on a certain someone's face...
dialogue_tracker.char_122_beagle_CN_011: My codename is Beagle! I know I didn't do very well on my assessment, but I'll still do my best at my internship!
dialogue_tracker.char_122_beagle_CN_012: I did it! I've become stronger!
dialogue_tracker.char_122_beagle_CN_013: Finally, FINALLY! Now nobody's going to call me 'the Rookiest Rookie in the Rookieverse' anymore!
dialogue_tracker.char_122_beagle_CN_018: Huh? I am the leader? I don't feel right about Fang not being the leader...
dialogue_tracker.char_122_beagle_CN_029: It's my duty to protect everyone! My resolve will never falter, no matter the odds!
dialogue_tracker.char_122_beagle_CN_030: All enemies have been defeated! We Rhodes Island Operators are the finest!
dialogue_tracker.char_122_beagle_CN_031: Hooray, we won! Although a few enemies managed to get away... *sigh*...
dialogue_tracker.char_122_beagle_CN_033: What can I do for you?
dialogue_tracker.char_122_beagle_CN_036: Doctor, can I come to your place to study every day?
dialogue_tracker.char_122_beagle_CN_038: Doctor, Happy New Year! Today's a day off, right? So that should mean we don't have to go to training... But just a minute ago, I saw Instructor Dobermann and a bunch of other operators at the training grounds. Maybe that means I should go too...
dialogue_tracker.char_122_beagle_CN_043: D-Doctor, happy birthday! Huh? I—I'm not nervous, not at all. We got you a birthday present, so can you come visit the dorms real quick? But you'll want to be careful! And please don't tell Kroos I was the one who warned you!
dialogue_tracker.char_122_beagle_CN_044: I think—what scares me more than Oripathy is the idea of separating from my friends. I love being here at Rhodes Island with everyone, and making a bunch of new friends too! As long as I keep doing what I can to get stronger, I'll be able to protect them all!
dialogue_tracker.char_123_fang_CN_001: Is there anything I can help you with, Doctor?
dialogue_tracker.char_123_fang_CN_002: Thank you for believing in me! I'll keep up my work!
dialogue_tracker.char_123_fang_CN_003: Hibiscus and Lava are fighting again... What a pain. Why are they like this? They're sisters.
dialogue_tracker.char_123_fang_CN_004: Instructor Dobermann puts us through mock battles a lot, but I can never get a handle on her skill. Doctor, next time you and Amiya observe our training, would you please give us some notes?
dialogue_tracker.char_123_fang_CN_005: Someone on my team is late again, huh? I'll make sure that gets fixed.
dialogue_tracker.char_123_fang_CN_007: Lava and I are both Infected, but I didn't get a talent for Arts like she did...
dialogue_tracker.char_123_fang_CN_008: Rhodes Island is our home and shelter, Doctor. I will protect everyone here with my life.
dialogue_tracker.char_123_fang_CN_009: The ever-honest and reliable Beagle, the perceptive Kroos, the resourceful Lava and the energetic Hibiscus. I like everyone in this team... as long as Hibiscus doesn't force her health food innovations on me.
dialogue_tracker.char_123_fang_CN_010: Shhh! The Doctor's resting. We can talk outside.
dialogue_tracker.char_123_fang_CN_011: Lancer Fang, captain of Reserve Op Team A1. My team and I will do our best to serve Rhodes Island.
dialogue_tracker.char_123_fang_CN_013: Your approval means so much to me, Doctor. This promotion proves my hard work is paying off.
dialogue_tracker.char_123_fang_CN_018: I know the captain's duty well. Rest easy.
dialogue_tracker.char_123_fang_CN_019: Team, check your gear before departing.
dialogue_tracker.char_123_fang_CN_029: With the right plan, even rookies like us can win a tough fight!
dialogue_tracker.char_123_fang_CN_030: We have accomplished our objective as planned.
dialogue_tracker.char_123_fang_CN_031: We can't call a mission complete if we let even a single enemy get through. Beagle, let's do better on the next one.
dialogue_tracker.char_123_fang_CN_032: I'm sorry I failed you, Instructor Dobermann...
dialogue_tracker.char_123_fang_CN_033: Yes. I'm back. Is Kroos here too?
dialogue_tracker.char_123_fang_CN_038: Happy New Year, Doctor. Our team's going to eat dinner together, and we were just about to invite Instructor Dobermann. Would you like to come as well? I have some combat-related questions I'd like to ask, too... Oh, sorry, I know I shouldn't be mentioning work on a holiday.
dialogue_tracker.char_123_fang_CN_042: I'm ready whenever you need me, Doctor.
dialogue_tracker.char_123_fang_CN_043: Doctor, happy birthday! We got you a birthday present as a team. Have you seen Kroos? We agreed to do this together, and she still vanished. Anyway, whatever she told you, just don't believe a word of it, we did actually—awgh! Krooth! Whah ah yoo cavvarin m' mauph phor?!
dialogue_tracker.char_123_fang_CN_044: Looking at our set goals, I've already finished all my training, the other members of my team have made huge progress under Dobermann's instruction too, and we're adapting better and better on the combat side of things. Doctor, I'll be a better captain than I'm now, I promise.
dialogue_tracker.char_124_kroos_CN_001: Doctor, it's such a nice day, so can't we take a little nap?
dialogue_tracker.char_124_kroos_CN_002: Hmm...? We're about to leave? But I just got up... Wait, is this the Doctor's office? How'd I get here?
dialogue_tracker.char_124_kroos_CN_003: Why am I always squinting? Because I don't want anyone to see my eyes. Nope, nobody~
dialogue_tracker.char_124_kroos_CN_004: I'm really careless and get hurt a lot... But Hibiscus heals me every time, so I'm not afraid of getting injured. Oh gosh, that 'Curing Cuisine' of hers though, I'm terrified of it...
dialogue_tracker.char_124_kroos_CN_005: Doctor! Someone left 10 alarm clocks by my bed! Who would do something so awful?!
dialogue_tracker.char_124_kroos_CN_007: Doctor, let's play a game~ Put an apple on your head and we'll start~
dialogue_tracker.char_124_kroos_CN_008: I'm always looking for fun things to do as a way to ease the pain of my Oripathy, I guess. Plus, I love seeing other people smile~
dialogue_tracker.char_124_kroos_CN_009: One day, our journey with Rhodes Island will come to an end, and hopefully we'll all get to have a warm, neverending dream, lying in the sunshine~ That's my number one dream~
dialogue_tracker.char_124_kroos_CN_010: Can't believe the Doctor's a heavier sleeper than me...
dialogue_tracker.char_124_kroos_CN_011: Hi-hiii~ I'm Kroos~ I might be inexperienced, but I'll do the best I can~
dialogue_tracker.char_124_kroos_CN_013: A promotion~ What a lovely dream~ Huh? I'm not dreaming?
dialogue_tracker.char_124_kroos_CN_018: Huhhh~? Fang would make a better captain than me!
dialogue_tracker.char_124_kroos_CN_020: Why can't everyone try to get along...?
dialogue_tracker.char_124_kroos_CN_024: I won't sleep on the job~
dialogue_tracker.char_124_kroos_CN_031: Hmm, I guess this was a bit of a letdown...
dialogue_tracker.char_124_kroos_CN_032: S-sorry... I'll fight harder next time...!
dialogue_tracker.char_124_kroos_CN_033: Can I get my beauty sleep in here?
dialogue_tracker.char_124_kroos_CN_038: Doctor Happy New Year! I'm really sleepy already, so I'm just wishing you a good year ahead of time. How was that can I gave you, tasty? If you liked it, I could give you a few more.
dialogue_tracker.char_124_kroos_CN_043: Fang! You're awful! Doctor, don't be scared, come with me. Hmm? What are you crouching for? There's no water bucket on the door. Pff, your chair's got all four legs too. No hot sauce in your cake either. Heheh, Doctor, Truth is, I haven't pulled a single prank at all! That's what I'm fooling them about!
dialogue_tracker.char_124_kroos_CN_044: It's so fun having everyone together like this. Not a care in the land except what's coming up next and what eats there are. How nice it'll be if every day was like this. Oh, the light show's starting? Let's get moving, Doctor.
dialogue_tracker.char_126_shotst_CN_001: I sense something familiar in the wind. Where are we?
dialogue_tracker.char_126_shotst_CN_002: Do you feel the wind from Kazimierz?
dialogue_tracker.char_126_shotst_CN_003: Rhodes Island is very different from the places I used to live. There's nowhere to start a campfire here... too bad. Maybe on the deck? I'd like to create a space where everyone can talk and grow closer together.
dialogue_tracker.char_126_shotst_CN_004: Umm, how does this mission signup system actually work? I'm really bad at electronics…
dialogue_tracker.char_126_shotst_CN_005: There have been lots of new faces at Rhodes Island. I'll gladly help them adjust to the environment.
dialogue_tracker.char_126_shotst_CN_006: That Kazimierzian knight... Oh, it's her. I knew that girl years ago. She used to be a shy, bookish type. I wonder what made her change so much.
dialogue_tracker.char_126_shotst_CN_007: Shh... look what I found! A solitary Doctor... gotta catch this one! Oh, did I scare you? Haha…
dialogue_tracker.char_126_shotst_CN_008: I sometimes recall the time back home in the forest. We had lots of different competitions every year…ah, the good old days. I wonder what my hometown is like now.
dialogue_tracker.char_126_shotst_CN_009: I'll always have your back, Doctor.
dialogue_tracker.char_126_shotst_CN_010: So you can fall asleep without a care, just like that? Heheh...
dialogue_tracker.char_126_shotst_CN_011: Hello, I'm Meteor, the archer from the woods. Do you need an Operator who excels in long-distance support?
dialogue_tracker.char_126_shotst_CN_012: Archery requires constant practice. No one can afford to slack off for even one day.
dialogue_tracker.char_126_shotst_CN_013: I'm honored to receive this promotion.
dialogue_tracker.char_126_shotst_CN_014: Thank you, Doctor, for recognizing my skill. I'll continue to do my best to serve you.
dialogue_tracker.char_126_shotst_CN_017: Leave the long-distance support to me.
dialogue_tracker.char_126_shotst_CN_020: Time to show them what we can do.
dialogue_tracker.char_126_shotst_CN_022: I've been waiting for a while.
dialogue_tracker.char_126_shotst_CN_023: The wind is blowing in the right direction.
dialogue_tracker.char_126_shotst_CN_029: No matter how difficult the battle, we can handle it, as long as we work together as one.
dialogue_tracker.char_126_shotst_CN_031: All injured personnel, please stay put, don't move. I'll be right there.
dialogue_tracker.char_126_shotst_CN_032: I'm sorry... I didn't want it to end up like this...
dialogue_tracker.char_126_shotst_CN_033: It's hard to get used to such a small room.
dialogue_tracker.char_126_shotst_CN_036: Being by your side feels like basking in the spring sunshine. So warm, so comfy.
dialogue_tracker.char_126_shotst_CN_038: Another year gone by. I wonder if the forests are as I left them? I'm still not too used to modern life, and people still fear Oripathy as much as ever, but the arrival of a new year means the land is once again shining with new life. There's still hope, for everything.
dialogue_tracker.char_126_shotst_CN_043: I found this plant a few days ago on a field mission. It's quite a miraculous one. Even when it's wilted, all it needs is to soak in water for a few nights, and it'll regrow all its leaves and stems—a method that lets it live for a very long time. Happy birthday, and may our fellowship be just like this plant.
dialogue_tracker.char_126_shotst_CN_044: Oh dear, these electronic appliances never make it easy. But I've been making progress, don't you think? Some of the things you call 'old-fashioned' just suit me better, like this bow. After using it for so many years, it has my total trust.
dialogue_tracker.char_127_estell_CN_001: Uh... w-where should I stand? O-oh, you want me to sit? Then... where should I sit?
dialogue_tracker.char_127_estell_CN_002: That little bird is my friend. But it's always disappearing on me these days... Oh no... It's not disliking me, is it...
dialogue_tracker.char_127_estell_CN_003: The way I look... is nothing like an Operator at all... And I understand having someone like me in your team won't make you pround... But don't worry, I won't go around saying I'm with Rhodes Island.
dialogue_tracker.char_127_estell_CN_004: You've probably noticed, but my hair is quite difficult to style... So I have to let my hair down like this... It's not very appropriate, is it?
dialogue_tracker.char_127_estell_CN_005: My mutant horns... they don't really fit in with the crowd... I thought I was used to other people staring at them... but … but it's still embarrassing...
dialogue_tracker.char_127_estell_CN_006: The friends I made in the wilderness... they're all coming to Rhodes Island too. So... I'll feel less lonely. I'll do my best to fight hard and protect everyone.
dialogue_tracker.char_127_estell_CN_007: Actually, ever since my childhood, I've always been dreaming to be a... a princess... I-I mean it's okay if you find it ridiculous...
dialogue_tracker.char_127_estell_CN_008: The bad guys always call me 'freak'... but… yeah, I'm a freak, a freak that wants to protect you and everyone else.
dialogue_tracker.char_127_estell_CN_009: Um... that really energetic doctor... she's an Archosaurian too, huh? I do want to talk to her... but I'm still a bit scared…
dialogue_tracker.char_127_estell_CN_010: No one's staring at me now, right? Ah, finally...
dialogue_tracker.char_127_estell_CN_011: H-hello... Uh... s-sorry, my horns... I accidentally broke your office door with my horns...
dialogue_tracker.char_127_estell_CN_012: Powers stronger than what I already have... can I really control them...?
dialogue_tracker.char_127_estell_CN_013: Promotion? What's that?... I don't really get it, but I think it means that I've been helpful, right?
dialogue_tracker.char_127_estell_CN_014: Thank you, Doctor, for giving me a bit more confidence... Now I am starting to understand what to do and how to wield my power.
dialogue_tracker.char_127_estell_CN_018: Wahh... me? R-really? Is that really okay?
dialogue_tracker.char_127_estell_CN_019: Uh, everyone... it's... it's time to attack! I-is this how I'm supposed to give orders?
dialogue_tracker.char_127_estell_CN_020: I... I won't let the bad guys win!
dialogue_tracker.char_127_estell_CN_023: My pushover look should pull a lot of enemies here...
dialogue_tracker.char_127_estell_CN_024: To intimidate the enemy... I... I'm capable of that, right?
dialogue_tracker.char_127_estell_CN_027: I won't let you escape this easily!
dialogue_tracker.char_127_estell_CN_029: I can do better... yes, even better!
dialogue_tracker.char_127_estell_CN_030: Are you proud of what we've achieved, Doctor?
dialogue_tracker.char_127_estell_CN_032: In the end... I'm good for nothing... just as expected...
dialogue_tracker.char_127_estell_CN_033: Wow, this place... it's so spacious! I love it!
dialogue_tracker.char_127_estell_CN_036: You're always so kind to me... I... I'm so happy!
dialogue_tracker.char_127_estell_CN_038: Happy New Year, Doctor... My wish is to get along better with everyone. Will I be able to do that? And make more friends as well... is that allowed? Having friends...
dialogue_tracker.char_127_estell_CN_043: Doctor, this is a gift I made... My friend on my head shed a bunch of feathers, which I made into a pendant. I hope you like it...
dialogue_tracker.char_127_estell_CN_044: Fighting makes me feel useful... You've always thought so? T-Thanks, Doctor... And outside of battle as well? I... Gavial and Tomimi said so too? Am I... dreaming?
dialogue_tracker.char_128_plosis_CN_001: Greetings Doctor. How may I assist you?
dialogue_tracker.char_128_plosis_CN_002: Deep Sleep Mode enabled... Zzzzz... Setting advanced config and power interface... Zzzzz…
dialogue_tracker.char_128_plosis_CN_003: My racial traits, in conjunction with my infection, may cause me to fall asleep in mid-conversation. Do not be alarmed.
dialogue_tracker.char_128_plosis_CN_004: I met Dr. Silence at Rhine Lab. I assisted her with data and risk analysis on a secret project.
dialogue_tracker.char_128_plosis_CN_005: Warning! Formatting Rhodes Island database... Don't worry. It's just a joke. Please don't panic.
dialogue_tracker.char_128_plosis_CN_006: I recommend you refactor my data if optimization fails to increase my performance. This will improve communication efficiency, and Ptilopsis will... Zzzz...
dialogue_tracker.char_128_plosis_CN_007: The way I speak? It is a side effect of Originium poisoning. By no means do I enjoy articulating my thoughts this way.
dialogue_tracker.char_128_plosis_CN_008: Warning, system has recovered from a fatal error. Reconfiguring to last normal system boot point. Do not be alarmed.
dialogue_tracker.char_128_plosis_CN_009: It is, in fact, quite burdensome to speak in this manner. But this is a necessary measure to prevent the system nexus from being devoured by that other voice. Doctor, if I lose control, please guide me back onto the right path.
dialogue_tracker.char_128_plosis_CN_010: System... is now in Sleep Mode...
dialogue_tracker.char_128_plosis_CN_011: I am Ptilopsis, former data analyst at Rhine Lab. Please submit your orders via the Command Line.
dialogue_tracker.char_128_plosis_CN_013: Update installation complete. Ptilopsis's system permissions have been revised.
dialogue_tracker.char_128_plosis_CN_014: Warning. Reverting Rhodes Island database to previous save state. Time since save state: two years… Just joking. Please calm down. System update complete.
dialogue_tracker.char_128_plosis_CN_017: New data used to assemble package build.
dialogue_tracker.char_128_plosis_CN_019: Direct memory access for application map and enemy coordinates authorized. Please stand by.
dialogue_tracker.char_128_plosis_CN_029: Even such a challenging scenario couldn't stop you, Doctor. Perhaps one day you will find the solution to the non-deterministic polynomial time problem.
dialogue_tracker.char_128_plosis_CN_030: Your logical deduction was absolutely correct. What a perfect calculation.
dialogue_tracker.char_128_plosis_CN_031: A number of errors have been detected. Please confirm.
dialogue_tracker.char_128_plosis_CN_032: A fatal error occurred during the operation. Reboot the system to proceed.
dialogue_tracker.char_128_plosis_CN_033: Is this place like a disk array?
dialogue_tracker.char_128_plosis_CN_036: Detecting affection increase for the Doctor within Ptilopsis. Would you like to skip to the next dialogue choice?
dialogue_tracker.char_128_plosis_CN_038: Loading… Loading complete. File name: New Year. Date modified: twelve hours ago. Updating entry contents: Doctor, Happy New Year! Your present has been placed on your desk. Open it and take a look!
dialogue_tracker.char_128_plosis_CN_042: Date rollover complete. The Doctor is now online. Detecting emotional surge within Ptilopsis.
dialogue_tracker.char_128_plosis_CN_043: Doctor, people celebrate their own dates of birth. How do you wish to celebrate yours? Acknowledged. Increasing favor rating of Doctor. Error: Invalid operation. Cause of failure: favor rating is already at—maximum.
dialogue_tracker.char_128_plosis_CN_044: Zzzzz... Detected passage of the Doctor. What is the Doctor laughing at...? Scanning hairstyle condition of Ptilopsis... Detected three pigtails, five bows, five colored bands, two clips. Assumed to be practical joke by Ifrit... Final assessment: Adorable.
dialogue_tracker.char_129_bluep_CN_001: Greetings, Doctor. You're glowing today. To see you so well... it's all I could ever hope for.
dialogue_tracker.char_129_bluep_CN_002: I prepared an antidote to nullify the effects of any common poison. I'd like you to take one dose before every battle. Do you mind?
dialogue_tracker.char_129_bluep_CN_003: Actually, the toxin in my body is an ingredient in some high-quality medicines. That's why Dr. Kal'tsit needs me in her lab a lot.
dialogue_tracker.char_129_bluep_CN_004: Hmm, why do you keep staring at me... You mean, it's because my eye color is special? Is that a compliment, Doctor?
dialogue_tracker.char_129_bluep_CN_005: I'm the one our enemies fear the most. After all, who wouldn't want to kill me before I can torture them to death with my poison? What really worries me is that my teammates might think the same…
dialogue_tracker.char_129_bluep_CN_006: Why am I staring at this cake? Actually... I baked it to share with everyone, but no one wanted it... Would you like to try it, Doctor?
dialogue_tracker.char_129_bluep_CN_007: Doctor, you're always wearing the same outfit. How about I choose some new clothes for you? I think I have pretty good taste. Oh... it's a uniform? So you can't change it? Okay…
dialogue_tracker.char_129_bluep_CN_008: I'm 'toxic'... so people prefer to stay away from me. But now I have you by my side, Doctor, and I'm really, really happy.
dialogue_tracker.char_129_bluep_CN_009: My body isn't that different from everyone else. I may be 'toxic,' but nothing bad will happen if someone touches me. Doctor, if you can prove this to everyone, then maybe they won't always keep away from me. Could you... hold my hand out there?
dialogue_tracker.char_129_bluep_CN_010: Doctor? Oh, already asleep. Gotta find a blanket to keep the Doctor warm...
dialogue_tracker.char_129_bluep_CN_011: Nice to meet you, I'm Blue Poison. I'm sure Dr. Kal'tsit must have told you about me. In that case, it'll be up to you to decide how to use my 'toxic' powers.
dialogue_tracker.char_129_bluep_CN_012: I think I hear the sound of toxic liquid boiling, like music to my ears.
dialogue_tracker.char_129_bluep_CN_013: Thank you so much... I'm so glad I get to help out in all these battles. It's like a dream come true.
dialogue_tracker.char_129_bluep_CN_014: I used to hold back and hide my 'toxic' self, but now I've accepted what I am, trying to move forward to change my fate. I have you to thank for helping me make this shift, Doctor. You have my sincerest gratitude.
dialogue_tracker.char_129_bluep_CN_017: Great. I'm good at supporting assaults.
dialogue_tracker.char_129_bluep_CN_018: I'd be much better off supporting the others. Wouldn't want my poison to harm you, Doctor...
dialogue_tracker.char_129_bluep_CN_019: Everyone, there's no need for you all to stand so far from me...
dialogue_tracker.char_129_bluep_CN_020: I prepared a 'gift' for you. Like it?
dialogue_tracker.char_129_bluep_CN_022: Please don't be scared of me.
dialogue_tracker.char_129_bluep_CN_023: Don't worry, my poison is not contagious.
dialogue_tracker.char_129_bluep_CN_025: My toxins will slowly burn your life away...
dialogue_tracker.char_129_bluep_CN_027: Honey to me, poison to you.
dialogue_tracker.char_129_bluep_CN_029: Use poison to fight the evils and crimes... Isn't that ironic to you?
dialogue_tracker.char_129_bluep_CN_030: I've got a poison to melt away all these remains in an instant. Want me to show you?
dialogue_tracker.char_129_bluep_CN_031: Good, finished before my clothes got dirty.
dialogue_tracker.char_129_bluep_CN_032: How ridiculous. Feels like I killed myself with my own poison...
dialogue_tracker.char_129_bluep_CN_033: Resting when you're tired helps you focus on your work.
dialogue_tracker.char_129_bluep_CN_036: D-Did you just touch me? C-Can you do that again? Please?
dialogue_tracker.char_129_bluep_CN_038: Well there, Doctor, Happy New Year. Although, given what day it is, won't you take your uniform off? I was assuming you'd put on something new, but maybe you just don't pay much attention to your appearence.  It's a little frustrating—I have no idea what would be a good gift for you.
dialogue_tracker.char_129_bluep_CN_043: Doctor, happy birthday. A dessert from me—please, take it. And if it's okay, I'd like you to give it a taste right now. What is it? Everyone's watching? I don't see the problem. You're a regular whenever I make snacks, aren't you?
dialogue_tracker.char_129_bluep_CN_044: I am a 'toxic' person, but I still have a place of my own here... It makes me so happy. The operators might still be slightly scared of me, but that's it. They don't reject me that much. Just give it enough time, and the relationships between us will be fine, won't they?
dialogue_tracker.char_130_doberm_CN_001: Doctor, are the new recruits keeping up with my basic training regimen?
dialogue_tracker.char_130_doberm_CN_002: A balanced, regular diet is also an important part of daily training. Any complainers get fifty laps around the deck.
dialogue_tracker.char_130_doberm_CN_003: As a military instructor, it's important to achieve the perfect balance between strictness and leniency. To be honest... I may be a bit too hard on Fang...
dialogue_tracker.char_130_doberm_CN_004: When putting your Operators into squads, it's crucial to assign them positions where they can exercise their skills to the fullest. It's true that Operators' ability is important, what's really being tested here is your judgement.
dialogue_tracker.char_130_doberm_CN_005: Doctor, when training Operators, you need to work on spiritual fulfillment as much as improving their physiques and skills. After all, they need to be mentally strong enough to survive interrogations and all sorts of attacks on their minds.
dialogue_tracker.char_130_doberm_CN_006: You're looking for the newbies? They're training out on the deck. Yes, I do realize what the weather's like right now. Of course I do.
dialogue_tracker.char_130_doberm_CN_007: Anomalies... ha. You can never fool the eyes of the 'Hound'.
dialogue_tracker.char_130_doberm_CN_008: If you believe that command allows you to slack off whenever you want, then I WILL correct your misconception, Doctor.
dialogue_tracker.char_130_doberm_CN_009: If I hope to remain at your side through all the difficulties to come, I must be even harder on myself. After all, with the world around us being what it is... the only way we can keep it together is to keep training our mental strength.
dialogue_tracker.char_130_doberm_CN_011: Attention! I am Dobermann, former military instructor for the Bolívarian armed forces. Now, let's cut to the chase. Hand over the list of Operators in need of training.
dialogue_tracker.char_130_doberm_CN_012: This is how our training pays off.
dialogue_tracker.char_130_doberm_CN_013: Promotion, huh? Thanks. I'm just doing my job.
dialogue_tracker.char_130_doberm_CN_014: The responsibility for training the future of Rhodes Island is on my shoulders. I will do my best to be worthy of that responsibility.
dialogue_tracker.char_130_doberm_CN_018: Then show me the briefing docs for the mission.
dialogue_tracker.char_130_doberm_CN_019: Calling all hands. This is not a drill!
dialogue_tracker.char_130_doberm_CN_029: No matter the challenges we face, strong fundamental combat skills can mean the difference between life and death.
dialogue_tracker.char_130_doberm_CN_030: Come back when you're less mediocre.
dialogue_tracker.char_130_doberm_CN_031: The operation was successful, but we still have room for improvement.
dialogue_tracker.char_130_doberm_CN_032: We have failed. I am the one to blame.
dialogue_tracker.char_130_doberm_CN_033: The newbies are intimidated by me, you say? That's only natural.
dialogue_tracker.char_130_doberm_CN_036: You want to cheer me up? Hm, let me interrogate someone, then.
dialogue_tracker.char_130_doberm_CN_038: Whether a workday or a holiday, I'm always on standby. You should keep your guard up too, Doctor.
dialogue_tracker.char_130_doberm_CN_043: Happy birthday, Doctor. Today is a day worth celebrating, but nevertheless, I'll have to ask you focus on work before this evening's birthday party. Sorry, please forget everything I said about 'birthday party.'
dialogue_tracker.char_130_doberm_CN_044: I always feel a sense of pride, watching as the novices grow step by step. Of course, I don't view that as a contribution to Rhodes Island, but I do walk together with them. Doctor. Never forget your calling, on the road to come.
dialogue_tracker.char_131_flameb_CN_001: {@nickname}, compared to the old ones, today's battle are too relaxed and juvenile. They are weak. Weak enough to make weapons rust. And once a warrior's weapons rust, death soon follows.
dialogue_tracker.char_131_flameb_CN_002: Life is but a brief flicker before the vast maw of annihilation. Cherish that view of the sunset while you still can, {@nickname}.
dialogue_tracker.char_131_flameb_CN_003: Practical exercises? Nah, I'm not interested. While Rhodes Island boasts many powerful warriors, squandering one's physical strength on a game is wasteful. Only on the edge of life and death does the clashing of swords have value.
dialogue_tracker.char_131_flameb_CN_004: I'm not concerned with the plight of the Infected? Hmph, don't misunderstand me - fighting in vain is what I hate. No enemy worth spilling my blood has come forward, and that's all there is to it.
dialogue_tracker.char_131_flameb_CN_005: Rampant slaughter liberates your inner instinct, 'teamwork' only robs you of it. What 'trust' and 'strategizing' buy you are nothing but illusions of security. And these illusions, {@nickname}, will one day cost you your life.
dialogue_tracker.char_131_flameb_CN_006: This blade ran through two crown princes, and this other one slew three generals. In our chaotic world, anything can happen. I don't know who will claim my life, but on that day, I sure hope it'll be more exciting than when I took these lives.
dialogue_tracker.char_131_flameb_CN_007: Shining, huh? A pity, she could have been a worthy adversary. But after she got pulled into that mess with the 'Confessarii,' I bet she felt her blade had been besmirched. Hmph, Swordsmen without faith in their swords are beneath mention.
dialogue_tracker.char_131_flameb_CN_008: {@nickname}, you remember that battle, right? After killing all the ambushers, I led the survivors and charged straight into the traitor's fortress. I was the only one who made it out alive. How did it all start? Oh, you know the answer to that. I've seen you before, and my memory is very good.
dialogue_tracker.char_131_flameb_CN_009: {@nickname}, help me fetch those seeds in the cupboard, won't you? Thank you. Yes, I'm actually quite fond of flowers. No matter how brilliantly they blossom, their petals must wither and fall into the wind. When will the petals wither next, Doctor?
dialogue_tracker.char_131_flameb_CN_011: We meet again, {@nickname}. Don't worry, I understand the situation you're in now, and pose no threat to you. I shall be your blade, so use me as you see fit, Doctor.
dialogue_tracker.char_131_flameb_CN_012: The skills a great warrior needs are those which defy recording.
dialogue_tracker.char_131_flameb_CN_013: Promotion? What? So you actually care about these rituals now?
dialogue_tracker.char_131_flameb_CN_014: I have no concept of what it's like to be Infected. Perhaps Rhodes Island can help me understand. I don't care, but if you have your own considerations. Fine, I'll hear them out.
dialogue_tracker.char_131_flameb_CN_017: Ahh, I've longed for a hurricane of blood.
dialogue_tracker.char_131_flameb_CN_018: I've been a captain before, and it didn't end well.
dialogue_tracker.char_131_flameb_CN_019: I will bathe in their blood.
dialogue_tracker.char_131_flameb_CN_023: So, who shall be my opponent?
dialogue_tracker.char_131_flameb_CN_024: Will it be you? Or maybe you?
dialogue_tracker.char_131_flameb_CN_027: Whose name will you cry as you pass?
dialogue_tracker.char_131_flameb_CN_030: A weak enemy proves nothing. Search for a worthier battlefield.
dialogue_tracker.char_131_flameb_CN_031: A dedicated opponent will prove to be a worthy adversary in the future, let them do just that.
dialogue_tracker.char_131_flameb_CN_032: The rest of you, go. It has always been my job to destroy the pursuing enemy.
dialogue_tracker.char_131_flameb_CN_036: You're just in time, I find myself in need of a whetstone…
dialogue_tracker.char_131_flameb_CN_038: Time never ceases to pass. If you make no progress at this stage in your journey, then as a wizened tree does, your hours will rot away, and lose any ability to meet the coming spring. Happy New Year, {@nickname}, and don't forget your own goals.
dialogue_tracker.char_131_flameb_CN_043: Here is a flower I grew. Take it. You don't need to assign it too much meaning. All I hope is that before you greet life's withering, you come upon a time in which you blossom at full might. Happy birthday.
dialogue_tracker.char_131_flameb_CN_044: I think of what reasons brought me to Rhodes Island, Doctor, and there is only you. I allow you to use me as your blade, but in kind, you provide me amusing prey and durable whetstones. But don't disappoint me. For if you do, I cannot guarantee that someday this blade will not point at you.
dialogue_tracker.char_133_mm_CN_001: Doctor, I may be in your employ, but every murderer is probably somebody's old friend—so if your conduct is even slightly suspect, I won't turn a blind eye!
dialogue_tracker.char_133_mm_CN_002: This Rhodes Island has no less of a suspicious smell about it…
dialogue_tracker.char_133_mm_CN_003: Careful observation is fundamental to all investigatory work! Elementary, true, but it always comes in handy!
dialogue_tracker.char_133_mm_CN_004: You there! Face this way, hands where I can see them! Ah, sorry, I thought you were someone else…
dialogue_tracker.char_133_mm_CN_005: I've always had my misgivings about that penguin. I mean, it spends money like water, and it's a PENGUIN! It even has a gold necklace on! Do you know how LITTLE detectives like us make in a month?
dialogue_tracker.char_133_mm_CN_006: Mmmgh... so frustrating! How do I get my investigation on that suspect logistics company started? Do I break in? Hrmm, not when those two guards look so dead fierce... No, no, I'm not scared... I'm just warming up the little grey cells!
dialogue_tracker.char_133_mm_CN_007: What are you giving me anpan for? I don't eat this sort of thing while I'm mid-investigation—you must be getting funny ideas from all those TV shows! When a real detective's on the case, it's doughnuts or nothing!
dialogue_tracker.char_133_mm_CN_008: You told me it was only for three months. But after three months came another three months, and another. I've been almost ten months undercover, guv! ...Hey! I see you there! Stop eavesdropping on my call!
dialogue_tracker.char_133_mm_CN_009: Doctor, I fear that penguin has noticed I've been investigating it... I fear for my life, too...!
dialogue_tracker.char_133_mm_CN_010: Wake up! Waaake uppp! No sleeping on the jooob!
dialogue_tracker.char_133_mm_CN_011: I'm Royal Detective May, and I ask you cooperate with me in my investigation! Eh? I've got the wrong address? Impossible! That penguin's holed up here, and I have the evidence!
dialogue_tracker.char_133_mm_CN_012: Don't I look so dashing when I'm on the case?
dialogue_tracker.char_133_mm_CN_013: Thank you for the promotion, guv'nor! I'm so grateful you... Wait, forget that! You're not even my ACTUAL superior!
dialogue_tracker.char_133_mm_CN_014: Elite team? Wait, wait, wait, wait, wait, I'm a Royal Detective! Why is some mercenary organization the one promoting me?!
dialogue_tracker.char_133_mm_CN_017: No letting any suspects sneak onto the team, okay?
dialogue_tracker.char_133_mm_CN_018: Heheheh! Leader? Nay, call me DETECTIVE CHIEF INSPECTOR!
dialogue_tracker.char_133_mm_CN_019: All units move out! Mooove ooout!!
dialogue_tracker.char_133_mm_CN_020: You criminals! Behave and turn yourselves in!
dialogue_tracker.char_133_mm_CN_024: I'll need to see proof of identity!
dialogue_tracker.char_133_mm_CN_027: I'll give you a taste of my taser!
dialogue_tracker.char_133_mm_CN_028: It won't hurt, you'll just get a little buzz!
dialogue_tracker.char_133_mm_CN_029: For a master detective, there is no case that can't be solved!
dialogue_tracker.char_133_mm_CN_030: I want all these suspects taken away! Ohh, fine, I'll do it myself...
dialogue_tracker.char_133_mm_CN_031: Hmm... I feel like we've missed some clues, haven't we?
dialogue_tracker.char_133_mm_CN_033: My instinct tells me there'll be a case afoot here!
dialogue_tracker.char_133_mm_CN_034: You and your villainous hand! I'll remember this!
dialogue_tracker.char_133_mm_CN_036: D-don't think this is some express ticket to clearing your name...!
dialogue_tracker.char_133_mm_CN_038: Doctor, Happy New Year! I solved plenty more cases last year as a Royal Detective! The only thing is, I'm still a little ways away from baring the truth of Penguin Logistics... Not that an inspector leaves any puzzle unsolved! I've got to give it my all this year too!
dialogue_tracker.char_133_mm_CN_043: Shh, shhh—not a word, hear me out first! I'll bet you anything it's your birthday today, isn't it? You see, I didn't seek ANY verbal testimony, not when I could simply let the available clues inform my mental deductions! By the way, I also happened to deduce this is a present you'll love—doughnuts!
dialogue_tracker.char_133_mm_CN_044: Streamers stuck up, snacks laid out, balloons of every color. Yes, one truth prevails! Doctor, based on my deductions, today must be some holiday celebration! What? They sent an advance notice to every operator's terminal yesterday? It can't be!!
dialogue_tracker.char_134_ifrit_CN_001: Why is this office so damn cold?! Hey, you there! You okay with me using that for kindling?
dialogue_tracker.char_134_ifrit_CN_002: Oh, How much did you say this book costs? Haha, pricey. Call me Mistress Ifrit and I'll give it back to you.
dialogue_tracker.char_134_ifrit_CN_003: Huh? You want me to read this book? I hate it when people try to tell me… It's from Silence? Really? Urgh... Wha-what does this word mean here?
dialogue_tracker.char_134_ifrit_CN_004: I hate it when you white coat creepers stare at me... Yeah, I mean you! What'cha looking at? Go stare at something else!
dialogue_tracker.char_134_ifrit_CN_005: Um... Okay, fine. No more scaring people with fire.
dialogue_tracker.char_134_ifrit_CN_006: Back off! You... Why are you coming at me like that? You wanna strap me to a lab table too?
dialogue_tracker.char_134_ifrit_CN_007: Saria's here? I want to see her— Silence says no? C'mon, what's the big deal? Just take me to her and keep it off the record!
dialogue_tracker.char_134_ifrit_CN_008: Why are Silence and Saria arguing all the time? I don't get it... Hey! You gotta know how to get them to make up, right? C'mon, just tell me… I mean, please...?
dialogue_tracker.char_134_ifrit_CN_009: I don't care what you think of me, but you'd better be nice to Silence. When she wants something, you go get it for her! Do that, and your wish is my command.
dialogue_tracker.char_134_ifrit_CN_010: You little...! You've got guts to ignore me and slack off like this!
dialogue_tracker.char_134_ifrit_CN_011: You stand before the almighty Ifrit! Hmph, Silence says Rhodes Island's a nice place, but there's nothing I hate more than you white-coat science creepers... I mean, except Silence...
dialogue_tracker.char_134_ifrit_CN_012: Stronger...? Hmm, that means my flames can burn brighter, right?
dialogue_tracker.char_134_ifrit_CN_013: What's this? Promotion Manual for Rhodes Island Operators? Guess I'll give it a peek... What the hell? So many rules even after I get promoted? Nah-uh, pass.
dialogue_tracker.char_134_ifrit_CN_014: Haha, that's right! I don't give a damn about all those rules. But, if you say you're counting on me, then that's all the words I need!
dialogue_tracker.char_134_ifrit_CN_018: I'm the captain? So, just do like Silence would, right?
dialogue_tracker.char_134_ifrit_CN_019: Hey! They made me the captain, so I'm the one calling the shots here!
dialogue_tracker.char_134_ifrit_CN_025: Does it hurt? I bet it does!
dialogue_tracker.char_134_ifrit_CN_027: Shriek all you want! Nobody cares!
dialogue_tracker.char_134_ifrit_CN_028: Get in the line of death!
dialogue_tracker.char_134_ifrit_CN_029: Weak, you're all too weak! I am invincibllllle!
dialogue_tracker.char_134_ifrit_CN_030: Why don't we torch all the trash into kindling? It'll be nice and warm!
dialogue_tracker.char_134_ifrit_CN_031: Nothing but cinders left now. I could've handled this all by myself!
dialogue_tracker.char_134_ifrit_CN_032: Damn you... You made a fool out of me!
dialogue_tracker.char_134_ifrit_CN_033: What kind of place is this? Huh?
dialogue_tracker.char_134_ifrit_CN_034: The hell are you doing here?
dialogue_tracker.char_134_ifrit_CN_036: Heheh, you're nicer than I expected. Wanna hang out?
dialogue_tracker.char_134_ifrit_CN_038: New Year's? Hah, no sweat, Silence taught me about New Year's forever ago. You celebrate all of last year, and make your resolutions or whatever for next year! My resolutions? Hey, what's with the homework? Silence said I don't have to do any today! Beat it!
dialogue_tracker.char_134_ifrit_CN_043: Feast your eyes on the great Ifrit's handmade chocolate cake! Silence taught me, and I got it right on the first try! I know, I know, I'm the best! ...Wh-What the hell? How come it melted?
dialogue_tracker.char_134_ifrit_CN_044: What's the deal outside today, why's it so noisy? Whoooa, there's a party! Is there a barbecue? I'm really good at barbecue, everyone should come eat mine! Which means, it's time to stoke the fire… What? We're not doing it on a charcoal grill? Boring! Where'd my grill go? Shaw confiscated it? Arrrrrrgh—
dialogue_tracker.char_135_halo_CN_001: No problem. I've done all of this before, and I won't have any trouble handling it, but let's be up front, Doctor: If you come to me in the evening with a stack of documents and tell me to sort everything out that night, chances are that you might not get what you want.
dialogue_tracker.char_135_halo_CN_002: Research is actually kind of a pain. Sometimes, you go all in on your research. Other times, you have to spend time going over progress with somebody else. You need to know your specialty like the back of your hand, and you also need people skills. If I wasn't already decent at both, my head would've exploded a long time ago.
dialogue_tracker.char_135_halo_CN_003: My sister Astesia is really good at our family's chicanery, but she only ever uses it to help people. To think there would be such a pure, kind-hearted shyster running around... Oh, Doctor, don't tell anyone about this! Please, I'm begging you! If she finds out I told, Astesia will whap me upside the head!
dialogue_tracker.char_135_halo_CN_004: Rhine Lab? Hmm... Sorry, I don't really want to talk about them right now. If that place were really so great, I wouldn't have asked for a transfer to Rhodes Island, right? Okay, break time's over! Back to work!
dialogue_tracker.char_135_halo_CN_005: I'm the one who got infected, but then even Astesia... *sigh*... You probably can't tell, but she's actually pretty depressed. Enough is enough, I gotta do something to help her.
dialogue_tracker.char_135_halo_CN_006: Columbia's technology keeps advancing, and as a researcher, I can almost see that future I'm looking for. My dream is right there, and I'm going to make it come true.
dialogue_tracker.char_135_halo_CN_007: Our family's... well, how should I say this? My parents are the old-fashioned type that like to order people around. They don't care about your opinions, only the joy of being in control. It sucks. That's why I haven't been back home since college. Now they can't stop me from studying the stuff I like.
dialogue_tracker.char_135_halo_CN_008: There are those who help because they really want people to have a better life, but there are also those who help so they can use people as stepping stones. Doctor, you know how to tell the two apart, don't you? It's easy. You just need to look at the way they smile.
dialogue_tracker.char_135_halo_CN_009: My dad's kinda famous back in the city, and our names are a little peculiar, so I thought I'd give myself a new name to get away from all that trouble. But feel free to call me whatever you want, Doctor. We're friends, don't sweat it.
dialogue_tracker.char_135_halo_CN_010: Yes, this is the Doctor's office. Yes, the Doctor is resting right now. Please call back later.
dialogue_tracker.char_135_halo_CN_011: Researcher Elena Urbica of Rhine Lab. A pleasure to make your acquaintance. We're supposed to call each other by codenames here, right? No problem. In that case, call me Astgenne. It's simple and easy to remember.
dialogue_tracker.char_135_halo_CN_012: I don't think I've seen a problem like that before. Gotta take notes...
dialogue_tracker.char_135_halo_CN_013: What a pretty medal! Let me help you pin it on. Hm? How come you're the one wearing it instead of me? Isn't this commemorating your good eye for people?
dialogue_tracker.char_135_halo_CN_014: Let's join together and break the shackles, Doctor! The future is unfolding right before our eyes!
dialogue_tracker.char_135_halo_CN_018: Hold on a sec. I'll finish reading the team leader's messages in a jiffy.
dialogue_tracker.char_135_halo_CN_019: All charged up and ready to go.
dialogue_tracker.char_135_halo_CN_020: I'll show you the power of technology.
dialogue_tracker.char_135_halo_CN_025: Miracles don't just drop out of the sky.
dialogue_tracker.char_135_halo_CN_027: I'm not gonna sit here and wait for my demise.
dialogue_tracker.char_135_halo_CN_028: My lightning will illuminate the starry sky!
dialogue_tracker.char_135_halo_CN_029: You had even the finest details under control. You must be a professional.
dialogue_tracker.char_135_halo_CN_030: I knew everything was going to be okay.
dialogue_tracker.char_135_halo_CN_031: Everything's under control~ Just a little scuffed, that's all...
dialogue_tracker.char_135_halo_CN_032: No way... How could my calculation have...?
dialogue_tracker.char_135_halo_CN_033: Let's see how far this is from my workstation...
dialogue_tracker.char_135_halo_CN_036: Oh, Doctor! What a coincidence running into you here! Why don't we go shopping together?
dialogue_tracker.char_135_halo_CN_038: Hm, that's another year, come and gone. It's time to come up with new plans. No, it's not really that much work. All you have to do is make a wish and keep it in mind. Your first wish of the year is always the easiest to fulfill. Give it a try.
dialogue_tracker.char_135_halo_CN_043: Happy birthday! Come, come! Here's my present for you. Crack it open~ What do you think? This music box is great, isn't it? Hehe~ Doctor, you know when my birthday is, don't you? I'm expecting a surprise when the time comes. It's a promise~
dialogue_tracker.char_135_halo_CN_044: Time to get up and stretch a little, Doctor. All that trouble won't go away just because you spend a couple more minutes grinding away. Come on, share a dance with me and move your body. Don't worry, it's not hard. Just take my hand, step forward. Right... Right, like that. Does it feel like your body just lightened up some?
dialogue_tracker.char_136_hsguma_CN_001: Relax, Doctor. I'll keep you safe.
dialogue_tracker.char_136_hsguma_CN_002: Lots of new recruits lately, many new faces. Don't let your guard down.
dialogue_tracker.char_136_hsguma_CN_003: If something happens, don't forget to use the emergency communication channel. Just call me and I'll come running.
dialogue_tracker.char_136_hsguma_CN_004: I sound cold when I talk? I'm on the clock. I'm a lot less serious when I'm off.
dialogue_tracker.char_136_hsguma_CN_005: Rhodes Island needs more than just combat Operators. You need experts in education, PR, and all kinds of stuff.
dialogue_tracker.char_136_hsguma_CN_006: I used to only get called in for the nastiest fights, but now every fight is a nasty one.
dialogue_tracker.char_136_hsguma_CN_007: This shield has a name: Hannya. I brought it from my hometown. Its 'father' and mine were old friends. Back in the L.G.D., my superiors would always tease me about it, but together we've proven that a shield makes a great weapon, and so do I.
dialogue_tracker.char_136_hsguma_CN_008: Hannya's tasted plenty of Lungmen gangster blood. I never thought it'd win me many friends, but the ones who looked down on me started showing me some respect after all that had happened. Or maybe they're just scared of how big I am? What do you think?
dialogue_tracker.char_136_hsguma_CN_009: How about another shot...? Oh, you've had enough? Don't sweat it... I can carry you back to your room if you pass out. What? That worries you even more? C'mon, don't be a buzzkill.
dialogue_tracker.char_136_hsguma_CN_010: Hm? Heh. Nothing. Just guarding you, Doctor.
dialogue_tracker.char_136_hsguma_CN_011: Hoshiguma, Defender Operator. I'll be your shield, your blade, your fortress. Very glad to meet you, Doctor.
dialogue_tracker.char_136_hsguma_CN_012: It's all thanks to your teaching, Doctor.
dialogue_tracker.char_136_hsguma_CN_014: No one tells me where I'm going, and no one can stop me once I make up my mind. And now—I've made up my mind to follow you, Doctor.
dialogue_tracker.char_136_hsguma_CN_018: Protecting Rhodes Island is my responsibility too.
dialogue_tracker.char_136_hsguma_CN_019: I want everyone to get home safe.
dialogue_tracker.char_136_hsguma_CN_020: If you've got a reason to fight, you've got a reason to die!
dialogue_tracker.char_136_hsguma_CN_026: If you want to hurt my friends, you have to go through my shield first.
dialogue_tracker.char_136_hsguma_CN_028: Hannya, unleash the rage your father poured into you!
dialogue_tracker.char_136_hsguma_CN_029: The harder the journey, the stronger you'll become.
dialogue_tracker.char_136_hsguma_CN_030: Hurting my friends right in front of me? I'll make you pay!
dialogue_tracker.char_136_hsguma_CN_031: Are you hurt? I'm sorry. I failed.
dialogue_tracker.char_136_hsguma_CN_032: Fall back, now! I'll bring up the rear!
dialogue_tracker.char_136_hsguma_CN_033: With my size... it's kind of hard to get through the door.
dialogue_tracker.char_136_hsguma_CN_036: Doctor, you should take a load off now that we finally got a break.
dialogue_tracker.char_136_hsguma_CN_038: Happy New Year, Doctor. Seeing as both you and I have the day off from official business, how about we head out and shake ourselves off? Want to ride on my bike and catch the breeze, or maybe let's find some place to drink? It's your call. Oh, but, hehe, can't do both. Never drink and drive.
dialogue_tracker.char_136_hsguma_CN_043: Phew, arrived on time. Didn't ride all that way for nothing—I was almost speeding, actually. Anyway, Doctor, happy birthday! I brought you a special pre—uh, where's my bag? I didn't drop it on the way, did I...? Ah, shoot. Doctor, how about I make up the present to you next time, and I'll treat you to some food for today?
dialogue_tracker.char_136_hsguma_CN_044: I might not be alongside Rhodes Island forever, but the camaraderie we built in battle, that's something the L.G.D., my Hannya, and me will remember. My commitment to protecting Rhodes Island will never change. Doctor, when times are troubled from here on, give me a call.
dialogue_tracker.char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_001: Relax, Doctor. I'll keep you safe.
dialogue_tracker.char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_002: Lots of new recruits lately, many new faces. Don't let your guard down.
dialogue_tracker.char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_003: If something happens, don't forget to use the emergency communication channel. Just call me and I'll come running.
dialogue_tracker.char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_004: I sound cold when I talk? I'm on the clock. I'm a lot less serious when I'm off.
dialogue_tracker.char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_005: Rhodes Island needs more than just combat Operators. You need experts in education, PR, and all kinds of stuff.
dialogue_tracker.char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_006: I used to only get called in for the nastiest fights, but now every fight is a nasty one.
dialogue_tracker.char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_007: This shield has a name: Hannya. I brought it from my hometown. Its 'father' and mine were old friends. Back in the L.G.D., my superiors would always tease me about it, but together we've proven that a shield makes a great weapon, and so do I.
dialogue_tracker.char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_008: Hannya's tasted plenty of Lungmen gangster blood. I never thought it'd win me many friends, but the ones who looked down on me started showing me some respect after all that had happened. Or maybe they're just scared of how big I am? What do you think?
dialogue_tracker.char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_009: How about another shot...? Oh, you've had enough? Don't sweat it... I can carry you back to your room if you pass out. What? That worries you even more? C'mon, don't be a buzzkill.
dialogue_tracker.char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_010: Hm? Heh. Nothing. Just guarding you, Doctor.
dialogue_tracker.char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_011: Hoshiguma, Defender Operator. I'll be your shield, your blade, your fortress. Very glad to meet you, Doctor.
dialogue_tracker.char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_012: It's all thanks to your teaching, Doctor.
dialogue_tracker.char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_014: No one tells me where I'm going, and no one can stop me once I make up my mind. And now—I've made up my mind to follow you, Doctor.
dialogue_tracker.char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_018: Protecting Rhodes Island is my responsibility too.
dialogue_tracker.char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_019: I want everyone to get home safe.
dialogue_tracker.char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_020: If you've got a reason to fight, you've got a reason to die!
dialogue_tracker.char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_026: If you want to hurt my friends, you have to go through my shield first.
dialogue_tracker.char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_028: Hannya, unleash the rage your father poured into you!
dialogue_tracker.char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_029: The harder the journey, the stronger you'll become.
dialogue_tracker.char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_030: Hurting my friends right in front of me? I'll make you pay!
dialogue_tracker.char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_031: Are you hurt? I'm sorry. I failed.
dialogue_tracker.char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_032: Fall back, now! I'll bring up the rear!
dialogue_tracker.char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_033: With my size... it's kind of hard to get through the door.
dialogue_tracker.char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_036: Doctor, you should take a load off now that we finally got a break.
dialogue_tracker.char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_038: Happy New Year, Doctor. Seeing as both you and I have the day off from official business, how about we head out and shake ourselves off? Want to ride on my bike and catch the breeze, or maybe let's find some place to drink? It's your call. Oh, but, hehe, can't do both. Never drink and drive.
dialogue_tracker.char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_043: Phew, arrived on time. Didn't ride all that way for nothing—I was almost speeding, actually. Anyway, Doctor, happy birthday! I brought you a special pre—uh, where's my bag? I didn't drop it on the way, did I...? Ah, shoot. Doctor, how about I make up the present to you next time, and I'll treat you to some food for today?
dialogue_tracker.char_136_hsguma_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_044: I might not be alongside Rhodes Island forever, but the camaraderie we built in battle, that's something the L.G.D., my Hannya, and me will remember. My commitment to protecting Rhodes Island will never change. Doctor, when times are troubled from here on, give me a call.
dialogue_tracker.char_137_brownb_CN_001: Boss, let's go grab a bite. On you this time. What? You bought last time? Doesn't sound right to me.
dialogue_tracker.char_137_brownb_CN_002: Use my head to win fights? Hmm… Hmm… Pummel them until I win, train harder if I lose. That's using your head!
dialogue_tracker.char_137_brownb_CN_003: Honey's sweet, but getting it hurts. I went for some the other day… They really give me a hard lesson.
dialogue_tracker.char_137_brownb_CN_004: My knuckles? Haha~ They're my precious babies. Wouldn't have racked up all those wins without 'em!
dialogue_tracker.char_137_brownb_CN_005: There's more rules in the underground fight scene than you might think. Plenty of gopniks dove in before they had 'em figured out. They usually ended up dead.
dialogue_tracker.char_137_brownb_CN_006: Oripathy? Who cares? Infected, Uninfected... They're all the same after I knock their lights out.
dialogue_tracker.char_137_brownb_CN_007: What? The fin in the kitchen? Hah! Right here in my belly now!
dialogue_tracker.char_137_brownb_CN_008: My book of names here? Ah, looks like that big brain of yours doesn't know everything. Gotta meet people to fight people, right? I don't want to run out of enemies.
dialogue_tracker.char_137_brownb_CN_009: The only reason I joined the underground fight is 'cause I didn't have two kopecks to rub together. But here on Rhodes Island I got that load off my mind. It's all thanks to you, Boss!
dialogue_tracker.char_137_brownb_CN_011: Yo! Boss, you know a winner when you see her! Now, put your hands together for the strongest underground fighter out there. The one! The only! BEEEEEEEE-HUNTERRRRRR!
dialogue_tracker.char_137_brownb_CN_012: I really don't wanna study. Send me out to fight already!
dialogue_tracker.char_137_brownb_CN_013: Hah hah hah! Somebody likes me a lot!
dialogue_tracker.char_137_brownb_CN_014: Hah! After this promotion, ain't no way I'm gonna let you down! Lemme show you what I can do in a fight, Boss!
dialogue_tracker.char_137_brownb_CN_018: Chow's on me after we win this one!
dialogue_tracker.char_137_brownb_CN_019: Relax, Boss. Ain't nobody can go three rounds with me!
dialogue_tracker.char_137_brownb_CN_020: So you're the ones looking for a beatdown. You guys?
dialogue_tracker.char_137_brownb_CN_029: The stronger the matchup, the more pumped I get!
dialogue_tracker.char_137_brownb_CN_030: K.O.! Check it out, Boss. See 'em all piled up there?
dialogue_tracker.char_137_brownb_CN_031: That's a wrap. Let's head back and chow down!
dialogue_tracker.char_137_brownb_CN_032: Ouch… Where's the Boss? Is the Boss okay?!
dialogue_tracker.char_137_brownb_CN_033: This room's a lot better than any I had before!
dialogue_tracker.char_137_brownb_CN_036: You brought food? You're the best, Boss!
dialogue_tracker.char_137_brownb_CN_038: Hey, hey, hey! There you are, boss! I was just out having some honey with the others! Man, it's nice to have a stable income. Now I can buy as much honey as I want. Sure beats gathering it myself, with all the stinging... You're the best, boss!
dialogue_tracker.char_137_brownb_CN_043: Honey-grilled fins! I just came up with the recipe a few days ago, and it's sure to be a blast! Same goes for fin jerky with honey. Why aren't I sharing any then? I couldn't hold myself back and ate it all last night.
dialogue_tracker.char_137_brownb_CN_044: The way Rhodes Island fights is different from what I'm used to, but that doesn't bother me one bit! And I only learned after coming here how many people look down on the Infected. But don't worry! Me and my fist will change their minds!
dialogue_tracker.char_140_whitew_CN_001: Ehi, Doctor. Hope you don't mind if I bring my weapons inside. I'll plop myself right over here.
dialogue_tracker.char_140_whitew_CN_002: Somebody out to get you, huh? Then have a long, hard think about who you might've wronged in the past.
dialogue_tracker.char_140_whitew_CN_003: If someone's out for revenge on you, don't hesitate, just take them out. Once you decide to pick up a weapon, you don't need a reason to kill.
dialogue_tracker.char_140_whitew_CN_004: It's been a while... I see that Texas made some friends. Hehehe... Affascinante! Can't wait to get to know them!
dialogue_tracker.char_140_whitew_CN_005: You think I'm an assassin, huh? Yeah, alright. Call me whatever you want. I can be anyone, do anything, kill anyone anytime. Just so long as I want to!
dialogue_tracker.char_140_whitew_CN_006: I love power, Doctor. And you offered me a job where I can use my power to my heart's content... Love it. Honestly, the only joy I get out of this insane world is using my power to conquer it.
dialogue_tracker.char_140_whitew_CN_007: Texas? Ha, she's afraid of me, but I don't wanna do anything to her, except maybe try to bring back the old Texas. The one we got here's a cucciolo impaurito.
dialogue_tracker.char_140_whitew_CN_008: That red one... oh... Doctor, keep her away from me! She'd definitely kill me in a fight. But I have this feeling... this feeling... ugh, why do I want to fight her so badly?
dialogue_tracker.char_140_whitew_CN_009: You want to know what happened between me and Texas? Hehe, you don't have a single idea of what you are sticking your nose into. You'll find out the truth someday, but not from me.
dialogue_tracker.char_140_whitew_CN_010: Sleep tight... enjoy your sweet dreams while you still can.
dialogue_tracker.char_140_whitew_CN_011: A great evil stands in the way of justice. My master, in the name of hatred and revenge, lead the weak onward!
dialogue_tracker.char_140_whitew_CN_012: Don't you just love how I keep getting more and more powerful?
dialogue_tracker.char_140_whitew_CN_013: Hahaha! Bene! I love how much you trust me. You can't say the same for Texas, right?
dialogue_tracker.char_140_whitew_CN_014: Molto bene! That's more like it! Strength, unfettered and unchained! That's what I'm talking about!
dialogue_tracker.char_140_whitew_CN_019: Haha, you people... I don't think I'll even remember your faces after this one... Anyway, let's just get started.
dialogue_tracker.char_140_whitew_CN_020: We're fighting you guys? Then please do your bestest job, or I'll be really bored.
dialogue_tracker.char_140_whitew_CN_028: You'll have to try harder than that!
dialogue_tracker.char_140_whitew_CN_030: Hahaha, sliced 'em up like a millefoglie. How do you like it?
dialogue_tracker.char_140_whitew_CN_031: Not my best work. You can lay it on me for letting a few get away.
dialogue_tracker.char_140_whitew_CN_032: Bravo! Now I want to crush them that much harder! Hahaha!
dialogue_tracker.char_140_whitew_CN_033: Hm? Did I see a red shadow flash by?
dialogue_tracker.char_140_whitew_CN_036: The more I get to know you, the better I understand Texas. I Love it.
dialogue_tracker.char_140_whitew_CN_038: Where's Texas? It's almost time for the countdown, shouldn't she be at Rhodes Island? Hah, to think I don't even get to see her on a day like this. Where are those precious friends of hers? I'm going to find Texas. Wanna come with, Doctor?
dialogue_tracker.char_140_whitew_CN_043: Is it so strange that I got you a gift? Do you not like it, or did you just not expect it…? I can tell by your face, you loved my gift, didn't you? What did Texas give you? Let me see! Whose do you like better?
dialogue_tracker.char_140_whitew_CN_044: Here, take some whiskey, add a little amaretto, then put it on the rocks. Wanna sip? Hehe. In Siracusa, we call this a 'Luci Spente,' and one sip means you're killing the guy next to you. Texas? She'll never tell you this, but she used to love this drink. Come, salute!
dialogue_tracker.char_140_whitew_ITA_CN_001: Ehi, Doctor. Hope you don't mind if I bring my weapons inside. I'll plop myself right over here.
dialogue_tracker.char_140_whitew_ITA_CN_002: Somebody out to get you, huh? Then have a long, hard think about who you might've wronged in the past.

dialogue_tracker.char_140_whitew_ITA_CN_012: Don't you just love how I keep getting more and more powerful?

dialogue_tracker.char_140_whitew_ITA_CN_014: Molto bene! That's more like it! Strength, unfettered and unchained! That's what I'm talking about!
dialogue_tracker.char_140_whitew_ITA_CN_019: Haha, you people... I don't think I'll even remember your faces after this one... Anyway, let's just get started.

dialogue_tracker.char_140_whitew_ITA_CN_028: You'll have to try harder than that!

dialogue_tracker.char_140_whitew_ITA_CN_031: Not my best work. You can lay it on me for letting a few get away.
dialogue_tracker.char_140_whitew_ITA_CN_032: Bravo! Now I want to crush them that much harder! Hahaha!
dialogue_tracker.char_140_whitew_ITA_CN_033: Hm? Did I see a red shadow flash by?
dialogue_tracker.char_140_whitew_ITA_CN_036: The more I get to know you, the better I understand Texas. I Love it.
dialogue_tracker.char_140_whitew_ITA_CN_038: Where's Texas? It's almost time for the countdown, shouldn't she be at Rhodes Island? Hah, to think I don't even get to see her on a day like this. Where are those precious friends of hers? I'm going to find Texas. Wanna come with, Doctor?
dialogue_tracker.char_140_whitew_ITA_CN_043: Is it so strange that I got you a gift? Do you not like it, or did you just not expect it…? I can tell by your face, you loved my gift, didn't you? What did Texas give you? Let me see! Whose do you like better?
dialogue_tracker.char_140_whitew_ITA_CN_044: Here, take some whiskey, add a little amaretto, then put it on the rocks. Wanna sip? Hehe. In Siracusa, we call this a 'Luci Spente,' and one sip means you're killing the guy next to you. Texas? She'll never tell you this, but she used to love this drink. Come, salute!
dialogue_tracker.char_141_nights_CN_001: Didn't notice me behind you, eh? It's only natural. I'm a cat. We're known for being silent prowlers!
dialogue_tracker.char_141_nights_CN_002: Hey, don't touch my hat... it's crazy, you know! If it feeds you too many secrets, Doctor, you'll be in trouble.
dialogue_tracker.char_141_nights_CN_003: So rare to see a pharma take in runaway kitties from a jail. Did you all want a peek at my maps? Or,  was it some advice on prison breaks?
dialogue_tracker.char_141_nights_CN_004: We thieves have our own principles and standards too... perhaps. Who can say?
dialogue_tracker.char_141_nights_CN_005: Meow, meow, meow... Meow? Never you mind, I'm just talking to myself.
dialogue_tracker.char_141_nights_CN_006: Anytime you want. Don't you worry, I have friends everywhere. Eyes everywhere.
dialogue_tracker.char_141_nights_CN_007: Curiosity can kill a cat, you know.
dialogue_tracker.char_141_nights_CN_008: I'm in a good mood right now, so here's a riddle for you. 'Why is a raven like a writing desk?'
dialogue_tracker.char_141_nights_CN_009: Thank you, for this 'Haze' I'm now.But... did you catch a peep of any of them, along the way? Any of, well... my secrets?
dialogue_tracker.char_141_nights_CN_010: Asleep like a baby... Time to get 'meown to business,' then.
dialogue_tracker.char_141_nights_CN_011: Hello, I'm Haze. I like relaxing work environments, and an employer who knows better than to bother me with too many questions.
dialogue_tracker.char_141_nights_CN_013: Promotion? What's that? Does it taste good?
dialogue_tracker.char_141_nights_CN_014: Finally out of those old shackles... and here I am, straight into new ones. The destiny of a thief's no wonder.
dialogue_tracker.char_141_nights_CN_017: Give me a bit of freedom and I'll be happy.
dialogue_tracker.char_141_nights_CN_018: What do we need a leader for? Can't everyone just fight on their own?
dialogue_tracker.char_141_nights_CN_019: Meow... It's driving me wild... this sweet, sweet smell of freedom!
dialogue_tracker.char_141_nights_CN_020: Everyone, no need to have cold feet here.
dialogue_tracker.char_141_nights_CN_026: Careful, kittens. Don't lose your mittens.
dialogue_tracker.char_141_nights_CN_027: You think you've got all the trimmings, don't you?
dialogue_tracker.char_141_nights_CN_029: No one stands above a kitty in the end!
dialogue_tracker.char_141_nights_CN_030: Perfect victory? Whatever. A victory's a victory afterall.
dialogue_tracker.char_141_nights_CN_031: Do you know how many enemies you let go? That will be a spanner in the works.
dialogue_tracker.char_141_nights_CN_032: I'm no stranger to running for it, but this is just too embarrassing...
dialogue_tracker.char_141_nights_CN_036: Meow? I'm not satisfied yet. You know my rule: if I can't have it, I want it.
dialogue_tracker.char_141_nights_CN_038: New year? A year is such a long time for a kitty. And happiness won't come knocking if one worries about more than just today. Speaking of which, today is really nice for napping. Doctor, how about we just spend this day with some lazy, cozy naps.
dialogue_tracker.char_141_nights_CN_043: Happy birthday, Doctor. Meow? My best wishes aren't enough? Don't tell me you want some presents, you greedy kitty. Well then, what do you want? Shall I give you a riddle, or allow you to rub my ears?
dialogue_tracker.char_141_nights_CN_044: A kitty visits gardens that provide food. But if someone tries to lock the kitty up, it will surely run away. When the kitty's in a good mood, however, it can bring back some tasty stuff as thanks. Know what I mean, Doctor? Be sure to make Rhodes Island a garden that everyone likes.
dialogue_tracker.char_143_ghost_CN_001: Good day. Please allow me a moment of prayer... before I resume my work for the day...
dialogue_tracker.char_143_ghost_CN_002: O benevolent Herald, hear my prayer: please watch over my dreams and ward my soul…
dialogue_tracker.char_143_ghost_CN_003: Hehehe… Cutting things... cutting things is such fun... Yes, some things were disconnected from the very beginning, their integrity only a false fiction...
dialogue_tracker.char_143_ghost_CN_005: Ehehe…Why were you dodging my sight? So pointless... because I already know exactly what your heart desires...
dialogue_tracker.char_143_ghost_CN_006: I have always, always wanted to bring you to a special place... A place where secrets are imparted...
dialogue_tracker.char_143_ghost_CN_007: What did you do to me...? Why was I made to drink that strange medicine? Who brought me to this place? PLEASE ANSWER ME!
dialogue_tracker.char_143_ghost_CN_008: That person's words are the complete and utter truth... Dissecting them, dismembering them, disemboweling them... it all grants them salvation...!
dialogue_tracker.char_143_ghost_CN_009: You see many things in your dreams that are hard to comprehend?... Those things you see are that soul's despairful tidings... And I, as the messenger, here to convey this exhortation to you... heh…
dialogue_tracker.char_143_ghost_CN_010: Hearken... Hear the whispers of vast creation's master, echoing from the deep...
dialogue_tracker.char_143_ghost_CN_011: I am Specter, that is what the spirits call me... That kind doctor informed me that I may receive further treatment by helping Rhodes Island... Yes, of course, my powers are yours to command.
dialogue_tracker.char_143_ghost_CN_013: I have no right to go against your will...
