dialogue_tracker.char_143_ghost_CN_014: Will this position be a new source of joy for me...? Or... will working for you become my life's joy...?
dialogue_tracker.char_143_ghost_CN_017: Good night, my brothers and sisters.
dialogue_tracker.char_143_ghost_CN_019: This will be a path paved with sacrifice.
dialogue_tracker.char_143_ghost_CN_020: All these lost souls on the battlefield... I offer them to you.
dialogue_tracker.char_143_ghost_CN_022: Please let me know the results.
dialogue_tracker.char_143_ghost_CN_023: I come from the depth of the ocean…
dialogue_tracker.char_143_ghost_CN_024: You are the one who woke me.
dialogue_tracker.char_143_ghost_CN_027: I care not for valueless ones.
dialogue_tracker.char_143_ghost_CN_029: I have conquered all trials you gave me... Were you watching me?
dialogue_tracker.char_143_ghost_CN_030: Please guide these lost souls to peaceful enlightenment...!
dialogue_tracker.char_143_ghost_CN_031: None of you shall leave this place!
dialogue_tracker.char_143_ghost_CN_032: They shall pay for this... They must pay…
dialogue_tracker.char_143_ghost_CN_033: May I ask you to assign me to a room where I can see the starry sky?
dialogue_tracker.char_143_ghost_CN_036: Doctor... What is it inside you… that is driving me to this blissful ecstasy?
dialogue_tracker.char_143_ghost_CN_038: Another year has passed? Ahh, how long my years were spent in the sea, so long I cannot even remember how I last spent them... Never we mind. Tell me, Doctor, would you like to be with me by the windowsill today, to watch the stars?
dialogue_tracker.char_143_ghost_CN_042: You are... Ah, the Doctor, isn't it?
dialogue_tracker.char_143_ghost_CN_043: How did I spend birthdays before now? Heheh. I don't remember too clearly... While I'm still lucid, Doctor, take this. An illuminous pearl, to be a valuable speck of light to you in the dark of night, there among illusory visions…
dialogue_tracker.char_143_ghost_CN_044: Heheheh. I may have seen some vision or other... You should be careful, Doctor. On the route you've chosen, disaster is unavoidable, and it is far more, and far closer, than you ever bargained for. And I—will live in the true field of battle…
dialogue_tracker.char_144_red_CN_002: I prefer to work alone, by myself.
dialogue_tracker.char_144_red_CN_003: Name, bounty, kill. Simple. That's the agreement with Kal'tsit.
dialogue_tracker.char_144_red_CN_004: Wolves have fangs, I have my blade. Wolves do not rest, neither do I.
dialogue_tracker.char_144_red_CN_005: Granny's calling... I can hear her.
dialogue_tracker.char_144_red_CN_006: Bleak wind, corpses on the ground, screams under the stars... I smell them all, the scent of wolves. I join the hunt.
dialogue_tracker.char_144_red_CN_007: Family? I have no family. I am always alone. Do you need a family, Doctor?
dialogue_tracker.char_144_red_CN_008: They avoid me... I just want to touch their tails. Provence, and Texas... I like their scent.
dialogue_tracker.char_144_red_CN_009: Doctor, sometimes I wonder... if I weren't a wolf hunter, would my life be different? Oh, you mean… I should answer the question... myself?
dialogue_tracker.char_144_red_CN_010: Doctor... no, nothing. I thought you fell asleep. Don't sleep, not now.
dialogue_tracker.char_144_red_CN_011: Projekt Red, wolf hunter, smells wolves.
dialogue_tracker.char_144_red_CN_012: As long as it helps me hunt.
dialogue_tracker.char_144_red_CN_014: A promotion? This will disguise me. I accept.
dialogue_tracker.char_144_red_CN_028: Your death... is in my eyes.
dialogue_tracker.char_144_red_CN_030: The one way a hunt can end.
dialogue_tracker.char_144_red_CN_032: Sorry... My blade... not sharp enough.
dialogue_tracker.char_144_red_CN_033: I prefer to be outside. But… it's okay.
dialogue_tracker.char_144_red_CN_034: Watch your hand. I might cut you.
dialogue_tracker.char_144_red_CN_038: A new year? That means a new hunt? Not yet? Understood. Then I rest… Doctor, you rest too.
dialogue_tracker.char_144_red_CN_043: I've seen people. Many people. They went to the Doctor's room, and left things. That spells danger… it doesn't? Birthday presents? Oh, well… I'll lend you this fluffy ball to touch. But you have to give it back.
dialogue_tracker.char_144_red_CN_044: Rhodes Island has many walls. But I can feel the wind on the deck. Kal'tsit and the Doctor are here. I... like this place.
dialogue_tracker.char_145_prove_CN_001: If you need your room cleaned, I'd be glad to help, Doctor.
dialogue_tracker.char_145_prove_CN_002: You seem really interested in my tail, don't you? You say it's furry and looks cute? Well, wanna touch it? No one else has a tail like this, you know!
dialogue_tracker.char_145_prove_CN_003: Water is precious in the wild. Rhodes Island is in no danger of having a drought right now, but that doesn't mean we should waste water.
dialogue_tracker.char_145_prove_CN_004: It's my duty to search for and rescue those who encounter Catastrophes. I rarely find any survivors though...
dialogue_tracker.char_145_prove_CN_005: Retrieving beacons, exploring mineral deposits, and recycling... Then we can call it a day!
dialogue_tracker.char_145_prove_CN_006: Mr. Grape is my buddy and a capable partner I can rely on! Where he came from, you ask?... Uh, hmm... Now that's a good question. Where did we first meet?...
dialogue_tracker.char_145_prove_CN_007: W-what's with that red one...? I... can't stop trembling... uh... Doctor, can you lend me your arm? I'd feel much safer that way...
dialogue_tracker.char_145_prove_CN_008: Those who do Catastrophe relief work often develop all kinds of mutations. What mutation do I have? Well, it's better not to ask. The more you know, the more dangerous it gets for you, Doctor.
dialogue_tracker.char_145_prove_CN_009: Catastrophe relief workers in the wilderness... don't usually come out unscathed. No need to worry about me, though! I'm already very happy to have a chance to rest at Rhodes Island.
dialogue_tracker.char_145_prove_CN_010: Aw, falling asleep in this kinda place again... Guess 'safety' isn't a part of your vocabulary.
dialogue_tracker.char_145_prove_CN_011: I'm Provence, your average Catastrophe relief worker. Hmm, why are you staring at me like that? Interested in my tail?
dialogue_tracker.char_145_prove_CN_012: So... does this bring me closer to what you imagined I should be?
dialogue_tracker.char_145_prove_CN_013: It's fun working with you, Doctor!
dialogue_tracker.char_145_prove_CN_014: I sense a storm approaching Rhodes Island. But don't worry, leave the evacuation to me! I'm an expert at Catastrophe prevention!
dialogue_tracker.char_145_prove_CN_017: Who will I be teaming up with this time?
dialogue_tracker.char_145_prove_CN_018: Don't worry. Everything will be fine.
dialogue_tracker.char_145_prove_CN_019: My job is to bring everyone home safely.
dialogue_tracker.char_145_prove_CN_020: I despise natural Catastrophes and enemies equally!
dialogue_tracker.char_145_prove_CN_023: Let's greet 'em with a warning shot.
dialogue_tracker.char_145_prove_CN_025: I've warned ya! Now time for Crowd Control!
dialogue_tracker.char_145_prove_CN_028: The wilderness has its own rules.
dialogue_tracker.char_145_prove_CN_029: Compared to natural Catastrophes, these enemies are really powerless.
dialogue_tracker.char_145_prove_CN_030: Disaster assessment report: we received zero damage!
dialogue_tracker.char_145_prove_CN_031: Everyone worked hard. Even if we suffered some damage,  let's not be discouraged!
dialogue_tracker.char_145_prove_CN_032: Aw... my assessment was off. This'll leave a spot on my record for sure...
dialogue_tracker.char_145_prove_CN_033: It'd be nice to have a room to rest in!
dialogue_tracker.char_145_prove_CN_036: I've got a fluffy tail~ a fluffy tail~♪
dialogue_tracker.char_145_prove_CN_038: Happy New Year, Doctor. I'm measuring my tail, because I think it's grown since the last time I checked... Could you hold the tip for me? And here's a ruler... let me see...
dialogue_tracker.char_145_prove_CN_043: This is the kind of day to try new things, Doctor. Trust me, the memories you make on birthdays will last a lifetime. I've already looked up the weather and lay of the land, and I've got backpacks ready to go. Let's head on an adventure for a couple of days!
dialogue_tracker.char_145_prove_CN_044: Stopping Catastrophes is still beyond me. We might not have a real solution for decades, even centuries. But what I hope for right now is to save as many as I can, from both Catastrophe and those who would exploit it.
dialogue_tracker.char_147_shining_CN_001: Greetings, Doctor... Is there anything you'd like to discuss?
dialogue_tracker.char_147_shining_CN_002: You look quite pale... You say your chest hurts? Don't overwork yourself, please get some rest. Don't be afraid, I'm right beside you. Everything will be okay...
dialogue_tracker.char_147_shining_CN_003: You've seen my healing Arts somewhere before?... That must have been your imagination. Yes, our memories do deceive us on occasion…
dialogue_tracker.char_147_shining_CN_004: 'Confessarius?' Where did you learn this word? My apologies, but I'm afraid I cannot continue this topic.
dialogue_tracker.char_147_shining_CN_005: We Sarkaz combined our inherent Arts affinity with the power of Originium to develop new healing Arts,  we've been doing this for quite some time to succour those who drag themselves in the mire.
dialogue_tracker.char_147_shining_CN_006: Now, you ask? Now we have nothing left. That war bereaved us of all hope.
dialogue_tracker.char_147_shining_CN_007: Who is Nearl to me? Well... She's a travel companion, and I trust her with my very life.
dialogue_tracker.char_147_shining_CN_008: There are those who will sacrifice their all to deliver others from their pain. And Nearl, she is just the kind.
dialogue_tracker.char_147_shining_CN_009: Once upon a time, I followed someone who shone bright as the beacon of hope, until wicked machinations took the light away. But this time, the incandescence will cease nevermore, even at the cost of my life...
dialogue_tracker.char_147_shining_CN_010: This quiet… it reminds me of my time back home.
dialogue_tracker.char_147_shining_CN_011: I am Shining, the roaming medic. I look familiar to you? It is possible our paths have crossed.
dialogue_tracker.char_147_shining_CN_012: The power to merely heal wounds... is not enough.
dialogue_tracker.char_147_shining_CN_013: A medic's hand cannot reach all those in need.
dialogue_tracker.char_147_shining_CN_014: Yes. I must be more than a medic—I will live on as a guardian. As has always been my goal. Doctor, please bear witness to my oath.
dialogue_tracker.char_147_shining_CN_017: To the battlefield, are we not?
dialogue_tracker.char_147_shining_CN_018: A battle for our own delieverence, is it not?
dialogue_tracker.char_147_shining_CN_020: May the war grant us the redemption we seek... or will it?
dialogue_tracker.char_147_shining_CN_024: 'Tis but a flash in the drift of time.
dialogue_tracker.char_147_shining_CN_025: Your life is mine to protect.
dialogue_tracker.char_147_shining_CN_027: Grief, ever echoes in our souls.
dialogue_tracker.char_147_shining_CN_028: Agony, ever etched on our hearts.
dialogue_tracker.char_147_shining_CN_029: Our wills and spirits are ever burning against the fiercest enemies.
dialogue_tracker.char_147_shining_CN_030: No matter the sins, all will fall to ashes with lives at the end of time.
dialogue_tracker.char_147_shining_CN_031: Return not to the battlefields. You will find no redemption here.
dialogue_tracker.char_147_shining_CN_032: Victory and loss... are insignificant moments in an endless cycle.
dialogue_tracker.char_147_shining_CN_033: I will be fine, so long as I have a quiet place to be alone.
dialogue_tracker.char_147_shining_CN_036: It's been some time since I've known such serenity. I can even hear your heartbeat.
dialogue_tracker.char_147_shining_CN_038: Fireworks... beautiful. I used to be one buried in research, pitting myself against death, lingering about the battlefield, and no more. Now, I have myself a moment of rest in which to gaze up at the night sky... Life's turns truly surpass anyone's expectations.
dialogue_tracker.char_147_shining_CN_042: How are you feeling today, Doctor?
dialogue_tracker.char_147_shining_CN_043: The day of your birth, is it? When a young life leaves the womb a newborn babe, the happiness and the hope in that moment will dwell in them, as well as their loved ones, for ages to come. Doctor, it honors me to the core, that I may celebrate a day so special alongside you.
dialogue_tracker.char_147_shining_CN_044: Chaos still arises without respite across this land, and the most we can do is save the wounded. The peace Rhodes Island has brought me is one I've never chanced to feel before. But, Doctor, the road ahead still stretches afar, and those oldest dreams of mine, I still continue in the wake of.
dialogue_tracker.char_148_nearl_CN_001: Salutations, Doctor. May the light be with you.
dialogue_tracker.char_148_nearl_CN_002: Doctor, I ask that you give me the most dangerous assignment available, such that my shield and I can best protect those in need.
dialogue_tracker.char_148_nearl_CN_003: The title of 'Knight' should be a symbol of honor. And yet now, it's been reduced to a mere commodity...
dialogue_tracker.char_148_nearl_CN_004: As long as the light continues to guide me, I will neither bow to cruelty nor kneel to violence.
dialogue_tracker.char_148_nearl_CN_005: I'm grateful as always for your service, Doctor.
dialogue_tracker.char_148_nearl_CN_006: The Kazimierz chivalric spirit should have been a force of salvation for all who suffer in this world. But now, it's nothing more than a rotten legacy, used to benefit the rich. Nothing is more shameful.
dialogue_tracker.char_148_nearl_CN_007: Shining, too, is a beam of light that guides me forward. She carries the hope I've long sought.
dialogue_tracker.char_148_nearl_CN_008: Something flickered in Shining's eyes when she heard the name Rhodes Island. I had no idea what it meant...
dialogue_tracker.char_148_nearl_CN_009: In this time and age of a world plagued by Oripathy, may the ray of hope from Rhodes Island light the way.
dialogue_tracker.char_148_nearl_CN_010: Let us embrace this momentary respite.
dialogue_tracker.char_148_nearl_CN_011: Margaret Nearl, the Radiant Knight of Kazimierz...and now a Rhodes Island Operator. I will defend your life and your honor with my shield.
dialogue_tracker.char_148_nearl_CN_012: Thank you for granting me power.
dialogue_tracker.char_148_nearl_CN_013: Thank you, Doctor. These new powers shall bring relief to those who suffer. This I shall engrave upon my heart.
dialogue_tracker.char_148_nearl_CN_014: Shining once said that dawn remains distant. But I believe that, one day, we will revive the dying glory with our very own hands.
dialogue_tracker.char_148_nearl_CN_017: I shall protect them from all harm.
dialogue_tracker.char_148_nearl_CN_018: I shall not blemish Rhodes Island's name.
dialogue_tracker.char_148_nearl_CN_022: I shall give my all to you.
dialogue_tracker.char_148_nearl_CN_029: A true knight will not bend to the threat of violence. Now, repent for your sins, in front of my warhammer.
dialogue_tracker.char_148_nearl_CN_030: Let us go forth. And there will be one day…
dialogue_tracker.char_148_nearl_CN_031: A true knight will not chase one who's lost the will to fight. Everyone deserves a chance to choose a new path.
dialogue_tracker.char_148_nearl_CN_032: We must not give up now.
dialogue_tracker.char_148_nearl_CN_034: I sense an intru- Oh, Doctor?!
dialogue_tracker.char_148_nearl_CN_036: Doctor, umm... may I enter your office? I've heard you have a vast collection of literature.
dialogue_tracker.char_148_nearl_CN_038: Tonight in the Grand Knight Territory, the corporations who've won the bidding war for firework permits will blanket the sky, and out in the barrens, destitute settlements will warm themselves on firewood as a rare luxury. While you can have your name written in those New Year's fireworks, I'm more than glad that I have brought those people firewood.
dialogue_tracker.char_148_nearl_CN_043: Happy birthday, Doctor. Aplogies that I don't have anything that might pique your interest with me, but perhaps you'd like this book on the history of the knights of Kazimierz? Forgive me, I've already given you my knight's oath, and anything I could grant you beyond that is negligible by comparison.
dialogue_tracker.char_148_nearl_CN_044: When I was bestowed the title of Radiant Knight, the General Chamber of Commerce didn't much appreciate my shine. Fortunately, neither Shining nor Rhodes Island have since found me too bright to look at. As vast as the land is, I imagine the rays of the sun will only reach so far. In that respect, I will strive until I can strive no more.
dialogue_tracker.char_149_scave_CN_001: Better to get your job done first than wasting time on chitchat.
dialogue_tracker.char_149_scave_CN_002: You'd better remember that failing to adapt makes you a useless burden.
dialogue_tracker.char_149_scave_CN_003: Work, eat, run, repeat. Big fricking whoop. Isn't that how life is for anyone these days?
dialogue_tracker.char_149_scave_CN_004: My job was to take care of 'troubles' for my employers. Eventually they started to call me Scavenger.
dialogue_tracker.char_149_scave_CN_005: Just like the two sides of a coin, no matter how splendid the face is, the backside is always stained with dirt.
dialogue_tracker.char_149_scave_CN_006: I've adapted to this place really well since I joined? Pfft, rubbish. It's just that I've gotten used to working on the surface.
dialogue_tracker.char_149_scave_CN_007: That's Provence, isn't it…? The wretched girl who got Infected while rescuing people from a Catastrophe... Look at that massive tail she's got...
dialogue_tracker.char_149_scave_CN_008: You know, Doctor... I hated the idea of working with other people, at first. I figured our methods would clash. But at some point, I came to realize that's not the case.
dialogue_tracker.char_149_scave_CN_009: If only she were still alive... Now all I can do is carry on alone, carrying her dreams on my back.
dialogue_tracker.char_149_scave_CN_010: How can you sleep so soundly when you're defenseless…?
dialogue_tracker.char_149_scave_CN_011: I'm Scavenger. Leave the dirty work to me. Just pay me like my other employers and we'll be good.
dialogue_tracker.char_149_scave_CN_013: This still isn't enough. I need to become stronger...
dialogue_tracker.char_149_scave_CN_014: Thanks, Doctor. I feel like I have a reason to fight now.
dialogue_tracker.char_149_scave_CN_017: Do I need to quip just 'cause I joined the team?
dialogue_tracker.char_149_scave_CN_019: Conceal yourselves so the enemy won't find you.
dialogue_tracker.char_149_scave_CN_020: Hmph, time for a clean up.
dialogue_tracker.char_149_scave_CN_027: There is no turning back for you!
dialogue_tracker.char_149_scave_CN_029: Gotta say that mission was a special one.
dialogue_tracker.char_149_scave_CN_030: Hmph. They have only their own weakness to blame.
dialogue_tracker.char_149_scave_CN_031: Tch, some of them got away. I'm disappointed in you.
dialogue_tracker.char_149_scave_CN_033: Just give me a dark corner.
dialogue_tracker.char_149_scave_CN_036: What? You want me to dispose of you too?
dialogue_tracker.char_149_scave_CN_038: New Year's? Tsk, just another day, nothing different. But if you need a reminder, crowded places mean more stupid crap can happen, so don't get too lost in the fun, okay?
dialogue_tracker.char_149_scave_CN_042: You got a job for me?
dialogue_tracker.char_149_scave_CN_043: I did used to take birthdays seriously... but who's out there still counting out every year they live these day...? Whatever. If you'd like, I could wish you have fun today or something.
dialogue_tracker.char_149_scave_CN_044: Ugh. Just waiting for you to clear out before I grab some cheese from in there. What? My job's never been anything but cleaning up the filthiest of places. Telling me my name's gonna show up on your honor roll?
dialogue_tracker.char_1502_crosly_CN_001: You want me at your side to see if Rhodes Island can live up to the talk. Hmm... Alright then, so long as your security doesn't give me too much trouble.
dialogue_tracker.char_1502_crosly_CN_002: Life in the Truckers Mutual Aid Association? We drive, we deliver, we drink, we mess around and have a good time. Nobody bares their fangs in Nuova Volsinii... But as my mentor once said, the Fangs will never truly disappear.
dialogue_tracker.char_1502_crosly_CN_003: At first, I couldn't get used to pizza and spaghetti. My mentor was the one who taught me to mix finsauce into spaghetti, and replace the salsiccia on pizza with bacon. Had to find a way to fit in with the wolfpack, she said. So, I've eaten like this through all my years in Siracusa. Why? Because it tastes alright.
dialogue_tracker.char_1502_crosly_CN_004: Truth and Justice... That's the book my father used to read to me when I was little. He even took me to meet the author, who was later imprisoned by some duke, died in jail, and was buried in a mine. Pretty awful, no? But that's how things were, at the time.
dialogue_tracker.char_1502_crosly_CN_005: My father said that Sergei would become the greatest of all scientists, even if he was born in Ursus. I thought they were friends, partners, and kindred spirits... Yet Sergei stabbed them all in the back. He deserved to die, but I also doubt whether the blame was his alone.
dialogue_tracker.char_1502_crosly_CN_006: Where did I learn to fight? From my mentor. She taught me to turn hatred into power, but not to hate. She taught me to fight, but not to step onto the battlefield... What a strange 'wolf' she was. Too bad I didn't figure out her final lesson sooner.
dialogue_tracker.char_1502_crosly_CN_007: Director Kal'tsit, Dr. Kal'tsit. No matter what hat she wears, she's still her same, cold-blooded self. Yet, I do find it believable that she didn't betray my father. Maybe she's not as ruthless as she looks, after all. Hmm, what do you think, Doctor?
dialogue_tracker.char_1502_crosly_CN_008: In all the time I stood behind Talulah, I watched her crush dream after dream, morphing into our very own tyrant... That was my mistake, and one I will not make again... Kill her? No. What I want is to tear off the tyrant's crown.
dialogue_tracker.char_1502_crosly_CN_009: You've united many under your banner. This is familiar to me. I've stood with such people, and also against them... But do beware, leaders like you are known to make grave errors. When you do, I'll look you dead in the eyes, and I won't hesitate—Doctor.
dialogue_tracker.char_1502_crosly_CN_010: She learned her song by snow, she learned her blade by rain… She learned to show her courage, by fire that swept the plain… She learned to topple crowns, by all the silent pain... Oh, you're awake. No, it's nothing. Just a Siracusan nursery rhyme.
dialogue_tracker.char_1502_crosly_CN_011: Crownslayer. It's a name we both know well, so let's keep it. Maybe one day you'll come to understand its true meaning.
dialogue_tracker.char_1502_crosly_CN_012: Old combat records? Got anything with me in it? Come on, let's give it a try. I won't lose this time.
dialogue_tracker.char_1502_crosly_CN_013: Alright, alright. Enough with the formalities already. I couldn't care less about your little medals and ribbons. Do you take me for some general or noble? Or, would you prefer I test my blade on them?
dialogue_tracker.char_1502_crosly_CN_014: Rhodes Island chose to trust me, so I'm willing to return that favor. Acceptance speech? Wait, you people aren't really expecting me to give one, are you?
dialogue_tracker.char_1502_crosly_CN_017: Just give me a target. My smoke will be their grave.
dialogue_tracker.char_1502_crosly_CN_018: Lead a squad…? Alright. I'm actually curious how you Rhodes Islanders do things.
dialogue_tracker.char_1502_crosly_CN_019: Move out. Watch the smoke, and don't get separated.
dialogue_tracker.char_1502_crosly_CN_025: Drink deep of the suffering of the deceased.
dialogue_tracker.char_1502_crosly_CN_026: Taste the fury of the forsaken.
dialogue_tracker.char_1502_crosly_CN_028: Weep. Those will be your last words.
dialogue_tracker.char_1502_crosly_CN_029: Very well. I'm honored to be part of this victory.
dialogue_tracker.char_1502_crosly_CN_030: Sound strategies, and outstanding execution. No wonder your operations are so efficient.
dialogue_tracker.char_1502_crosly_CN_031: The necessary lives have been taken. Mission accomplished.
dialogue_tracker.char_1502_crosly_CN_032: Smokescreen deployed. Retreat, we'll find another chance later.
dialogue_tracker.char_1502_crosly_CN_033: Not sending me out on a field mission today? Suit yourself.
dialogue_tracker.char_1502_crosly_CN_034: Y-You can see me? But, I threw down a smokescreen...
dialogue_tracker.char_1502_crosly_CN_036: Take off my mask? I'd rather not. Hehe, hard to breathe with all the smoke, right? I keep it on for a reason.
dialogue_tracker.char_1502_crosly_CN_038: Never imagined I'd be welcoming the New Year on Rhodes Island. But here I am, with all of you… Looks like we've changed a lot. Happy New Year. To you, and to Rhodes Island.
dialogue_tracker.char_1502_crosly_CN_042: Have you been on the ship all day, Doctor? Uh, Me? No, I just happened to be behind you. It's pure coincidence.
dialogue_tracker.char_1502_crosly_CN_043: That crown on your head... It's just a prop the operators made for your birthday? Happy birthday to you then. Hehe, don't worry, I won't slay this crown.
dialogue_tracker.char_1502_crosly_CN_044: Infected or otherwise, there are so many on this land who yearn to live freely and with dignity. Some of them have failed, but so many more are still pressing on. May you continue to move forward with them, Rhodes Island.
dialogue_tracker.char_150_snakek_CN_001: Here I am! What should we play, baseball or board games? Oh, you're working?
dialogue_tracker.char_150_snakek_CN_002: Where was I born, you ask? Well, umm...no idea. But that doesn't matter, right?
dialogue_tracker.char_150_snakek_CN_003: Hello, Professor Rhodes Island! Wait, am I calling you by the right name?...
dialogue_tracker.char_150_snakek_CN_004: Hm, what's my assignment today? To capture some long, sleek animals?
dialogue_tracker.char_150_snakek_CN_005: Hey! Don't knock on my backpack! Oh, sorry, I'm not mad, I'm just worried. If you're not careful, you could hurt your hand! Here, let me show you how it's done.
dialogue_tracker.char_150_snakek_CN_006: If anyone dares to hurt you, I'll smash them with my baseball bat. Oh, uh... so... there really are people who hurt you? Um... actually, I'm not that good at fighting, hehe…
dialogue_tracker.char_150_snakek_CN_007: I love spending the whole day just walking down the street. I get to watch the people, enjoy the sunshine, and then… lose my way!
dialogue_tracker.char_150_snakek_CN_008: You've been treating my sickness, and you gave me a place to live... you're really so kind...
dialogue_tracker.char_150_snakek_CN_009: Doctor, are you my big brother? Or big sister?... Well, does't matter! I'm not leaving you, even if you throw me out! It's not like I can walk far anyway.
dialogue_tracker.char_150_snakek_CN_010: Oh, the Doctor is busy. I'll just play by myself then...
dialogue_tracker.char_150_snakek_CN_011: Hm? Where am I? Who am I?
dialogue_tracker.char_150_snakek_CN_012: I can make myself super tough! It's my only special skill!
dialogue_tracker.char_150_snakek_CN_013: Promotion? What's a promotion?... Whatever, let's play for a bit longer! You and me, together!
dialogue_tracker.char_150_snakek_CN_014: New position or not, I don't really care. All I want is to be by your side every day. Can you grant this tiny wish of mine?
dialogue_tracker.char_150_snakek_CN_017: I've got lots of friends here!
dialogue_tracker.char_150_snakek_CN_019: We'll be fine if we stick together!
dialogue_tracker.char_150_snakek_CN_026: C'mon, show me what you got!
dialogue_tracker.char_150_snakek_CN_029: Was that tough? Didn't feel much different from any other battle.
dialogue_tracker.char_150_snakek_CN_033: Just don't throw fireballs at me, okay?
dialogue_tracker.char_150_snakek_CN_036: Hey Doctor! Can we play a little bit longer? Just a little bit!
dialogue_tracker.char_150_snakek_CN_038: Happy new year, Doctor! I'm looking for the place I was first found. It's somewhere around on the deck. Was it here… or there?... Hm? Why am I looking for it? Because I was actually having a cozy nap when you guys found me. The sunshine was so warm... And I want to take a nap like that again! Hehe...
dialogue_tracker.char_150_snakek_CN_043: Hey, hey, Doctor! Happy birthday! These are for you: this baseball bat, these mitts, and this baseball! Come on, let's play!... You still got work to do? You're working on your birthday? Can't you take a day off? Aww…
dialogue_tracker.char_150_snakek_CN_044: Hehe, they're all busy having fun outside! I'm gonna pack up my bag a little, then get out and return with cool stuff loaded on my back! What's in my bag? A baseball, pair of mitts, and… Doctor, just between you and me, and promise to keep it from the Medical Department—I also got some snacks in there!
dialogue_tracker.char_151_myrtle_CN_001: Hey, Doctor. I'm here to hang!
dialogue_tracker.char_151_myrtle_CN_002: Doctor, don't look down on me just 'cause I'm little. Back where I'm from, all the kids looked up to me.
dialogue_tracker.char_151_myrtle_CN_003: Durin used the name of our race as her codename because she's so lazy, but isn't it kind of dumb how calling me 'Myrtle of Durin' made me sound like I belong to her or something?
dialogue_tracker.char_151_myrtle_CN_004: I understand how all the machines here work, but it still feels weird using them. Some have a lot of different parts, but some are surprisingly simple.
dialogue_tracker.char_151_myrtle_CN_005: My banner? Good eye, Doctor. It sure is a tablecloth from my house. I sneaked it out with me because it can't get dirty. My dad is probably pretty mad about it!
dialogue_tracker.char_151_myrtle_CN_006: Is my apple really that great? They're popular back home. You can study or play with it if you want, Doctor, just don't break it.
dialogue_tracker.char_151_myrtle_CN_007: There are still many things I'm not used to on land, but I love the many delicious foods. The cafe on Rhodes Island is my favorite!
dialogue_tracker.char_151_myrtle_CN_008: I do have to point out the fact, Doctor, that I am a full-grown adult! And I'm tall by Durin standards! Please tell everyone to stop patting me on the head and giving me candy!
dialogue_tracker.char_151_myrtle_CN_009: Say, Doctor, are you interested in my homeland? I can take you there! But it's pretty far, so wait till I'm in the mood.
dialogue_tracker.char_151_myrtle_CN_010: Are you taking a break? You can use my banner as a blanket.
dialogue_tracker.char_151_myrtle_CN_011: Reporting in! You must be the Doctor? Call me Myrtle, Myrtle of Durin. Durin said I could get a job here, so what have you got for me? I may be small, but I'm tough!
dialogue_tracker.char_151_myrtle_CN_012: Cool fight... Got some more, Doctor?
dialogue_tracker.char_151_myrtle_CN_013: Oh, did I get promoted? Does that mean I can go somewhere I couldn't before?
dialogue_tracker.char_151_myrtle_CN_014: I told you I'm tough! Told you!
dialogue_tracker.char_151_myrtle_CN_017: There's a mission? I wanna go!
dialogue_tracker.char_151_myrtle_CN_025: I have to get serious now!
dialogue_tracker.char_151_myrtle_CN_027: We're counting on you again today, little apple.
dialogue_tracker.char_151_myrtle_CN_029: Phew, I'm exhausted! I wanna go to lie down, Doctor.
dialogue_tracker.char_151_myrtle_CN_030: Flawless victory! I was pretty good, wasn't I, Doctor?
dialogue_tracker.char_151_myrtle_CN_031: We won, Doctor, and that's what counts!
dialogue_tracker.char_151_myrtle_CN_036: Why can't the cafe open 24 hours?
dialogue_tracker.char_151_myrtle_CN_038: Take the flag down, tie it up over here... Good! That's my cloth sack done! Oh, Doctor, you're here, too. Come, we'll eat up all the tasty food in the canteen! It's the first day of the year. Let's kick it off by eating our fill!
dialogue_tracker.char_151_myrtle_CN_042: Any more fun things to do, Doctor?
dialogue_tracker.char_151_myrtle_CN_043: So, Doctor, today's your birthday, huh? Then as a mature adult, let me give you a little present. Hm, Doctor, kneel down a little... Ahem-hem. Good job, good job... Alright! That was a compliment from the Generalissimo herself. You did well, Doctor.
dialogue_tracker.char_151_myrtle_CN_044: I guess I followed Durin to a pretty nice place. I've seen huge nomadic cities, beaten up so many baddies in battle, and eaten so many great foods I'd never seen before. Once I get home, I'll turn all these stories into a travelogue and get it published. It's bound to be a bestseller!
dialogue_tracker.char_154_morgan_CN_001: You want to chat future op planning? You've come to the right person, Doctor, love. I'm the entire stuffing brains of Glasgow.
dialogue_tracker.char_154_morgan_CN_002: Eugh, this doesn't taste right. Is this can gone off...? Ay, get Hannah to try this for me, will you? Oh, and if she scoffs the whole thing in one go... well, waste not want not, yeah?
dialogue_tracker.char_154_morgan_CN_003: Why do I fight with such a naff-off big machete? Because I'm trying to be efficient here! If I scare some enemies off, that's enemies I don't need to do in. I mean obviously, I'm handy with me fists too. 'Cuz you spend as long as us on the streets, you learn how to scrap from every angle.
dialogue_tracker.char_154_morgan_CN_004: When we left the Glasgow Gang behind, see, I thought we'd all be back in a jiffy. But here we are ages later, and still on the go. Everything's changed. Vina, Hannah, Baird, and especially me... yeah, I might have changed most out of us.
dialogue_tracker.char_154_morgan_CN_005: I had my grievances, I did. While Victoria was booming, I was living on scraps. Who said I should pay the price once the bloody place went arse-up? But look at me, I came back anyway. I mean, my life, everyone I care about... all of it's here still.
dialogue_tracker.char_154_morgan_CN_006: I guess me old Morgan's Memoirs is gone. Probably lost it in the Glasgow Gang base, if you'd even call it a base... and if the Glasgow Gang still exists. War's not some heroic fantasy. There's moments of deathly honest grief... just, instants you can't describe.
dialogue_tracker.char_154_morgan_CN_007: I got a good head on my shoulders, don't I? Not like I'm book-smart or anything here—the most I'm good at is scheming a thing or two in the street. Be honest, sometimes, there's this thought that plagues me, how maybe I'm no help to Vina at all... What, that's rubbish, you think...? Yeah, alright, fair dos, love! I can't be quitting now!
dialogue_tracker.char_154_morgan_CN_008: It might be easy for us to follow the leader, but you know what? While we go after Vina—who's Vina got to go after? I don't want to be behind her anymore, Doctor. I want to go with her, or take her along. That way, when she gets tired, at least she'll have my shoulder to rest on.
dialogue_tracker.char_154_morgan_CN_009: Once we succeed with all this, I... hahah, the ffffirst thing I wanna do! Is go out and get smashed with the girls again... Doctor, promise me, you'll come crawling with us. We'll have a right hoot... forget all our troubles. Sound good, love?
dialogue_tracker.char_154_morgan_CN_010: Ay-yi-yi, someone's wide open. I could do some face painting on you, love?
dialogue_tracker.char_154_morgan_CN_011: Alright, Doctor? I'm Morgan. Vina said you'd like some assistance from me? I've got brains to pick and brawn with a machete—whatever you need, love, just ask.
dialogue_tracker.char_154_morgan_CN_012: Not bad, not bad, learned a thing or two. In exchange, why not have a copy of How to Fight with the Glasgow Gang?
dialogue_tracker.char_154_morgan_CN_013: Well, I'm honored! You've got a sharp eye, Doctor, just like Vina.
dialogue_tracker.char_154_morgan_CN_014: There'll be plenty more trouble in future for the Glasgow Gang, but you won't catch me running. Whatever we can't handle, you bet I'll keep trying to figure it out. Whatever we can handle, you let my machete and Molotovs do the work!
dialogue_tracker.char_154_morgan_CN_017: Coming, love, coming. Not too late, am I?
dialogue_tracker.char_154_morgan_CN_018: No prob. Minding you lot's a breeze compared to Glasgow.
dialogue_tracker.char_154_morgan_CN_019: Doctor, love, how'd you even come up with these plans?
dialogue_tracker.char_154_morgan_CN_022: Alright, who am I hacking up?
dialogue_tracker.char_154_morgan_CN_023: Watch. There's method to a brawl.
dialogue_tracker.char_154_morgan_CN_026: Nah, mate, I'm on your right.
dialogue_tracker.char_154_morgan_CN_027: Lessee, who's the next sap getting duffed up?
dialogue_tracker.char_154_morgan_CN_028: You don't win until you beat us all.
dialogue_tracker.char_154_morgan_CN_029: All that command was complex stuff... I'm having trouble keeping up now. Doctor, love, once we're back, can you break down today's battle for me? You'd do me a solid!
dialogue_tracker.char_154_morgan_CN_030: Doctor, want to celebrate the Glasgow way? First me and Hannah grab a leg each, then we shut our eyes, and then we hip-hip-hurray and send you flying... ay, no need to run, love, I'm just joking!
dialogue_tracker.char_154_morgan_CN_031: I know every bend around these parts. Give me one minute, and I'll root those bastards out.
dialogue_tracker.char_154_morgan_CN_032: I'm not... I'm not falling here. The story of Vina and every one of us... is NOT over!
dialogue_tracker.char_154_morgan_CN_033: Dead quiet around here... hahah, makes me wish I could do it like Vina and kip somewhere.
dialogue_tracker.char_154_morgan_CN_036: Got some good news to share, Doctor? Because if you don't, let me tell you a joke.
dialogue_tracker.char_154_morgan_CN_038: It's a New Year, and I want to see Vina happy, Hannah mucking things up less, and I'd like Dagda to loosen up some. Right, and for you, Doctor... mmm, a bit less work, a bit more time to yourself. That way, I could take you around Londinium for a proper stroll.
dialogue_tracker.char_154_morgan_CN_042: Alright, Doctor! Fancy seeing you about.
dialogue_tracker.char_154_morgan_CN_043: Doctor, thank you for giving us a place we can call home. Here—I ordered in a whole box of Victorian-make lollipops, a YEAR'S worth, just for you, love. Come on, try try try, see how the... soap flavor tastes first, yeah?
dialogue_tracker.char_154_morgan_CN_044: Norport's a borough full of Infected. Them, and the mariners out of a job and the old workers and the thugs like us, we're all people Londinium doesn't want. And then here... everyone gets equal work opportunities. *sigh* Why can't it just be like Rhodes Island out there?
dialogue_tracker.char_155_tiger_CN_001: If you got enemies about, just scream. I'll keep ya safe.
dialogue_tracker.char_155_tiger_CN_002: Where's that kid gone off to? Y'know, her... the really tanned shorty who's always trailing our Master... 'Morgan' is her nam- Oi! Stop right there!
dialogue_tracker.char_155_tiger_CN_003: You scratch my back, I'll scratch yours, we keep it real that way, yeah? You treat me with respect, I'll do the same for you.
dialogue_tracker.char_155_tiger_CN_004: Seems our Majesty's really into your place. Don't see that every day, seeing as we're never anywhere same for long.
dialogue_tracker.char_155_tiger_CN_005: Work or what have ya, you've gotta have guts!
dialogue_tracker.char_155_tiger_CN_006: Whoa, whoa, chew before you swallow, mate! HEY! SOMEONE BRING US MORE MEAT! This girl's got an empty belly to fill!
dialogue_tracker.char_155_tiger_CN_007: Bleeding Morgan... she might seem like a layabout mostly, but she's our tactician when push comes to shove. Gets the job done. Gets on my nerves otherwise, though, and she loves it. Tch...
dialogue_tracker.char_155_tiger_CN_008: Doesn't she look brilliant, like a liege with a hammer in hand? I'm even more keen to see the look of her holding a sword, though.
dialogue_tracker.char_155_tiger_CN_009: Out with it! Don't beat around the bush, just say it: who do you want dealt with?
dialogue_tracker.char_155_tiger_CN_010: Tch. look at you spacing out like an idiot... Your own bloody fault if a tiger bites you.
dialogue_tracker.char_155_tiger_CN_011: I'm Indra. I don't have any of those weird crazy powers -- I let my fists do the talking. Nice to meet ya!
dialogue_tracker.char_155_tiger_CN_013: Promotions are great, almost as great as fighting is!
dialogue_tracker.char_155_tiger_CN_014: Don't be afraid. I'll protect ya.
dialogue_tracker.char_155_tiger_CN_018: So, who's in the market for a walloping?
dialogue_tracker.char_155_tiger_CN_019: Mind your own sodding business and let me be!
dialogue_tracker.char_155_tiger_CN_020: Come on! Show me what you've got!
dialogue_tracker.char_155_tiger_CN_029: That's the stuff! That's what I call a kick!
dialogue_tracker.char_155_tiger_CN_030: You don't go home happy without some bloodshed!
dialogue_tracker.char_155_tiger_CN_031: Tch, we've got some who fled. Bunch of cowards.
dialogue_tracker.char_155_tiger_CN_032: Not bad... But I'll get you back for this!
dialogue_tracker.char_155_tiger_CN_033: What's this room about? More of a squeeze than anywhere I've been.
dialogue_tracker.char_155_tiger_CN_034: Oi! You got a bleedin' death wish?
dialogue_tracker.char_155_tiger_CN_036: C'mere, lemme get my arms around you! Yes, I mean hug you!
dialogue_tracker.char_155_tiger_CN_038: Ooh! Gotcher end-of-year bonus? Haha, I must be due for one too, scrapping so much on your behalf! You and me, we're fellows now, no two ways about it! Get up, I'm taking you out for food!
dialogue_tracker.char_155_tiger_CN_043: Hah, it's your birthday today, then. Here's a prezzie: these brass knuckles. They're the tiger's choice, get all your average muckers done and dusted! You should learn to watch yourself too, I say. Can't always count on me being there when you're in danger, right? Still, if I'm around and anyone picks on you, their arse is good as kicked!
dialogue_tracker.char_155_tiger_CN_044: Vina trusts Rhodes Island. That's why I take orders from you, no hesitation. But you listen here, Doctor. You need to feel the weight of that trust. Else I'll make you feel it, even if I need my fists to do it—and I don't mean wanting to scrap with you. But you just keep what I've said in mind.
dialogue_tracker.char_157_dagda_CN_001: Siege's ordered me to serve as your assistant. I'll be a harsh supervisor for you, if it's called for.
dialogue_tracker.char_157_dagda_CN_002: Huh? Do you have a problem with my metal claws? They're totally brill! ...I mean... They're very... Wieldy. Please don't get the wrong idea about my taste.
dialogue_tracker.char_157_dagda_CN_003: Morgan picked this outfit. Obviously, something with a knightly air would definitely suit me more. Although this street style... is just a little bit... wicked.
dialogue_tracker.char_157_dagda_CN_004: Indra's a mess, both the way she lives and fights. That said, she'll go through hell and high water for her mates, and she'll fight to her last breath for Siege—maybe, she's more knight than some knights out there, and she's never even had to try.
dialogue_tracker.char_157_dagda_CN_005: Most of Victoria's people live out their whole lives in their own cities, while everyone aboard Rhodes Island has left their homes to drift around this land. It just bowls me over.
dialogue_tracker.char_157_dagda_CN_006: The Montague name and the title of Knight of the Tower used to be more precious to me than anything. But gradually, I came to see how change for Victoria was unavoidable, and it doesn't just stem from the flames of war before us. I may have to abandon my past to follow Siege, but I'll follow through, unto the very end.
dialogue_tracker.char_157_dagda_CN_007: Bound to uphold Victoria's dignity, the Knights of the Tower never once shrank back in the face of the Sarkaz's blades. I was the only one who escaped, protected by my brothers and sisters in arms... I often think to myself—if... just if... I could've fought to the end with them...
dialogue_tracker.char_157_dagda_CN_008: Siege said I should choose the life I truly want to live when the war is over. Once that day arrives, how will Victoria turn out to be? And how will I turn out to be? I... I can't imagine it. All I hope is I'm still able to stay by their sides.
dialogue_tracker.char_157_dagda_CN_009: Dr. {@nickname}... From here onwards, my blade belongs to both Victoria, and you. You can call me either Dagda or the 'Dark Blade.' Isa? T-Too frivolous! But if you've got to... then keep your voice down!
dialogue_tracker.char_157_dagda_CN_010: It's a Knight of the Tower's duty to stand night watch. May you rest well, Doctor.
dialogue_tracker.char_157_dagda_CN_011: Knight of the Tower Isabella Montague. On behalf of Siege and our little alliance, I express our sincerest gratitude… What do you mean I don't dress like a knight? L-Looks can be bloody deceiving!
dialogue_tracker.char_157_dagda_CN_012: Umm...I'm seeing a wide gap between these tactics and my old training.
dialogue_tracker.char_157_dagda_CN_013: A medal? I can't accept any that's not Victorian... hmm, but you are the Doctor of Rhodes Island. Okay, I'm making an exception just this once.
dialogue_tracker.char_157_dagda_CN_014: Ever since we left Londinium, I've trained up a million more techniques than just knightly combat! Now you're going to see my true strength!
dialogue_tracker.char_157_dagda_CN_017: I've got no need to hide my identity if I'm fighting for Rhodes Island, yeah?
dialogue_tracker.char_157_dagda_CN_018: What style of command do you want from me? The knight type, or the gang type?
dialogue_tracker.char_157_dagda_CN_019: A fight? Wicked, bring it on... Ahem, as a Knight of the Tower, I accept your challenge.
dialogue_tracker.char_157_dagda_CN_020: These punks are nothing compared to the foes Victoria's surmounted!
dialogue_tracker.char_157_dagda_CN_027: Even without a blade, I can run you through!
dialogue_tracker.char_157_dagda_CN_028: Any soldier's will is worthy of respect.
dialogue_tracker.char_157_dagda_CN_029: Be of firm enough conviction, and it won't matter what difficulties you face. You'll have nothing to be afraid of.
dialogue_tracker.char_157_dagda_CN_030: Is that it? I didn't get to show off my real skills yet... If there is a next time, permit I continue to stand by your side.
dialogue_tracker.char_157_dagda_CN_031: You can't reach perfection without pushing yourself to the limit. I must do better.
dialogue_tracker.char_157_dagda_CN_032: If only I had a blade on me, I could... No, I can't give up now. Doctor, I'm ready to enter the next battle.
dialogue_tracker.char_157_dagda_CN_033: I'll assume guard duties for this room.
dialogue_tracker.char_157_dagda_CN_038: Whenever they rang the last bell of the year, we Knights of the Tower used to stand still at the tower's top, watching the lights across Londinium dim one after the other... I'm the only one left, but I still want to hold a torch in my hands even now, to protect Victoria's light in its darkest hour.
dialogue_tracker.char_157_dagda_CN_043: Doctor, I wanted to do my bit for your birthday party, so I asked Saileach if she could teach me these desserts. Morgan and the rest like to say I'm bad at expressing my feelings out loud... So all I could do is try and make the cakes a little sweeter. I hope you like them.
dialogue_tracker.char_157_dagda_CN_044: Another year's come and gone. We've been through plenty of hard times together, and the path forward remains thistly. Even then, we shouldn't give in. In the end, I believe we'll triumph over everything, Doctor, and greet the day and watch the dark clouds scatter.
dialogue_tracker.char_158_milu_CN_001: I'm keeping an eye on our surroundings. So far everything seems fine.
dialogue_tracker.char_158_milu_CN_002: You should know that some of those eyes on you hold nothing but malice. You're not safe, not even at Rhodes Island.
dialogue_tracker.char_158_milu_CN_003: Don't be afraid of those hostiles hiding in the shadow. No matter how those criminals try to hide, they can't escape my eyes.
dialogue_tracker.char_158_milu_CN_004: I'll have my revenge... even if I must lose my life for it.
dialogue_tracker.char_158_milu_CN_005: My clan, my friends, they all perished in the woods of our hometown... The only ones who mourned them were the trees, which gave unto them their leaves.
dialogue_tracker.char_158_milu_CN_006: This crossbow is manufactured for the sole purpose of punishing sinners. The day will come when I use it to pass my final judgement on those who deserve it.
dialogue_tracker.char_158_milu_CN_007: Meteorite... we used to be friends. On the day my hometown was destroyed, we were part of the small group that managed to escape.
dialogue_tracker.char_158_milu_CN_008: Since then, I've never stopped searching for the traitor who led the rebel army to our town. Could it be Meteorite? No, I... It couldn't be her...
dialogue_tracker.char_158_milu_CN_009: ...Oh, did I fall asleep? Sorry, I've been spending more time patrolling these days... It's fine, you say? But... um, thank you for caring.
dialogue_tracker.char_158_milu_CN_010: I'd like to take a nap...
dialogue_tracker.char_158_milu_CN_011: Firewatch here. I'm a sniper. To avenge my fallen clan, I need all the power I can get.
dialogue_tracker.char_158_milu_CN_013: Thanks for appointing me to this position.
dialogue_tracker.char_158_milu_CN_014: Thank you for the promotion. I hope you'll keep using my powers for the right thing. If you don't, however...
dialogue_tracker.char_158_milu_CN_029: I'm not done until I have my revenge...
dialogue_tracker.char_158_milu_CN_031: Mission accomplished, request search for remaining hostiles.
dialogue_tracker.char_158_milu_CN_033: I'm not used to being in a room with so many people...
dialogue_tracker.char_158_milu_CN_036: Uh, please don't touch my antlers... it tickles...
dialogue_tracker.char_158_milu_CN_038: New Year's? It's noisy, but I remember days like this back in the forest. We used to sing around the campfire, give each other bracelets weaved from vines... Do you want to hear the songs of my homeland? I've never forgotten them.
dialogue_tracker.char_158_milu_CN_043: You want to hear my harmonica? Fine. What are you in the mood for?… Calm and leisurely… Alright, here's a little tune called 'Greenleaves.'
dialogue_tracker.char_158_milu_CN_044: Today will be noisy. I think I'll find a quiet place to hide. Have fun with Meteorite and the others.
dialogue_tracker.char_159_peacok_CN_001: Since you summoned me, you must be eager to feast your eyes upon my elegant dancing form, right? Uh...? Help you move the luggage...? Hey! I didn't come here to do manual labor!
dialogue_tracker.char_159_peacok_CN_002: You're such a weak and ineffectual leader! How could you be so fragile? If it wasn't for the sorrowful tears Amiya would then shed, I'd convict you right here, right now!
dialogue_tracker.char_159_peacok_CN_003: You don't even know what conviction is? Now prick up your ears! The art of conviction is an assassination technique created by the first Conviction master, who combined traditional dance moves with ancient fighting techniques. And now, standing before you is his third-generation successor!
dialogue_tracker.char_159_peacok_CN_004: Conviction is not some barbaric fighting technique! It's an artform where beauty and ideals are poured into the fist, then delivered through the fist straight into the heart! Now you know!
dialogue_tracker.char_159_peacok_CN_005: This art is the crystallization of hard work and great insight. When people ignore the true value of art and use this sacred product as some sort of game, Conviction will descend to right all wrongs.
dialogue_tracker.char_159_peacok_CN_006: Do you not revere in awe my aestheticly perfect image and overwhelming pressure? Then you're unworthy of your place on the same team as your savior! Ughhh! Con! Viction!
dialogue_tracker.char_159_peacok_CN_007: I'm actually someone infected with Oripathy, an incurable disease?! Curses... is this my destiny? Is this the fate of all who wield the Conviction Punch? Hey, why are you all looking away! I'm clearly telling you a sad story!
dialogue_tracker.char_159_peacok_CN_008: You also wish to become Conviction? In that case, chew upon this question! 'You're standing at a junction in a railroad, with a train full of Durin people approaching. The junction splits off into two tracks, one upon which several artists with meager artistic achievements are...'
dialogue_tracker.char_159_peacok_CN_009: You don't even have the gumption to answer the easiest of Conviction's dilemmas! You have no artistic talent! Taaaaake this! Conviction - Second Style!
dialogue_tracker.char_159_peacok_CN_010: ...Hoo! Hah! No, wait, wrong move. Let's try again!
dialogue_tracker.char_159_peacok_CN_011: I am Conviction. I shall use this name, with all the faith it entails, as my code name. You ask what my talents are? I'm a master of the deadly and beautiful art of conviction! Now shiver in reverence!
dialogue_tracker.char_159_peacok_CN_012: An opportunity like this to become stronger is readily taken!
dialogue_tracker.char_159_peacok_CN_013: Ahaha, a promotion! The day when Conviction's hidden powers are released is not far away!
dialogue_tracker.char_159_peacok_CN_014: This sensation... it feels as if my artistic accomplishments have deepened, but also like something is welling up inside me...!
dialogue_tracker.char_159_peacok_CN_017: Due to my tendency to sometimes convict teammates, it would be safer for me to work alone.
dialogue_tracker.char_159_peacok_CN_024: You think you're a worthy opponent?
dialogue_tracker.char_159_peacok_CN_029: History is written by the winners… This is the doctrine of Conviction!
dialogue_tracker.char_159_peacok_CN_030: How about it! Aren't you awed by my heroic majesty-- Hey, wait up! Don't leave me behind!
dialogue_tracker.char_159_peacok_CN_031: It's fine. This victory might not be the most gorgeous, but it'll still serve us well.
dialogue_tracker.char_159_peacok_CN_032: Ugh... the magnificent Conviction must never allow such a blunder…
dialogue_tracker.char_159_peacok_CN_033: It's going to be another dilemma for me to convict this room…
dialogue_tracker.char_159_peacok_CN_036: Woahh! What are you trying to do this time! I'll teach you to behave!
dialogue_tracker.char_159_peacok_CN_038: Happy! New! Year! I bring Rhodes Island a dance most rich with the fragrance of Art. Enjoy with bated breath! All will receive a baptism by my gorgeous fistwork, and gain life anew!
dialogue_tracker.char_159_peacok_CN_042: Oh, if it isn't the Doctor!
dialogue_tracker.char_159_peacok_CN_043: Your office entrance is all filled with finely-wrapped boxes! I've convicted each and every one of them! Now partake in this gift from me: Soldiers Assemble: Barrage Fortress! The Firestorm Update!
dialogue_tracker.char_159_peacok_CN_044: Even beside those who don't understand art, those who misrepresent art are the vilest! The despair, the drowning despair! To think that penguin's music should find so many worshippers—that it should earn Number 1! Who was the contractor for that showdown? I will! Con! Vict!
dialogue_tracker.char_163_hpsts_CN_001: Hm? You want to watch me forge weapons? Sure, but be careful not to get singed.
dialogue_tracker.char_163_hpsts_CN_002: Only weapons that don't see use go undamaged. Therefore, a spotless weapon is actually a terrible sacrilege.
dialogue_tracker.char_163_hpsts_CN_003: Nowadays, weapon and equipment manufacturing is all modernized. Traditional craftsmen lose their livelihoods because of it. Times change. Those who can't keep up get left behind... that's only natural.
dialogue_tracker.char_163_hpsts_CN_004: Firearms… these weapons will change the world completely.
dialogue_tracker.char_163_hpsts_CN_005: My right leg? Oh, It's no big deal. You know, all craftsmen make mistakes.
dialogue_tracker.char_163_hpsts_CN_006: Thank you for giving me a chance to show what I can do.
dialogue_tracker.char_163_hpsts_CN_007: You saw my name engraved on some equipment? Well, no need to mind that. Probably has nothing to do with me.
dialogue_tracker.char_163_hpsts_CN_008: Steel and bronze form the bone, and then…
dialogue_tracker.char_163_hpsts_CN_009: If me and my hammer can still be of use to you, I'm honored.
dialogue_tracker.char_163_hpsts_CN_010: They're promoting new drinks at the bar... What should I have today?
dialogue_tracker.char_163_hpsts_CN_011: Vulcan, that's what everyone calls me. I can do maintenance on your weapons, if it comes up. The equipment I need for the forge is listed here, in this blueprint.
dialogue_tracker.char_163_hpsts_CN_012: Hmm… I'm feeling inspired. Gotta start the blowers. It's time to work.
dialogue_tracker.char_163_hpsts_CN_013: A skilled craftsman is crucial to a military organization. I see you understand that well.
dialogue_tracker.char_163_hpsts_CN_014: Keeping your weapons in good condition is the best way to keep your people safe. You agree with me? Seems I made the right choice joining you.
dialogue_tracker.char_163_hpsts_CN_017: I just want to focus on my work.
dialogue_tracker.char_163_hpsts_CN_018: You're making me the leader…? If you insist… Still, I'm much better at designing and producing weapons than giving orders.
dialogue_tracker.char_163_hpsts_CN_019: Can I stay behind and work? No?
dialogue_tracker.char_163_hpsts_CN_028: Your weapon will shatter under my next blow!
dialogue_tracker.char_163_hpsts_CN_029: Please bring me any enemy equipment you find. I want to know what they're making now.
dialogue_tracker.char_163_hpsts_CN_030: A victory, just as planned! This is why we need high-quality equipment for our fighters.
dialogue_tracker.char_163_hpsts_CN_031: Please submit damage reports for all of your equipment. I'll work on repairs when we get back.
dialogue_tracker.char_163_hpsts_CN_033: Do you have a furnace here?
dialogue_tracker.char_163_hpsts_CN_036: Any equipment you have in mind? I can try making it for you.
dialogue_tracker.char_163_hpsts_CN_038: Happy New Year, Doctor. A moment please, I'm working the forge. In our trade, we believe that the flames must burn bright over the new year, so that we'll be able to craft strong equipment.
dialogue_tracker.char_163_hpsts_CN_043: Happy birthday, Doctor. I'm not precisely sure what to give you as a present, since you don't need weapons. But the bar has been mixing some new drinks lately, and they've still got the ones I like. So how about I buy you a drink?
dialogue_tracker.char_163_hpsts_CN_044: People at Rhodes Island are beginning to understand the wonders of weapons. I was used to being alone, but now I get a few regular visitors... not that I mind. It's kind of fun, actually. Sometimes I even feel like a few more would be nice.
dialogue_tracker.char_164_nightm_CN_001: Um, it hurts my eyes in here... Doctor, could you turn down the office lights a bit? I'm not so used to bright rooms...
dialogue_tracker.char_164_nightm_CN_002: Um, did you really bring me here to be an Operator? Not to keep a watch on me? What about that doctor, Miss Kal'tsit? What is she going to do to me...?
dialogue_tracker.char_164_nightm_CN_003: My staff was passed down to me by my father. Its magic does something called 'Evernight' to those it touches. Anyone trapped in that illusion will... have trouble waking up the next day...
dialogue_tracker.char_164_nightm_CN_004: I'm used to being alone. When I feel lonely, I'll just talk to myself. Eheh... Hmm? Is that weird?
dialogue_tracker.char_164_nightm_CN_005: Stare deeply into my eyes. Feeling sleepy, aren't you? Hehe... Now, wouldn't you like to do something for me? Tell me, where does Rhodes Island store all its Originium?
dialogue_tracker.char_164_nightm_CN_006: You called for me? Oh yes, my disease is worsening. That's because you wouldn't give me your Originium, which means now this body is gradually disintegrating... So, just what should we do, Doc-tor?
dialogue_tracker.char_164_nightm_CN_007: Um, please let me apologize! I mean, erm, I m-might still end up saying something weird, but please don't get angry... I just have no way to control 'her'…
dialogue_tracker.char_164_nightm_CN_008: Say, Doctor, if I were to suddenly end you, right here, how would everyone else react...? Argh! Grgh! No! I have to stop myself from... Hehe, I really would like to see it...
dialogue_tracker.char_164_nightm_CN_009: Doctor, don't you get tired of it, from time to time? Your work,life, feelings, everything... What would you say to just forgetting all of it, all at once? With my power, things like that can be arranged...
dialogue_tracker.char_164_nightm_CN_010: Your sleeping face is so cute, it makes me want to...
dialogue_tracker.char_164_nightm_CN_011: I'm Nightmare... Ah, that's a code name. My real name is Gloria. But, if you don't mind, I'd rather you call me that... I think my code name... is kind of scary...
dialogue_tracker.char_164_nightm_CN_012: You're making me stronger... but why...?
dialogue_tracker.char_164_nightm_CN_013: I came here as a patient, to get treatment for my disease. But now, I'm given to understand that that doctor wants me to fight for you, doesn't she?
dialogue_tracker.char_164_nightm_CN_014: Don't you think I'm only barely qualified for this promotion? Not that it matters—go ahead and call your shots. At this point, I'm just lucky to even be alive.
dialogue_tracker.char_164_nightm_CN_019: What sorts of incredible powers will you show me? I can't wait to see.
dialogue_tracker.char_164_nightm_CN_020: So these are our enemies? Well, well, you look like fun.
dialogue_tracker.char_164_nightm_CN_021: Um, is there anything to eat?
dialogue_tracker.char_164_nightm_CN_022: Say, why don't you let me take you on?
dialogue_tracker.char_164_nightm_CN_024: Ah, the battlefield. How I missed you.
dialogue_tracker.char_164_nightm_CN_028: You'll run if—if you know what's good for you.
dialogue_tracker.char_164_nightm_CN_030: Well, sorry, but this is the end I prepared for you.
dialogue_tracker.char_164_nightm_CN_031: We won. What more could you ask for?
dialogue_tracker.char_164_nightm_CN_033: I'll be fine in the corner...
dialogue_tracker.char_164_nightm_CN_036: D-did I do something bad again...? J-Just, please let me apologize. I'm so, sooo sorry...
dialogue_tracker.char_164_nightm_CN_038: Happy New Year, Doctor... My wish? Good health, so that I can help you out more... Ah, well, then my wish is for this wish not to come true so easily.
dialogue_tracker.char_164_nightm_CN_043: Happy birthday, Doctor! It must be hard always carrying such heavy responsibilities, you deserve a break. Come closer, close your eyes, and let me bring you sweet dreams... Doctor?! S-Stay back, don't listen to me!
dialogue_tracker.char_164_nightm_CN_044: Rhodes Island feels so lively today. I like this sort of energetic atmosphere... Huh? A party? Er, maybe not... I'm happy enough watching everybody enjoy themselves...
dialogue_tracker.char_166_skfire_CN_001: The fire alarm's gone off? Sorry, it was only me passing by your office. My body temperature must've sailed too high again.
dialogue_tracker.char_166_skfire_CN_002: There's no language that's impossible to learn, no Arts that are impossible to understand. Isn't that the plain and simple truth? ...What? I'm the exception to the rule, you say?
dialogue_tracker.char_166_skfire_CN_003: My life plans...? Tch, everything was going swimmingly until that dreadful attack. But after Reunion murdered Phil, their eradication jumped to the top of my to-do list.
dialogue_tracker.char_166_skfire_CN_004: Rhodes Island's methods aren't nearly tough enough. All they'll do is drag King's Wand down.
dialogue_tracker.char_166_skfire_CN_005: Can you talk to Amiya for me? Poor girl, her kind heart clouds her judgment. As far as I'm concerned, total annihilation is the only fitting end for the wicked.
dialogue_tracker.char_166_skfire_CN_006: Your current skills wouldn't compare to even the average level of a King's Wand member such as myself. Ha, yes, I'm powerful... and the power of all five of us put together... words wouldn't even begin to describe.
dialogue_tracker.char_166_skfire_CN_007: Luminarie's blade was a gift from Shiro. I heard that the owner before Shiro was a swordmaster who could fell all the cherry blossoms of Higashi with a single swing. But even that legendary swordmaster was no match for Shiro, and had to surrender the blade.
dialogue_tracker.char_166_skfire_CN_008: What happened to your shirt? What? I burned a hole in it? But... impossible... my self-control is impeccable, don't you think...? I... well, I'm sorry. Really, truly sorry.
dialogue_tracker.char_166_skfire_CN_009: We might be on opposite ends of the spectrum when it comes to ideals, but I do enjoy seeing the people of Rhodes Island sweat away with bright hopes for the future. Yes, that is a compliment. It's a heartwarming sight.
dialogue_tracker.char_166_skfire_CN_010: How lazy. You think it's fine to just sleep here and while away the precious day?
dialogue_tracker.char_166_skfire_CN_011: I am Skyfire of King's Wand. I will remain at Rhodes Island until my objective is accomplished. What's my objective, you ask? To burn every last Reunion thug to ashes, of course.
dialogue_tracker.char_166_skfire_CN_012: This is no way to go about unleashing my true power.
dialogue_tracker.char_166_skfire_CN_014: Ha. Enjoying the privileges I deserve from time to time is a good way to relax.
dialogue_tracker.char_166_skfire_CN_017: This battlefield needs some heating up.
dialogue_tracker.char_166_skfire_CN_018: The rays of the sun are my shield.
dialogue_tracker.char_166_skfire_CN_020: Kneel before the flame of the heavens.
dialogue_tracker.char_166_skfire_CN_023: Bad luck is always in waiting for the weak.
dialogue_tracker.char_166_skfire_CN_024: The wise alway take the initiative.
dialogue_tracker.char_166_skfire_CN_027: May the flames of the sun devour you!
dialogue_tracker.char_166_skfire_CN_028: May the rays of the skies set you ablaze!
dialogue_tracker.char_166_skfire_CN_029: There isn't a soul who may survive the sunflame.
dialogue_tracker.char_166_skfire_CN_030: Pathetic... you're nothing but ashes now. Were you hoping to leave a trace behind?
dialogue_tracker.char_166_skfire_CN_031: Is that it? I had  higher expectations.
dialogue_tracker.char_166_skfire_CN_033: Couldn't you ready a slightly cooler room for me?
dialogue_tracker.char_166_skfire_CN_034: Are you trying to get your hand burnt?
dialogue_tracker.char_166_skfire_CN_036: Doctor, could you explain this theory to me? I'll need twelve minutes of your time, that's all.
dialogue_tracker.char_166_skfire_CN_038: Hmph, they won't let me near the fireworks. They say I could lose control and blow them all to kingdom come. They even set Logistics operators to guard the things. Why, I never—Eek! Get a fire extinguisher! …Anger causing a rise in body temperature is a perfectly normal physiological phenomenon. I—I'll steer clear of them!
dialogue_tracker.char_166_skfire_CN_042: How are you doing today, Doctor?
dialogue_tracker.char_166_skfire_CN_043: Manipulating Originium Arts to bake little clay treats is a lovely way to practice my fine control of the flames, and it's quite safe. Here, this delightful cup is for you. Ah, and it even heats itself, so you'll always have hot water. But do be careful when you sip from it.
dialogue_tracker.char_166_skfire_CN_044: I find I do think rather simply about some things. Pure power won't actually achieve everything I set for myself. It may hold the other side off for a while, but it doesn't get to the root of the issue. I must press on, Rhodes Island, I have much more yet to learn here.
dialogue_tracker.char_171_bldsk_CN_001: Doctor, Dr. Kal'tsit sent me to take a blood sample from you. We can chat as I'm getting the needle ready.
dialogue_tracker.char_171_bldsk_CN_002: Can I control the urge to feed, you ask? How dare you underestimate me! I'm a trained professional. Of course I can tell patients from food!
dialogue_tracker.char_171_bldsk_CN_003: It's my job to track blood indicators for all our operators, even if they aren't exactly happy about it—huh...? These blood bags? They're samples, of course! What were you thinking!?
dialogue_tracker.char_171_bldsk_CN_004: There's another one of my kind here. And she's an... engineer? Hm…maybe she likes the smell of machine oil more than blood?
dialogue_tracker.char_171_bldsk_CN_005: Why I chose to become a doctor? I can't say it was any sort of lofty calling. It's just that, you know, OUR kind... we don't exactly have the brightest prospects. But it turned out my skills were actually in surprisingly high demand, so... I just went with the flow.
dialogue_tracker.char_171_bldsk_CN_006: How do we fight the urge to feed? We actually have a course that helps us control our desires. And we've invented artificial blood, so we drink that if we need. We can be very resourceful, you know.
dialogue_tracker.char_171_bldsk_CN_007: This is the standard procedure. It's the same for everyone getting blood drawn. Don't move, Doctor. Ah... blood... your blood... it smells delicious... It's just… it's just… captivating...
dialogue_tracker.char_171_bldsk_CN_008: Replenishing saline solution! Changing filters! Sterilizing sand and charcoal canisters... all done! Doctor, you'd better keep your medical supplies well-maintained. As Dr. Kal'tsit said, when your kidneys give out, these machines are going to save your life... aw, come on, just kidding.
dialogue_tracker.char_171_bldsk_CN_009: Fine, fine, I'll come clean... I have tasted lots of blood of many different types from all different races. And I do enjoy the subtle differences in flavor, okay? In fact, the only type of blood I've never tasted is... yours, Doctor. Heheh...
dialogue_tracker.char_171_bldsk_CN_010: Hm? So you still have time to sleep? I'm jealous.
dialogue_tracker.char_171_bldsk_CN_011: I am Warfarin, the blood-scientist-slash-doctor. Besides typical healing Arts, I also bring you specialized medical treatments, courtesy of my remarkable expertise in hematology and plentiful experience. Anyway, look forward to working with you.
dialogue_tracker.char_171_bldsk_CN_012: Hm, my work efficiency seems to have improved.
dialogue_tracker.char_171_bldsk_CN_013: Are you even listening? We're having trouble collecting rare blood types for the emergency blood bank. So—what? What did you say? A promotion? Now?
dialogue_tracker.char_171_bldsk_CN_014: This only means more work for me, right? Ha, I saw that a mile away! I'm an expert in this field after all. Don't worry, I am well prepared!
dialogue_tracker.char_171_bldsk_CN_017: Wait, I need to prepare my equipment first.
dialogue_tracker.char_171_bldsk_CN_018: A leader reports only to you, right?
dialogue_tracker.char_171_bldsk_CN_019: My equipment is ready. We can start any time.
dialogue_tracker.char_171_bldsk_CN_020: I don't have the leisure for enemy intel at the moment. Taking care of our operators has already occupied my whole schedule...
dialogue_tracker.char_171_bldsk_CN_023: Call for help immediately if you're injured!
dialogue_tracker.char_171_bldsk_CN_029: It's really nerve-wracking being in the medic squad. Support troops are really under lots of pressure! Good thing I'm already used to it.
dialogue_tracker.char_171_bldsk_CN_030: The battlefield is a place of tragedy. I hope they come to understand this one day.
dialogue_tracker.char_171_bldsk_CN_031: Forget about those fleeing enemies at the moment, our priority now is to help the injured.
dialogue_tracker.char_171_bldsk_CN_032: I am sorry, we've even ran out reserve medicine…
dialogue_tracker.char_171_bldsk_CN_033: I guess I'm more accustomed to figuring things out myself...
dialogue_tracker.char_171_bldsk_CN_036: Doctor, isn't it almost time for your annual checkup?
dialogue_tracker.char_171_bldsk_CN_038: New Year's? My, the moment I turn around, another year passes. Time really does fly fast... Anyway, did you come on your own, Doctor? All alone? Good. And did you run into any other operators on the way...? That makes this easy, Doctor, let's test your blood. Oh, settle down, I'm just joking.
dialogue_tracker.char_171_bldsk_CN_043: Apparently this confection is popular in Higashi. You get strawberry juice in a plasma bag with an IV drip as a straw, and the sensation of drinking it is macabre but completely novel! Want one, Doctor? What are you sniffing it so hard for? It's just strawberry, of course it is! There's no weird additives in it at all!
dialogue_tracker.char_171_bldsk_CN_044: Look at how spry and active they all are. If only they could come back from field missions just as lively. It's a doctor's lot to worry, but some operators really don't know to cherish themselves. They don't fear me, so they don't listen. Maybe this calls for me to be a little more fearsome, like, Kal'tsit-style?
dialogue_tracker.char_172_svrash_CN_001: There are better ways to kill time. Care to try one?
dialogue_tracker.char_172_svrash_CN_002: Why the constant sullen face? Can't you at least smile for me? Good. That's what I want to see... Yes, there's no one better suited to solve your problems than me... Isn't that right?
dialogue_tracker.char_172_svrash_CN_003: That girl... Amiya, I believe her name was? She's no ordinary girl. If you don't put shackles on her wrists today, you will find yourself placing a crown upon her head tomorrow.
dialogue_tracker.char_172_svrash_CN_004: The stability of the alliance between Karlan and Rhodes Island depends solely on your state of mind, and mine. As such, we should at least try to get along, my friend.
dialogue_tracker.char_172_svrash_CN_005: I suppose... it's high time I signed this contract. Of course, I do know that the terms are in yours, and Rhodes Island's favor.
dialogue_tracker.char_172_svrash_CN_006: I'm well aware that this contract offers me nothing... But what does that matter? I shall nonetheless accept this unequal treaty. The reason being that I, SilverAsh, recognize that you warrant it.
dialogue_tracker.char_172_svrash_CN_007: Is Ensia giving you trouble? My apologies. It was originally my own responsibility to foster and guide her, but it's unlikely I will be able to do so. So I must ask... could you do it in my stead, {@nickname}?
dialogue_tracker.char_172_svrash_CN_008: Could you show me to Rhodes Island's deck? No, I'd just like to get a view of the area. Tenzin needs to spread his wings every once in a while as well. He must be longing to soar through the night sky.
dialogue_tracker.char_172_svrash_CN_009: If this continues, there will come a day when you and I confront one another... I seem delighted, you say? Hah, perhaps I am. You would be a worthy opponent, that's for certain. Let us make the most of our time before that day comes.
dialogue_tracker.char_172_svrash_CN_010: When the aether darkens, 'tis an omen that snowfall draws near...'
dialogue_tracker.char_172_svrash_CN_011: I, SilverAsh, have joined your cause as a sworn ally. Whatever your plans may be, do not disappoint me.
dialogue_tracker.char_172_svrash_CN_012: For one to travel such an arduous path, one absolutely must have experience.
dialogue_tracker.char_172_svrash_CN_013: Ostentatious titles are one thing, but the trust accompanying them is what concerns me. You surely know that.
dialogue_tracker.char_172_svrash_CN_014: It takes a daring soul to drag me into their war. That being so, I, SilverAsh, will show my prowess for all of Rhodes Island to see.
dialogue_tracker.char_172_svrash_CN_017: We all have our roles to play. Use my abilities as best you see fit.
dialogue_tracker.char_172_svrash_CN_018: You wish me to act as your proxy? Very well. But you must pay me due tribute later.
dialogue_tracker.char_172_svrash_CN_019: Compassion saves no one on the battlefield.
dialogue_tracker.char_172_svrash_CN_020: Show me what you're made of. Amuse me, if you even can.
dialogue_tracker.char_172_svrash_CN_025: 'The fool flaunting his gallantry reaches none with his vanity...'
dialogue_tracker.char_172_svrash_CN_026: 'Fool, for what reason hast thou come?'
dialogue_tracker.char_172_svrash_CN_027: 'Art thou mine worthy enemy, or art thou naught but a jester?'
dialogue_tracker.char_172_svrash_CN_029: The fiercer the battle, the more jubilant the victory.
dialogue_tracker.char_172_svrash_CN_030: A satisfying battle. It brought palpitations even to my heart.
dialogue_tracker.char_172_svrash_CN_032: Retreat at once, while there is still time.
dialogue_tracker.char_172_svrash_CN_033: For a place to rest my feet, it is acceptable.
dialogue_tracker.char_172_svrash_CN_036: Let me rest for a brief while. I'm more tired than I thought. My apologies.
dialogue_tracker.char_172_svrash_CN_038: The snow falls heavy... The blizzards of far-off Kjerag continue year after year, but the political landscape never stands still from one moment to the next. For those who fail to catch up with the changes, this age-old snowstorm will come to bury them beneath.
dialogue_tracker.char_172_svrash_CN_042: You haven't changed one bit, my friend.
dialogue_tracker.char_172_svrash_CN_043: Oh? Does my appearance aboard Rhodes Island today surprise you? The journey here from Kjerag certainly was an extensive one, but you shouldn't underestimate the fellowship between us so. Happy birthday, my ally and my friend. This present aside, do you have any birthday wishes?
dialogue_tracker.char_172_svrash_CN_044: Multiple times now, Rhodes Island has shown its ability and its responsibility as a medical firm. But I'm very curious. In your eyes, will this merely stop at Oripathy? What new ripples will you send across the lands in future? I have great expectations.
dialogue_tracker.char_173_slchan_CN_001: Uh... Doctor, you really need to work out more, you know.
dialogue_tracker.char_173_slchan_CN_002: Everyone's really nice here at Rhodes Island. Too nice to prank. Oh, is it time for lunch? I'll help!
dialogue_tracker.char_173_slchan_CN_003: Mountaineering's not just a hobby of mine, it's my career! You heard me: career!
dialogue_tracker.char_173_slchan_CN_004: The hoop on my leg? Oh, you mean what it's for? It's just for decoration. I've got this crystal over here, see. Wanna touch?
dialogue_tracker.char_173_slchan_CN_005: My brother sent Matterhorn to look after me, didn't he…? Ugh, why can't he just come out and tell me what he's thinking? It drives me mad.
dialogue_tracker.char_173_slchan_CN_006: I've always wanted to climb the holy Mt. Karlan, and I've only wanted it even more since my sister left us and became the Saintess. So Doctor, train me more, yeah? So one day I can reach the peak of Mt. Karlan and bring my sister home.
dialogue_tracker.char_173_slchan_CN_007: When it comes to Mountaineering, I won't lose to anyone! No one knows these tools better than me. They make great weapons too!
dialogue_tracker.char_173_slchan_CN_008: Yeah, Oripathy really changed me. But if I keep wallowing in self-pity, that wouldn't be like me, right? So, no matter what lies in wait in the future... I should continue working hard on my chosen path.
dialogue_tracker.char_173_slchan_CN_009: Ah, it's snowing... We Silverashes can't go back to the way we were... I get that. Everything's changed. Only the snow is the same—the same snowflakes that I watched falling back home.
dialogue_tracker.char_173_slchan_CN_010: Doctoooor? Doctooooor! Heeeey! Fine, if you're just gonna sleep, then so be it. Bye-bye!
dialogue_tracker.char_173_slchan_CN_011: I'm Cliffheart, and I live to conquer the peaks! It's nice to meet you!
