dialogue_tracker.char_2013_cerber_CN_004: I found a bunch of these little bottle things in some room, and the sauce inside tasted pretty good. Spicy? Umm... a little. But it's really yummy! Want some, Doctor?
dialogue_tracker.char_2013_cerber_CN_005: My den is right here. Doctor's den is above my head, and Vulcan's den is on my left... Okay, got it! One more time? Um, sure. My den is above my head, Doctor's den is on my left, and Vulcan's den is right here!
dialogue_tracker.char_2013_cerber_CN_006: Whoa… So this is where I started ? Oh, oh, then how far did I go? And where did you catch me? You can find it all on this map?!
dialogue_tracker.char_2013_cerber_CN_007: So hungry... My tummy's been grumbling for hours. Can we go to the canteen yet?
dialogue_tracker.char_2013_cerber_CN_008: I don't know much about Arts, but when other people try to use my weapons, they can't make all those cool sparky things happen. Anyway Doctor, don't worry. As long as I'm here, the bad guys can't hurt you. And I can tell who the bad guys are.
dialogue_tracker.char_2013_cerber_CN_009: Bad guys usually come in groups, and I don't always have friends around. But the more weapons you have, the more power you have. Am I right? So, can I get another hammer for my bag? Or a javelin! They're super useful! No…? Hmph! But I need it!
dialogue_tracker.char_2013_cerber_CN_011: You seem pretty nice. They call you 'Doctor,' right? My name is Ceobe, but if that's too hard to say, you can also call me Kay. I'm staying here from now on!
dialogue_tracker.char_2013_cerber_CN_013: This little button is for me? Alright, I'll put it on. Hmmm... Done!  Do I look cool?
dialogue_tracker.char_2013_cerber_CN_014: One's not enough, two gets the job done, and three is for safety. As long as I bring the right weapons for the job, I'll take out every bad guy I see!
dialogue_tracker.char_2013_cerber_CN_018: I'm in command? What's a command?
dialogue_tracker.char_2013_cerber_CN_019: Are we gonna eat goodies when we get back?
dialogue_tracker.char_2013_cerber_CN_029: With your brains, my job is super easy! You're the best, Doctor!
dialogue_tracker.char_2013_cerber_CN_030: All you need is a little bang, bump, pow! And they're done!
dialogue_tracker.char_2013_cerber_CN_031: Are you hurt? Should I wrap your ouchie?
dialogue_tracker.char_2013_cerber_CN_032: Hurry! Run! Before it's too late!
dialogue_tracker.char_2013_cerber_CN_033: This thing's super fluffy. Lying on it's gonna feel great!
dialogue_tracker.char_2013_cerber_CN_036: Doctor, can I follow you around?
dialogue_tracker.char_2013_cerber_CN_038: Today a holiday? Does that mean I don't need to do anything? Then I wanna stay here the whole day! Vulcan baked a lotta Kay-shaped honey biscuits, and I brought them with me. Hm! Doctor, eat up! Or I'll eat them all!
dialogue_tracker.char_2013_cerber_CN_042: Nice to meet you, Doctor! Mhm, that's a proper greeting, right?
dialogue_tracker.char_2013_cerber_CN_043: Today's the Doctor's birthday, this is the Doctor's cake. I can't eat it before you, I must wait! But there's so much fruit on top, and icing, and jam... Doctor, when are you going to blow out the candles? They said once you blow out the candles, then we can start eating it!
dialogue_tracker.char_2013_cerber_CN_044: I used to go hungry all year round, and I was really happy when I could just sleep safe and sound. Now I have a warm bed every day, so I'm happy. Oh, and it would be even nicer if my room could have all these snacks like yours does, Doctor.
dialogue_tracker.char_2014_nian_CN_001: Man, I'm so bored... Might just go shopping... You know what, yeah, we're doing it! Come on, put your shoes on. Yeah, we're both going out, that's why I said 'we'!
dialogue_tracker.char_2014_nian_CN_002: That lame look of yours is grinding my gears... Here, have a toy to lighten up. You're busy with work? Who cares about some boring-ass work? Just one thing: don't lose sight of this little doll, or it'll vanish in the blink of an eye.
dialogue_tracker.char_2014_nian_CN_003: Maaan, I'm so hungry... But as they say, gourmet food takes a gourmet cook. My brother's a great chef, you get hungry at one of our family reunions, just call him up and he'll take care of you. Now that's what I call service! Rhodes Island's food tastes like crap compared to his.
dialogue_tracker.char_2014_nian_CN_004: Lungmen's a pretty chill place, but their cuisine? It's got no kick to it! How can they eat that flavorless baby food? Listen up: spice is a way of life. Once you taste a little pleasant pain and feel that explosion of heat on your tongue, you'll realize what you've been missing all this time.
dialogue_tracker.char_2014_nian_CN_005: I used to just focus myself on what I needed for daily life, but I'm the type to really absorb my surroundings. And somehow or other I keep getting into fights. So I guess I could say it feels weird to NOT carry a weapon around. So it goes, I guess.
dialogue_tracker.char_2014_nian_CN_006: Rituals get passed down from generation to generation not 'cause they have any inherent meaning, but because people find their own meaning in them. A performance has its rewards, and a wish has its fulfillment. And when one of my favorite stories is involved, you bet your ass I'm gonna participate.
dialogue_tracker.char_2014_nian_CN_007: If you're out of touch with reality, you'll end up crushed beneath its boot, sooner or later. You'd think that's common freakin' sense, but some of my siblings ignore reality for what it is. Their dull lives are only gonna get harder for 'em as time goes on.
dialogue_tracker.char_2014_nian_CN_008: Your dreams turn to haze when you've lived as long as I have. But I've got better stuff to do than dream all day, and that's why l feel so alive. Sure, life is suffering, but seeing people carve something out for themselves is incredible. And as for you: think you got what it takes to be the anvil to my hammer?
dialogue_tracker.char_2014_nian_CN_009: Blacksmithing may just be a regular old occupation, but it was also a part of early civilization. I'll keep metallurgy well and alive, even if everything else dies out. That's the future I chose for myself long ago. And you, you've made important choices before, haven'tcha? Don't ever go back on them. Stay true to the end and see it through. That's what it means to complete something.
dialogue_tracker.char_2014_nian_CN_010: You're sleeping AGAIN? Wake up, sunshine! We're going shopping! C'mon, hurry!
dialogue_tracker.char_2014_nian_CN_011: Anybody home? Heard from one of your guys that I can make a comfy living here! Something about free lodging and food, with plenty of free time left over... Hm? This area is for staff only? Don't be like that! You make it sound like I don't belong here!
dialogue_tracker.char_2014_nian_CN_012: Huh? What good do you think this stuff's gonna do me? Skills like these are only useful to people who value them.
dialogue_tracker.char_2014_nian_CN_013: A promotion? That takes me back... I got something like this once before. Anyway, that's cool, I guess. You have my thanks!
dialogue_tracker.char_2014_nian_CN_014: People are like tools; you can classify 'em. And you, you're an interesting one... Or should I say 'unusual'? I could forge you a good sword, but since you ain't gonna swing it, let alone fight in the first place, it'd just be a waste of metal.
dialogue_tracker.char_2014_nian_CN_017: Guess one thing's never gonna change with time: swords will inevitably clash.
dialogue_tracker.char_2014_nian_CN_018: Say what? Lead the team? Never led anyone before, but I guess I'll try.
dialogue_tracker.char_2014_nian_CN_019: A smith's gotta be ready to pay the debts accrued by the weapons she forges.
dialogue_tracker.char_2014_nian_CN_020: My sword's gonna cleave your bodies and values alike.
dialogue_tracker.char_2014_nian_CN_021: Oh? You want me to handle this(, personally)?
dialogue_tracker.char_2014_nian_CN_022: A knife, a life; weapons are the basis for society.
dialogue_tracker.char_2014_nian_CN_023: 'When 'tis a choice of life and death, why shouldst thou lay down thy arms?'
dialogue_tracker.char_2014_nian_CN_024: Let's just get this done with.
dialogue_tracker.char_2014_nian_CN_025: You dare strike my shield with your spear? That's gonna end with you in pieces!
dialogue_tracker.char_2014_nian_CN_026: My body burns at over 1,400 degrees!
dialogue_tracker.char_2014_nian_CN_027: Even a virtuous king must, from time to time, look to the sword.
dialogue_tracker.char_2014_nian_CN_028: Why do I gotta waste my precious time on the likes of you third-rate amateurs?
dialogue_tracker.char_2014_nian_CN_029: Not bad! I see some faint promise in you!
dialogue_tracker.char_2014_nian_CN_030: These small fry ain't even close to quelling my hunger.
dialogue_tracker.char_2014_nian_CN_031: Man, you sure messed up. What'd I tell you about air bubbles weakening the iron?
dialogue_tracker.char_2014_nian_CN_032: Terrible... If I really let myself loose, things would get a whole lot nastier... for everyone involved.
dialogue_tracker.char_2014_nian_CN_033: Mind if I do some redecorating in here?
dialogue_tracker.char_2014_nian_CN_036: Hold still! I'm making you a little something for your ear. It'll look great, just don't move!
dialogue_tracker.char_2014_nian_CN_038: Aww, yeah! Today's the day I've been waiting for! It's time to release my brand-new masterpiece! That's right. Unlimited Showdown in the Siege of Monster Doomsday. My blood and sweat went into making this one a special effects blockbuster. You're not gonna watch? Wait, wait, all of you got the day off, right? Why aren't you coming?
dialogue_tracker.char_2014_nian_CN_042: Yo, Doctor, you had lunch yet?
dialogue_tracker.char_2014_nian_CN_043: Birthdays, huh? Yeah, heard of those. You guys know where you came from, when you got here, so you like to celebrate the day. Here, this hammer's for you. Can't lift it? Hehe, of course you can't. I like to see people live and grow, you know. If after all these years, all we've forged is weapons, without honing our people, then the weapons are just some lumps of metal too heavy to wield.
dialogue_tracker.char_2014_nian_CN_044: The food was bad, but a fun time was had, sort of... Well, I know they had fun, but I just couldn't enjoy myself. All I see is Rhodes Islanders putting down their weapons, and coming to munch on spice and play mahjong with me. And when the party's over, they pick those weapons right back up. It makes me think, damn, what a shame. Hey, what are you gawping at me for? C'mon, let's take a walk.
dialogue_tracker.char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_001: Man, I'm so bored... Might just go shopping... You know what, yeah, we're doing it! Come on, put your shoes on. Yeah, we're both going out, that's why I said 'we'!
dialogue_tracker.char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_002: That lame look of yours is grinding my gears... Here, have a toy to lighten up. You're busy with work? Who cares about some boring-ass work? Just one thing: don't lose sight of this little doll, or it'll vanish in the blink of an eye.

Unlimited Showdown in the Siege of Monster Doomsday. My blood and sweat went into making this one a special effects blockbuster. You're not gonna watch? Wait, wait, all of you got the day off, right? Why aren't you coming?
dialogue_tracker.char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_042: Yo, Doctor, you had lunch yet?
dialogue_tracker.char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_043: Birthdays, huh? Yeah, heard of those. You guys know where you came from, when you got here, so you like to celebrate the day. Here, this hammer's for you. Can't lift it? Hehe, of course you can't. I like to see people live and grow, you know. If after all these years, all we've forged is weapons, without honing our people, then the weapons are just some lumps of metal too heavy to wield.
dialogue_tracker.char_2014_nian_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_044: The food was bad, but a fun time was had, sort of... Well, I know they had fun, but I just couldn't enjoy myself. All I see is Rhodes Islanders putting down their weapons, and coming to munch on spice and play mahjong with me. And when the party's over, they pick those weapons right back up. It makes me think, damn, what a shame. Hey, what are you gawping at me for? C'mon, let's take a walk.
dialogue_tracker.char_2015_dusk_CN_001: Hm? Did I not explain that you were forbidden to enter without my express permission, after knocking? Oh? This is your office? You're working? Then have I not come out of my room to work as well? What is the meaning of 'your office'? Get out! I'm still sketching it out.
dialogue_tracker.char_2015_dusk_CN_002: You want to see my painting? You may. For you, I could even give you the painting. But if you like it, I won't give it to you. You don't like it? Huh, then you wouldn't want it anyway. This is who I am. Deal with it.
dialogue_tracker.char_2015_dusk_CN_003: Haa… I'm trapped on this ship. If anyone asks, you tell them so, and you do not let them into my room. I'm taking up space? I'm refusing to perform my operator duties? Hello, I am Dusk, the great painter trapped in this room.
dialogue_tracker.char_2015_dusk_CN_004: I'm not going out. Don't try to make me go out, I don't want to go out. I no longer care for the world outside. Do I dislike it? I like it fine. The mountains and rivers, the flowers and feathers, the pools and forests, the common folk, young and old, I could paint forever, I could watch forever, and yet, I will not go. It does not hold my interest forever.
dialogue_tracker.char_2015_dusk_CN_005: I loathe the word 'taste.' What gives these people the confidence to demand something good just as they open their mouths to lock the gates to others? It is unbecoming. If you are satisfied, you are satisfied. Should you enter, you must not bar the gate. Do you see the twin moons thinking only of themselves?
dialogue_tracker.char_2015_dusk_CN_006: An opportunity to watch me paint in earnest comes but once in a lifetime to one in ten thousand individuals. 'When the time comes, the strength of heaven and earth are one.' Ch'i, bone, shape, color, method, pouring out as a vast river, fine like the shadow of mountain bamboo, such is my brush, and it will not stop.
dialogue_tracker.char_2015_dusk_CN_007: I took the time to partake of some contemporary works. Films are not bad, they are like paintings. The good ones all have a unique strength of character, with form, and with decent meaning. Right, poetry and painting have a legacy. Do you have time to help me burn Nian's mountain of garbage? She is denigrating the very concept of cinema. Please.
dialogue_tracker.char_2015_dusk_CN_008: Food? Oh, thank you. Hm, where does this drink come from? It's good. Quite good. But I feel like it's missing something. You want to know what I usually eat? Then close your eyes. Ah~ You feel nothing, yes? That's because if you don't look, the food in my paintings does not exist.
dialogue_tracker.char_2015_dusk_CN_009: Take a look at Nian's carefree expression. You know the truth, don't you? She cares quite a bit about our lives, and our deaths. As for me? I may not get along with the wretched scribbler, but neither of us care much. When people die, the paintings remain. When I die, my work remains.
dialogue_tracker.char_2015_dusk_CN_010: Dreams are like unto life, like unto the scroll. One sleeps this sleep, will one sleep for millennia?
dialogue_tracker.char_2015_dusk_CN_011: Oh? {@nickname}? Another contract? Very well, please don't bother me again after I sign this one. Here... I should tell you here and now: I, Dusk, do not give out my paintings. Not to anyone. And I don't take commissions!
dialogue_tracker.char_2015_dusk_CN_012: Hm? A swing of an axe becomes rivers of blood. Do you mean... you want me to paint this?
dialogue_tracker.char_2015_dusk_CN_013: Why use a sword? There is a reason. 'With an inkstone sheath, one may learn the annals. With a brush sword, one may paint the celestial.' Is it true? Naturally, I speak off the cuff.
dialogue_tracker.char_2015_dusk_CN_014: Ahh, to make it this far with me... I should paint you a scroll. But be careful! Do not get caught up within it. The world I paint is much more fascinating than this one. How many have been lost, since ancient times? How many have escaped?
dialogue_tracker.char_2015_dusk_CN_018: Captain? What does a captain do?
dialogue_tracker.char_2015_dusk_CN_020: I'm in a good mood today. I'll give you this one I've titled 'Bones on the Sand'.
dialogue_tracker.char_2015_dusk_CN_022: Better leave the fine brush at home.
dialogue_tracker.char_2015_dusk_CN_023: Would any of you like to be my paint?
dialogue_tracker.char_2015_dusk_CN_024: This battlefield would do well with a splash of ink.
dialogue_tracker.char_2015_dusk_CN_025: Too difficult to explain, let me paint it for you.
dialogue_tracker.char_2015_dusk_CN_026: With the setting of the sun, the brush draws up the peaks!
dialogue_tracker.char_2015_dusk_CN_027: Copy the infinite with the tangible, bring the intangible to life!
dialogue_tracker.char_2015_dusk_CN_028: I am rather attached to you. Most of the time.
dialogue_tracker.char_2015_dusk_CN_029: Once, painting and war were quite different. But with this power, battle is art.
dialogue_tracker.char_2015_dusk_CN_031: Hm... a failed painting must be destroyed. It will bring shame.
dialogue_tracker.char_2015_dusk_CN_032: Slipped on a stroke? Start over.
dialogue_tracker.char_2015_dusk_CN_033: Do not bother preparing the room for me. I will handle it myself.
dialogue_tracker.char_2015_dusk_CN_038: The New Year? A human's life is brief enough as it is. It's like partitioning a tiny dot on a scroll, thinking what to draw here, what to draw there, coming and going full circle, living and dying in exhaustion. But whatever. A moment of laughing and feasting is valid enough, I suppose.
dialogue_tracker.char_2015_dusk_CN_042: What was your name again? Oh, {@nickname}?
dialogue_tracker.char_2015_dusk_CN_043: What? You wanted me to celebrate your birthday? Don't think I came all the way out here just for that, I'm only getting some fresh air and happened to run into you. Oh, and here, a painting I messed up and stopped caring about, so now it's yours. What did I draw? Why don't you go look in a mirror and compare.
dialogue_tracker.char_2015_dusk_CN_044: I keep saying, don't bring me out for nothing. You want to celebrate together? Celebrate what, me being trapped here this long? Get out, get out, honestly... No, the decorations on the wall were me scrawling randomly, and I didn't draw them just because Closure asked me to. Once again, I don't take commissions.
dialogue_tracker.char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_001: Hm? Did I not explain that you were forbidden to enter without my express permission, after knocking? Oh? This is your office? You're working? Then have I not come out of my room to work as well? What is the meaning of 'your office'? Get out! I'm still sketching it out.

dialogue_tracker.char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_009: Take a look at Nian's carefree expression. You know the truth, don't you? She cares quite a bit about our lives, and our deaths. As for me? I may not get along with the wretched scribbler, but neither of us care much. When people die, the paintings remain. When I die, my work remains.
dialogue_tracker.char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_010: Dreams are like unto life, like unto the scroll. One sleeps this sleep, will one sleep for millennia?
dialogue_tracker.char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_011: Oh? {@nickname}? Another contract? Very well, please don't bother me again after I sign this one. Here... I should tell you here and now: I, Dusk, do not give out my paintings. Not to anyone. And I don't take commissions!
dialogue_tracker.char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_012: Hm? A swing of an axe becomes rivers of blood. Do you mean... you want me to paint this?
dialogue_tracker.char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_013: Why use a sword? There is a reason. 'With an inkstone sheath, one may learn the annals. With a brush sword, one may paint the celestial.' Is it true? Naturally, I speak off the cuff.
dialogue_tracker.char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_014: Ahh, to make it this far with me... I should paint you a scroll. But be careful! Do not get caught up within it. The world I paint is much more fascinating than this one. How many have been lost, since ancient times? How many have escaped?
dialogue_tracker.char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_018: Captain? What does a captain do?
dialogue_tracker.char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_020: I'm in a good mood today. I'll give you this one I've titled 'Bones on the Sand'.
dialogue_tracker.char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_022: Better leave the fine brush at home.
dialogue_tracker.char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_023: Would any of you like to be my paint?
dialogue_tracker.char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_024: This battlefield would do well with a splash of ink.
dialogue_tracker.char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_025: Too difficult to explain, let me paint it for you.
dialogue_tracker.char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_026: With the setting of the sun, the brush draws up the peaks!
dialogue_tracker.char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_027: Copy the infinite with the tangible, bring the intangible to life!
dialogue_tracker.char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_028: I am rather attached to you. Most of the time.
dialogue_tracker.char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_029: Once, painting and war were quite different. But with this power, battle is art.
dialogue_tracker.char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_031: Hm... a failed painting must be destroyed. It will bring shame.
dialogue_tracker.char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_032: Slipped on a stroke? Start over.
dialogue_tracker.char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_033: Do not bother preparing the room for me. I will handle it myself.
dialogue_tracker.char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_038: The New Year? A human's life is brief enough as it is. It's like partitioning a tiny dot on a scroll, thinking what to draw here, what to draw there, coming and going full circle, living and dying in exhaustion. But whatever. A moment of laughing and feasting is valid enough, I suppose.
dialogue_tracker.char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_042: What was your name again? Oh, {@nickname}?
dialogue_tracker.char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_043: What? You wanted me to celebrate your birthday? Don't think I came all the way out here just for that, I'm only getting some fresh air and happened to run into you. Oh, and here, a painting I messed up and stopped caring about, so now it's yours. What did I draw? Why don't you go look in a mirror and compare.
dialogue_tracker.char_2015_dusk_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_044: I keep saying, don't bring me out for nothing. You want to celebrate together? Celebrate what, me being trapped here this long? Get out, get out, honestly... No, the decorations on the wall were me scrawling randomly, and I didn't draw them just because Closure asked me to. Once again, I don't take commissions.
dialogue_tracker.char_201_moeshd_CN_001: This here Croissant guarantees yer safety, no matter where yer headin', Baws! Oh, 'n payment's upfront! 'Member that!
dialogue_tracker.char_201_moeshd_CN_002: Make a buncha money workin' yer butt off! We can't be livin' in no poverty, after all!
dialogue_tracker.char_201_moeshd_CN_003: Yer kiddin'! All yer people got such shiny gear on 'em! Lemme have a touch too!
dialogue_tracker.char_201_moeshd_CN_004: Boy, I sure love orderin' new gear! Feels like I bought enough stuff to fill the whole depot! This what they call a 'shoppin' addiction'?
dialogue_tracker.char_201_moeshd_CN_005: Every month there's more 'n more bills to pay... 'n that's why I sell some stuff I find on the side! Everythin' I got is cheap 'n high quality!
dialogue_tracker.char_201_moeshd_CN_006: Move this, lift that. If we gotta be haulin' things, might as well pick some easy-to-use and yummy-yummy stuff!
dialogue_tracker.char_201_moeshd_CN_007: Baws, Baws! Found this here heckin' tasty thing lyin' around, ya want a bite? Ya ask me, the only thing second to gud gear is gud food!
dialogue_tracker.char_201_moeshd_CN_008: Baws, c'mere a sec, wouldja? Take a gander at my wares! From fancy clothes 'n everyday items to office supplies and gear, ya name it, I got it! Buy in bulk 'n I'll give ya a discount!
dialogue_tracker.char_201_moeshd_CN_009: Baws, I gotta thank ya! With all them referrals, I can buy everything I ever wanted! Yer the best, Baws! Love ya lots!
dialogue_tracker.char_201_moeshd_CN_010: Aw shucks, gotta tighten my belt again this month...
dialogue_tracker.char_201_moeshd_CN_011: The name's Croissant, and by golly yer in luck, Baws! Won't find nobody as good at their trade as I am! I'm strong, don't break easy, 'n if ya hire me right now, I'll give ya a 20% discount!
dialogue_tracker.char_201_moeshd_CN_012: I reckon I'll get more work if I get stronger!
dialogue_tracker.char_201_moeshd_CN_013: Thank ya kindly, Baws, fer helpin' me find such a nice job.
dialogue_tracker.char_201_moeshd_CN_014: Baws, Baws, I made good use of that there bonus ya gave me! Check it out, I don’t got myself some new gear. All the better to keep ya safe!
dialogue_tracker.char_201_moeshd_CN_018: Listen up, y'all! Let's do this here mission nice and cleanlike!
dialogue_tracker.char_201_moeshd_CN_019: We'll be back with the best results ya ever did see!
dialogue_tracker.char_201_moeshd_CN_020: Well lookee here. The bad guys're comin' to donate their gear!
dialogue_tracker.char_201_moeshd_CN_021: What can I do ya for?
dialogue_tracker.char_201_moeshd_CN_022: Time to try this here new gear!
dialogue_tracker.char_201_moeshd_CN_028: That ain't gon' work on me!
dialogue_tracker.char_201_moeshd_CN_029: Ya reckon the enemy dropped a treasure chest or somesuch?
dialogue_tracker.char_201_moeshd_CN_031: Dagnabbit... the enemy got away! That ain't good for my rep…
dialogue_tracker.char_201_moeshd_CN_032: Aw, shucks… First I lost the fight, and now my wallet…
dialogue_tracker.char_201_moeshd_CN_033: Ya got any treasure chests hidin' 'round here?
dialogue_tracker.char_201_moeshd_CN_036: Baws, Baws, got any nifty stuff on hand? C'mon, I wanna see!
dialogue_tracker.char_201_moeshd_CN_038: Happy New Year, Baws! The Penguin Logistics girls're countin' on yer business. And my hammer and shield'll keep yer goodies safe wherever they need to go. Hehe, if'n ya trust me enough, feel free to cut out Emperor and send the job straight to me!
dialogue_tracker.char_201_moeshd_CN_043: Shhh! Rise n' shine, Baws. Get'cher clothes on! We gotta move before the others wake up. Texas's got the engine runnin', and Exusiai's talkin' about a champaign buffet with all the rubber bullets we'n shoot. Relax, Baws, we know a thing or two about birthday parties.
dialogue_tracker.char_201_moeshd_CN_044: Even yer most carefully-laid plan ain't gonna carry you outta the swamp when yer all stuck in it. That's when ya come lookin' fer the unstoppable force! Hold the shiny equipment! That's the reason Rhodes Island n' Penguin Logistics're like two peas in a pod! Here's to keepin' that unstoppable force rollin', Baws!
dialogue_tracker.char_2023_ling_CN_001: Evocative so. Years and an age ago, the very palace rained and drizzled in the whisperers of consultants.
dialogue_tracker.char_2023_ling_CN_002: Yea, when Yan scholars speak of Sui, that is us, and It too. Facts hardly worth covering up; Nian's worries are not mine. After all, I am only me, and my death, no more than death is. The only shames would be this wine and world, for at day's end I love them long.
dialogue_tracker.char_2023_ling_CN_003: I was of the mind I would finally meet someone past, an old friend. Never did I think this is how you now present yourself. From knowing not one is one, isn't this like a dream? However, {@nickname}. It is fine to be as yourself. Long have I contended with myself; myself I shall prefer to act.
dialogue_tracker.char_2023_ling_CN_004: Where the heart is as will, and its utterance is as verse. If wells your chest with depths manifold, wouldn't failing their writing be shame to meet yourself? Hm? My tail? Ah, so too do I make use of a common brush, naturally. But it is at times inconvenient, as an extremity would be. My body is an unfettered one; who says I can't use my tail?
dialogue_tracker.char_2023_ling_CN_005: Poetry, speech, lyric, essay. Though they all differ as their own, they are common in places. A pity the people of now are, by and large unable to exercise patience. To listen to a song, to read a poem. I take no objection to it, but how must our present scholars suffer.
dialogue_tracker.char_2023_ling_CN_006: Nian is too impetuous, Dusk timid, yet to see the two as they are now, it seems they already know what they like, and want to do. So why probe at veracity or falsity or object or subject? To bicker and squabble every day, knowing emotion's gamut, is that not what a person is?
dialogue_tracker.char_2023_ling_CN_007: {@nickname}, would you want for me to compose you a verse? Hm? Nay, I'm simply in the mood. I need not write it, nor record it. Ah, wait, if it were a song... that would be quite good too! But to dance a song, I fear I would need some preparation. Good! You sit there, and await me a short while.
dialogue_tracker.char_2023_ling_CN_008: I am drunk? Hah... I have not yet seen the sky throw wide, moon rise, seas race, ice break, to wait true for all the world's sobriety would be but the withering of a bud, to want true for deep intoxication would be far too early still... {@nickname}, now, why do you say I am drunk?
dialogue_tracker.char_2023_ling_CN_009: Last night I dreamt of you. Nay! Perhaps it's you who dreamt of me. Oh, can you not recall? A shame; it delighted me so, yet I cannot share this revelry. Delighted how? Hmm. That eight thousand years of springs, eight thousand of winters, all dreamt, were no more than a brief handful of autumns. That is all.
dialogue_tracker.char_2023_ling_CN_010: Clouds ranged as billows, distant-run roads withered. I, departed of the vistas, sailed a ferry in late autumn.
dialogue_tracker.char_2023_ling_CN_011: Ling, you can call me. Have my two troublemaking sisters vexed you any? Hm? You've seen me before? Ah... perhaps so, in a dream.
dialogue_tracker.char_2023_ling_CN_012: Though antithetical at a glance, your nature is quite similar.
dialogue_tracker.char_2023_ling_CN_013: Hm... 'General, I heed thy order,' should I say? Ha, do not take it seriously. I only suppose that if you were truly a field marshal, then I may not mind once again serving as a strategist.
dialogue_tracker.char_2023_ling_CN_014: Nian was not wrong. This farcical dream of a thousand autumns is only right to wake from.
dialogue_tracker.char_2023_ling_CN_017: The river bends a thousand times, a city lone in desolation, vivid in the mind's eye.
dialogue_tracker.char_2023_ling_CN_018: To scatter the fill of a brimming cup, to share the sip for a soothed sorrow.
dialogue_tracker.char_2023_ling_CN_019: Plotted schemes, waged wars, crossed arms, shed blood. An eternity, unaltered and unfailing in its challenge.
dialogue_tracker.char_2023_ling_CN_020: To gaze the fire from afar, knowing not its heat.
dialogue_tracker.char_2023_ling_CN_021: Has it come to my turn?
dialogue_tracker.char_2023_ling_CN_023: And thus has autumn made reckoned her arrival.
dialogue_tracker.char_2023_ling_CN_024: For the marching, a warsong. For the fallen, a lament.
dialogue_tracker.char_2023_ling_CN_025: The split halberd sinks in the sand, great aspirations unrecompensed.
dialogue_tracker.char_2023_ling_CN_026: One word to address all beneath the heaven, one scope to spare none upon the earth.
dialogue_tracker.char_2023_ling_CN_027: When will the hate sunk beneath the battlefield disperse?
dialogue_tracker.char_2023_ling_CN_028: Speak as your heart wills, and be as your intoxication wishes.
dialogue_tracker.char_2023_ling_CN_029: Another song, sublime and majestic. {@nickname}, perhaps you and I truly are as two entwined friends.
dialogue_tracker.char_2023_ling_CN_030: Duly satisfying, as a cup filled to the brim. We should remain level and humble, yet... we ought to sing your praises, yes. You did well.
dialogue_tracker.char_2023_ling_CN_031: Mm... things disappoint on occasion; there's no need to blame yourself too hard. Leave the rest to me.
dialogue_tracker.char_2023_ling_CN_032: Victory and defeat are commonplace in war. As we have freedom to maneuver, this is not a complete loss.
dialogue_tracker.char_2023_ling_CN_033: Rhodes Island's interior... I'm lost as to whether I should say it's reminiscent or curious.
dialogue_tracker.char_2023_ling_CN_036: What is it? Would you like a cup? You wouldn't? What a shame.
dialogue_tracker.char_2023_ling_CN_038: Nian can have her boisterous way. I see Dusk, for all her reticence, has brought out her scroll's creation to join the children in play. Heheh, what troublemakers they are. I will say it charms me, that we siblings tint in this human nature as we live each to our own.
dialogue_tracker.char_2023_ling_CN_043: A birthday? Though all life and death's abundance makes but a farcical dream... Nay, should you be free at ease within, then a toast from me to you is only becoming. You may not be the old friend that lives in dreams, but that we lock eyes and converse apiece here is no misfortune to me at all.
dialogue_tracker.char_2023_ling_CN_044: Yea, they are my writings over the walls. A fair accompaniment to your feastful merrymaking, I would tout. Why would I write, you ask? And what would be writ-worthy? Nay, it is but that the drinks flow free and spirits run high. To speak of which, your arrival is just so. I would still essay to hear from you—of much of Rhodes Island.
dialogue_tracker.char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_001: Evocative so. Years and an age ago, the very palace rained and drizzled in the whisperers of consultants.
