dialogue_tracker.char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_036: What is it? Would you like a cup? You wouldn't? What a shame.
dialogue_tracker.char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_038: Nian can have her boisterous way. I see Dusk, for all her reticence, has brought out her scroll's creation to join the children in play. Heheh, what troublemakers they are. I will say it charms me, that we siblings tint in this human nature as we live each to our own.
dialogue_tracker.char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_043: A birthday? Though all life and death's abundance makes but a farcical dream... Nay, should you be free at ease within, then a toast from me to you is only becoming. You may not be the old friend that lives in dreams, but that we lock eyes and converse apiece here is no misfortune to me at all.
dialogue_tracker.char_2023_ling_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_044: Yea, they are my writings over the walls. A fair accompaniment to your feastful merrymaking, I would tout. Why would I write, you ask? And what would be writ-worthy? Nay, it is but that the drinks flow free and spirits run high. To speak of which, your arrival is just so. I would still essay to hear from you—of much of Rhodes Island.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_CN_001: You would like to be my 'kung fu recorder?' The way Rhodes Island treats its guests truly moves me. It is no wonder my sisters love this place so much… I misunderstand?  No problem, I have no qualms with being your subordinate either.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_CN_002: Doctor.' Your title reminds me of the Yanese scholars. Experienced and knowledgeable, they see the forest for the trees. You feel like we've met before? It's true that after awakening from my dream of chaos, I have traveled to many places... Sadly, the more friends I make, the lonelier I feel. Perhaps we are alike in that respect.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_CN_003: As you can see, I note down only my experiences and insights, rather than any specific kung fu moves. What really matters to the martial arts is 'Yi' — your intent. If you let yourself be constrained by those gaudy forms, you will find it hard to break out of them. Take Dusk's paintings, for example. If I couldn't grasp the intent behind them, and sought to discuss techniques and styles with her, she would only shut the door on my face.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_CN_004: I agreed to be a 'fight choreographer' for Nian's movie. It keeps her from making too much of a racket, or getting too lonely. Dusk is timid, and Ling is too fond of drink. I will look after them as well... We are far from a normal family. Nevertheless, we are siblings, and not the collective 'we' as we are often called.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_CN_005: Death is a daily occurrence to warriors on campaign. But the real challenge they face, is preserving their humanity and morality after facing such morbidity, rather growing jaded and desensitized. Indeed, conflicts and mortality have been the way of these lands for eons. But only those giant, terrible creatures are cold-hearted enough to think so.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_CN_006: The world is a vast place, and wonderful sceneries abound, yet man has limited strength and time. It is impossible to see all these sights, much less defend them. To those who practice the martial arts, all we can do is train day and night, from the depths of winter to the height of summer. It may sound like a clumsy and brutish method, but the result is giving every last drop you have, leaving no regrets.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_CN_007: That sword is an unwanted possession that must not be cast away. Huai Tianpei keeping it is an outcome that all concerned parties can accept. My duel with him, you ask? He trained for forty years, and landed a single heavy blow on me. But how many comings and goings of spring and autumn have I trained? All things considered, I was the one who lost.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_CN_008: 'Who am I'... For this question, you need only gaze upon the water. Be it human, beast, mountains, foggy woods, or the reflection of the twin moons on the night sky, whatever it is you see, that is your answer. As for the distant, radically different future, whether we siblings will return to chaos and seek new answers, is an entirely different question.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_CN_009: The scholars at court seek perfect answers in everything. The kung fu practitioners who wander in jianghu seek revenge, status, glory, or a simple resolution. Their obsessions run deep, yet their time runs short. Often, they spend their whole lifetimes chasing a single ideal or undertaking... All those people, how woeful and pitiful, how respectable and regrettable.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_CN_010: The spring comes and goes, leaving a lonely autumn.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_CN_011: Doctor, thank you kindly for taking care of my sisters. I hope you will excuse me for intruding upon Rhodes Island for a little while. Please call me 'Chongyue.' It's a name given to me by... an old friend of mine.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_CN_012: The colors that once embellished the autumn grass, hues long buried by war.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_CN_013: Often I think about those soldiers who traveled from all corners of Great Yan to Yumen. They risked their lives in battle until death took them, or their age crept upon themselves... yet never for their own ends.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_CN_014: Battles we have fought, death we have braved. Doctor, no need to say more.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_CN_017: Lit, quenched, then lit again… The signal fires never ever rest.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_CN_018: In that case, Doctor, will you beat the drums for me as we sortie?
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_CN_019: The sunset weaves a silken river. Heaven and earth bolster me upon departure.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_CN_020: Warriors from afar rest scarce, the armor they wear spurs them to march.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_CN_021: One should spar from time to time.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_CN_023: Look at this spectacular sight. Alas, it is now a battlefield.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_CN_024: Many intellectuals must join a battle before penning a decent verse, including that sister of mine… This too is an opportunity.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_CN_025: Unsteady posture, wavering intent. Much to learn yet.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_CN_026: A thousand moves in one breath!
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_CN_027: Strike, and sunder the tides cleft. Retract, and leave no peace bereft.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_CN_028: After all this time, you still turn to war for solutions!
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_CN_029: You calmly place your pieces to plot your victory... Doctor, a weiqi player like you is a truly rare sight.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_CN_030: A thousand armies move at the beating of your war drums, with a handful of sand to clean the blood from one's armor... What a tremendous victory!
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_CN_031: There is never a true victory in brandishing a sword and formulating a strategy, while looking for gains and losses is an even greater folly. So long as you leave no regrets, then all is well.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_CN_032: All warriors must face defeat. Don't lose heart.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_CN_033: This is much more comfortable than a military tent. Can I even manage a good night's sleep without the sound of drilling soldiers…?
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_CN_034: Doctor, have you figured out how to counter that move from yesterday?
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_CN_036: The times are changing, and man along with them. So too does the scenery change.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_CN_038: Nian, Dusk, and Ling are already drunk? It's not often Rhodes Island gets this lively...Let them be. Relax, I will keep an eye on them. Our sibling 'reunion' may be an extraordinary event to most, but this too is human nature. Who are we to reject participation in these traditions?
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_CN_042: Doctor, I did not see you at this morning's training session.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_CN_043: Once I traveled through Sargon and taught the locals a few moves for their defense. From what I heard, they became very fierce and instigated many riots. Ever since, I have been careful who I teach. This booklet contains instructions on how to strengthen your body and health. Take it. It is a joyous day, after all.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_CN_044: Yumen throws a banquet rather like this every year, to reward its warriors for their work the year prior. The men would clatter their weapons and sing along with the beat. But the next morning, they would still be up for duty, no matter how inebriated. Just like that, Yumen has traversed the lands and defended Great Yan's peace for a hundred years. Doctor, what is it that you defend?
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_001: You would like to be my 'kung fu recorder?' The way Rhodes Island treats its guests truly moves me. It is no wonder my sisters love this place so much… I misunderstand? No problem, I have no qualms with being your subordinate either.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_002: 'Doctor.' Your title reminds me of the Yanese scholars. Experienced and knowledgeable, they see the forest for the trees. You feel like we've met before? It's true that after awakening from my dream of chaos, I have traveled to many places... Sadly, the more friends I make, the lonelier I feel. Perhaps we are alike in that respect.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_003: As you can see, I note down only my experiences and insights, rather than any specific kung fu moves. What really matters to the martial arts is 'Yi' — your intent. If you let yourself be constrained by those gaudy forms, you will find it hard to break out of them. Take Dusk's paintings, for example. If I couldn't grasp the intent behind them, and sought to discuss techniques and styles with her, she would only shut the door on my face.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_004: I agreed to be a 'fight choreographer' for Nian's movie. It keeps her from making too much of a racket, or getting too lonely. Dusk is timid, and Ling is too fond of drink. I will look after them as well... We are far from a normal family. Nevertheless, we are siblings, and not the collective 'we' as we are often called.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_005: Death is a daily occurrence to warriors on campaign. But the real challenge they face, is preserving their humanity and morality after facing such morbidity, rather growing jaded and desensitized. Indeed, conflicts and mortality have been the way of these lands for eons. But only those giant, terrible creatures are cold-hearted enough to think so.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_006: The world is a vast place, and wonderful sceneries abound, yet man has limited strength and time. It is impossible to see all these sights, much less defend them. To those who practice the martial arts, all we can do is train day and night, from the depths of winter to the height of summer. It may sound like a clumsy and brutish method, but the result is giving every last drop you have, leaving no regrets.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_007: That sword is an unwanted possession that must not be cast away. Huai Tianpei keeping it is an outcome that all concerned parties can accept. My duel with him, you ask? He trained for forty years, and landed a single heavy blow on me. But how many comings and goings of spring and autumn have I trained? All things considered, I was the one who lost.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_008: 'Who am I'... For this question, you need only gaze upon the water. Be it human, beast, mountains, foggy woods, or the reflection of the twin moons on the night sky, whatever it is you see, that is your answer. As for the distant, radically different future, whether we siblings will return to chaos and seek new answers, is an entirely different question.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_009: The scholars at court seek perfect answers in everything. The kung fu practitioners who wander in jianghu seek revenge, status, glory, or a simple resolution. Their obsessions run deep, yet their time runs short. Often, they spend their whole lifetimes chasing a single ideal or undertaking... All those people, how woeful and pitiful, how respectable and regrettable.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_010: The spring comes and goes, leaving a lonely autumn.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_011: Doctor, thank you kindly for taking care of my sisters. I hope you will excuse me for intruding upon Rhodes Island for a little while. Please call me 'Chongyue.' It's a name given to me by... an old friend of mine.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_012: The colors that once embellished the autumn grass, hues long buried by war.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_013: Often I think about those soldiers who traveled from all corners of Great Yan to Yumen. They risked their lives in battle until death took them, or their age crept upon themselves... yet never for their own ends.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_014: Battles we have fought, death we have braved. Doctor, no need to say more.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_017: Lit, quenched, then lit again… The signal fires never ever rest.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_018: In that case, Doctor, will you beat the drums for me as we sortie?
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_019: The sunset weaves a silken river. Heaven and earth bolster me upon departure.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_020: Warriors from afar rest scarce, the armor they wear spurs them to march.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_021: One should spar from time to time.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_023: Look at this spectacular sight. Alas, it is now a battlefield.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_024: Many intellectuals must join a battle before penning a decent verse, including that sister of mine… This too is an opportunity.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_025: Unsteady posture, wavering intent. Much to learn yet.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_026: A thousand moves in one breath!
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_027: Strike, and sunder the tides cleft. Retract, and leave no peace bereft.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_028: After all this time, you still turn to war for solutions!
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_029: You calmly place your pieces to plot your victory... Doctor, a weiqi player like you is a truly rare sight.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_030: A thousand armies move at the beating of your war drums, with a handful of sand to clean the blood from one's armor... What a tremendous victory!
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_031: There is never a true victory in brandishing a sword and formulating a strategy, while looking for gains and losses is an even greater folly. So long as you leave no regrets, then all is well.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_032: All warriors must face defeat. Don't lose heart.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_033: This is much more comfortable than a military tent. Can I even manage a good night's sleep without the sound of drilling soldiers…?
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_034: Doctor, have you figured out how to counter that move from yesterday?
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_036: The times are changing, and man along with them. So too does the scenery change.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_038: Nian, Dusk, and Ling are already drunk? It's not often Rhodes Island gets this lively...Let them be. Relax, I will keep an eye on them. Our sibling 'reunion' may be an extraordinary event to most, but this too is human nature. Who are we to reject participation in these traditions?
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_042: Doctor, I did not see you at this morning's training session.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_043: Once I traveled through Sargon and taught the locals a few moves for their defense. From what I heard, they became very fierce and instigated many riots. Ever since, I have been careful who I teach. This booklet contains instructions on how to strengthen your body and health. Take it. It is a joyous day, after all.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_044: Yumen throws a banquet rather like this every year, to reward its warriors for their work the year prior. The men would clatter their weapons and sing along with the beat. But the next morning, they would still be up for duty, no matter how inebriated. Just like that, Yumen has traversed the lands and defended Great Yan's peace for a hundred years. Doctor, what is it that you defend?
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_cfa#1_CN_001: Are you interested in this continuity log, Doctor? We film our shots in a shuffled order, different from how they appear in the final product. So if we lose this log, the editor will be in trouble. Uh... actually, I'm looking for a page that went missing... Could you help me check the back of that prop box? I think it may be hiding there.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_cfa#1_CN_002: Doctor, I'm here to serve as stunt coordinator for Nian's motion picture. The actors here have never been trained in kung fu, but you will find that their diligent rehearsal is no less impressive or touching. What? The male lead is injured? Ai-ya... what should we do...? Ah? You want me to take the role?
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_cfa#1_CN_003: Let me see... I'm an L.G.D. officer, part of a special task force looking for artifacts. During a hostage rescue mission, I end up losing my memory when my superior betrays me, and in the end I battle a feranmut in the wilderness... Err... Nian, this is a little overwrought, don't you think? Fine, Director.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_cfa#1_CN_004: While we risk our lives out there, you're sitting back thinking of dinner. We fight criminals day and night, and all you ever think about is how to spiff up your reports. You got promoted at our expense. Have you ever thought of us? Oh, I'm merely rehearsing my lines. Haha. General Zuo is certainly nothing like this. He is a fine and upstanding man.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_cfa#1_CN_005: The fights in the movies are nothing like real combat. You must consider whether your position fits the shot composition, and whether your moves feel original. It's not just simple poses. It's a science, and I must learn everything anew. I should use my tail here? Hmm... Alright, let's try it again.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_cfa#1_CN_006: If you want your picture to be exciting, you must pour your heart and soul into creating it. If it's perfection that you seek, you must find a way through trial and error. All this blood and sweat, to turn a brief dream into one that lasts an eternity... Those who walk this path, are truly worthy of admiration and respect.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_cfa#1_CN_007: And all of you hiding in a gloomy place like this! Why debase yourselves? Don't you know you're the scum of society?! Um, Director, I think as a policeman, our hero should reason with the lost young men, BEFORE engaging in physical combat with them... Ah? Talk sense into them as we fight? Very well, I'll try.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_cfa#1_CN_008: Nian, since we are shooting a picture, we must consider the influence it will have. No amount of drink will improve your kung fu, and you need not rely on violence in your struggle for justice. If everyone simply imitates—I can choreograph my own moves for the fights? Ahem-hem, Ling, I'll borrow this wine flask. You may have it back once the shoot is over.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_cfa#1_CN_009: I am both myself and a character in a story. Now I have left a fictional story, yet how do I know I'm not already in another, real story? If I hadn't come to shoot this picture, I may never have gotten the chance to experience a different life. All this is indeed very interesting. Would I like to try it again? Hmm... It would take much preparation for me to do so.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_cfa#1_CN_010: Ah… Look at that cloud in the distance. It's beautiful. Director, let's get an empty shot of it.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_cfa#1_CN_011: Actors to their marks—Doctor, are you here for a visit? You want to help? Alright, hold this clapperboard. Now, stand a little closer to the camera. Yes, that's the right place. 3, 2, 1. Action!
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_cfa#1_CN_012: I can feel that each frame of action in this one is a product of tremendous human effort.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_cfa#1_CN_013: What? A Best Actor nomination? Uh no no no, as an actor, I am well aware that I still have a long way to go. Best Newcomer Award? That I can try to work toward.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_cfa#1_CN_014: Seeing the audience enjoying the picture fills me with that very same joy. Thank you, thank you very much.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_cfa#1_CN_017: Before the camera, one must embody one's character.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_cfa#1_CN_018: You want me to be the director? I dare say I have a little experience.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_cfa#1_CN_019: Eenie meenie miney mo, that's the way I got to go!
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_cfa#1_CN_020: I hope next time when we meet, we won't be fighting each other. Instead we will be drinking tea together.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_cfa#1_CN_021: That's why I like being a cop. Because I think all human life is important.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_cfa#1_CN_022: Always do the right thing, and stop the people who don't.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_cfa#1_CN_023: I know what I'm doing. Don't stop me.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_cfa#1_CN_024: You take the credit. I take the blame!
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_cfa#1_CN_026: Freeze! You're under arrest, but you have the right to remain silent.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_cfa#1_CN_027: Something you just don't get. Some things are priceless.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_cfa#1_CN_028: Give it up. The whole building is surrounded by cops.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_cfa#1_CN_029: You say it's over? No! It's NOT over! The real culprit is still hiding in the shadows. How can you say it's—O-Oh, sorry, the filming of this shot is indeed over.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_cfa#1_CN_030: I hope the masses will remember these scenes on the silver screen, even after many years have passed.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_cfa#1_CN_031: If it is a masterpiece you want, you must seek perfection in every detail. Let's try this once more.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_cfa#1_CN_032: Life will knock us down, but we can choose, whether or not, to get back up.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_cfa#1_CN_033: Is that a wrap for today? Better check and see if you have left anything behind.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_cfa#1_CN_034: Doctor, this costume and makeup took three hours to finish.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_cfa#1_CN_036: Doctor, perfect timing. Come help me rehearse. Oh, just the lines, no kung fu necessary.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_cfa#1_CN_038: That's another year in the books. How time flies may feel somewhat woeful. But this is a new beginning, so we should be cheerful. What I am holding, you ask? I learned how to use a camcorder recently, so I'm filming whatever catches my fancy. See the fireworks? How beautiful they are.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_cfa#1_CN_042: Doctor, you're early today. Don't forget to eat breakfast before you start work.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_cfa#1_CN_043: Doctor, happy birthday. This, is a film print from a picture I was in. It's not worth much, but it's a treasured memory to me. You want to watch it now? I suppose I could borrow Nian's equipment… No matter. You're the star of the show today.
dialogue_tracker.char_2024_chyue_cfa#1_CN_044: Rhodes Island rarely enjoys auspicious celebrations like these. A certain motion picture says, you should treat every day like the holidays. Before we can love our ideals, we must first love our own lifestyles. Which reminds me, Doctor, if you have time today, why don't we take in a matinee together? Or perhaps you'd prefer to spar outside?
dialogue_tracker.char_2025_shu_CN_001: Doctor, all life requires both sunlight and water to grow. While this potted plant seems to have its needs met, I don't think you've had your ten cups of water yet today.
dialogue_tracker.char_2025_shu_CN_002: Who am 'I'? The answer lies only in all that I've seen. The same way seeds are inanimate, and yet they germinate after you put them in the ground. I too lodged myself in a seed once, to feel the growth of life. You wonder what it's like? Hehe, take a deep breath and you've more or less felt it.
dialogue_tracker.char_2025_shu_CN_003: I am no fin, and yet I can reason what one is thinking. You may say I've spent the whole day idling. But you are not me, so how can you tell I've not been swimming freely with the fins in the ever-flowing streams? Yes, I know you think this water jug is too small for fincatching, but who's to say I can't drop a line in?
dialogue_tracker.char_2025_shu_CN_004: My eldest brother Shuo guards the border all year round, while my eldest sister Ling sleeps her days away clutching a pot of wine. Without me worrying over the rest of us, we would've ceased to be 'siblings' long ago. Hmm? Of course it's my duty to look after them—I'm the sixth out of us twelve, making me a big sister to five.
dialogue_tracker.char_2025_shu_CN_005: Doctor, give me your hand. I'll read your palm. Hmm... Your heaven, earth, and human lines are really impressive. Your past is dim and vague. Your journey is fraught with peril. Your future is criss-crossed with conflict... I see, Doctor. You are an 'ordinary one' who 'stirs up a storm fighting for a good end.'
dialogue_tracker.char_2025_shu_CN_006: A pity? How so? Petals fall to the ground, so the soil may be nourished, allowing new flowers to bloom the following year. Rivers flow into the sea, but the water will condense into clouds, raining the drops back onto the mountains and streams. Even if this great land is to meet a snow-white end, the cycle continues. When spring comes, there will always be buds sprouting anew.
dialogue_tracker.char_2025_shu_CN_007: Grain Buds is teaching some children how to make string figures? Yes, it's a Yanese children's hobby. A millennium ago, my younger brother had just arrived in Dahuang, where he invented this pastime to entertain the lonely children. A string in his hands could turn into countless hours of fun... Ah... it's been a thousand years.
dialogue_tracker.char_2025_shu_CN_008: Doctor, there's a pond up ahead—Nian! I see you adding chili oil to Dusk's cup. The villagers tell of a huge fin—Dusk! Pouring ink into Nian's bowl is going too far. Oh, Doctor, would you like to go fincatch—Are you two still fighting?! ...Get over here, both of you.
dialogue_tracker.char_2025_shu_CN_009: Our lives vary in their spans, and in their spans only. Just as how this landship holds so many people on its decks, a fallen leaf floating in that puddle is a sufficient vessel to sustain an ant for its entire life. Our burdens only grow as we gather more, yet you and I are naught but a single millet grain in our respective realms.
dialogue_tracker.char_2025_shu_CN_010: In east sun lifts; in west moons fall. Spring cold foretells rain; summer chill, clear skies.
dialogue_tracker.char_2025_shu_CN_011: Nian should have already told you my name—'Shu'. With my eldest brother, eldest sister, and my two younger sisters here, I feel as if I've returned home… Intriguing. Has that boy from the Sui Regulator not caused you any trouble yet?
dialogue_tracker.char_2025_shu_CN_012: Sow no reason for retaliation—point your blades at one another, and strife will never end.
dialogue_tracker.char_2025_shu_CN_013: The people of Dahuang pray for a year of peace and harvest with this jade cong. The ceremonial artifact also serves as the source of the one I hold in my hand. Summon wind and rain? Hehe, of course I can. Want me to demonstrate?
dialogue_tracker.char_2025_shu_CN_014: The fertile fields stretch to the horizon, the fragrance of rice spreads from the golden ocean... Day after day, year after year, with constant work, it finally draws near.
dialogue_tracker.char_2025_shu_CN_017: A day of fine sun and gentle breeze. I hope everyone makes it home safe.
dialogue_tracker.char_2025_shu_CN_019: Reap not what's sown by malice.
dialogue_tracker.char_2025_shu_CN_020: When were the seeds of this tragedy planted?
dialogue_tracker.char_2025_shu_CN_021: I wasn't supposed to act, but…
dialogue_tracker.char_2025_shu_CN_022: If you're really incapable of settling this, then let me handle it.
dialogue_tracker.char_2025_shu_CN_023: Spring breeze, timely rain; now we sow the grain.
dialogue_tracker.char_2025_shu_CN_024: War'... A word I've not heard in a long, long time.
dialogue_tracker.char_2025_shu_CN_025: Clear skies for Qingming, rain clouds for Guyu.
dialogue_tracker.char_2025_shu_CN_026: Sow the mountains when summer leaves a white dew. Seed the plains when equinox paints russet hue.
dialogue_tracker.char_2025_shu_CN_027: Branch and bone bear weeds; mounds and ruins bloom fields.
dialogue_tracker.char_2025_shu_CN_028: I'll plant you into the soil to grow anew.
dialogue_tracker.char_2025_shu_CN_029: Seeds are now in the field—another season full of hope.
dialogue_tracker.char_2025_shu_CN_030: Good, good. I had no idea you were so clever and learned. I was going to ask you help me make maiyatang, but with such a good head on your shoulders, I'm feeling a little bad now.
dialogue_tracker.char_2025_shu_CN_031: Perfection is a tall order, just as our crops may suffer from inclement weather, Catastrophe, and pestilence. These problems may not be solved in ten thousand years. You tried your best, Doctor.
dialogue_tracker.char_2025_shu_CN_032: Fortune and misfortune are two sides of the same coin. What you have sown is not necessarily wicked, so why lose heart?
dialogue_tracker.char_2025_shu_CN_033: Now let's see... where's a good spot for my fincatching tools?
dialogue_tracker.char_2025_shu_CN_034: You want me to plant you in the soil too, Doctor?
dialogue_tracker.char_2025_shu_CN_036: Hm? You want to come fincatching with me?
dialogue_tracker.char_2025_shu_CN_038: The third nine days after Winter Solstice, all lakes and rivers frozen to ice. The fourth nine days, we can still walk on them.' Soon those ice surfaces will be thick enough to carry us, and the coldest time of year will arrive. Did Nian's hotpot warm you up? If not, you could ask Ling for some of her drink. Come on, let's go out and see if it's snowing. An auspicious snowfall tells of a bountiful year, and perhaps the new year will bring us a good harvest.
dialogue_tracker.char_2025_shu_CN_042: Doctor, come over here for a bit. Let's see... Hmm, the crops cultivated in Jiangqi this year are indeed taller than a man.
dialogue_tracker.char_2025_shu_CN_043: Happy birthday, Doctor. Let me tell your fortune for the year. Hmm, I see a prosperous one in store for you, investments made will bring you gain, and all your wishes will come true. Truths or lies? I've told you before—the answer's in your hands.
dialogue_tracker.char_2025_shu_CN_044: What a crowd! I'll take you to Dahuang for their famous opera, if we get the chance. In the old days, its people numbered no more than a hundred, but today it truly is a city. I see you've gained a good number of new faces too. For tens, hundreds, and thousands of years, those before us and those yet to come will spend their days just as we do now—with company.
dialogue_tracker.char_2025_shu_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_001: Doctor, you need both sunlight and water to grow, and this potted plant seems to have gotten plenty. But I don't think you've had your ten cups of water yet today.
dialogue_tracker.char_2025_shu_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_002: Who am 'I'? The answer lies only in all that I've seen. The same way seeds are inanimate, and yet they germinate after you put them in the ground. I too lodged myself in a seed once, to feel the growth of life. You wonder what it's like? Take a deep breath and you've more or less felt it.
dialogue_tracker.char_2025_shu_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_003: I am no fin, and yet I can reason what one is thinking. You are not me, so how would you know for sure if I've spent the day idling here, not feeling the fins swimming freely in the ever-flowing streams? Even if you think this water jug is too small for fincatching, who's to say you can't drop a line in?
dialogue_tracker.char_2025_shu_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_004: Toahia guards the border all year round, while my eldest sister Ling sleeps her days away clutching a pot of wine. Without me worrying over the lot of them, we would've ceased to be 'siblings' long ago. Hmm? Of course I'm a big sister-type—I'm the sixth out of us twelve, making me a big sister to five.
dialogue_tracker.char_2025_shu_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_005: Doctor, give me your hand. I'll read your palm... Hmm? Your heaven, earth, and human lines are really something. A previous life unknown, your life line split into four, and conflict criss-crossing all along your path... I see, I get it now. An 'ordinary one' who 'stirs up a storm fighting for a good end.'
dialogue_tracker.char_2025_shu_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_006: A pity? How so? Petals fall to the ground to nourish the soil for new flowers to bloom the following year. Rivers flow endlessly into the sea, yet the water will condense into clouds and rain back onto the mounts and streams. Even if this great land is to meet a snow-white end, the cycle of cause and effect continues, and there will always be buds beneath the snow sprouting in spring anew.
dialogue_tracker.char_2025_shu_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_007: Grain Buds is teaching some children how to make string figures? Yes, it's a Yanese children's hobby. A millennium ago, my younger brother had just arrived in Dahuang, where he invented this pastime to entertain the lonely children. A string in his hands could turn into countless hours of fun... Yes, it's been a thousand years.
dialogue_tracker.char_2025_shu_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_008: Doctor, there's a pond up ahead—Nian! I see you adding chili oil to Dusk's cup. *ahem* The villagers tell of a huge fin—Dusk! Pouring ink into Nian's bowl is going too far. Doctor, would you like to go fincatch—Are you two still fighting?! ...Get over here, both of you.
dialogue_tracker.char_2025_shu_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_009: There is a limit to our lifespans, and that limit is the limit. Just as how this landship holds only so many people, the fallen leaves floating in that puddle are sufficient to sustain an insect for its entire life. The more we gather, the heavier the load we bear. You and I are naught but a single millet grain in our respective realms.
dialogue_tracker.char_2025_shu_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_010: In east sun lifts; in west moons fall. Spring cold foretells rain; summer chill, clear skies.
dialogue_tracker.char_2025_shu_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_011: Nian should have already told you my name—'Shu'. With my eldest brother, eldest sister, and my two younger sisters here, I feel as if I've returned home... Remarkable. Has that boy from the Sui Regulator not caused you any trouble yet?
dialogue_tracker.char_2025_shu_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_012: Sow no reason for retaliation—point your blades at one another, and strife will never end.
dialogue_tracker.char_2025_shu_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_013: I pray for a year of favorable weather with this jade cong from Dahuang. This ceremonial artifact also serves as the source of all that I hold in my hand. Summon wind and rain? Of course I can. Want me to demonstrate?
dialogue_tracker.char_2025_shu_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_014: The fragrance of rice sprouting over ten thousand mu of fertile fields... day after day, year after year, with constant work it will draw near.
dialogue_tracker.char_2025_shu_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_017: A fine day today. I hope everyone makes it home safe.
dialogue_tracker.char_2025_shu_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_020: When were the seeds of this tragedy planted?
dialogue_tracker.char_2025_shu_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_021: *sigh* I wasn't supposed to act, but...
dialogue_tracker.char_2025_shu_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_022: If there's no other way to settle this, then let me handle it.
dialogue_tracker.char_2025_shu_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_023: Spring breeze turns to rain; come ring the season in.
dialogue_tracker.char_2025_shu_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_024: 'War'... A word I've not heard in a long, long time.
dialogue_tracker.char_2025_shu_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_025: Clear skies for Qingming, rain clouds for Guyu.
dialogue_tracker.char_2025_shu_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_026: Sow the mounts for Bailu, and flatlands come Qiufen.
dialogue_tracker.char_2025_shu_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_027: Branch and bone bear weeds; mounds and ruins bloom fields.
dialogue_tracker.char_2025_shu_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_028: I'll plant you into the soil to grow anew.
dialogue_tracker.char_2025_shu_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_029: Sowing seeds into the soil—another fine day today.
dialogue_tracker.char_2025_shu_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_030: Not bad, not bad. I had no idea you were so clever and learned. I feel a little bad now, putting you to work pulling maiyatang with such a good head on your shoulders.
dialogue_tracker.char_2025_shu_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_031: Perfection is a tall order, just as the sustenance we sow is beset by the elements, Catastrophe, and pestilence. Ten thousand years will not change this, so just try your best.
dialogue_tracker.char_2025_shu_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_032: Fortune and misfortune are two sides of the same coin. What you have sown is not necessarily wicked, so why lose heart?
dialogue_tracker.char_2025_shu_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_033: Now let's see... where's a good spot for my fincatching tools?
dialogue_tracker.char_2025_shu_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_034: Doctor, want me to plant you in the soil too?
dialogue_tracker.char_2025_shu_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_036: Hm? Want to come fincatching with me?
dialogue_tracker.char_2025_shu_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_038: Sa kau si kau ping siong kia, the coldest time of year will soon be here. Did Nian's hotpot warm you up? If not, you could ask Ling for some of her drink. Come, let's go out and see if it's snowing. A timely snowfall tells of a bountiful year, and perhaps the new year will bring us a good harvest.
dialogue_tracker.char_2025_shu_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_042: Doctor, come over here for a bit. Let's see... Hmm... the scallions from Jiangqi this year are indeed taller than man.
dialogue_tracker.char_2025_shu_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_043: Happy birthday, Doctor. Let me tell your fortune for the year. Hmm, I see a prosperous one in store for you, investments made will bring you gain, and all your wishes will come true. Truths or lies? I've told you before—the answer's in your hands.
dialogue_tracker.char_2025_shu_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_044: What a crowd! I'll take you to Dahuang for their famous opera, if we get the chance. In the old days, its people numbered no more than a hundred, but today it truly is a city. I see you've gained a good number of new faces too. For tens, hundreds, and thousands of years, those before us and those yet to come will spend their days just as we do now—with company.
dialogue_tracker.char_2026_yu_CN_001: Ah, I see this is a fine location. Alright, then… 'Daily desserts, fresh out of the oven, in limited quantities.' Heehee, there we go! Oh, Doctor? Nothing special here. Don't let me keep you.
dialogue_tracker.char_2026_yu_CN_002: Doctor, I don't know what Nian told you, but I must emphasize this: I. Don't. Cook. Without good reason. A chef must be particular in his prepara... Wai-wai-wai-wait, That bag of snacks is your lunch? Tch, aiya... stop eating that, I'll whip something up for you.
dialogue_tracker.char_2026_yu_CN_003: I'm fairly confident in my culinary arts, but just as there are those who indulge in exotic delicacies, there are those who prefer bland flavors. You can't satisfy everyone, and it's also a matter of whether fate allows for a chef and a diner to cross paths. So, do you find this dish to your liking? If you want any special treatment in the future, you'd better nod right now.
dialogue_tracker.char_2026_yu_CN_004: I'm laying low on Rhodes Island to dodge my debts? Who said that? I owe Ji a little rent, but he's had plenty of my cooking! My siblings only ever think of me when they're hungry. Doctor, now you know who's the dependable one in the family!
dialogue_tracker.char_2026_yu_CN_005: 'A nobleman stays clear of the kitchen.'... Hmph, I wonder which bitter scholar dreamed up such nonsense. Just because you ignore something, it ceases to exist? People eat five grains, and then they have six desires and seven emotions. Nothing could be more natural. The work of this kitchen is, if you ask me, the most significant thing in this land.
dialogue_tracker.char_2026_yu_CN_006: I love the mortal realm. I mean, who would want to go back to that primordial chaos after tasting all these different flavors? Sour, salty, bitter, spicy... miss any one of them, you'll never master cookery. Likewise, joy, sorrow, separation, reunion... if you don't understand all of them, you'll never learn how to truly be a person. Yeah... Now, I've come to understand all the tastes.
dialogue_tracker.char_2026_yu_CN_007: Blaze went home, and brought Miss Ning along? Ah... Good for them... Shh... nope, I didn't fan the flame or anything. Oftentimes, what matters is who sits around the table, rather than what's upon it. All I want is for my patrons to enjoy their meals. The land is home to many flavors, but nothing compares to the taste of family reunion.
dialogue_tracker.char_2026_yu_CN_008: 'Who am I?' My siblings have all thought things through. Me? I'm not ready yet. There are still many dishes I haven't tasted, and too many TV dramas I have to finish... Hey, wait a second. Doctor, just play your tile already. Bringing up philosophical questions right when I'm about to win? That's cheating, and it's way too obvious, you know!
dialogue_tracker.char_2026_yu_CN_009: Here we come to this moment again... You are just like that brother of mine. Once you've got your mind set on something, nothing else matters, and there's no going back. Hey-ya... You see, Doctor. Soup needs to be simmered slowly to develop its flavors, but it can be so mentally exhausting. That's why... one must always take care to eat well.
dialogue_tracker.char_2026_yu_CN_010: I'm still not used to the quiet without a kitchen fire burning nearby… It makes me so sleepy…
dialogue_tracker.char_2026_yu_CN_011: Hello, you must be the Doctor. I'm here to visit my brother and sisters. Do I sign the visitor's log here? Alright. Hmm...? Logistics Operator Employment contract? Nian! You tricked me again!
dialogue_tracker.char_2026_yu_CN_012: Maybe we should watch something else while we're eating?
dialogue_tracker.char_2026_yu_CN_013: Bitter gourd is in season now. Deseeding, blanching, and adding it to the soup brings out the most flavor. Some find it too bitter, while others are absolutely in love with it. Palates differ, and sweetness or bitterness are unique to each individual.
dialogue_tracker.char_2026_yu_CN_014: Oh? Trying to keep me here? Haha. There's nothing to be ashamed of. You've had a taste of my cooking. If you could forget that flavor, wouldn't all my years of culinary practice have been in vain?
dialogue_tracker.char_2026_yu_CN_017: I won't fight for nothing. But for the right price, hehe, I'm in.
dialogue_tracker.char_2026_yu_CN_018: A-hem! The chef has the final word here.
dialogue_tracker.char_2026_yu_CN_019: The mung bean soup is already simmering. Whether you want your beans intact or fully dissolved depends on how quickly you return.
dialogue_tracker.char_2026_yu_CN_020: Line up, line up. We have plenty of good eats for everyone.
dialogue_tracker.char_2026_yu_CN_021: Patience, friend. Heat control is everything here.
dialogue_tracker.char_2026_yu_CN_022: Quickly! The spare ribs have been stewing for so long, they're falling apart!
dialogue_tracker.char_2026_yu_CN_023: So long as you're here, have some hot soup before you go.
dialogue_tracker.char_2026_yu_CN_024: You will get what you deserve. I mean, what you ordered.
dialogue_tracker.char_2026_yu_CN_025: Cold oil into a hot wok. The heat is just perfect.
dialogue_tracker.char_2026_yu_CN_026: Slow-simmer on low heat. Patience is not optional.
dialogue_tracker.char_2026_yu_CN_027: Tough to swallow, huh? Try to behave yourself next time.
dialogue_tracker.char_2026_yu_CN_028: Still misbehaving? Then let's kick it up a notch!
dialogue_tracker.char_2026_yu_CN_029: Not bad. This recipe will stand the test of time.
dialogue_tracker.char_2026_yu_CN_030: Daring to add ingredients like that? You've definitely got the potential to be a top chef.
dialogue_tracker.char_2026_yu_CN_031: The taste's passable, but the appearance falls short. Customers won't be as accommodating as me.
dialogue_tracker.char_2026_yu_CN_032: Messed up the dish? Sometimes getting messy is the spice of cooking, and life. Wash it out, and the wok will be good as new.
dialogue_tracker.char_2026_yu_CN_036: Are you hungry? Give me a moment.
dialogue_tracker.char_2026_yu_CN_038: Nian, quit sneaking bites and go call Dusk out. Ling, could you lend a hand? Shu and I are swamped in kitchen. Where did Dage wander off to now...? Ah! Doctor! what took you so long? Come, have a seat and join us! Happy New Year!
dialogue_tracker.char_2026_yu_CN_042: Come, have a seat. Make yourself at home. You can order anything on the menu.
dialogue_tracker.char_2026_yu_CN_043: Doctor, happy Birthday! This is a present I've treasured for years...my private cookbook. If you follow the instructions step-by-step, you too can become a master chef. If Yu can cook, so can you. What? Still want me to cook for you? Hehe, OK, OK. I'll make an exception today.
dialogue_tracker.char_2026_yu_CN_044: I never knew Rhodes Island could be so bustling during festivals. I have literally been cooking on all burners today. But, well, it's all worth it. Just look at all these young sprouts, so full of promise... Ah! What are you doing? Open your ears, and don't measure me! I-I didn't grow any taller...
dialogue_tracker.char_2026_yu_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_001: Ah, I see this is a fine location. Alright, then… 'Daily desserts, fresh out of the oven, in limited quantities.' Heehee, there we go! Oh, Doctor? Nothing special here. Don't let me keep you.
