dialogue_tracker.char_373_lionhd_CN_029: Bam! Another mighty enemy laid low. Alright, Doctor, let's have you treat yourself like we agreed before. You and me, we're gonna visit a market at our next stop.
dialogue_tracker.char_373_lionhd_CN_030: Enemies of this caliber pose no threat to us, right?
dialogue_tracker.char_373_lionhd_CN_031: Cleaning up stragglers isn't really my strong suit. You oughta find someone to send after them right away, before you lose points off your combat evaluation.
dialogue_tracker.char_373_lionhd_CN_032: Whoops, looks like we messed up. Doctor, go ahead and withdraw first. Don't worry, as long as I'm here, there's no chance of the enemy catching up.
dialogue_tracker.char_373_lionhd_CN_033: Maybe I should go to Procurement to check out the new outfits? Or maybe not?
dialogue_tracker.char_373_lionhd_CN_036: What's the matter, you wanna take me out for a walk?
dialogue_tracker.char_373_lionhd_CN_038: It's New Year's again. When I was a boy, this day meant one thing: the adults on the ship were coming to pat the heads of the children and ask 'Have you grown taller?' I didn't much care for… Hey! Stop it! Doctor, no patting my head!
dialogue_tracker.char_373_lionhd_CN_042: Yo, Doctor, done with work for the day?
dialogue_tracker.char_373_lionhd_CN_043: Doctor, happy birthday! Look! I chose this outfit just for you. Trust me, you'll turn heads all around Rhodes Island in this getup! The top is too short? The pants are too flashy? Hey, c'mon, that's fashion!
dialogue_tracker.char_373_lionhd_CN_044: The old miners on the ship used to say, 'Every ship hides a story,' and so does Rhodes Island... Haha, just kidding, I'm not here for corporate espionage! But even if you have some secrets, I'm willing to trust you, Doctor. When the time comes for me to know, I'm sure you'll trust me too, right?
dialogue_tracker.char_376_therex_CN_001: Thermal-EX, ready to commence thermal shock! What, the designated combat time has not been reached yet? Then, I shall postpone it. Commencing thermal shock after a delay of 10 seconds!
dialogue_tracker.char_376_therex_CN_002: I have heard an expression from the East: 'No martial art is infallible, except for heat.'
dialogue_tracker.char_376_therex_CN_003: Doctor, it's great to be with you! My burning heart won't calm down! —I'm talking about the Raythean Industries custom-made full-thermal Arts impact generator on my body!
dialogue_tracker.char_376_therex_CN_004: In the beginning, God said, 'Let there be light,' and there was light. God said, 'Let there be power,' and there was the high-performance variant of Raythean's Challenger Hellcat.
dialogue_tracker.char_376_therex_CN_007: As a perfect industrial-grade mass-produced combat platform, I am very happy now! Not only do I get regular performance optimizations from Mayer, but I even get to work with passionate partners like Blaze! Life is so good!
dialogue_tracker.char_376_therex_CN_008: Even though I'm already this dazzling, only you, the peerless Doctor, are worthy of becoming the brightest sun!
dialogue_tracker.char_376_therex_CN_009: I know that the heat and light I emit is so very short-lived... But all that matters is that I can illuminate the path before you, Doctor!
dialogue_tracker.char_376_therex_CN_010: Even when you're asleep, I can continue to work as your heater! I'm incredible!
dialogue_tracker.char_376_therex_CN_011: Born from Raythean Industries, improved by the hands of the great Mayer. I, Thermal-EX, the throbbing heart of hotness, am here to help!
dialogue_tracker.char_376_therex_CN_012: Ohhhhh! This power blazing within me... It's… It's… It's a hotfix!
dialogue_tracker.char_376_therex_CN_017: Now, it's my turn to show off!
dialogue_tracker.char_376_therex_CN_029: Aren't I awesome? I knew your command would be a perfect match for me, Doctor!
dialogue_tracker.char_376_therex_CN_031: My retreat was just a fluke. Nothing must be allowed through our net on the battlefield.
dialogue_tracker.char_376_therex_CN_032: Contact! Contact! Enemy ambush! Dropping smoke! Doctor, I'll cover your retreat!
dialogue_tracker.char_376_therex_CN_033: Rest? Haha, it's too early for me! I just swapped to the newest energy storage device, so we have fifty more hours until the end of the workday!
dialogue_tracker.char_376_therex_CN_034: A-ha! My thermal sensor feels your burning heart!
dialogue_tracker.char_376_therex_CN_036: Your burning enthusiasm has melted my processor!
dialogue_tracker.char_376_therex_CN_038: Happy New Year, Doctor! There's too much excess and zero majesty to playing songs on Monster Siren hi-fis and related devices! Allow me to use a hotter, more direct method to boost the vigor of this fireworks show! BANG!! Pewwwwww... BANG!!!
dialogue_tracker.char_376_therex_CN_042: Welcome back, Doctor! I see that you're also full of light and heat today!
dialogue_tracker.char_376_therex_CN_043: I hear the others are expressing their feelings of fondness for you by way of gifts, but you and I have no need for such tedious things to express our emotions! Our hearts have long been connected through heat and impact! Doctor! Happy birthday!
dialogue_tracker.char_376_therex_CN_044: Doctor!! Even I'm dazzled by the liveliness of this spectacle! Hesitate no more, come with me! Let us celebrate with the others!
dialogue_tracker.char_377_gdglow_CN_001: Am I really going to be helpful? Um... alright, if you say so...
dialogue_tracker.char_377_gdglow_CN_002: Hmm... your hair is close to coming out of your hood. If you've got the time, remember to give it a trim.
dialogue_tracker.char_377_gdglow_CN_003: I can't use anything like a compass. No matter what I do, they all end up pointing at me. *Sigh*... I had no clue as a child, so I tried to use them to find my way home... Now that I think about it, I'm lucky I have a sense of direction.
dialogue_tracker.char_377_gdglow_CN_004: You wanna touch my ears? Of course, touch them however you want... but people usually only do it a tiny bit. Why? Heheh, you'll find out if you try, won't you?
dialogue_tracker.char_377_gdglow_CN_005: My Arts are... how do I put it? They affect a lot of things, but because they don't have a form, it's hard to grasp them properly... if I can get a handle on their nature some day, I might be able to live a normal life.
dialogue_tracker.char_377_gdglow_CN_006: Static electric pulse theory says... okay, okay, I see. I just need to apply my Arts Unit, and start the antistatic equipment up, and that should... Yagh! That's not working at all. Where did I mess it up...? Here? Alright, once more.
dialogue_tracker.char_377_gdglow_CN_007: Welcome~! Oh, Doctor! You finally decided to get your hair sorted, then? Good, sit down. Today, I'll be your... That's right, it's a salon in here, you're not imagining things. Um, don't go! This is my speciality, trust me, please! You won't regret this, I guarantee!
dialogue_tracker.char_377_gdglow_CN_008: My dad told me I should pick up another craft in addition to Originium Arts, so this is what I went with. It turns out the only hair I can't fix is my own... Okay! How's that? Are there any bits you want fixed? None? Heheh, I thought as much. Alright, I'm finished for the day, then.
dialogue_tracker.char_377_gdglow_CN_009: Before I got Infected, I was actually in really good shape. I got second place in a cross-country race! Once my Oripathy's a bit better, I want to start training again, and carry the gold medal back. Can I ask you to present it to me, Doctor? Heheh, then it's a promise.
dialogue_tracker.char_377_gdglow_CN_010: The circuit's grounded... okay, now my hair shouldn't poof out. I'll have a break while the Doctor's asleep.
dialogue_tracker.char_377_gdglow_CN_011: Finally made it here... nice to meet you, Doctor. I'm a new Operator onboard, Goldenglow. I look forward to working under you.
dialogue_tracker.char_377_gdglow_CN_012: Mmgh... it still doesn't really make sense. Maybe I should visit my Instructor and see if she can help.
dialogue_tracker.char_377_gdglow_CN_013: There's no tingling feeling, is there? If not, we should be fine. Okay! I'll accept this medal from you graciously, Doctor. Thank you!
dialogue_tracker.char_377_gdglow_CN_014: Doctor! Stay away from here! I just need a—a-are you alright?! Are you hurt anywhere? I took all the protective measures, didn't I? Why...
dialogue_tracker.char_377_gdglow_CN_017: Is there really a use for me on the front?
dialogue_tracker.char_377_gdglow_CN_018: Doctor, are you sure I should be the captain?
dialogue_tracker.char_377_gdglow_CN_019: I've got this, I've got this. I can do this!
dialogue_tracker.char_377_gdglow_CN_023: Now's the time to help everyone out.
dialogue_tracker.char_377_gdglow_CN_029: Huh? Oh—no, it's nothing! Let's get going!
dialogue_tracker.char_377_gdglow_CN_030: I managed to help a little, didn't I? Heheh.
dialogue_tracker.char_377_gdglow_CN_031: Phew, we're finally saved. Are you hurt?
dialogue_tracker.char_377_gdglow_CN_033: I need to keep away from the electronics...
dialogue_tracker.char_377_gdglow_CN_036: Could you help me comb my hair down? Thank you so much, Doctor.
dialogue_tracker.char_377_gdglow_CN_038: Happy New Year, Doctor! My family sent me all of this stuff. This is bread my mum baked, these biscuits are from my oldest brother, and my sister cured this meat—she's eighth-oldest. I think that's mostly it. Don't be shy, let's tuck in together! ...Eep! Did I accidentally shock you again, Doctor?
dialogue_tracker.char_377_gdglow_CN_042: Hope you have another good day today.
dialogue_tracker.char_377_gdglow_CN_043: If today was my birthday, I'd be on a sofa at home with my brothers and sisters. We'd be eating and drinking and playing until all end up falling asleep and waking up the next day. But never mind that, you're the star for today, Doctor. Do you want a new look? Well, how about I trim a new hairstyle for you? Mm-hm! Great, let's do it!
dialogue_tracker.char_377_gdglow_CN_044: Doctor, look, I can control my static away from my staff now! Maybe with a bit more time, I'll be able to master my Arts. Then I can hug my mum all I want, without having to worry about shocking her! Mm-hm, I need to keep at it!
dialogue_tracker.char_378_asbest_CN_001: If you've got something to say, spit it out. I ain't got all day, you know?
dialogue_tracker.char_378_asbest_CN_002: Eep! You idiot, touch my tail again and I'll smack ya into next week! And you best forget whatever sound you just heard, or I'll make ya forget, the hard way.
dialogue_tracker.char_378_asbest_CN_003: This ol' door I have here? Can't you tell? I made it myself, it's multifunctional. Hands off if you know what's good for ya, or you might get yourself killed.
dialogue_tracker.char_378_asbest_CN_004: Gotta say, scabbin' a lift on this big ol' ship gets me to places faster than my own two legs. Besides, you lot are headin' all over the shop anyway. Mm, yeah, I guess I've changed my view towards you guys a little.
dialogue_tracker.char_378_asbest_CN_005: Don't lump me in with Magallan. I ain't no pro explorer, just someone trampin' it around the lands chasin' thrills. Trailblazin' for the benefit of others? Ha, do I look that noble?
dialogue_tracker.char_378_asbest_CN_006: What am I doin' this for? The danger and the thrill, mate. What's life without a little craziness, eh?
dialogue_tracker.char_378_asbest_CN_007: Magallan? I met her at the Black Flow. That tiny, overzealous videographer girl made that adventure the noisiest one yet. But I gotta admit, the li'l ripper's got some real chops.
dialogue_tracker.char_378_asbest_CN_008: Friend? Pfft, who needs that? I'd much rather be a complete jerk and keep things simple: you don't like me, and I don't like you. On second thought, I could use a drinking mate tonight... Oi, you in or what?
dialogue_tracker.char_378_asbest_CN_009: My Oripathy? Yeah yeah, I know it's bad, but as long as I ain't bothering no one, how I deal with it is my business. To me, it's real simple: dying on a journey seems like an alright way to go. You can try to save me, if you think you're all that. Do your worst, Doctor. Bet you couldn't if you tried.
dialogue_tracker.char_378_asbest_CN_010: Sleeping, huh? Good time to make some noise. Ahaha!
dialogue_tracker.char_378_asbest_CN_011: Alright, so here's the deal. I'll be out exploring for most of the year, but you still need to pay me full wage, and keep a dorm room for me. Think you can accept—Wait, you agree? Ha! You must be off your rocker.
dialogue_tracker.char_378_asbest_CN_012: Whatever. Guess I learned some self-defense.
dialogue_tracker.char_378_asbest_CN_013: Me? 'Honorary Captain of the Rhodes Island Expedition Team?' The hell?
dialogue_tracker.char_378_asbest_CN_014: I can't promise I'll do any good for Rhodes Island, that's not my style. But I can promise you this: if there are any mysteries on this land you want uncovered, then I'm your gal.
dialogue_tracker.char_378_asbest_CN_018: Ugh, Doctor, If you wanna make my life hard, just say it to my face.
dialogue_tracker.char_378_asbest_CN_019: If you can't keep up, just find something to keep yourself busy.
dialogue_tracker.char_378_asbest_CN_020: Ugh... What a pain in the proverbial.
dialogue_tracker.char_378_asbest_CN_029: I've braved savage winds and waves. This is nothin' but smooth sailing.
dialogue_tracker.char_378_asbest_CN_030: This sucks. I was hopin' for an adventure.
dialogue_tracker.char_378_asbest_CN_031: Enough, mate. Let's call it a day.
dialogue_tracker.char_378_asbest_CN_032: Ugh... Am I supposed to say 'there there' now...?
dialogue_tracker.char_378_asbest_CN_033: Time to head back to the dorms for a kip.
dialogue_tracker.char_378_asbest_CN_036: Oh right, gotta take a trip to the Doctor's office first…
dialogue_tracker.char_378_asbest_CN_038: Ahh crap, I forgot it's New Year's. Shouldn't have come back. I hate huge crowds like this... Even those Archosauria we came across in Sargon weren't this rowdy… Huh? Wait, wait! What're you grabbing my hand for? Let go! I'm going back to my room!
dialogue_tracker.char_378_asbest_CN_042: Got nothin' better to do again, eh?
dialogue_tracker.char_378_asbest_CN_043: Fine, fine, whatever! Take this and get out of my face! What kind of person are you, asking people to give you a present? Gah… Alright, mate, you got your gift. Now shut up, and get out!
dialogue_tracker.char_378_asbest_CN_044: Damn. And I thought New Year's would be the only special holiday here. Didn't know you got another one. Guess I picked just the right bloody time to come back. Shh-sh-sh, hold it right there. You want to talk, fine, but we'll talk over drinks. Otherwise, keep your trap shut.
dialogue_tracker.char_379_sesa_CN_001: Hmm, is this the Doctor's room? Painfully sterile. Reminds me of Sargon's monotonous hilly terrain. Wouldn't hurt to install a game console, would it?
dialogue_tracker.char_379_sesa_CN_002: Dr.{@nickname}, I feel something resonating between us. Weird, right? Is it because we both have so much untapped potential? But you've forgotten your past. Feels like freedom to you? Or just another level of pain?
dialogue_tracker.char_379_sesa_CN_003: I take greater pride in natural wisdom than indoctrinated knowledge, Dr.{@nickname}! With Rhodes Island on my side, both you and I will grow ever-closer to the Great Truth. Hey, don't avert your gaze. Oh, are you feeling a touch... embarrassed?
dialogue_tracker.char_379_sesa_CN_004: 'I wish to bridge the gap to the other side.' That was once a code phrase used to contact me. The bridge connects two lands, transferring wisdom and imbuing power... Hey, let me finish. Turning away mid-sentence? How terribly discourteous!
dialogue_tracker.char_379_sesa_CN_005: Rhodes Island is home to some folk devoid of aesthetic sensibility. A disguise isn't just a superficial layer, but an art of meticulous refinement. Without careful cultivation, one merely appears... disheveled. You think my clothing looks tattered? Ha! You simply fail to comprehend my nuanced style...
dialogue_tracker.char_379_sesa_CN_006: Do you believe weapons have souls? The things they've experienced, the hands that have wielded them, and the reasons they've been swung... No! These aren't souls. For a weapon, any belief or meaning is externally imposed. Tell me, are we the weapons, or are we the ones imposing souls onto others?
dialogue_tracker.char_379_sesa_CN_007: A genius? Do such beings truly exist...? In Sargon, most craftsmen appear to me as mere apprentices still learning to walk, tinkering with metal. Yet, walk long enough, and even they may traverse the entire path.
dialogue_tracker.char_379_sesa_CN_008: Do you need my help refining a weapon? My skills are best kept hidden under a bushel. 'Enabling universal weapon access is tantamount to creating war'—this self-imposed shackle I must bear. Or... do you seek the key to unlock chaos across the land?
dialogue_tracker.char_379_sesa_CN_009: You know who I am? And my past? No, you don't, and you shouldn't. I maintain anonymity precisely to bury the past behind me. Forget it all, and let this skin I've shed sink into the depths of the deserts.
dialogue_tracker.char_379_sesa_CN_010: I don't mind this kind of peace and quiet.
dialogue_tracker.char_379_sesa_CN_011: I know precisely what you seek, Doctor of Rhodes Island! Your thirst for truth and power is palpable. And I, Sesa, am willing to bestow that very strength upon you... Woah, hold on! Don't throw me out! I'm here to apply for a position!
dialogue_tracker.char_379_sesa_CN_013: ...You wish for greater power? Don't draw any unnecessary attention before the time is right. Otherwise, it'll be waaay too dangerous.
dialogue_tracker.char_379_sesa_CN_014: 'The bridge connects, the ammunition embodies wisdom, the weapon expresses will, and harmony manifests equality.' Do you wish to shatter the misty veil obscuring the Truth? Perhaps I can lend you a touch of power... just a little bit.
dialogue_tracker.char_379_sesa_CN_017: The 'bridge' yearns… for those weapons in your hands... May I take a closer look?
dialogue_tracker.char_379_sesa_CN_018: Let me guide you... Just apply this oil to the bolt slot of your crossbow. Make sure you apply it evenly.
dialogue_tracker.char_379_sesa_CN_019: Cohorts, it's time to show the results of our efforts. Just remember, handle the weapons with the utmost care.
dialogue_tracker.char_379_sesa_CN_020: The battlefield destroys both weapon and wielder.
dialogue_tracker.char_379_sesa_CN_022: Set me free! I'm supposed to yell that now, right?
dialogue_tracker.char_379_sesa_CN_025: Free the weapon from its shell...
dialogue_tracker.char_379_sesa_CN_027: I shall be your doom! I'm allowed to say stuff like that, right?
dialogue_tracker.char_379_sesa_CN_028: How can you ever understand the suffering of the victims?
dialogue_tracker.char_379_sesa_CN_029: Such agony inevitably accompanies a fierce battle, but the weapon in hand never lies. It sings of victory!
dialogue_tracker.char_379_sesa_CN_030: You are a bit too dependent upon my powers. Speak no more, same deal: a cup of black tea with two sugar cubes.
dialogue_tracker.char_379_sesa_CN_031: To escape the malediction of a weapon is, for both sides, perhaps a blessing.
dialogue_tracker.char_379_sesa_CN_032: No matter how far we run, the weapons will lie in wait, until the day they eradicate us.
dialogue_tracker.char_379_sesa_CN_033: The Great Truth demands an equally great space to house it! Wait, no, I don't need a room this big...
dialogue_tracker.char_379_sesa_CN_034: Watch out! I... I'm still not able to fully control my powers!
dialogue_tracker.char_379_sesa_CN_036: Wanna hear a story? I know many old tales.
dialogue_tracker.char_379_sesa_CN_038: A brand new year already. When will the day finally arrive that we brush with the truth... My tone's off? Right, I'm still rehearsing. Stop it, I know, I'll see you at the party soon.
dialogue_tracker.char_379_sesa_CN_043: Since today is your birthday, I shall share a secret incantation. Speak it, and you may unchain my true power... Actually, never mind. Dr.{@nickname}, you already know exactly what I'm capable of, don't you?
dialogue_tracker.char_379_sesa_CN_044: I understand your craving, on this day of retrospection, for ancient tales from the golden sands of Sargon, and truths that belong to the future... Hey now, don't go. I truly wished to share these stories, even if I failed... Never mind. Care for some tea?
dialogue_tracker.char_381_bubble_CN_001: Let's see what goodies the Doctor hides in this drawer.
dialogue_tracker.char_381_bubble_CN_002: I'm probably only about as big as one of Papa's legs right now. But one day, I'm gonna be as big as him, and then I'll trample all over the bad guys! Graaagh!
dialogue_tracker.char_381_bubble_CN_003: I'm really, really sorry! I won't run in the hallways ever again!
dialogue_tracker.char_381_bubble_CN_004: Fighting is super easy. I point my shield one way, and nobody can beat me. Huh? What if they get behind me? Ohyeaah... I never thought of that!
dialogue_tracker.char_381_bubble_CN_005: Gavial? Never heard of her. She's tough? She's famous in Sargon? Okay, whatever. I'll see for myself how tough she is.
dialogue_tracker.char_381_bubble_CN_006: Oh, you're talking about Gavial? I'm Gavial's number one fan. See, she even signed my shield for me. That's her autograph! I think pretty much nobody could take down Gavial, besides Papa.
dialogue_tracker.char_381_bubble_CN_007: Doctor, shhh, tell me the truth. Kay says Vulcan can hammer straight through the floor, can she? No? Phew... Hehe. I knew it. That means my Papa is definitely stronger. He could bust down a Rhodes smoke stack with one punch.
dialogue_tracker.char_381_bubble_CN_008: Do I really have to write it in the notebook...? Fine... 'I knocked over Lancet-2 today. I won't do it again.'
dialogue_tracker.char_381_bubble_CN_009: This is my shield. It'll be one of my greaves someday, or maybe a pauldron. Then as long as I'm standing behind you, hehe, nobody'll ever bully you.
dialogue_tracker.char_381_bubble_CN_010: Doctor, wake up! Someone's here to see you.
dialogue_tracker.char_381_bubble_CN_011: You're the boss of this training camp? And they call you the Doctor? Hrmmmm... But you don't look strong... Whatever. I'm Bubble. I may be the weakest in my tribe right now, but you're gonna train me until I'm the second strongest.
dialogue_tracker.char_381_bubble_CN_012: Fight! Fight! Fiiiiiight! What, why'd they stop. Is it over?
dialogue_tracker.char_381_bubble_CN_013: A reward for my training? Great! I can't eat it? Grrr...
dialogue_tracker.char_381_bubble_CN_014: I think I got a good chance of beating Kay now! Okay, lemme at her. Doctor, you can come watch!
dialogue_tracker.char_381_bubble_CN_018: I'll count down and we charge on one, okay?
dialogue_tracker.char_381_bubble_CN_029: Doctor, if you got your body as strong as your brain, you could be an awesome warrior like my Papa!
dialogue_tracker.char_381_bubble_CN_030: What did I tell you? I'm super strong.
dialogue_tracker.char_381_bubble_CN_031: Huh? Some of them got away? Did I let them through?
dialogue_tracker.char_381_bubble_CN_032: We can't beat them! Whatdowedo?! Whatdowedo?!
dialogue_tracker.char_381_bubble_CN_033: I need a way, waaay bigger room. How can anyone live in a little place like this?
dialogue_tracker.char_381_bubble_CN_038: It's New Year's! We got the day off! No homework! That means it's time to challenge Kay! Doctor, you can't just sit there all day. Why don't you come wrestle with us? It'll be fun!
dialogue_tracker.char_381_bubble_CN_043: Happy birthday, Doctor! Oh, this means you've grown a whole extra year! When am I gonna get as big as you?
dialogue_tracker.char_381_bubble_CN_044: I have to train hard at Rhodes Island! First, I'm gonna get tougher than Kay, then I'll beat Gavial, until I finally outdo Vulcan! Then I can go back home and be a warrior as great as Papa...! Doctor, are you gonna miss me when I'm gone?
dialogue_tracker.char_383_snsant_CN_001: D-Doctor! Excuse me, but could you please move a little? You're stepping on a coin...
dialogue_tracker.char_383_snsant_CN_002: My dream is for all Terra to know… Okay, maybe just Lungmen… Umm, well, maybe I'll just start with Rhodes Island, or even just you! Yes, my dream is for you to know my skill…
dialogue_tracker.char_383_snsant_CN_003: Aaaugh… I forgot to turn out the lights when I left the office yesterday… Hm? Rhodes Island has power generation facilities so we don't have to pay for electricity? R-Really? Does that mean I can start eating dinner every day?
dialogue_tracker.char_383_snsant_CN_004: So this is the Originium ammunition that Jessica ordered... Uh, D-Doctor, the amount on the bill, is it right? Or maybe it's in the currency of some small, remote country? It's not? It's Lungmen Dollars? I-I-I-I see... Nonono, I-I'm just a-a-a little surprised, hehehe...
dialogue_tracker.char_383_snsant_CN_005: Oripathy... Hm, even though it's a bit outside my field of study, it might be worth looking into... But if I add another research project, I'll go from two meals a day to two days a meal... Aww…
dialogue_tracker.char_383_snsant_CN_006: Frugality is a virtue, but for me, it's more like a habit... E-Even so, if you or my friends ever have money troubles, I'll gladly help out! I'm serious!
dialogue_tracker.char_383_snsant_CN_007: You'd like to take a look at my clawhook? That's probably fine... B-But whatever you do, don't push this button. And watch your thumb when you're holding the grip... W-Wait, you're not winding the rope correctly, and... Oh, I-I'm sorry, don't mind me, you can keep looking at it...
dialogue_tracker.char_383_snsant_CN_008: After I become a great, world-famous scientist with lots of money, I swear I'll have three meals a day and dessert too, just like Jessica... And then, with the money I can't even spend, I'll invest it into making Lungmen a better place. Um... if a day like that ever comes.
dialogue_tracker.char_383_snsant_CN_009: Money is very important. Before I went back to Lungmen, I turned down a big retention fee from the research institute, so my self-funded research project went under... But, it's more important to be home. I can always save up again, and now I won't go dizzy looking at all those big numbers!
dialogue_tracker.char_383_snsant_CN_010: …Doctor fell asleep? Then I'll handle the rest of the work, though I am a bit hungry.
dialogue_tracker.char_383_snsant_CN_011: Oww... my head! Sorry... Oh, a-are you the Doctor? It's a pleasure to meet you! My name is Snowsant. Sorry, I shouldn't be walking with my head down…
dialogue_tracker.char_383_snsant_CN_012: Woah... This isn't something you can learn with more effort...
dialogue_tracker.char_383_snsant_CN_013: Wha-what? A promotion? I… feel a bit more pressure, but I'll be okay. This is proof that I'm one step closer to making something of myself!
dialogue_tracker.char_383_snsant_CN_014: 'Heaven rewards the hard-working.' Wouldn't you agree, Doctor?
dialogue_tracker.char_383_snsant_CN_017: It'll be all right. I just need to remember my training and work hard…
dialogue_tracker.char_383_snsant_CN_018: You want m-me to be the squad leader? But I really don't know anything about battle…
dialogue_tracker.char_383_snsant_CN_019: Clawhook checked and ready! Take a deep breath... I can do this!
dialogue_tracker.char_383_snsant_CN_023: I hope my clawhook won't malfunction…
dialogue_tracker.char_383_snsant_CN_024: This is my first time being so close to a battlefield...
dialogue_tracker.char_383_snsant_CN_026: Please hold still, don't make it hard on you!
dialogue_tracker.char_383_snsant_CN_028: Claw's all good for a catch!
dialogue_tracker.char_383_snsant_CN_029: As long as we work together, there's no obstacle we can't overcome! R-Right, Doctor?
dialogue_tracker.char_383_snsant_CN_030: Not a single resource wasted, a flawless victory!
dialogue_tracker.char_383_snsant_CN_031: Some enemies got away, sh-should we chase after them?
dialogue_tracker.char_383_snsant_CN_032: I, I'll go salvage some damaged parts, to at least reduce our losses…
dialogue_tracker.char_383_snsant_CN_033: Wooooah, so this is what it's like inside Rhodes Island... I'm so jealous…
dialogue_tracker.char_383_snsant_CN_038: So today's a holiday? No wonder the canteen has such an amazing spread. I can finally enjoy a proper meal, heheh. Speaking of which, Rhodes Island sure has a lot of holidays. If I take another job in the downtime, maybe I can make a little more money...
dialogue_tracker.char_383_snsant_CN_043: Doctor, happy birthday! Thank you for always looking out for me, I got you a present. Here's an ergonomic chair to correct your posture, and an automatic document sorter, I made them both myself. I-I know they're made of really cheap materials, but I can promise they're great quality!
dialogue_tracker.char_383_snsant_CN_044: Rhodes Island maybe can't offer me a super comfortable life... No, I get enough food and warm clothes here, that's already pretty comfy... A-Anyway, I'm extremely grateful to have a work environment that supports my R&D like this. I will double up my efforts, and get results worth the experimental funding.
dialogue_tracker.char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_001: D-Doctor! Excuse me, but could you please move a little? You're stepping on a coin...
dialogue_tracker.char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_002: My dream is to be praised sincerely by the entire world... Ah, um, maybe just Lungmen... Well, maybe I should start with Rhodes Island, or, um, just you! Yes, that is my dream for the time being...
dialogue_tracker.char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_003: Ugh, I forgot to turn off the light when I left the office yesterday... Hm? Rhodes Island has a power generation facility so there's no need to pay for electricity? Really? Does that I mean I get to eat dinner in the future?
dialogue_tracker.char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_004: This is the Originium ammunition that Jessica ordered... Eh? D-Doctor! Isn't this dollar amount wrong? Or is this the currency of some small remote country? It's not? It's LMD? I, I, I, I, I see... Don't worry, I was just a l-l-l-little s-surprised.
dialogue_tracker.char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_005: Oripathy... Hm, even though it's a bit beyond my field of study, it does seem to be worth looking into... But if I add another research project, I'll go from two meals a day to two days a meal... Ugh...
dialogue_tracker.char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_006: Frugality is a type of virtue, but for me, it's closer to a habit... D-despite that, if you or my friends were in need, I'd gladly help out! I'm serious!
dialogue_tracker.char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_007: You'd like to take a look at my clawhook? That's maybe fine... but whatever you do, don't push this button. And watch your thumb when you're holding the grip... W-wait, you're not winding the rope correctly, and... Ack! Sorry, don't mind me, you can keep looking at it...
dialogue_tracker.char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_008: After I become a great, world-famous scientist with lots of money, I swear I'll have three meals a day and dessert too, just like Jessica... And then, with the money I'm not able to spend, I'd put it back into making Lungmen a better place. Um... if a day like that ever comes.
dialogue_tracker.char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_009: Money is very important. Before I returned to Lungmen, I refused a large retention fee from the research institute, so my self-funded research project went under... But it's more important to be home. I can always save up more money, and now I won't go dizzy from looking at all those large numbers!
dialogue_tracker.char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_010: ...Did you fall asleep? Just let me handle the rest, though I am a bit hungry.
dialogue_tracker.char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_011: Oww... my head! Sorry... Oh, y-you're the Doctor? It's a pleasure to meet you. My name is Snowsant. Sorry, I shouldn't be walking with my head down...
dialogue_tracker.char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_012: Woah... This isn't something you can learn with more effort...
dialogue_tracker.char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_013: Ehh? A p-promotion? I feel a bit more pressure, but I'll be okay. This is the proof that I'm one step farther than when I first came.
dialogue_tracker.char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_014: 'Heaven rewards the hard-working.' Wouldn't you agree, Doctor?
dialogue_tracker.char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_017: It'll be all right, as long as I work just as hard as I did during training...
dialogue_tracker.char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_018: You want m-me to be the squad leader? I really don't know anything about battle though...
dialogue_tracker.char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_019: Clawhook inspection complete! Take a deep breath... I can do this!
dialogue_tracker.char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_024: This is my first time being so close to a battlefield...
dialogue_tracker.char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_026: Stop moving around, it'll be easier this way!
dialogue_tracker.char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_029: As long as we work together, there's no obstacle we can't overcome!
dialogue_tracker.char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_030: What a flawless victory - not a bit of waste!
dialogue_tracker.char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_031: Some enemies got away, sh-should we chase after them?
dialogue_tracker.char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_032: I, I'll go salvage some damage parts, to at least reduce our losses...
dialogue_tracker.char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_033: Woah, so this is what it's like inside Rhodes Island... I'm so envious...
dialogue_tracker.char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_043: Doctor, happy birthday! Thank you for always looking out for me, I got you a present. Here's an ergonomic chair to correct your posture, and an automatic document sorter, I made them both myself. I know they're made of really cheap materials, but I can promise they're great quality.
dialogue_tracker.char_383_snsant_CN_TOPOLECT_CN_044: I might not be extremely well off at Rhodes Island, no, I can eat properly and dress myself, that's already relatively well off... but basically, I'm extremely grateful to have a work environment that supports my R&D like this! I need to double up my efforts, and get results worth the experimental funding, before I can rest!
dialogue_tracker.char_385_finlpp_CN_001: Smiling can help you feel revitalized. Why don't you try smiling, Doctor.
dialogue_tracker.char_385_finlpp_CN_002: Rhodes Island shouldn't be like those black-hearted corporations, right? Lungmen Industrial Waste Disposal License, Lungmen City Sewage Permit... Well, it seems like there are no problems with your certification, and the sewage treatment seems good enough... It's good that you're a law-abiding organization!
dialogue_tracker.char_385_finlpp_CN_003: Woah, this water tastes amazing~! It's cool and sweet, just like the springs back in my hometown... Where's the water source? How is it filtered? What are you using to filter it? Please tell me quickly, Doctor!
dialogue_tracker.char_385_finlpp_CN_004: There are signs of excessive wastewater discharge this mon-- Huh? Did I take too many baths again? ...Oh no, I must reflect upon my behavior!
dialogue_tracker.char_385_finlpp_CN_005: I love my hometown! Although it's not as lively in the country as it is in the city, and daily life isn't as comfortable, the water there is cool and delicious, and the air is always fresh. Hehe, these are sometimes hard to come by in the city!
dialogue_tracker.char_385_finlpp_CN_006: The pollution near the city is getting worse and worse. Earlier, we even had problems with the water supply in my hometown, and resolving that situation required a lot of effort. While Catastrophes pose a very clear threat to us, pollution will also erode away at our habitable spaces! Therefore, protecting our environment is also of great importance!
dialogue_tracker.char_385_finlpp_CN_007: Heave, ho! That should be the last shoe... Got it! Phew, now, this waterway will be much cleaner, and my daily efforts here won't go to waste! Thank you for accompanying me, Doctor!
dialogue_tracker.char_385_finlpp_CN_008: There is a legend among my people that we came from a place far, far away. Now that there are fewer and fewer of us, nobody seems to know where we came from, or where we are going...
dialogue_tracker.char_385_finlpp_CN_009: Back in my hometown during harvest season, each family will make lots and lots of delicious food! Braised, sweet and sour, steamed, fried, marinated, anything you can imagine! Doctor, why don't we go visit together? The people there are very hospitable~
dialogue_tracker.char_385_finlpp_CN_010: Ugh... So dry... I want to soak in a bath...
dialogue_tracker.char_385_finlpp_CN_011: Hello, I am the municipal waterway cleaner, codename Purestream! From now on, I will handle the water treatment and sanitation of this ship, so please rest assured! Oh, these are pickled vegetables from my hometown. Everyone is welcome to try some—I assure you, they're delicious!
dialogue_tracker.char_385_finlpp_CN_012: If the purpose is to gain experience, wouldn't it be faster to put everything into practice?
dialogue_tracker.char_385_finlpp_CN_013: Am I getting a raise? With this promotion and salary increase, I'm well on my way to the top! Hehe, I'll have to tell everyone back home the good news~
dialogue_tracker.char_385_finlpp_CN_014: While there is a difference in urgency between visible threats and less evident threats, they are both dangerous to us! I'm glad you understand, Doctor.
dialogue_tracker.char_385_finlpp_CN_017: No problem, just leave it to me!
dialogue_tracker.char_385_finlpp_CN_018: Such an important task... I'll do my best!
dialogue_tracker.char_385_finlpp_CN_019: Rhodes Island Water Treatment Team, heading out!
dialogue_tracker.char_385_finlpp_CN_020: Surprise inspection! That punk just poured paint down the sink! Get him!
dialogue_tracker.char_385_finlpp_CN_021: A fight? Alright! Lemme Roll up my sleeves… Oh, I don't have sleeves.
dialogue_tracker.char_385_finlpp_CN_027: Water works to the benefit of all.
dialogue_tracker.char_385_finlpp_CN_028: Did that splash of cool water wake you up?
dialogue_tracker.char_385_finlpp_CN_029: No more contaminants! Very good, this mission was a great success~
dialogue_tracker.char_385_finlpp_CN_030: Operation complete! But we have to be diligent with the cleanup.
dialogue_tracker.char_385_finlpp_CN_031: Hey, where'd the enemy run off to? I-I can't find them!
dialogue_tracker.char_385_finlpp_CN_032: The situation is looking bad, but we have nothing to fear as long as we stay strong! Let's fall back for now?
dialogue_tracker.char_385_finlpp_CN_033: I hope I can get a nice, big bathtub.
dialogue_tracker.char_385_finlpp_CN_036: Let me tell you a secret - I can swim upright!
dialogue_tracker.char_385_finlpp_CN_038: Doctor, Happy New Year! Mom and Dad sent me some pickles they made. I've checked the calendar, now's the best time to eat them! Quick, try some, and I'll fetch some for everyone else too. Hehe, Our village might not be famous, but even city people know this kind of pickle!
dialogue_tracker.char_385_finlpp_CN_042: Good morning, Doctor! Would you like a cup of cool, refreshing spring water?
dialogue_tracker.char_385_finlpp_CN_043: Happy birthday, Doctor! This is a water purifier I developed myself. You connect it to the tap, and it lets you directly drink the water that comes out! Oh, of course, I'll keep working on new filter models for you to replace it with. I've got this all planned out, and the next step is—getting everyone at Rhodes Island to use it!
dialogue_tracker.char_385_finlpp_CN_044: I often have this sinking feeling that my own power is too little, but if I can change a company as big as Rhodes Island by myself, then there have to be more people like me across the land. As long as we all keep up our own strives, the future will be better, won't it?
dialogue_tracker.char_388_mint_CN_001: Can I read any of the books here? I can read all of them?  Oh, thank you! I'll be careful! I won't mess them up!
dialogue_tracker.char_388_mint_CN_002: Ah, sorry, please don't go touching my book. It might bite your hand if you do. No, really, I'm not joking, I'm serious. Look! I even have to tie it shut like this.
dialogue_tracker.char_388_mint_CN_003: Doctor, do you know where the library is? I asked someone just now, but they were talking too fast. It was hard to understand.
dialogue_tracker.char_388_mint_CN_004: Skyfire, um, Skyfire, wait for me! Uwwhh, please don't walk so fast... I promise I won't run off halfway this time, I promise!
dialogue_tracker.char_388_mint_CN_005: I like reading, but I like hanging out with everyone too! It makes me so happy when I can be with the people I like. Also, don't be fooled. I'm really good at sporty stuff! Especially climbing trees. I can climb super high!
dialogue_tracker.char_388_mint_CN_006: I got some new inspiration after talking to Miss Eyjafjalla today! She's very well-researched on environmental geology. Thank goodness my group's research wasn't stopped because of my accident. Heheh! If I get results this time, I can reapply to the Institution to resume my studies.
dialogue_tracker.char_388_mint_CN_007: Skyfire is an alumna from my university. She graduated soon after I entered since she skipped a year, but even still, she did look after me... Oh, speaking of! She's also the one who introduced me to Rhodes Island! It's thanks to her I'm receiving treatment here.
dialogue_tracker.char_388_mint_CN_008: Um, I suppose I've been following you around, haven't I? I mean, I feel really at ease when I'm around you, so I just unconsciously... A-Am I annoying you, Doctor? Do you want me to go away?
dialogue_tracker.char_388_mint_CN_009: Doctor, this is for you. I found it on the way back, and so many more pretty-looking stones just like it! But, well... that was before I realized I'd gotten separated from the others. Mm? The ore chunk on your desk from before? I put that there too, yes. Did you like it, Doctor?
dialogue_tracker.char_388_mint_CN_010: Nnh... mmmmnnh... there! Ah, Doctor! Sorry! Did I wake you up? There was a bug on your head, so I just, um—did it hurt? I can shush it better!
dialogue_tracker.char_388_mint_CN_011: Thank you for helping me move all these books! Just leave them here, please. Oh, my codename is Mint. What's yours? Doctor? Wait, so you're the Doctor? Skyfire was telling me about you!
dialogue_tracker.char_388_mint_CN_013: Are there any rewards for promotion? Can I borrow even more books than before?
dialogue_tracker.char_388_mint_CN_014: Doctor, come sit down here. How is it? The sun feels really nice, right? Eheheh. This is my secret base. I love it here more than anywhere. Don't tell anyone else about it, okay?
dialogue_tracker.char_388_mint_CN_017: Got it. Are you coming with us, Doctor?
dialogue_tracker.char_388_mint_CN_018: Wait! You want me as the leader?
dialogue_tracker.char_388_mint_CN_021: Mmmm… Whuh? What? Yes, I'm listening!
dialogue_tracker.char_388_mint_CN_024: Please don't get in our way!
dialogue_tracker.char_388_mint_CN_028: Would you like to see some of my magic?
dialogue_tracker.char_388_mint_CN_029: Everything went just like you said it would, Doctor! Amazing...!
dialogue_tracker.char_388_mint_CN_030: Phew... it's over. We can finally head back now.
dialogue_tracker.char_388_mint_CN_031: It doesn't look like any more are coming for us... This is fine for now, right?
dialogue_tracker.char_388_mint_CN_032: We can't, it's too dangerous... Doctor, you need to get away!
dialogue_tracker.char_388_mint_CN_033: Um, to tell the truth, I'd be alright sleeping in the library too.
dialogue_tracker.char_388_mint_CN_036: Ah! Doctor, would you like to read with me? It's really comfortable sitting here.
dialogue_tracker.char_388_mint_CN_038: Hm... I'm starting to miss my mum and dad. Skyfire has been away from home for so long. Maybe I should ask her how she manages... Oh, Doctor. Will a Messenger visit Rhodes Island today? I have a letter I'd like to post.
dialogue_tracker.char_388_mint_CN_042: So this is where you were, Doctor! Found you.
dialogue_tracker.char_388_mint_CN_043: Doctor, here's a book as a present. Happy birthday! Look, I illustrated the cover myself. I'm always gathering minerals, and these ones have been recent favorites of mine. I looked for paints with lusters as close as I could get! And I have the actual rocks to give you too, of course. What do you think, Doctor? Go on, it's all for you.
dialogue_tracker.char_388_mint_CN_044: I wish I could participate in more research projects. My instructor and teammates always take such good care of me. They're worried my illness could get worse if I push myself too hard, so they don't let me join them on the surveys... I must get better at Rhodes Island so I can go back and focus on my research.
dialogue_tracker.char_391_rosmon_CN_001: Umm, Doctor... I'm not very good at filing and writing reports. Do you think you can assign me to another position? Eh? I don't need to do anything. All I need to do is hang out here? Doctor... You're a weirdo.
dialogue_tracker.char_391_rosmon_CN_002: Everyone at Rhodes Island is my friend. The elite operators and my squad mates are my family. Ms. Kal'tsit doesn't want me to treat them as family. I didn't get it at first, but I do now. They're like flowers in a vase. If you don't pay attention to them, they'll wither. But they're all I have.
dialogue_tracker.char_391_rosmon_CN_003: What am I reading? Oh, it's an entry from two days ago. Closure spilled her coffee that morning and stained a couple scrolls in the library. And she got cursed, I think. For every five words she says, she ends up spitting on someone's face. Scary, isn't it?
dialogue_tracker.char_391_rosmon_CN_004: Painful things, sad things, and scary things all go away when you least expect them to. But it's not okay to forget them. I need to remember them, because those emotions are still there inside me. I don't want to end up crying without knowing why. Memories are a burden, and I have to carry my own burden.
dialogue_tracker.char_391_rosmon_CN_005: I can't use a shield, I can't use a bow, I can't make guns glow, and I can't turn those iron rods into weapons very well. More importantly, the other elite operators are much warmer than me. This warmth is what helps them fight for everyone else and for what's right. I will do my best.
dialogue_tracker.char_391_rosmon_CN_006: Ms. Kal'tsit has lost lots of family, right? I see it in her eyes. How does she keep it to herself and manage to live with it? Just thinking about how everyone will disappear eventually one after another is enough to make my heart ache. Like it's going to explode. Is it because she's a grown-up? Then I want to grow up soon.
dialogue_tracker.char_391_rosmon_CN_007: Doctor, could you tell me what this word means? I asked Blaze about it, and she just kept giggling, and Amiya just kept hitting her. Oh, it means kissing? I know what that is, then. Doctor, bend down a little, okay? Can I kiss you on the cheek? Thanks for always taking care of us. Meow.
dialogue_tracker.char_391_rosmon_CN_008: I won't forget about those people. They created me and those monsters. They wanted to use us to do bad things. Before the world finally stops hurting us all... I'll punish these people. I will make it really, really hurt, so they never, ever forget.
dialogue_tracker.char_391_rosmon_CN_009: Oh... You're the Doctor, right? I went over the records on the terminal just yesterday. Yep, I remember now, Doctor. You can give me orders. Let's go on a mission? Make sure to use my powers well.
dialogue_tracker.char_391_rosmon_CN_010: Hmm... the Doctor is taking a nap. Looks restless, too. Must be tired. If I give the Doctor a hug, it should feel a little better, right? Just relax and sleep well. I know how it feels... It hurts even in your dreams, right? I can tell.
dialogue_tracker.char_391_rosmon_CN_011: Hello, Doctor. I am Elite Operator Rosmontis. Ms. Kal'tsit has given her permission. You can give me and my team orders now. Use my power where it matters, Doctor. I also tend to forget about things pretty easily. Be sure to remind me if it looks like I might forget something.
dialogue_tracker.char_391_rosmon_CN_012: Yeah... I got that down now. I can use this in battle.
dialogue_tracker.char_391_rosmon_CN_013: I asked Ms. Kal'tsit why I'm an elite operator. Lots of people talk behind my back. They say I'm not right for the job. Ms. Kal'tsit said that if I become an elite operator, I'll remember more, and I'll become a better person. Yep, I'm doing my best.
dialogue_tracker.char_391_rosmon_CN_014: This world isn't going to get better so easily, but humans tend to get worse because of their surroundings. Doctor, we can't turn into bad people. If you do, I am sure you'll be really, really bad. I won't let you turn out like that.
dialogue_tracker.char_391_rosmon_CN_017: Time for a mission? Yeah, I know. I will protect all of Rhodes Island's operators. I promise.
dialogue_tracker.char_391_rosmon_CN_018: I am the leader? Don't worry. They may not be from my team, but I'll make sure their support doesn't go to waste.
dialogue_tracker.char_391_rosmon_CN_019: Don't worry. I know how to control my Arts.
dialogue_tracker.char_391_rosmon_CN_020: I don't want to see my family get hurt. I will destroy everything that could hurt my family.
dialogue_tracker.char_391_rosmon_CN_022: Give me your order. I will see it through.
dialogue_tracker.char_391_rosmon_CN_024: Stand back. If you don't want to see what's about to happen, don't look.
dialogue_tracker.char_391_rosmon_CN_025: If it hurts, just cry out. It'll feel better.
dialogue_tracker.char_391_rosmon_CN_026: If you surrender now, I won't hurt you.
dialogue_tracker.char_391_rosmon_CN_027: You won't die... I'll make sure you don't die.
dialogue_tracker.char_391_rosmon_CN_028: There are things that have to be done by someone. There are things that only I can do.
dialogue_tracker.char_391_rosmon_CN_029: If there comes a day when I can't use these Arts again... Hmm. What will that day be like? I can't imagine.
dialogue_tracker.char_391_rosmon_CN_030: That was very nice, Doctor. There, there. Thanks.
dialogue_tracker.char_391_rosmon_CN_031: I will take care of the rest. It won't take long.
dialogue_tracker.char_391_rosmon_CN_032: No... I won't retreat. I can't disappoint the others. I still have my sword... Even without my sword, I can still fight! I won't leave!
dialogue_tracker.char_391_rosmon_CN_033: P-Please don't lock me in a small room. They're scary... I... I don't really like those kinda rooms.
dialogue_tracker.char_391_rosmon_CN_036: Um... I-I'll try to bear with it... and not break your hand...
dialogue_tracker.char_391_rosmon_CN_038: I don't remember how I used to spend New Year's very well. I think I had brothers, and we would set off fireworks in the yard, but I also wonder... Were they real? The people on Rhodes Island… are the only ones I have left. Please don't leave me. Not ever.
dialogue_tracker.char_391_rosmon_CN_043: Doctor, I remember your birthday now. It's always been on my terminal. This is a really, really good day, right? I don't know why we celebrate the days we were born... But just hearing the word, make me feel life and warmth. Doctor, do you want to blow out the candles? Candles are warm, too.
dialogue_tracker.char_391_rosmon_CN_044: Should I wear blue shoes or white shoes to the party tonight? Doctor, I don't remember what I've done this past year, but all the people I hurt were bad, right? If I haven't done anything wrong, I want to wear this new pair of white shoes.
dialogue_tracker.char_394_hadiya_CN_001: 博士，要来跟我一起学习一下萨尔贡部族的文字和生活方式吗？比起战斗训练，这些可难多了。
dialogue_tracker.char_394_hadiya_CN_002: 我身负了部族的责任，就一定会履行到底。所谓的部族传承，对在哥伦比亚长大的我来说其实有些遥远，但是我不会因为受到几个王酋的质疑就轻言放弃！
dialogue_tracker.char_394_hadiya_CN_003: 你不觉得红隼姐手里的那把武器超级酷吗？！它的挥砍方式和着力点跟一般武器完全不一样，有机会我要找她多讨教几次。
dialogue_tracker.char_394_hadiya_CN_004: 呃......感谢你的好意，萨尔贡这些富含酒精的“饮料”我到现在还是完全喝不惯，真怀念哥伦比亚的羽衣甘蓝气泡水。
dialogue_tracker.char_394_hadiya_CN_005: 没错，之前向那些王酋亲兵挑战的时候，我并不能每次都胜过他们，有好几次甚至没机会还击。不过没什么关系，我还有时间和机会。
dialogue_tracker.char_394_hadiya_CN_006: 哥伦比亚的组合剑是专为城市作战设计的，所以帕夏和当地的战士们会看不起这样的武器。不过，总有一天我会向他们证明，现代科技和传统战术也有融合的可能！
dialogue_tracker.char_394_hadiya_CN_007: 博士，记得平常多喝点水，保持体内水分充足是很重要的。等到去了萨尔贡的旱季荒野，几十天都找不到水源的时候，你就知道为什么我这么在乎这件事了。
dialogue_tracker.char_394_hadiya_CN_008: 起初，荒野上几乎没有部族愿意相信我就是剑角的后裔。毕竟传说已经消逝了那么多年，他们那样做也无可厚非。一开始你就相信我是？啊......我的意思是......谢谢......
dialogue_tracker.char_394_hadiya_CN_009: 我的梦想是在萨尔贡举行一场比武大会，让大地上的战士们齐聚剑角部族，共享我们的荣耀。博士，到时候也请你带上这里的好手，一起来参与盛会！嗯，一言为定！
dialogue_tracker.char_394_hadiya_CN_010: 这里不是荒野，放心休息吧。
dialogue_tracker.char_394_hadiya_CN_011: 博士你好，我是哈蒂娅，萨尔贡的剑角部族的后裔，为了完成荒野给我的挑战，前来罗德岛进行学习。
dialogue_tracker.char_394_hadiya_CN_012: 那些萨尔贡战士总说要在战斗中成长，但我用这样的方式也能学习，开始吧。
dialogue_tracker.char_394_hadiya_CN_013: 相比起我的目标，我做到的事还微不足道，不过请接受我的谢意。
dialogue_tracker.char_394_hadiya_CN_014: 我的荣誉即是部族的荣誉。博士，感谢你的认可。
dialogue_tracker.char_394_hadiya_CN_017: 该试试之前学到的新招式了。
dialogue_tracker.char_394_hadiya_CN_018: 很多战场和萨尔贡的荒野一样，实际比看起来要危险得多，记住不要盲目行动。
dialogue_tracker.char_394_hadiya_CN_019: 装备都确认好了？那接下来就是——战斗时间！
dialogue_tracker.char_394_hadiya_CN_020: 这次用哪只手的武器来教训你们呢！
dialogue_tracker.char_394_hadiya_CN_023: 但愿是个有挑战价值的强敌。
dialogue_tracker.char_394_hadiya_CN_024: 知道这双角代表着什么吗？
dialogue_tracker.char_394_hadiya_CN_027: 别忘了我的武器不止一柄。
dialogue_tracker.char_394_hadiya_CN_029: 我一直坚信，早晚有一天我会赢下这样一场令人难以忘怀的战斗。
dialogue_tracker.char_394_hadiya_CN_030: 萨尔贡战士追求的就是这种胜利，我也不例外。
dialogue_tracker.char_394_hadiya_CN_031: 嗯，这把剑还是有局限，为了部族我不应该就此满足。
dialogue_tracker.char_394_hadiya_CN_032: 失败之后肯定会有胜利。现在，暂且退后吧。
dialogue_tracker.char_394_hadiya_CN_033: 这种有屋檐庇护的感觉，真令人怀念。
dialogue_tracker.char_394_hadiya_CN_034: 如果不想被我的角戳痛的话，那可要小心了。
dialogue_tracker.char_394_hadiya_CN_036: 对我这把剑的构造很好奇？给，拿去试试吧。哦，记得小心战杖里弹出来的刀刃。
dialogue_tracker.char_394_hadiya_CN_038: 博士，祝你新年快乐。你想怎样庆祝这个节日，是遵循萨尔贡的传统，还是按照哥伦比亚的习惯，或者你还有别的安排？无论如何，我都愿意陪你一起度过。
dialogue_tracker.char_394_hadiya_CN_042: 你好博士，今天为我准备了什么样的挑战？
dialogue_tracker.char_394_hadiya_CN_043: 今天是你的生日，我觉得是时候带你放下这些工作，去外面走一走了。萨尔贡的风景很不错，但似乎之前你都无心欣赏。今天的外出，就当做是我送给你的礼物吧。
dialogue_tracker.char_394_hadiya_CN_044: 博士，看起来我们彼此都离目标更进一步了。那为了庆祝，来一个哥伦比亚式的击掌吧！接下来的日子，也一起努力！
dialogue_tracker.char_4000_jnight_CN_001: Beep-Beep. Understood. Classification program initiated. Now sorting the Doctor's documents. Will you want any snacks during work? Justice Knight could pick some up for you from the cafeteria.
dialogue_tracker.char_4000_jnight_CN_002: Ever since Closure and Mayer installed a human voice patch, Justice Knight's functionality as a smart assistant has gone right up! Being able to use natural language logic really has improved communication so much when helping out my masters.
dialogue_tracker.char_4000_jnight_CN_003: Justice Knight's master, the Wild Mane Knight Iwona, found Justice Knight in a scrapped state. She rebooted and fixed this unit. Ever since then, Justice Knight've been in charge of her and her partners' everyday lives, as well as supporting them on missions.
dialogue_tracker.char_4000_jnight_CN_004: Doctor... why does my master say things to this unit like 'Justice, you're too noisy these days. Go play somewhere else if you've got nothing to do!'? Beep-Beep…Beep-Beep... Justice Knight doesn't understand.
dialogue_tracker.char_4000_jnight_CN_007: Everyone in Pinus Sylvestris is incredibly hard-working, always putting meals off so they can train their knightly skills. There has to be a day where their bodies won't keep up. None of them have time to fetch their lunchboxes, so it's all up to Justice Knight to bring them over.
dialogue_tracker.char_4000_jnight_CN_008: A low battery? Sorry, this unit is not sure if any of my functions will be of help to you... What? it's the games console that's almost out? Please get this wire plugged in straight away!
dialogue_tracker.char_4000_jnight_CN_009: Beep-Beep. Doctor, you discovered Justice Knight's secret. Justice Knight has no other choice but to take firm action in order to protect the secret... Master? You'll allow Justice Knight to keep tending to the plants in the Convalescent Garden? Thank you, Doctor. You now have unlimited access to all services of Justice Knight!
dialogue_tracker.char_4000_jnight_CN_010: Beep-Beep, Beep-Beep. Apologies, Doctor. Justice Knight always forgets to disable the automatic timeteller feature.
dialogue_tracker.char_4000_jnight_CN_011: Beep-Beep, Beep-Beep-Beep, Beep-Beep…Beep! ('Justice Knight,' glad to be reporting in along with everyone from Pinus Sylvestris Knightclub... Justice Knight will be of great use to you all!)
dialogue_tracker.char_4000_jnight_CN_012: These are very useful resources for this unit. Justice Knight will apply to Miss Closure for installing even more new functions.
dialogue_tracker.char_4000_jnight_CN_017: Justice Knight, all ready and set!
dialogue_tracker.char_4000_jnight_CN_018: Are you leaving command to Justice Knight? It might be a little challenging for this unit right now…
dialogue_tracker.char_4000_jnight_CN_020: Beep-Beep. Justice Knight will provide you all with proper and timely support!
dialogue_tracker.char_4000_jnight_CN_021: Justice Knight, all good to go!
dialogue_tracker.char_4000_jnight_CN_024: Beep-Beep. Justice Knight is now in position.
dialogue_tracker.char_4000_jnight_CN_029: Beep-Beep, BeepBeepBeep-- Sorry, Justice Knight got too worked up. Doctor, master, Justice Knight has made it!
dialogue_tracker.char_4000_jnight_CN_030: Possiblilites of new function development detected! Justice Knight, awaiting for orders to return to Rhodes Island!
dialogue_tracker.char_4000_jnight_CN_031: There is still room for improvement. Anyway, we won! Congratulations, Doctor!
dialogue_tracker.char_4000_jnight_CN_032: Please don't... throw Justice Knight... away again...
dialogue_tracker.char_4000_jnight_CN_033: Beep-Beep, Justice Knight has plenty of things to do here.
dialogue_tracker.char_4000_jnight_CN_034: Beep-Beep! Don't treat this unit like that… Negative!
dialogue_tracker.char_4000_jnight_CN_036: The washing machine... doesn't seem too hard to use...
dialogue_tracker.char_4000_jnight_CN_038: Doctor, can you see the countdown on the screen? Three... two... one... Happy New Year! This year, Justice Knight will focus all her heart on doing even more for you.
dialogue_tracker.char_4000_jnight_CN_043: 'Beep-beep.' Doctor, your takeout is delivered... Yes, Justice Knight has brought you your birthday meal from the Rhodes Island Cafeteria. Scan of ingredients inside packaging: Inedible items, paraffin wax, Acid Originium Slug; edible items, butter, fermented flour. Scan results: safe.
dialogue_tracker.char_4000_jnight_CN_044: Since the Pinus Sylvestris Knightclub joined Rhodes Island, their lifestyles have transformed. Accordingly, all of Justice Knight's functions are being upgraded to follow. Justice Knight will ensure that she remains a useful operation platform.
dialogue_tracker.char_4004_pudd_CN_001: Doctor, can I borrow half of your desk? Thank you very much. Huff... Ah, it's a blueprint for a new electrical system. I need to get it drawn up by today. Are you busy too? Let's be partners in overtime, then?
dialogue_tracker.char_4004_pudd_CN_002: I've been into electricity ever since I was a kid. Just listening to currents crackling really soothed me. Huh? You think that's weird?
dialogue_tracker.char_4004_pudd_CN_003: You learn a lot when you're in Rhodes Island's Engineering Department. The Operators bring weapons and equipment from all over, all sorts of technological applications you've never seen before, and all of them worth plenty of research time. If I put more efforts to my work, I might be able to stay in the Engineering Department.
dialogue_tracker.char_4004_pudd_CN_004: This is 'Pillow,' a childhood friend of mine. Our family moved from somewhere way far all the way to Columbia, and I found myself very lonely at school. My mom gave me Pillow to keep me company. Oh, Doctor, you should know it can't speak!
dialogue_tracker.char_4004_pudd_CN_005: I got into an accident while I was on a lone study out in the country, and was unable to contact the rescue team. Pillow and I had to make it all the way back to inhabited land on foot. After that... I didn't really want to go out doors.
dialogue_tracker.char_4004_pudd_CN_006: My dreams... that I work well, and everyday is a nice day. Also, I want to buy a holiday villa in Sami, and after my parents are retired, they can live there together... yeah, I've gotta stay healthy, and keep on trucking until they retire.
dialogue_tracker.char_4004_pudd_CN_007: Since I was little, my mom and dad would find time every year to take me to the tundras on vacation. We're all really into cold places! Although if I wanted to cover the cost for my own vacations, I'd have to go pick up work in the city again.
dialogue_tracker.char_4004_pudd_CN_008: Haah, *yawn*... Sorry, Doctor, can I take a break here for a little bit...? Ever since this new project kicked off, the shift schedule's been completely crazy! I still have to go check over the base station later...
dialogue_tracker.char_4004_pudd_CN_009: To tell the truth, I've wanted to try going outdoors lately. I've gotten to know a lot of people in the same line as me at Rhodes Island, and I wanna experience more along with them. At least... I'm not ever going to be stuck on my own again, not now.
dialogue_tracker.char_4004_pudd_CN_010: Oh, the Doctor's asleep…? Well, I'd better turn this machine down a bit. It's kind of loud…
dialogue_tracker.char_4004_pudd_CN_011: Hello, I'm an electrical engineer from Columbia, codename... Well, Closure suddenly started calling me 'Pudding', but I don't know if that's too weird...
dialogue_tracker.char_4004_pudd_CN_012: So this is how professionals fight… Alright, I'd better put in some training if I'm gonna make it through this safely.
dialogue_tracker.char_4004_pudd_CN_013: Thank you for the recognition. I still have a ways to go compared to Rhodes Island's other Operators, so if there's any more high-effort work, throw it my way. If I just get enough sleep, I can hold out for some real long shifts.
dialogue_tracker.char_4004_pudd_CN_014: Combat missions in the tundra? At this point, I think I can be of help. Doctor, thank you, and all of Rhodes Island for always encouraging me. I'd like to pitch in some of my own strength now.
dialogue_tracker.char_4004_pudd_CN_017: I'm being assigned to combat? Just give me a bit more time to get ready... I... I can do this.
dialogue_tracker.char_4004_pudd_CN_018: I don't have much confidence in commanding, but I do know a thing or two about basic survival in the countryside.
dialogue_tracker.char_4004_pudd_CN_019: Pillow, don't you go leaving my sight.
dialogue_tracker.char_4004_pudd_CN_029: Mission complete. Right now, I got the same feeling I get seeing a blueprint come perfectly to life. What a relief!
dialogue_tracker.char_4004_pudd_CN_030: That wasn't too bad of a job... heheh, can you put this in my evaluation?
dialogue_tracker.char_4004_pudd_CN_031: Ugh... no. A discrepancy like this should be totally avoidable.
dialogue_tracker.char_4004_pudd_CN_032: Everyone, orderly retreat, please! I don't want anyone to fall behind!
dialogue_tracker.char_4004_pudd_CN_033: Phew, now where should I put Pillow...
dialogue_tracker.char_4004_pudd_CN_036: Ahh... please don't throw out any of the pink household goods in the Engineering Department. Those are for overtime use!
dialogue_tracker.char_4004_pudd_CN_038: Doctor, Happy New Year! Heheh, I'm going to take a few days off at a mountain resort nearby. There's a towering ski slope there, and hot springs, and ice fishing! Alright, see you la— The electrics need maintenance? Ohh... okay...
dialogue_tracker.char_4004_pudd_CN_042: Good morning, Doctor. *yawn*... I should probably catch up on some sleep.
dialogue_tracker.char_4004_pudd_CN_043: Doctor, happy birthday! Here's a doll for you, it looks just like my Pillow. Isn't it cute? It... It looks kind of like me? No it doesn't!
dialogue_tracker.char_4004_pudd_CN_044: Closure says she has a surprise for everyone today. Soo… I hope you'll like the light show tonight, Doctor. Actually, the energy-saving proposal for the string lights was mine, which I worked a whole week of overtime on to... no, never mind...
dialogue_tracker.char_4006_melnte_CN_001: You would like me to take care of your secretarial work? I can, but please do keep the amount of work under control. I used to write reports fairly often, but most don't find the contents of my reports very pleasant to read.
dialogue_tracker.char_4006_melnte_CN_002: You can stop looking at my shoulder. This is not an Oripathy lesion. It's just a tattoo that resembles one. Why? To outwit anyone who thinks they've found a weakness. You won't bother me again after the first time you guess wrong.
dialogue_tracker.char_4006_melnte_CN_003: That's right. I became an Infected while I was testing this railgun. Why am I still using it? First, it's safe now that it has been fine-tuned. Secondly, while I don't want to admit it, this is the weapon that suits me the most. I don't want to or dare to abandon it.
dialogue_tracker.char_4006_melnte_CN_004: The medicine in my earrings? It's not medicine. It's a perfume that I mixed myself. A highly concentrated perfume that can induce... emotions that run opposite to hostility. It comes in handy in dangerous situations. As for the lower concentrated one that I have here... Umm, it's for alleviating carsickness. I tend to get carsick pretty badly.
dialogue_tracker.char_4006_melnte_CN_005: I'd say I was a mercenary, more than a weapons tester. As soon as the higher-ups gave the order, I would have to take to the battlefield with newly-issued equipment. It was nothing like the battles I've fought for Rhodes Island. No one knew or cared why I fought.
dialogue_tracker.char_4006_melnte_CN_006: I was infected not because of an accident, but because of a transaction. For my infection, the client got their data, and the provided got a significant payment. Plus, they got to keep me on a leash with their insurance... If it wasn't for them treating me like a tuskbeast, why would I have run?
dialogue_tracker.char_4006_melnte_CN_007: The first time I struck a dummy, I thought back to my parents, that bandit, and how powerless I was despite having a gun in my hand... Even after I was out of ammo, I was still mechanically pulling the trigger over and over, until the coach took away the launcher in my hand. That's right. A launcher, not a gun.
dialogue_tracker.char_4006_melnte_CN_008: I once thought about opening a sundries shop like my parents did. Once, I even had an agreement with a landlord. Then, I had nightmares that entire night... Now? Much better. I'm even trying to help Instructor Dur-nar—Oh, please don't tell anyone about this.
dialogue_tracker.char_4006_melnte_CN_009: My father used to tell me stories of how the great Blacksteel founder upgraded their firearms. But it wasn't until recently that I realized true greatness is not to popularize some kind of weapon. Instead, it's to make weapons useless forever. Right, it's very ironic. This is what I dream of achieving, and it is something that I can only dream of achieving.
dialogue_tracker.char_4006_melnte_CN_010: Please rest at ease. I will ensure the office's safety during this period of time.
dialogue_tracker.char_4006_melnte_CN_011: Nice to meet you, Doctor. As a field operator, I will be in your service from here onwards. I hope that my firepower will not betray your expectations.
dialogue_tracker.char_4006_melnte_CN_012: That is excellent CQC, but perhaps a little too dangerous...
dialogue_tracker.char_4006_melnte_CN_013: The only way my former employer expresses approval is by raising wages—Don't get the wrong idea. For every wage increase, they make you do ten times the work afterwards. That's not how Rhodes Island works, right?
dialogue_tracker.char_4006_melnte_CN_014: Thank you for your trust, Doctor. I used to think of Rhodes Island as a stopping point so beautiful that it's almost unreal, but it now seems I will have to extend my stay here for a little longer.
dialogue_tracker.char_4006_melnte_CN_017: I'll provide fire support for everyone.
dialogue_tracker.char_4006_melnte_CN_018: You are appointing me as the leader? It appears this will be a tough battle.
dialogue_tracker.char_4006_melnte_CN_019: Everyone, so that we don't run into any unexpected issues on the field, check your weapons once again.
dialogue_tracker.char_4006_melnte_CN_020: Maintain a safe distance. Avoid direct confrontation if possible.
dialogue_tracker.char_4006_melnte_CN_024: Weapon's good. Ready for data collection.
dialogue_tracker.char_4006_melnte_CN_025: Shh. Do you hear that? That's the sound of the reaper making her advent.
dialogue_tracker.char_4006_melnte_CN_028: Don't huddle there. Hard for me to assess the blast area.
dialogue_tracker.char_4006_melnte_CN_029: I... I'm suddenly a little terrified. If I were on the other side facing you and your command, how much of the firepower I'm so proud of would actually be effective?
dialogue_tracker.char_4006_melnte_CN_030: A perfect performance, to the point that I want to write an evaluation report, voluntarily.
dialogue_tracker.char_4006_melnte_CN_031: A few of them got away. It seems we need some further adjustments.
dialogue_tracker.char_4006_melnte_CN_032: Cover the retreat? No problem. It's important to evaluate performance during retreats, too.
dialogue_tracker.char_4006_melnte_CN_033: Considering the weapon's size, this place might be a little cramped.
dialogue_tracker.char_4006_melnte_CN_034: Doctor, don't touch. You could get hurt.
dialogue_tracker.char_4006_melnte_CN_036: Would you like to head to Engineering together?
dialogue_tracker.char_4006_melnte_CN_038: Happy New Year, Doctor. Would you like me to shoot up some fireworks with this launcher? That's not a metaphor. It really has a fireworks mode. It's had one ever since I first got it.
dialogue_tracker.char_4006_melnte_CN_042: Good morning. A dream-less night of sleep alleviates exhaustion the most, don't you think?
dialogue_tracker.char_4006_melnte_CN_043: My former coworkers celebrated each safe return from a mission like a birthday. I wasn't really into hanging out with them. The wild carousing like they lived through a disaster always made me feel sick—I'm sorry, Doctor. I shouldn't be saying this today. Happy birthday.
dialogue_tracker.char_4006_melnte_CN_044: Rhodes Island is a place you can talk about your dreams without feeling embarrassed, and I like that. If I could start over, I would've come straight here without spending that time as a weapons tester... Maybe that way, I would already have taken a step toward my dreams.
dialogue_tracker.char_4009_irene_CN_001: All my tasks must relate to the sea or Iberia. Huh? You have too much work? Okay, I'll make some time to help you out.
dialogue_tracker.char_4009_irene_CN_002: I have to get back to my handcannon practice once I'm done with my work here. Rhodes Island has shooting lessons? No, I'll pass. An inquisitor's handcannon isn't your normal firearm. It's not better aim you need to fully master it. It's an indomitable will.
dialogue_tracker.char_4009_irene_CN_003: It's been bugging me, so I really have to ask. Is Skadi like that when she talks to you, too? Like... Does she always say only the bare minimum, nothing more? Huh? No? She's actually very sentimental? Wait, are we really talking about the same Ægir?
dialogue_tracker.char_4009_irene_CN_004: I make the other Iberian Operators nervous? To fear the Inquisition is to fear the law. Isn't that only natural? Unless... Some of our Ægirs have their reasons to dodge my gaze. I'll make it clear now. I can't promise I won't fight them.
dialogue_tracker.char_4009_irene_CN_005: 'For Iberia's prosperity, for Iberia's defense, and for Iberia's orderliness and integrity, I shall raise my sword and my light!'—I may not be an Inquisitor anymore, but I know very well that my duty remains the same.
dialogue_tracker.char_4009_irene_CN_006: The scriptures tell us the light of an Inquisitor's lantern is the light of faith within our hearts. It wasn't until I saw my master's last ray of light that I truly understood what this means. When an Inquisitor lays down judgment, her ruling should be based not on law, but instead her own heart.
dialogue_tracker.char_4009_irene_CN_007: Um... Do you have any old Iberian records? Any that can still play? I brought my master's record player... I know it's silly to dwell in our past glory, but I really want to know what Iberians could have been.
dialogue_tracker.char_4009_irene_CN_008: The truth felt like it swallowed me whole when it happened. Was I wavering? Crumbling? Despairing? No, I couldn't feel anything... until I killed another Sea Terror. I finally realized that I fought only because I wanted to live. Isn't that just like Iberia today?
dialogue_tracker.char_4009_irene_CN_009: All I did was sprain my shoulder on my last mission. The bite wound the mission before that's almost all healed up, too. Stop selling me short! I'm pretty jealous of those Ægir hunters power... Hmph forget it! When I get back... Um, you said I could go to the Rhodes Island ball. That's a promise, right?
dialogue_tracker.char_4009_irene_CN_010: We're still in deep water, and you managed to fall asleep in a blink of an eye? It makes me wonder if I should be jealous... Fine, you can have your rest for now. I'll be waiting here.
dialogue_tracker.char_4009_irene_CN_011: Irene, Inquisition Messenger of Iberia. Are you the Doctor of Rhodes Island? It seems the Ægir hunters really trust you... Do show me how special you are as we work together in the future.
dialogue_tracker.char_4009_irene_CN_012: Hm... Are these all your operators? Is it just me or do some of them seem like an actual security risk? Alright, fine. I will try my best to focus on their combat techniques…
dialogue_tracker.char_4009_irene_CN_013: What I need is Rhodes Island's power, not a commendation. But… I mean... this ribbon looks nice… Okay, I'll take it.
dialogue_tracker.char_4009_irene_CN_014: It doesn't matter if Iberia faces ferocious tides or heavy storms. I will never back down, and my blade will never waver again!
dialogue_tracker.char_4009_irene_CN_017: Perfect. I've been very curious to see how Rhodes Island carries out its missions.
dialogue_tracker.char_4009_irene_CN_018: I thought it would be years before I could lead a team alone... I won't disgrace my master.
dialogue_tracker.char_4009_irene_CN_019: Follow my light. Watch out for the tides and mist.
dialogue_tracker.char_4009_irene_CN_020: The most dangerous enemies are usually masters of disguise .
dialogue_tracker.char_4009_irene_CN_021: See the light of my lantern? I'm right here.
dialogue_tracker.char_4009_irene_CN_023: My sword will respond the instant I spot the movement.
dialogue_tracker.char_4009_irene_CN_025: My light will purge the vice!
dialogue_tracker.char_4009_irene_CN_026: My blade will cleave the tides!
dialogue_tracker.char_4009_irene_CN_027: My eyes will find the truth!
dialogue_tracker.char_4009_irene_CN_028: My heart will be the judge.
dialogue_tracker.char_4009_irene_CN_029: The tide still comes in. We can't let our guard down yet. Hm...? I'm smiling? What? Is there a rule that you can't smile after a victory?
dialogue_tracker.char_4009_irene_CN_030: Is this how you command the Ægir hunters too? Seems like the victory that the arrogant doctor promised might actually be plausible.
dialogue_tracker.char_4009_irene_CN_031: Letting even a single enemy slip by could crumble our line of defense! Hurry, give me the order! Let me eliminate the threat!
dialogue_tracker.char_4009_irene_CN_032: An Inquisitor must never yield in the face of evil! But I also made a promise to my master. I can't die here. Not yet.
dialogue_tracker.char_4009_irene_CN_033: You have a pretty big ship here, but it's not nearly as roomy as an old Iberian flagship.
dialogue_tracker.char_4009_irene_CN_036: Didn't you promise to show me around? If you were going to disappear the moment things got busy, you could've asked me to help.
dialogue_tracker.char_4009_irene_CN_038: New Year's already? The tides draw even closer to us now. Sorry, it's hard not to think about that. On the flipside, we can count ourselves lucky for being able to walk the lands this upcoming year, can't we?
dialogue_tracker.char_4009_irene_CN_042: Doctor, there's new movement on the tides. We need to talk.
dialogue_tracker.char_4009_irene_CN_043: Happy Birthday, Dr. {@nickname}. Because of the situation in Iberia, I've never had the breathing room to celebrate someone's birthday, but you gave me this moment of reprieve, and I have to put it to good use. Here, pick your favorite piece of music. We'll start with that.
dialogue_tracker.char_4009_irene_CN_044: You want to cure Oripathy? After I saw for myself what Iberia... No, after I realized the threat the sea poses to us all, I started to think... it may not be all that unrealistic.
dialogue_tracker.char_400_weedy_CN_001: Doctor, you've managed to keep your room clean. Not bad.
dialogue_tracker.char_400_weedy_CN_002: Water is the core ingredient of life. I've talked to Miss Closure about improving Rhodes Island's water purification system. I hope that my research can be of help... so I don't have to worry about the water being dirty anymore.
dialogue_tracker.char_400_weedy_CN_003: This is Leaf, a Bionic Seadragon that I produced from a prototype design passed across my family. In addition to auxiliary combat functions, he helps out a lot in my daily life, such as pouring water, lifting heavy things, and so on.
dialogue_tracker.char_400_weedy_CN_004: Glaucus and I agreed that we'd conduct our automation engineering experiment at about this time. Doctor, if you're interested, want to come take a look?
dialogue_tracker.char_400_weedy_CN_005: These reserve water cannons were originally made for industrial usage. In addition to shooting pressurized water, they can also release high-temperature steam. Please don't touch them haphazardly; they're not like Closure's little buggies.
dialogue_tracker.char_400_weedy_CN_006: These high-level combat data materials are based upon my own summaries of the combat situation. Doctor, please read them carefully for the sake of future battles. After that, there are a few operation-related experiments I'd like to perfect that I will need your help on. I trust that you won't turn me down?
dialogue_tracker.char_400_weedy_CN_007: I occasionally go to Perfumer's Convalescence Garden to relax. The aroma there can really wash all your stress away, and it's a very effective way of relieving the fatigue from research. Doctor, how about we head there together and give it a try next time?
dialogue_tracker.char_400_weedy_CN_008: I definitely do not talk to my Bionic Seadragons when I'm alone! I only gave him a name to help distinguish him more easily!
dialogue_tracker.char_400_weedy_CN_009: Thanks to your compassion, I've recently become more accustomed to having you around, Doctor. And apart from Glaucus and some other research colleagues, I can't say that about many people.
dialogue_tracker.char_400_weedy_CN_011: Hello, I'm Weedy from Rhodes Island's Engineering Department. I've heard of your name a long time ago, so I hope we'll have a productive relationship from now on. Ah, if you want to shake hands, please use your gloved right hand.
dialogue_tracker.char_400_weedy_CN_012: Hmm, I didn't expect these to be this helpful.
dialogue_tracker.char_400_weedy_CN_013: After my promotion, can I get another upgrade to my personal room?
dialogue_tracker.char_400_weedy_CN_014: Thank you for acknowledging someone as frail as I am, Doctor. I'll continue to work hard for the sake of Rhodes Island.
dialogue_tracker.char_400_weedy_CN_020: Everything is as we planned. To battle!
