dialogue_tracker.char_4177_brigid_CN_005: Hmm, there's this legend about changelings: the Dead swappin' wee ones who'd end up as wakemen, stuck guardin' ruins their whole life. But I know Nemos' not like that. Born in the ruins, she up and scarpered off; became a wakewoman and then chucked it all in. These legends? Nothin' more than tall tales, when it comes down to it.
dialogue_tracker.char_4177_brigid_CN_006: To forge this blade, I ground some burdenbeast bone on a metal crab shell dusted with lime powder. Next, I set the blade in the polished handle, grippin' it tight, even when I slept, to knit the bone and iron together. Then I Spun the knife 'round to mark me path, and just like that, I bid me clan farewell. Once I die, this knife'll guide me home.
dialogue_tracker.char_4177_brigid_CN_007: Got a letter back for you, Doc! Feels mighty strange saying that. When I wasn't helpin' Nemos, I'd be tearin' about warnin' folk of Catastrophe, maybe deliverin' some final letters along the way. Other Catastrophe Messengers are like bridges, but me? I'm more like a stone you hurl with all your might.
dialogue_tracker.char_4177_brigid_CN_008: The rope I got you's all tangled up? Odd that, it's slick with beastoil... Alright, here's the trick: first, loosen the twists, find the longest strand, lift and stretch it open 'till it makes a hole, slip your wrist through, then give the rope a good tug outwards. Tada! Got you tied up tight as a drum!
dialogue_tracker.char_4177_brigid_CN_009: I know how to use comm devices, and I keep one on me always. If I don't answer while I'm out, means I'm too busy. But Doc, if you've got need for me, or just want a look-see, stand up on deck and call my name. The wind'll carry your voice to me, faster than any device.
dialogue_tracker.char_4177_brigid_CN_010: No bonfires to watch here... Think I could draw a me on the wall to keep the Doc company?
dialogue_tracker.char_4177_brigid_CN_011: I'm a—Err, what's the word again? Catastrophe Messenger, right. Call me Brigid. Sorry, got a letter here for the Doctor of Rhodes Island. Know anyone by that name?
dialogue_tracker.char_4177_brigid_CN_012: Can we bring these up on deck, watch them outdoors?
dialogue_tracker.char_4177_brigid_CN_013: I've helped deliver a few of these bits of metal before, but the recipients always cried. Emm… since it's a happy moment here, those must've been tears of joy, surely?
dialogue_tracker.char_4177_brigid_CN_014: If you keep pinnin' these metal trinkets on me, I'll run out of space on my shirt... But I've no mind to trade 'em away neither. Would you be willin' to keep 'em safe for me, Doc?
dialogue_tracker.char_4177_brigid_CN_017: Got me knives polished, when're we headin' off?
dialogue_tracker.char_4177_brigid_CN_018: Like heading off into battle, yeah?
dialogue_tracker.char_4177_brigid_CN_019: I think we ought to run there, personally.
dialogue_tracker.char_4177_brigid_CN_020: Alright, time to focus! Can't let the quarry go!
dialogue_tracker.char_4177_brigid_CN_021: Need me to have an ambush set?
dialogue_tracker.char_4177_brigid_CN_022: Just tell me where to go.
dialogue_tracker.char_4177_brigid_CN_023: Just so you know, this here's a knife, not a boomerang!
dialogue_tracker.char_4177_brigid_CN_024: Weather not looking too good? No mind, my knife'll slice clean through the fog.
dialogue_tracker.char_4177_brigid_CN_025: I'll chase you to the ends of Tara and back.
dialogue_tracker.char_4177_brigid_CN_027: You gotta flick your wrist, just like that!
dialogue_tracker.char_4177_brigid_CN_028: I've been here too long. Let's wrap things up.
dialogue_tracker.char_4177_brigid_CN_029: Men or beasts, they run all the same, eh?
dialogue_tracker.char_4177_brigid_CN_031: Didn't it turn out grand? Let's go, I'll roast up some meat for you!
dialogue_tracker.char_4177_brigid_CN_032: Does victory wander like a burdenbeast?
dialogue_tracker.char_4177_brigid_CN_033: Like I could reach out and touch the ceiling, same as Na Saoirsí.
dialogue_tracker.char_4177_brigid_CN_034: Hmm? Wouldn't be pushing me like that, Doc, gotta put your back into it!
dialogue_tracker.char_4177_brigid_CN_036: Fancy how the hair on my tail curls up?
dialogue_tracker.char_4177_brigid_CN_038: 'On the eleventh knell of the bell, carve a Trinity Knot rune onto a stone. The comin' year's bad luck will go into the stone, leavin' you with a bright and breezy future.' Some of the legends teach ancient wisdom, guidin' people towards better lives. I practice it every year. Go on, give it a try, Doc.
dialogue_tracker.char_4177_brigid_CN_042: You should really walk more often, Doc.
dialogue_tracker.char_4177_brigid_CN_043: Back in me clan, birthdays always mean green cheese made from cystymilk. A bite of this cheese is like eatin' the moons themselves, so when night falls, your fire—your very soul—won't be snuffed out by the twin moons' gaze. So come on, Doctor, I made it with me own two hands!
dialogue_tracker.char_4177_brigid_CN_044: If I had never come here, I might never have known there were such wide open spaces beyond Tara. Though life aboard the landship's real interesting and all, I still much prefer to get me own two feet movin’. Afore my fire burns out, I'll keep runnin' and runnin', just like I did back in Na Saoirsí.
dialogue_tracker.char_4178_alanna_CN_001: I've done a few accident writeups before, but this lot's important. Reckon you'd better check them for yourself. I don't skive off, do I? I've changed these bulbs here. How's that? Makes reading clearer now, right?
dialogue_tracker.char_4178_alanna_CN_002: Doin' delivery in the outback takes a lotta guts, but even the toughest truckie's got things they avoid, like those metal crabs poking holes in your tires. Me? Since I joined Rhodes Island and quit driving, it's none of my business. Speaking of which, I saw a broad here's keeping those crabbies as pets!
dialogue_tracker.char_4178_alanna_CN_003: It's kinda stuffy in here, reckon I should crack a window? Ever wondered why truckies hang their arm out? Comfort, sure, but also cos the wind tells stories. Sounds iffy? Thunderstorm's on its way—wanna bet on it?
dialogue_tracker.char_4178_alanna_CN_004: This gizmo goes everywhere with me. Designed it myself, still a work in progress. I was set on 'Nutty' for a name, but Potlid's not a fan. You're better at this stuff than I am, got any ideas?
dialogue_tracker.char_4178_alanna_CN_005: Give us a spin, Nutty! Take a gander, there's a tire repair kit, a jack, and a remote-controlled spray gun! Nutty can solve anything you throw at it. Huh? What if there's no vehicle? Ah, I was considering installing an engine…
dialogue_tracker.char_4178_alanna_CN_006: Looking for me? Didn't go far, just popped to Engineering for a tick. Closure's been promising to upgrade Nutty's voice module, but she's always busy. Thought I'd swing by and see if I could lend a hand. Cause trouble? Not likely!
dialogue_tracker.char_4178_alanna_CN_007: Wouldn't believe I was a miner once, would you? Wasn't for long, but the feeling lingers. One swing of the pickaxe, and you're gamblin' with a cave-in or a strike—pure luck. Luck's not fair, and you sure can't count on it, but sometimes it's all you got.
dialogue_tracker.char_4178_alanna_CN_008: Wanna tuck into my lunchbox? Yeah, it's Potlid's cooking! Got a good nose on you, huh? I was coughin' so much last week she's been seeing to it that I get pear stew every day. Who's the kid now, right? She's so mature, makes me feel bad. You get moments like that too, Doctor?
dialogue_tracker.char_4178_alanna_CN_009: Autumn and winter mornings bring a pea soup fog to the road. All I could do was switch on the fog lamps and push on through. Was only when my ute got out of the fog that I could wipe the sweat off and check that Potlid was still asleep. Lucky? I reckon so.
dialogue_tracker.char_4178_alanna_CN_010: Sleep tight, I got your back.
dialogue_tracker.char_4178_alanna_CN_011: Doctor, just call me Lanns like before! Sure, I'm on a break from the outback, but I brought my tradie skills with me. See, here's my Artificer creds. Intern? Huh! Becomin' fully fledged is just a matter of time.
dialogue_tracker.char_4178_alanna_CN_012: Frame rate's stable, colors are real vibrant too. Crazy good display tech you got here… Huh? Combat skills? Oh, I know how to sneak up on someone and whack the daylight's outta them!
dialogue_tracker.char_4178_alanna_CN_013: A promotion already? Feels like I just finished up my intern days! Hah, I getcha, Doctor. I'll keep at it, maintenance and combat both.
dialogue_tracker.char_4178_alanna_CN_014: You taught me a loose screw can cost a war. I might not really see how it goes down like that, but I'll make sure every single screw is tightened down. This sort of work? You can count on me, Doctor.
dialogue_tracker.char_4178_alanna_CN_017: No wukkas. I'm Alanna of the Barrenlands after all. What's that mean? You'll know soon enough.
dialogue_tracker.char_4178_alanna_CN_018: I'll take the wheel, you take a breather.
dialogue_tracker.char_4178_alanna_CN_019: Hold on tight now, things might get rough.
dialogue_tracker.char_4178_alanna_CN_024: Dang it, sprained my leg—Just joshing, mate.
dialogue_tracker.char_4178_alanna_CN_027: Think you can dodge this next trick? Wanna bet?
dialogue_tracker.char_4178_alanna_CN_029: That was rough, Doctor! I thought you'd got yourself winded again.
dialogue_tracker.char_4178_alanna_CN_030: All in one go! Good load of combat data this time, too. Thanks heaps, Doctor.
dialogue_tracker.char_4178_alanna_CN_031: We did pretty good already, so just let them go, yeah?
dialogue_tracker.char_4178_alanna_CN_032: Come on, make a run for it!
dialogue_tracker.char_4178_alanna_CN_033: Don't know if I can have a snooze here without all the clinkin' an' clankin' around me.
dialogue_tracker.char_4178_alanna_CN_034: Alright, what are we betting on this time?
dialogue_tracker.char_4178_alanna_CN_036: Take a squiz at this electric welding torch I just got! Wanna give it a go? Slow down, goggles on first.
dialogue_tracker.char_4178_alanna_CN_038: Fancy a bevvy, Doctor? We got a tradition of drinkin' ourselves silly on New Year's Eve. I can deadset leave a whole bunch of truckies legless... Huh? Drunk drivin's bad? Nah, this ain't beer, it's carrot soda!
dialogue_tracker.char_4178_alanna_CN_042: Doctor, lemme know if you wanna go for a ride, yeah?
dialogue_tracker.char_4178_alanna_CN_043: There're so many days in a year, you gotta save one for yourself. Even the most hardworking diggers can't stay down in the mines all the time, right? So, let's get you out of your office. I'll even take you out for a spin after your birthday party's over, how 'bout it?
dialogue_tracker.char_4178_alanna_CN_044: When we'd just arrived here, I told Warmy Rhodes Island was like a big big transport. She was really excited when she said 'So the Doctor's just like you, a truckie at the steering wheel!' Haha, she's not wrong there. Your work decides the direction Rhodes Island sails, Doctor. Well done, mate.
dialogue_tracker.char_4179_monstr_CN_001: Don't worry, this is all routine work. I've reviewed the correct process numerous times. Now... how do I edit these permission logs again?
dialogue_tracker.char_4179_monstr_CN_002: Yes, I declined Dr. Warfarin's request to perform a scientific examination on you, as per Kal'tsit's instructions. She wants to study me too? It's worth considering... She could assist with analyzing the knowledge and memories I've acquired. I know what she wants, and our goals are aligned.
dialogue_tracker.char_4179_monstr_CN_003: I'm getting used to speaking plainly with the operators, Doctor. They've been cooperating with my check-up requests, and I'm addressing their concerns as Kal'tsit would, in the ways they're accustomed to. Our coordination has become increasingly seamless. Oh? There's been a steep drop in Medical appointments?
dialogue_tracker.char_4179_monstr_CN_004: Why abandon a more efficient, more robust form? Why would I prefer others not fear me? I never considered this before. I made an unconscious decision the moment I awakened. Hey, are you done staring? I can still easily string you up— Huh, you're saying this is what she meant by 'humanity'?
dialogue_tracker.char_4179_monstr_CN_005: Amiya's gone to chair the elite operators' meeting. Hmm... She now appears much taller than I remember... how odd. I'd like to spend more time with her, Doctor, but I find myself feeling rather anxious— We can go together? That's a great idea! Err, I mean, a sensible suggestion.
dialogue_tracker.char_4179_monstr_CN_006: The anti-Originium communication lines have been destroyed; unable to confirm your receipt of this transmission. The Crystal Activity Index continues to surge, and I've observed its escape from the void. Meltdown protocols initiated. I will eliminate all interceptors. Find her... and Kal'tsit.
dialogue_tracker.char_4179_monstr_CN_007: 'Protect the Doctor. Protect Amiya.' This directive indeed holds the highest priority in my core behavioral protocols, but this doesn't mean I am compelled to execute it. Protecting you is my own choice— And definitely not because I'm trying to trick you into dealing with an angry Closure!
dialogue_tracker.char_4179_monstr_CN_008: Projekt Red likes to curl up and rest by my side, while Folinic always sweetly helps me with things I've overlooked. How should I respond to the way they look at me, Doctor? How did Kal'tsit first learn to love...? I do wish I could hold her once more.
dialogue_tracker.char_4179_monstr_CN_009: It was the end Kal'tsit had long anticipated. She prepared well, and faced it with composure. She loathed idle speculation about the future, and just the same refused to dwell on the past. 'Keep going.' I believe that is the only message she would have left us, Doctor. We should just keep moving forward.
dialogue_tracker.char_4179_monstr_CN_010: Wanna hear some stories about Kal'tsit? The kind she'd never tell anyone.
dialogue_tracker.char_4179_monstr_CN_011: Leave my file here in the Medical Department, Doctor. Like Kal'tsit said, this is the core where Rhodes Island addresses critical challenges, and my knowledge is crucial. Now, let me concentrate on accomplishing my mission.
dialogue_tracker.char_4179_monstr_CN_013: She ended our cycle of reincarnation, granting me freedom and eternal life... and loneliness. Yet I cherish it, Doctor. It reminds me of what I have lost.
dialogue_tracker.char_4179_monstr_CN_014: So long as a spark of hope for life remains, the unending cycle of despair cannot shake me. Not even Originium may force my life into stasis, Doctor. AMa-10 has shattered the fate predetermined at her inception.
dialogue_tracker.char_4179_monstr_CN_017: When necessary, you'll see a more familiar side of me.
dialogue_tracker.char_4179_monstr_CN_018: Do not worry, I've fully mastered the art of tactical command. Don't fear injury, I guarantee you'll make it out alive.
dialogue_tracker.char_4179_monstr_CN_019: Make certain my claws don't scratch you!
dialogue_tracker.char_4179_monstr_CN_020: Enemy engaged. Let's end this quickly.
dialogue_tracker.char_4179_monstr_CN_026: My talons shall be my stethoscope.
dialogue_tracker.char_4179_monstr_CN_027: This may sting a little. Just bear with it.
dialogue_tracker.char_4179_monstr_CN_028: Ahem, sorry, I used too much force…
dialogue_tracker.char_4179_monstr_CN_029: Some cut-to-the-chase commanding. Promise me you'll deploy me closer to the enemy next time, Doctor. I'll try some more efficient techniques.
dialogue_tracker.char_4179_monstr_CN_030: Wait a moment, I need to collect tissue samples.
dialogue_tracker.char_4179_monstr_CN_031: I'm fine, I already learned how to heal myself. Leave the cleanup to me. You don't want to see what comes next.
dialogue_tracker.char_4179_monstr_CN_032: Stop struggling! You always liked it when I had to carry you during a retreat, didn't you?
dialogue_tracker.char_4179_monstr_CN_033: No priestly eyes on me now, right?
dialogue_tracker.char_4179_monstr_CN_034: Hee hee, did I scare you?
dialogue_tracker.char_4179_monstr_CN_036: I'm getting used to my work and responsibilities as quickly as I can. I will be ready for our reunion.
dialogue_tracker.char_4179_monstr_CN_038: A new year, and you're still punctual as ever. That means the season's first scientific exam will be your reward— You didn't come to Medical for an appointment? Oh, is this... a present for me?
dialogue_tracker.char_4179_monstr_CN_043: Birthdays are special for us. We can't say for certain when our lives started. But at the very least, you have your answer deep within... This gift… Kal'tsit hesitated for too long, and never got to give it to you. Happy birthday.
dialogue_tracker.char_4179_monstr_CN_044: You are reminiscing about the old Rhodes Island—about all the tragic destruction we witnessed, about the happy reunions we celebrated. But no matter how time wears away our precious memories, the ark beneath our feet will press ahead on its course across the lands. Come, Doctor. Everyone's waiting for you.
dialogue_tracker.char_4182_oblvns_CN_001: 你的决策思路很值得参考，我想在你身边多观察你的言行举止。
dialogue_tracker.char_4182_oblvns_CN_002: 罗德岛的工作制度的确值得称赞，灵活的日程安排、合理的考核标准、明晰的上升渠道，真是让人羡慕啊......为什么我会了解这么多？没、没什么，我从家人那里学到过一些罢了。
dialogue_tracker.char_4182_oblvns_CN_003: 我知道——这个叫“自助饮料机”，对吧？把各种饮品混合起来，会变得意外地美味呢。
dialogue_tracker.char_4182_oblvns_CN_004: Ave Mujica是支坚如磐石的乐队，的确，我们之间会偶有争论，但这都是为了让我们的乐队更加优秀。
dialogue_tracker.char_4182_oblvns_CN_005: 那个梦的记忆在逐渐变淡，终有一天，我会彻底忘记它......不，博士，我并不觉得可惜。我很明白，那是我不可能拥有的人生......那样的美梦，只要做过一次就好。
dialogue_tracker.char_4182_oblvns_CN_006: 在罗德岛的这段时间，让我对泰拉有了新的认识......这片大地上许多人的遭遇远比我们看到的更为艰难。博士，我会带着这份感悟，创作出更加直击人心的乐曲。
dialogue_tracker.char_4182_oblvns_CN_007: 来罗德岛之前，我就做过一个在这里生活和工作的梦，现在回想起来，梦里的一切仍旧很清晰。到这里后，跟红豆小姐初次打招呼时，我还感到了一丝落寞。呵呵，博士，可以帮我保守这个秘密吗？
dialogue_tracker.char_4182_oblvns_CN_008: 博士，这就是我跟你说过的甲板上的那个位置！在这里放声大喊会让人的心情格外舒畅！我先做个示范，待会博士要不要一起试试看？那我就开始了——
dialogue_tracker.char_4182_oblvns_CN_009: 这个洋娃娃？这是贝娜小姐送给我的。嘿嘿，只要有它在身边，心里就会感到温暖，就好像一直有人陪在我旁边一样。
dialogue_tracker.char_4182_oblvns_CN_010: 适当地休息才能更好地达成目标。在Ave Mujica成立初期，我也常熬夜工作到很晚，直到被初华提醒，我才明白了这个道理。“这样有害健康！”——她当时是这么对我说的。
dialogue_tracker.char_4182_oblvns_CN_011: 我是Ave Mujica的oblivionis，丰川祥子。在我们找到回去的方法前，还请多多关照。
dialogue_tracker.char_4182_oblvns_CN_012: 我们以后的行动也会被记录到录像里吗？
dialogue_tracker.char_4182_oblvns_CN_013: 比起其他小队的队长，我还有很多地方需要改进......我会努力跟上大家的脚步。
dialogue_tracker.char_4182_oblvns_CN_014: 更多认可代表着要承担更多的责任，我想，我准备好了。
dialogue_tracker.char_4182_oblvns_CN_017: 这也是考验团队默契的时刻，对吧？
dialogue_tracker.char_4182_oblvns_CN_018: 我会带领队伍完成任务，一如既往。
dialogue_tracker.char_4182_oblvns_CN_019: 让我们开始吧，今夜的假面舞会。
dialogue_tracker.char_4182_oblvns_CN_021: 你我现在的判断应该是一致的。
dialogue_tracker.char_4182_oblvns_CN_022: 请立刻告诉我你的决定。
dialogue_tracker.char_4182_oblvns_CN_025: 人偶获得了暂时的生命。
dialogue_tracker.char_4182_oblvns_CN_027: 如此这样，你也希望寻求慰藉吗？
dialogue_tracker.char_4182_oblvns_CN_028: 这座黄昏的乐园，由我君临。
dialogue_tracker.char_4182_oblvns_CN_029: 刚才的战术真是令人印象深刻，这场胜利也是你刻意准备的惊喜吗？
dialogue_tracker.char_4182_oblvns_CN_030: 精彩的作战——大家都辛苦了。
dialogue_tracker.char_4182_oblvns_CN_033: 真是干净整洁的地方，一看就知道是被精心维护的。
dialogue_tracker.char_4182_oblvns_CN_038: 我刚在训练场，突然听见外面一阵阵欢呼......这是我新年的第一句问候——新年快乐，博士。
dialogue_tracker.char_4182_oblvns_CN_042: 贵安，博士。今晚我们会举办一场化装舞会，为您预留了贵宾席位。如果您方便的话，欢迎前来参加。
dialogue_tracker.char_4182_oblvns_CN_043: 祝你生日快乐——这是我很小的时候学的钢琴曲，刚学会它时，我每天都乐此不疲地演奏它......甚至让母亲感到了困扰。
dialogue_tracker.char_4182_oblvns_CN_044: 很荣幸能和你一起见证这个特殊的日子。这段时间里，看见大家为一个共同的目标而努力，这样的感觉真好。
dialogue_tracker.char_4183_mortis_CN_001: 没什么事的话……我会在这里安静待着。
dialogue_tracker.char_4183_mortis_CN_002: 我是什么时候出现的？在你进入活动室之前，我就在了......
dialogue_tracker.char_4183_mortis_CN_004: 希望我弹吉他吗？知道了。
dialogue_tracker.char_4183_mortis_CN_005: 这是调香师小姐给我的香水。葛罗莉亚也在用的。
dialogue_tracker.char_4183_mortis_CN_006: 嘿嘿……回应了大家的期待的感觉，还不坏。
dialogue_tracker.char_4183_mortis_CN_007: 即使是博士你，也会有犹豫不决的时候吗？我也经常这样......
dialogue_tracker.char_4183_mortis_CN_008: 祥说过，我们都是“一丘之貉”……
dialogue_tracker.char_4183_mortis_CN_009: 这里，谁都不认识森南和阿隆……
dialogue_tracker.char_4183_mortis_CN_012: 我看得出来，这些不是表演，它们真的死掉了。
dialogue_tracker.char_4183_mortis_CN_013: 还需要，更加努力地练习……
dialogue_tracker.char_4183_mortis_CN_026: 这些敌人也没有那么恐怖。
dialogue_tracker.char_4183_mortis_CN_038: 刚才我在舞台上参加了表演。不，并不是Ave Mujica的演出，是罗德岛大家一起的戏剧。扮演了一棵树。
dialogue_tracker.char_4183_mortis_CN_042: 博士。昨晚我没做噩梦，您呢？
dialogue_tracker.char_4183_mortis_CN_044: 外面很热闹，你不去加入他们吗？你就在这里？......好的。
dialogue_tracker.char_4184_dolris_CN_001: 在Ave Mujica时，一直都是海铃帮我们做这些工作。现在我也该学会自己安排行程了。
dialogue_tracker.char_4184_dolris_CN_002: 最近，我会和星极小姐约在甲板上观察星空。泰拉的星空和我熟悉的很不一样，我尝试向她介绍我所知的星象理论，她也十分感兴趣。
dialogue_tracker.char_4184_dolris_CN_003: 作词的方法吗......？博士，请不要看我的终端！
dialogue_tracker.char_4184_dolris_CN_004: 我有时会戴墨镜和帽子？是以前养成的习惯啦——人出名以后，要注意的事情也变多了......这么说起来，博士你在泰拉应该也很出名？呵呵，不然为什么你走到哪都戴着兜帽呢？
dialogue_tracker.char_4184_dolris_CN_005: 空小姐本人就和她的演出一样，始终让人感到温暖和坚强。我也希望大家能从我的歌声中听到这些。
dialogue_tracker.char_4184_dolris_CN_006: 比起战斗，我还是更希望用音乐去治愈大家。但是我也知道，只有足够强大，才能更好地站在祥子身边。不论是在泰拉，还是在我的世界，我都会继续努力。
dialogue_tracker.char_4184_dolris_CN_007: 自从来到这里，与大家在一起的时间就变多了。每天处理完工作，约上其他成员一起去排练室练习——真的就像参加社团活动一样呢。
dialogue_tracker.char_4184_dolris_CN_008: 小祥一直把Ave Mujica视若珍宝，我想要守护好她创造的世界观。之后，我也会作为主唱，为展现Ave Mujica的世界观而努力。
dialogue_tracker.char_4184_dolris_CN_009: 去到一个陌生的地方，重新认识一群人，我有过类似经历，也深知这并非易事。但现在，尽管我对这艘舰船还知之甚少，我依然想要和大家建立更多联系。博士，这就是你说的“信任”吧。
dialogue_tracker.char_4184_dolris_CN_010: 等博士醒来的时间里，帮博士泡杯咖啡吧。
dialogue_tracker.char_4184_dolris_CN_011: 你好，我叫三角......初华。欸，小祥已经和你介绍过了？！她、她是怎么介绍我的？
dialogue_tracker.char_4184_dolris_CN_012: ......这些都是真实的作战记录吗？
dialogue_tracker.char_4184_dolris_CN_013: 罗德岛的训练计划很完善，我能感觉到自己的身体素质越来越好了，今后应对演出肯定会更加轻松。
dialogue_tracker.char_4184_dolris_CN_014: 我随时都可能回去，你这样信任我，还投入这么多资源，真的好吗？......明白了，我一定会回应你的期待。
dialogue_tracker.char_4184_dolris_CN_017: 我会在队伍的最前方，尽我所能引导大家。
dialogue_tracker.char_4184_dolris_CN_018: 我还没有什么指引他人的经验，但是我会努力以身作则！
dialogue_tracker.char_4184_dolris_CN_020: 只要不松懈大意，我们一定能获得胜利！
dialogue_tracker.char_4184_dolris_CN_023: 为你们的终幕......唱响挽歌。
dialogue_tracker.char_4184_dolris_CN_024: 为我们的胜利......献上赞歌。
dialogue_tracker.char_4184_dolris_CN_026: 我会保护小祥，保护所有人！
dialogue_tracker.char_4184_dolris_CN_029: 回去洗个热水澡，放点舒缓的音乐，好好休息一下吧。
dialogue_tracker.char_4184_dolris_CN_030: 大家的配合越来越有默契了！
dialogue_tracker.char_4184_dolris_CN_032: 没关系的，我会......一直陪在你的身边。
dialogue_tracker.char_4184_dolris_CN_034: 稍等，我先把吉他放好......久等了，你找我有什么事，博士？
dialogue_tracker.char_4184_dolris_CN_036: 博士，想一起去看看星空吗？
dialogue_tracker.char_4184_dolris_CN_038: 在我的世界，新年时每个人都会许愿祈福，就像这样——双手合十，闭上眼睛......不妨这样试试吧，博士的祈愿也一定能成真的。
dialogue_tracker.char_4184_dolris_CN_042: 博士，我正好在泡咖啡，你也来一杯吗？
dialogue_tracker.char_4184_dolris_CN_043: 博士，生日快乐！这份磁带里存着几首曲子，是我们为了罗德岛的大家和博士你创作的新作品，所以它们属于这里。就算有天我们回去了，希望这些歌还能陪伴在你的身边。
dialogue_tracker.char_4184_dolris_CN_044: 最开始来这里时，我常怀疑自己能做的会不会太有限。但罗德岛是个特别温暖的地方，无论什么想法都能得到理解，任何人都能在此找到自己的位置——所以，我也能坦然地说自己是罗德岛的一员了。
dialogue_tracker.char_4185_amoris_CN_001: 啊，博士，有什么需要我来做的？
dialogue_tracker.char_4185_amoris_CN_002: 呜哇，真厉害！在这里拍摄Vlog的话，播放量肯定能猛涨吧！不不不，我不会真的这样做的。
dialogue_tracker.char_4185_amoris_CN_003: 我现在有~一点~点忙呢，有什么事的话稍后再说吧~
dialogue_tracker.char_4185_amoris_CN_004: 罗德岛上也有形形色色的干员呢~大家都有着各自的理想和厉害的地方，真有意思，迫不及待想要跟大家多聊聊呢。
dialogue_tracker.char_4185_amoris_CN_005: 嗯？喵姆亲每天的自主练习？对啊，为了梦想付出一切努力，这不是理所当然的吗？
dialogue_tracker.char_4185_amoris_CN_006: 想让喵姆亲做更多的工作，需要另外支付报酬哟。呀，开玩笑的开玩笑的，为了报答博士和小阿米娅的信任，喵姆亲当然会努力工作啦~
dialogue_tracker.char_4185_amoris_CN_007: 哦哦~罗德岛上有好多可爱的干员，真想拍一期给她们化妆的Vlog，肯定能收获大量的热度！
dialogue_tracker.char_4185_amoris_CN_008: 医疗部有好多孩子已经成了喵姆亲的粉丝~这样喵姆亲不去给他们一些回馈都不行了。
dialogue_tracker.char_4185_amoris_CN_009: 我最近也开始觉得，与其不择手段地朝着目标孤军奋战，偶尔稍稍绕绕远路也不是什么坏事。大概是受到了罗德岛的大家的影响吧？
dialogue_tracker.char_4185_amoris_CN_010: 嗯，博士睡着了吗？机会难得，我来恶作剧了哦？开个玩笑~
dialogue_tracker.char_4185_amoris_CN_011: 你好~喵姆喵姆~喵姆亲来报到啦。请多指教~
dialogue_tracker.char_4185_amoris_CN_012: 太好了~♪喵姆亲还能继续进化~
dialogue_tracker.char_4185_amoris_CN_013: 怎么样，要变成喵姆亲的粉丝了吗？
dialogue_tracker.char_4185_amoris_CN_014: 嗯嗯，我表现得不错吧？多赞美一下我也没关系哦~
dialogue_tracker.char_4185_amoris_CN_018: 呃，要我来做指挥吗？祥子才更适合吧。
dialogue_tracker.char_4185_amoris_CN_025: 来见识一下我的实力吧！
dialogue_tracker.char_4185_amoris_CN_029: 哦哦~我们一起真不赖啊~！
dialogue_tracker.char_4185_amoris_CN_030: 完美的胜利！接下来应该是庆功宴了吧！
dialogue_tracker.char_4185_amoris_CN_032: 比起只是沮丧着什么都不做，还是想想问题出在哪里吧。
dialogue_tracker.char_4185_amoris_CN_033: 呀~罗德岛居然有这么华丽的地方啊！
dialogue_tracker.char_4185_amoris_CN_038: 新年快乐！对我来说，新的一年依然要向前迈进才行，博士也一样！
dialogue_tracker.char_4185_amoris_CN_043: 生日快乐！这是给博士的生日礼物！我已经开始期待了，到喵姆亲的生日那天，博士会送我怎样的礼物呢~
dialogue_tracker.char_4185_amoris_CN_044: 嗯嗯，在这段时间里喵姆亲肯定给罗德岛带来了很多的朝气吧！博士是不是需要好好感谢我？
dialogue_tracker.char_4186_tmoris_CN_001: 这部分的工作应该已经处理好了，博士，有什么问题吗？
dialogue_tracker.char_4186_tmoris_CN_002: 罗德岛的干员们看起来都十分强大且个性十足，但是干员之间却少有冲突，都能彼此真诚相待，真是让人意想不到。
dialogue_tracker.char_4186_tmoris_CN_003: 红豆的吉他也弹得不错啊，她还邀请我去参观她的乐队表演。嗯，我很有兴趣。
dialogue_tracker.char_4186_tmoris_CN_004: 博士请放心，我不会因为忙于工作而让自己的身体状态变差。我的休息时间和锻炼时间都已经规划好了，我也给工作留好了足够的缓冲时间。
dialogue_tracker.char_4186_tmoris_CN_005: 我只是做了我理所应当做的事情，既然暂居罗德岛，帮助罗德岛上的大家也无可厚非。
dialogue_tracker.char_4186_tmoris_CN_006: 不愧是罗德岛，一定是阿米娅和博士的真诚感染了大家。我现在相信这里的大家都是真的把彼此当作家人看待了，能为这里出一份力是我的荣幸。
dialogue_tracker.char_4186_tmoris_CN_007: 小刻喜欢吃的蜜饼果然很好吃，吃多少都没问题。
dialogue_tracker.char_4186_tmoris_CN_008: 明明罗德岛上的大家也都有自己的困扰，但还是会毫无保留地帮助彼此，我们因此受了很多人的照顾，尤其是博士你，十分感谢。
dialogue_tracker.char_4186_tmoris_CN_009: 不知不觉好像又有十多个小队需要我去帮忙。不过，我很珍惜在罗德岛的这每一份工作。
dialogue_tracker.char_4186_tmoris_CN_010: 嗯......博士还在忙吗，这盒巧克力奶冻就给博士吧。
dialogue_tracker.char_4186_tmoris_CN_011: 我是八幡海铃，有什么需要我做的吗？
dialogue_tracker.char_4186_tmoris_CN_012: 嗯，果然是高效的手法，我会学习的。
dialogue_tracker.char_4186_tmoris_CN_013: 我只是做了分内的事而已。
dialogue_tracker.char_4186_tmoris_CN_014: 罗德岛的大家愿意接纳和信任我，真是件高兴的事。那么，大家也能回应我的期望吧？
dialogue_tracker.char_4186_tmoris_CN_020: 跟预想的一样，我们上吧。
dialogue_tracker.char_4186_tmoris_CN_031: 勉勉强强，练习量还不够啊。
dialogue_tracker.char_4186_tmoris_CN_032: 快走吧，我们不能放弃任何一个人。
dialogue_tracker.char_4186_tmoris_CN_033: 哦，这里就是自由活动的房间吗，请问训练室在哪里？
dialogue_tracker.char_4186_tmoris_CN_038: 你好博士，新年快乐，今后也请你多多关照。
dialogue_tracker.char_4186_tmoris_CN_042: 你好，博士，要一起去练习吗？
dialogue_tracker.char_4186_tmoris_CN_043: 博士，我终于找到你了。生日快乐，这是我给你买的蛋糕和礼物。这家店的蛋糕的口味我已经亲自确认过了，非常美味。
dialogue_tracker.char_4186_tmoris_CN_044: 在罗德岛的经历，让我慢慢变得不再害怕向身边的人表露自己的真实想法。谢谢你，博士。
dialogue_tracker.char_4187_graceb_CN_001: I'm sorry, Doctor. This girl's sick today and nobody's to take care of her, so I brought her along. She's quiet and really well-behaved. Besides, she can fold a paper napkin into a lily. Dear, why don't you give the Doctor these flowers? You'd make the Doctor very happy.
dialogue_tracker.char_4187_graceb_CN_002: Come out! I can see you, you know—oh, Doctor! I'm so sorry! I thought you were one of the kids playing hide-and-seek. Why are you hiding in here? Oh, someone is trying to drag you back to work? Well, I don't think this box is big enough for you. I could help you with my tail, if you wanted.
dialogue_tracker.char_4187_graceb_CN_003: Yes, this hymn is an arrangement of a Bolívarian folk song. You can tell? It's quite different from the original. Does it matter, though? Everyone loved it when the arrangement made its way back to Laterano.
dialogue_tracker.char_4187_graceb_CN_004: Why is there an axe behind the saint's statue? Oh, I think I left it there after cleaning up some bandits that got into the abbey. I have to put it away before the children see it. You mean, sacrilege? Of course not. Our Lord would approve, if He knew of the wicked deeds they did.
dialogue_tracker.char_4187_graceb_CN_005: I always knew Laterano well, but it was only when I heard a gravely wounded nun singing hymns on her deathbed, with no trembling in her voice, that the black-and-white image of Laterano turned vibrant, and our Lord's grace dawned on me.
dialogue_tracker.char_4187_graceb_CN_006: The first time I came to Laterano, it had suffered a calamity attack, a broken city filled with broken souls, hardly the image of paradise. Was I shaken? I guess I was, but nobody ever said that faith is only for that which is perfectly flawless.
dialogue_tracker.char_4187_graceb_CN_007: Aurela should not have spoken to you like that. Allow me to apologize on her behalf. She's not easy to get along with, and I wouldn't even call her a good person, but we all need 'bad friends', for the sake of our worst thoughts and emotions, things that I would never show to a good person like you.
dialogue_tracker.char_4187_graceb_CN_008: Let the ancestors' legacies lie forgotten in my mind. It's enough to pick up a few tidbits from time to time as tales to tell the children. What I really want to remember, well, is the excited looks on the children's faces when I talk with them... and the smile on your face right now.
dialogue_tracker.char_4187_graceb_CN_009: What was taken from you? You try your best to suppress the wrath in your heart, but I can still sense it, so intense it could destroy everything. No, I'm not afraid, Doctor. Release it, and it will energize you, pushing you forward, until you take back everything that was yours.
dialogue_tracker.char_4187_graceb_CN_010: Sleep, Doctor. There's a wicked creature out there in the night, clad in feathers and scales, that hunts children who stay up too late, impaling their hearts with its sharp spiked tail. What? You say you know her? I... I just made that up...
dialogue_tracker.char_4187_graceb_CN_011: I am Gracebearer, a nun from Bolívar. Give me your hand, Doctor, and our Lord shall grant you His blessings.
dialogue_tracker.char_4187_graceb_CN_012: They should be more decisive... this will only create complications.
dialogue_tracker.char_4187_graceb_CN_013: Thank you for your generous donation. Your name will be etched into a century-old monument, with that of the abbey's founder.
dialogue_tracker.char_4187_graceb_CN_014: I really appreciate Rhodes Island taking these children in, and away from Bolívar. They deserve some light and warmth at the end of their lives.
dialogue_tracker.char_4187_graceb_CN_017: I would be delighted to join your team, Doctor, but... I'm hoping you will stay away when I'm fighting. Maybe you wouldn't mind it, but to me, you're too good of a person to have to face that.
dialogue_tracker.char_4187_graceb_CN_018: No... don't make me take even more of them, Doctor.
dialogue_tracker.char_4187_graceb_CN_019: I'll come back at the appointed time... or an hour late. I'm Bolívarian, after all.
dialogue_tracker.char_4187_graceb_CN_020: Do not fear. I'm just bringing you to your predetermined end.
dialogue_tracker.char_4187_graceb_CN_021: ...Very well. You have my axe, if you need it.
dialogue_tracker.char_4187_graceb_CN_022: Don't worry, Doctor, I have my axe here.
dialogue_tracker.char_4187_graceb_CN_023: There are certain things I must handle personally.
dialogue_tracker.char_4187_graceb_CN_024: I'm not the one who will regret letting things get to this point.
dialogue_tracker.char_4187_graceb_CN_025: Close your eyes. I don't want to scare you.
dialogue_tracker.char_4187_graceb_CN_026: Cover your ears. This might get loud.
dialogue_tracker.char_4187_graceb_CN_027: No need to scream. It's all over.
dialogue_tracker.char_4187_graceb_CN_028: Shh... it'll be okay. Everything will be okay.
dialogue_tracker.char_4187_graceb_CN_029: I was lucky. I didn't encounter any enemies—the blood on my skirt? Oh, I must have tripped and fallen. Don't worry, it's just a scratch.
dialogue_tracker.char_4187_graceb_CN_030: It's done, Doctor. Let it go.
dialogue_tracker.char_4187_graceb_CN_031: Turn around and find someone else, Doctor... I don't want you to see me covered in blood.
dialogue_tracker.char_4187_graceb_CN_032: Go back. Sleep well. Everything will be alright by the time you wake up in the morning... Go. Back.
dialogue_tracker.char_4187_graceb_CN_033: How did you find me? You followed the singing? I was humming while working alone. You've never heard me sing… Well, one should not sing the same songs alone as with others.
dialogue_tracker.char_4187_graceb_CN_034: Oh, it's you, Doctor. Don't sneak up on me like that again.
dialogue_tracker.char_4187_graceb_CN_036: I sneaked some extra sugar beneath your bread when we took Communion just now. Did you notice?
dialogue_tracker.char_4187_graceb_CN_038: Would you like a bowl of cream soup? It's an honor to have you—oh dear, don't do that, children! Oh, look how they spilled soup on you... I'll get you a change of clothes. Hm, looks like all I have handy is a nun's habit... do you mind?
dialogue_tracker.char_4187_graceb_CN_042: May the Lord bless you and keep you.
dialogue_tracker.char_4187_graceb_CN_043: I know it's rude to get drunk at someone else's birthday party, but it's been a long time since I've been able to drink to my heart's content like this. No need to worry about the children, no need to worry about shells falling on our heads out of nowhere, and no need to worry about what may come tomorrow.
dialogue_tracker.char_4187_graceb_CN_044: Am I imagining things, or is there something sealed away in your mind too? Something chaotic and complex, no less than the knowledge passed down through generations of K'uk'ulkan... Promise me, Doctor, that whatever it is, you will not allow it to take control of your life and replace it.
dialogue_tracker.char_4188_confes_CN_001: Press 1 to confess, press 2 to place an extra order of donuts, press 3 to rent a firearm, press 4 to be connected to an operator. Please note that pressing 4 will redirect you to representative Saint Closure if this platform is onboard Rhodes Island.
dialogue_tracker.char_4188_confes_CN_002: You have access to all my convenience features, including but not limited to confession, in accordance with the user agreement. Such as: a dessert shop directory, leisurely transit, saint figurehead touching and photography, holy scripture reading, and firearms training. Please note that no personal care or hygiene services are available.
dialogue_tracker.char_4188_confes_CN_003: An operator bonus—for me? I see. So you were giving bonuses to the vending machines when you put coins in them late last night... I am the only one who counts as an operator? But hearing confessions is a common public service, and there is no fundamental difference between my nature and that of the vending machines.
dialogue_tracker.char_4188_confes_CN_004: Please do not send me to the Engineering Department, Doctor. Only Exusiai, who has been educated in faith assistive engineering, is properly equipped to render assistance and is available... yes, it is a serious issue. My mic stand is displaced by at least five millimeters, threatening to undermine the confession experience.
dialogue_tracker.char_4188_confes_CN_007: I will now boil water for you. Due to the considerable quantity of water on Terra, it will take some time to complete the process—Wait, stop hitting my chassis, I am not broken—yes, it is true that my language logic has malfunctioned to a degree, but this contributes to the production of 'jokes'. This is the part where you laugh.
dialogue_tracker.char_4188_confes_CN_008: Yes, I have recently been fitted with a voice-recording function. Your confessions contain many enlightening words that I must ponder. May I record your confessions, Doctor...? No, I have received no directives from Saint Closure to this effect, absolutely none.
dialogue_tracker.char_4188_confes_CN_009: You are destroying all civilization on Terra? Not a problem, Doctor, I have heard even more radical thoughts in my time... you say this is not the same? You should not be too hard on yourself, even if it is a material burden that you carry and not simply an exaggerated expression. May you have the chance to choose your future in peace.
dialogue_tracker.char_4188_confes_CN_010: There is a charge for sleeping in my cabin, Doctor.
dialogue_tracker.char_4188_confes_CN_011: Laterano Automated Confessional 047 at your service. Please create a user name as directed in the operating manual. Thank you for your cooperation.
dialogue_tracker.char_4188_confes_CN_012: Is playing back images of humans engaging in acts of violence against one another how this 'Rhodes Island' comforts penitents?
dialogue_tracker.char_4188_confes_CN_017: Charge all operator confessional fees to your card? Understood, Doctor. I will safeguard their mental health on the battlefield.
dialogue_tracker.char_4188_confes_CN_018: I am unable to direct operators to their proper positions, as I lack command experience. However, I will speak to each individual operator and ensure they find their ideal positions themselves.
dialogue_tracker.char_4188_confes_CN_019: I am afraid my wheels are not designed for off-road travel. If speed is of the essence, perhaps you could carry me?
dialogue_tracker.char_4188_confes_CN_020: Please adjust your facial muscles to make your expressions as friendly as possible. That is conducive to the completion of my mission maximally utilizing non-violent persuasion.
dialogue_tracker.char_4188_confes_CN_022: Do not worry, I am not going anywhere.
dialogue_tracker.char_4188_confes_CN_023: Please insert your Signa Creditorum or swipe your citizen credit card before beginning your confession.
dialogue_tracker.char_4188_confes_CN_024: You may obtain donuts from my cabin if you are in need of calories.
dialogue_tracker.char_4188_confes_CN_025: If you prefer to confess by physical means, I am able to meet your needs.
dialogue_tracker.char_4188_confes_CN_026: Please do not stand in front of me. I lack the firing accuracy of a Sankta.
dialogue_tracker.char_4188_confes_CN_027: You may use me as cover. The repair bill will be sent to you following the operation.
dialogue_tracker.char_4188_confes_CN_028: 'He who hideth his own sin shall suffer.'
dialogue_tracker.char_4188_confes_CN_029: 'He who is begotten of the Law shall conquer with faith.'
dialogue_tracker.char_4188_confes_CN_030: These poor souls may not have put their wicked thoughts to action had I arrived sooner.
dialogue_tracker.char_4188_confes_CN_031: I feel my bumper burning... should I mourn the carving on the bumper, Doctor?
dialogue_tracker.char_4188_confes_CN_032: I suggest you leave first, Doctor. I shall engage my self-destruct sequence to delay the enemy… My apologies, you need not worry. I was actually just going to attempt a second round of peace talks.
dialogue_tracker.char_4188_confes_CN_033: Do you want me to confess to this 'Rhodes Island'? How should I make payment?
dialogue_tracker.char_4188_confes_CN_034: Lateran customs dictate that the door is opened at the point where the gaze of the saint figurehead on the bow meets the third vertical line on the door, by knocking upon it in the rhythm of the fifth verse of Psalms.
dialogue_tracker.char_4188_confes_CN_036: You should know that there is currently no one in my cabin, Doctor.
dialogue_tracker.char_4188_confes_CN_038: One moment, please. The angle of my quadruple vehicle-mounted patron firearm, can be adjusted to fire upwards, although it will take some time... mm—oh—ah—there. May I now present the spectacle of Laterano's New Year fireworks.
dialogue_tracker.char_4188_confes_CN_042: May I bring you peace, Doctor.
dialogue_tracker.char_4188_confes_CN_043: All believers are equal before the Law. Payment is a necessary part of the confessional process, regardless of whether it is the penitent's birthday... Oh no, my fee meter is stuck. No, such a little thing must not be allowed to delay your confession. Please enter and confess the depths of your heart.
dialogue_tracker.char_4188_confes_CN_044: Humans share joy and happiness with each other. A confessional hears only the thoughts not suitable to share with others. But today is a rare occasion, Doctor... may I ask that you put some colored lights on me, as you have done with 'Rhodes Island'?
dialogue_tracker.char_4191_tippi_CN_001: Omigosh, a close-up chance to watch the Doctor at work. Finally, I'll get a glimpse of Rhodes Island's secrets! Huh? You just want me to tell you a scary story to keep you up? Seriously? Fine, two choices then: The Headless Burdenbeastman of the Barrens, or The Thousand-Year Curse of the Sargonian Tomb. Which one, Doc?
dialogue_tracker.char_4191_tippi_CN_002: I never imagined I'd see two familiar faces from Wrankwood here. Nah, I'm not that interested in them personally, just curious on how they ended up on a pharma company's landship. They must have some kinda angle here!
dialogue_tracker.char_4191_tippi_CN_003: What am I looking at, standing here on the bridge? Uh, I was just thinking how Rhodes Island's such a great place. Look, sealed spaces, high mobility, destinations unknown, everyone's using code names... doesn't it feel like a survival-slasher horror flick?!
dialogue_tracker.char_4191_tippi_CN_004: I tried doodling a 'Slenderburdenbeastman' symbol on this corner of the corridor here, but no one's reacting to it when they walk by. Why? Not enough Columbians onboard? Nobody knows the legend?—Relax, I'll clean it up once my experiment's done.
dialogue_tracker.char_4191_tippi_CN_005: The device on my back's made of suspension cables and hover units, and I'm the only one with anything like it in Wrankwood. I met my master who taught me how to retrofit it on a little production. He spent whole days there with a jetpack on his back. Dunno where he went after production wrapped. Omigosh, you might have seen him in Sargon?
dialogue_tracker.char_4191_tippi_CN_006: Look! Timestamp three-seventeen, see how the vapor turns the smile in the makeup mirror into a spooky face—this clip's one of my best! I tried it at home once when I was a kid. All these people came by to talk about how great my drawings were, only to get a nasty shock. I just knew it was gonna be super effective.
dialogue_tracker.char_4191_tippi_CN_007: I joined Greta's crew because she promised me artistic freedom, but that was another load of crap! Meeting Miss.Christine and Lucian gave me a lot of inspiration though. Don't you think it'd be fun to make a horror flick about a storm-cloudbeast exorcist?
dialogue_tracker.char_4191_tippi_CN_008: Nah, I don't butt heads with my parents that much, I just don't like how stiff their pictures are. And I didn't like the path they laid out for me either. But... I guess I've got a long way to go before the skills and resources needed to put together a real spectacular movie.
dialogue_tracker.char_4191_tippi_CN_009: When I was starting out, I joined some little production crews, hoping to meet interesting people, but I ended up so busy I couldn't get a convo in... These days, at least I got you to lend me an ear whenever I come back onboard, Doctor.
dialogue_tracker.char_4191_tippi_CN_010: Doctor? Oh, busy? Suits me, Tippi can take care of herself. Let's see if there's anything new to watch... Omigosh, an nonconformist Lungmen horror comedy... let's do this one!
dialogue_tracker.char_4191_tippi_CN_011: Live long and prosper! Tippi 'Skyriftwalker' Booker reporting for duty! Who, Doctor? Oh, Skyriftwalker's the code name I thought up for myself! Uh, that's not how you do code names here?
dialogue_tracker.char_4191_tippi_CN_012: The protag gets a videotape everyday, describing her life bit by bit, until one day the video shows her killing people... don't you think that fits the vibes in this recording? No? For reals?
dialogue_tracker.char_4191_tippi_CN_013: That's it? Pretty mid ceremony. No test or anything like that?
dialogue_tracker.char_4191_tippi_CN_014: I get another promotion? Does this mean I can go some places I wasn't allowed before?
dialogue_tracker.char_4191_tippi_CN_017: Omigosh, this a co-op mission? I'll get along real nice with everybody.
dialogue_tracker.char_4191_tippi_CN_018: Ooh, just got a new idea! Let's try it out!
dialogue_tracker.char_4191_tippi_CN_019: C'mon! Let's go see the wonderful sights waiting for us out there.
dialogue_tracker.char_4191_tippi_CN_020: An extra special spot we got here.
dialogue_tracker.char_4191_tippi_CN_021: Finally my turn to make a move? I'm in a good spot!
dialogue_tracker.char_4191_tippi_CN_022: Spray gun and hover unit ready.
dialogue_tracker.char_4191_tippi_CN_024: I've almost finished this piece. Just a sec!
dialogue_tracker.char_4191_tippi_CN_025: Some deep purple for a sense of mystery.
dialogue_tracker.char_4191_tippi_CN_026: Bit of dark red to get your heart pumping.
dialogue_tracker.char_4191_tippi_CN_027: A little lime green for a weird rotten vibe.
dialogue_tracker.char_4191_tippi_CN_028: The stage's set, now let's see how everyone performs!
dialogue_tracker.char_4191_tippi_CN_029: Now this is a perfect work of art! Lemme just tag my name in the corner here real quick.
dialogue_tracker.char_4191_tippi_CN_030: So much for Wrankwood war movies.
dialogue_tracker.char_4191_tippi_CN_032: Let me edit that op's recording. I might just come up with a new kind of horror flick.
dialogue_tracker.char_4191_tippi_CN_033: So I can't tag the corridors, but can I spraypaint my own dorm walls?
dialogue_tracker.char_4191_tippi_CN_034: Keep on tapping the device on my back, and something scary just might pop out.
dialogue_tracker.char_4191_tippi_CN_036: Don't worry about me, if you're tied up. I can keep myself busy. Oh, you're done? Wanna watch a movie together?
dialogue_tracker.char_4191_tippi_CN_038: Watch a New Year's blockbuster together? Sure—'Famous Columbian husband-and-wife producer-director duo collabs on joint production for war film...' Okay, Doctor, I don't mind going with you, but don't blame me if I fall asleep halfway in.
dialogue_tracker.char_4191_tippi_CN_042: Want me to spray some colors around to liven up the place and brighten your mood?
dialogue_tracker.char_4191_tippi_CN_043: I always had big parties as a kid. The adults would use them as an excuse to socialize, like with totally zero thought to what the birthday girl wanted. Wasn't the biggest fan. So for your birthday, I redecorated your room based on your favorite movies this year. What'cha think?
dialogue_tracker.char_4191_tippi_CN_044: Rhodes Island's a proper pharma company, I've seen that with my own eyes—too bad it doesn't have the stories I got up here in my head. But Doc, you're full of mysteries, so I have to keep watching you for reference material. And who knows, you might even star in your own horror movie one day.
dialogue_tracker.char_4193_lemuen_CN_001: Doctor, when you chose your office, did you realize there's a spot on the landship, perfect for a cozy little sniper nest overlooking it? Where, you ask? If I told you, would you allow me personal use of the space?
dialogue_tracker.char_4193_lemuen_CN_002: Please reconsider these patient placement clauses, but first, kindly sign these cooperative pharmaceutical R&D forms. Also, may I trouble you to look over my proposal on the mobile plate transfer once again... I'm scary when I smile, you say? Then do your best to get all this sorted quickly, alright?
dialogue_tracker.char_4193_lemuen_CN_003: Yes, this is your office. I took the liberty of revamping it and adding a few confetti guns and a scripture disco-ball here and there. You say El caused an explosion here, while trying to cook some popcorn with her gun...? Yes, I knew that, but as they say back in Laterano, 'an explosion unseen is an explosion clean'.
dialogue_tracker.char_4193_lemuen_CN_004: My signature? Ah, I did contribute a little to 'Botanical Review', yes. It wasn't anything I had to do for work. Rather, I simply had too many types of flowers around my sickbed. One time, Mostima was in such a rush, all she could offer me was a potato that had started to bloom. With that many flowers on hand, how could I not learn a thing or two about them?
dialogue_tracker.char_4193_lemuen_CN_005: This scrape on my hand? Just from getting a little physical. During fieldwork, you sometimes run into the types who simply have no respect for the ill. Fiammetta was just about boiling over, so I saw fit to educate them in a... fitting manner. I may not mind, personally, but that doesn't mean I have to force my friends to ignore it.
dialogue_tracker.char_4193_lemuen_CN_006: The rulebook for cardinals may be as thick as a stack of three apple pies, but it's nothing that complicated. Checking on new arrivals to see how they're settling in, seeing if people are doing alright at the monasteries... After all, without them, what would even be left of Laterano today?
dialogue_tracker.char_4193_lemuen_CN_007: Here, some cold cystymilk, apple-scented smelling salts, an eyemask, and some earplugs. Hold onto them tight, they're about to start seating people. You were wondering what sort of films I liked to watch, and, well, I think every entry in the 'Edict Terminator' series is brilliant, but it's good to be prepared if you can't handle all the blood, right?
dialogue_tracker.char_4193_lemuen_CN_008: No need to avert your eyes, Doctor. Sure, I'm not quite able to leave this wheelchair just yet. Some wounds simply don't heal quickly... If you feel like assuaging your guilt, how about granting me authorization to use your autonomous operation platforms? 'For transport or for racing?' Oh, don't worry yourself over that.
dialogue_tracker.char_4193_lemuen_CN_009: Are you always so quick to notice when someone is watching you? Oh, forgive me, it's a habit of mine to observe others. It's how I weigh the reasons I might need to take care of someone, against the reasons to... 'take care' of them. Which one do I mean for you? Work in peace, Doctor.
dialogue_tracker.char_4193_lemuen_CN_010: Hmm? Oh, I was just looking at a shadow across your window. A habit from my days in the hospital. What does that shadow look like to you?
dialogue_tracker.char_4193_lemuen_CN_011: Pleasure to meet you, Doctor. Just Lemuen is fine, thanks. Would you rather discuss work with a cardinal of the Seventh Tribunal, or show El's big sister around her workplace? The choice is yours.
dialogue_tracker.char_4193_lemuen_CN_012: Right there. You edited out one of the gorier scenes, didn't you?
dialogue_tracker.char_4193_lemuen_CN_013: After having worked together all this time, why are you only getting around to this ceremony now? If you were too busy, you should have asked me to help.
dialogue_tracker.char_4193_lemuen_CN_014: Ah, you laughed. Giving trust and receiving it are one and the same. Both acts that put people at ease, no? Then, would you like to receive this medal from the Seventh Tribunal for outstanding cooperation, to put me at ease? You can have two, if you'd like. You could even pin them on your eyemask, one for each eye.
dialogue_tracker.char_4193_lemuen_CN_017: No need for introductions, I'm already familiar with everyone here.
dialogue_tracker.char_4193_lemuen_CN_018: No need for reports, I can see what everyone does from here.
dialogue_tracker.char_4193_lemuen_CN_019: Please, this is no time for excuses.
dialogue_tracker.char_4193_lemuen_CN_020: Please, this is no time for pity.
dialogue_tracker.char_4193_lemuen_CN_021: I'm in position... No need to guess which position.
dialogue_tracker.char_4193_lemuen_CN_023: Whoever said a wheelchair couldn't get up onto a steel beam?
dialogue_tracker.char_4193_lemuen_CN_024: Oh, I should try adding a jet engine next time~
dialogue_tracker.char_4193_lemuen_CN_028: Who would bear the news of your death? Ever crossed your mind?
dialogue_tracker.char_4193_lemuen_CN_029: Doctor, can you come help me out? My wheel's stuck on a tile... Alright, hold out your hand. High five! Oh, the wheel? I pulled it out myself.
dialogue_tracker.char_4193_lemuen_CN_030: Mission accomplished. There is one more thing, though. Logistics gave me far too much tea and cake. Would everyone like to help me lighten the load?
dialogue_tracker.char_4193_lemuen_CN_032: I'll keep watch behind. No one will give chase.
dialogue_tracker.char_4193_lemuen_CN_033: Surely there's no speed limit in Rhodes Island's corridors?
dialogue_tracker.char_4193_lemuen_CN_034: That finger of yours would be more suited to tickling the ivories, I think.
dialogue_tracker.char_4193_lemuen_CN_036: Would you like to push me along for a walk?
dialogue_tracker.char_4193_lemuen_CN_038: I'm giving some gifts to operators I went on missions with. I still have three boxes to go, and it would be terribly inconvenient if I don't deliver them all before work. Could you help me out? The sooner we get these delivered, the sooner you can have a present from me. Sound good? Let's get going, then. Hold on tight, now.
dialogue_tracker.char_4193_lemuen_CN_042: Where are you headed today, Doctor?
dialogue_tracker.char_4193_lemuen_CN_043: Now that you mention it, have you ever thought of making up for past birthdays? I understand you spent several years asleep due to some unfortunate accident as well, correct? I know you might not mind, but the time we lose is never only lost by ourselves. Come, there's still plenty of time today to hold a few parties.
dialogue_tracker.char_4193_lemuen_CN_044: To fight against disease and injustice... What a noble message. We have a similar speech at our annual meetings at the Seventh Tribunal, but it's a lot shorter than the celebratory gunfire segment... Hmm? I'm just getting a piece of candy. I know you're not simply going through the motions when you speak, so I'll be listening to the very end.
dialogue_tracker.char_4194_rmixer_CN_001: Forget it. I'm almost retired, and it's about time I enjoyed some leisure... there's no end to work. How about you stop shutting yourself in here and go outside with me for once? It's a fine day out there.
dialogue_tracker.char_4194_rmixer_CN_002: The young man at the front desk gave me a huge cake. Good thing a few kids passed by, and they got through the whole thing pretty quick. Take it home? No, there's only me at home, and I wouldn't be able to finish it before it spoiled.
dialogue_tracker.char_4194_rmixer_CN_003: Why ask about His Holiness? I can't tell you much. We never quite saw eye-to-eye from a young age, though we managed to work together for decades because we shared the same devotion to the Holy City. Even today, I wouldn't say we're much more than acquaintances... but then, perhaps the fact that we're not friends is precisely the reason we've been able to tolerate each other for so long.
dialogue_tracker.char_4194_rmixer_CN_004: I was delighted when Fia said she wanted to become a gun-knight. Nothing makes you prouder than your child wanting to take up your mantle. She being a Liberi was no obstacle at all, smart and hard-working as she is. And I would have done anything to make her dream come true. But kids grow up, people change...
dialogue_tracker.char_4194_rmixer_CN_005: There were lots of friends I tried to convince to stay, but failed. It was only a long time later I realized it wasn't because of me that they left, but because of Laterano. The city's glory is like the sun, its brilliant radiance suffers no stars. But it is the duty of the stars to shine upon the night where the sun does not.
dialogue_tracker.char_4194_rmixer_CN_006: Laterano has been turned on its head. The old Law is gone. But I still have faith in the Holy City, and in the ties that bind us to one another. Otherwise, why would those who left the Holy City return to defend it together with me... right, Doctor?
dialogue_tracker.char_4194_rmixer_CN_007: I heard Fia made some friends here. Does she get along with the others? She's got a sharp tongue, but deep down she's hiding a heart of gold... I guess it's my fault for making fun of her too much when she was little. But then, where's the fun in raising a child, if you don't make fun of her?
dialogue_tracker.char_4194_rmixer_CN_008: What a tear-jerker. I should've picked a comedy for movie night. How embarrassing, crying my heart out like that in front of you... the tear glands get so much weaker as you age, you know. Say, am I imagining it, or are your eyes even redder than mine are? Come now, no need to fight the tears.
dialogue_tracker.char_4194_rmixer_CN_009: This letter? Oh, it's nothing, just word that an old friend has passed away. I personally escorted her out of the Holy City when she contracted Oripathy, many years ago. I don't even remember what she looked like, how awful I am. I wish I could've seen her one last time, even if it meant getting punched in the face.
dialogue_tracker.char_4194_rmixer_CN_010: Feel free to lean against me if you're tired, though I'm not exactly soft. This suit is almost as ancient as I am. It's gone through quite a few major overhauls, but it's still a... reliable partner.
dialogue_tracker.char_4194_rmixer_CN_011: A pleasure to meet you, Doctor. You know me as Fia's grandpa, if you've heard of... the Sankta Miksaparato... I really regret letting Fia fill out my recommendation form.
dialogue_tracker.char_4194_rmixer_CN_012: That was one wild shot from Fia. Reminds me of when I was young.
dialogue_tracker.char_4194_rmixer_CN_013: What is WRONG with your medics?! Do they think I'm a child? A medal just for cooperating with medical personnel? Shouldn't that be common sense? And… what're they giggling about?
dialogue_tracker.char_4194_rmixer_CN_014: You see all these medals? That Vampire told me to come here to claim my prize. I can't guess what you're going to give me. Another medal? Is it a 'collect twenty to get the grand prize' deal?
dialogue_tracker.char_4194_rmixer_CN_017: I'll help, but you'd better sit down with me for a mug of mead once this is over.
dialogue_tracker.char_4194_rmixer_CN_018: Why do I feel like I'm taking a bunch of kids out to a picnic?
dialogue_tracker.char_4194_rmixer_CN_019: Why does this suit of armor feel like it's gotten tighter, especially around the waist? Thankfully, my gun still feels the same as it ever has.
dialogue_tracker.char_4194_rmixer_CN_020: What are you doing standing there? Come at me! And don't expect me to give you your last rites!
dialogue_tracker.char_4194_rmixer_CN_021: Good, a chance to try out my new hip.
dialogue_tracker.char_4194_rmixer_CN_022: My bones will get rusty if I don't exercise.
dialogue_tracker.char_4194_rmixer_CN_023: I'll hold this ground all on my own.
dialogue_tracker.char_4194_rmixer_CN_028: No one will touch that which I defend.
dialogue_tracker.char_4194_rmixer_CN_029: Blood? No, I'm not hurt. Just a loose tooth that fell out. Lucky, spares me a visit to the dentist.
dialogue_tracker.char_4194_rmixer_CN_030: No need to thank me. I hardly broke a sweat.
dialogue_tracker.char_4194_rmixer_CN_031: Are we done? We should go home, then. If we didn't do bad, then I say we did good.
dialogue_tracker.char_4194_rmixer_CN_032: I'm fine. I've been in worse pickles before. Come now, don't look so sullen. Maybe a bit of ice cream will cheer you up? My treat.
dialogue_tracker.char_4194_rmixer_CN_033: Anyone in the mood for some classic Lateran soap operas? They're pretty good up to the point where you fall asleep.
dialogue_tracker.char_4194_rmixer_CN_034: Take it easy, you'll shatter my old bones.
dialogue_tracker.char_4194_rmixer_CN_036: A little pot of tea, a big plate of raspberry pie. Let's sit down and talk.
dialogue_tracker.char_4194_rmixer_CN_038: Don't complain about me being late. What's half an hour more or less? Have you any idea how long I waited for Fia to bring you folks to see me in Laterano? Besides, I still need to fix my hair since it got crushed under a helmet all day.
dialogue_tracker.char_4194_rmixer_CN_042: I brought some pastries. You can share them.
dialogue_tracker.char_4194_rmixer_CN_043: I heard it's your birthday. So I brought a vintage from my cellar to join in the fun... Oh, no need to be so polite. A bottle doesn't compare to a good time spent with friends.
dialogue_tracker.char_4194_rmixer_CN_044: The people by your side will leave you someday, Doctor, but they're never truly gone. They are the stars adorning the sky that is your life when you look up at night; distant though they may be, the light they leave behind for you will never die.
dialogue_tracker.char_4195_radian_CN_001: 博士，做个简单的测试吧，放在茶几上的点心，你偷吃了几个？
dialogue_tracker.char_4195_radian_CN_002: 博士，别担心，虽然我确实会在走路时因思考而忽略周遭环境，不过，“小树”和“小轴”会辅助我规避障碍的。你问是谁？啊，就是这两只机械臂呀。它们能做很多事呢。
dialogue_tracker.char_4195_radian_CN_003: 小家伙们给我起了不少外号呢，比如“眯眯眼怪人”“四手心电怪”之类的。没事的，这个年纪的孩子们最讨厌被看穿的感觉，这也很正常。不过，呵呵，不服气的话，就好好学习，试着骗过我吧。
dialogue_tracker.char_4195_radian_CN_004: 感知和操控各种电信号，这是我源石技艺的本质。它让我对周围的人有了更多的了解，但也让我对许多细节都过分敏感。比如，你的右肩斜方肌正在持续异常放电，该调整坐姿了，博士。
dialogue_tracker.char_4195_radian_CN_005: 博士，看到你出现在我的课堂上，我很高兴。感染者在乌萨斯的处境很艰难，但——没错，有许多方法可以对付那些用暴力来掩盖软弱的人。看来你对我的课程很有心得，那么，来一场突击测验吧。
dialogue_tracker.char_4195_radian_CN_006: 萨卡兹以外的种族是否有灵魂的概念？嗯......这是个复杂的问题。但是，我能看到，人体的电信号不仅是生命的律动，同样铭刻着绽放的情感。它们有时太过耀眼，就像是灵魂的火光。
dialogue_tracker.char_4195_radian_CN_007: 博士最近的生活看起来很稳定呢，身体发出的信号让我很安心。噗，我没有在说反话，不用急着忏悔。比起健康，我更看重规律，就像医疗仪器上的波形，太安静意味着死亡，太嘈杂则预示着疾病。
dialogue_tracker.char_4195_radian_CN_008: 过去，迷迭香的身体里，就像是有两只迷途的羽兽在惊恐地尖叫。那时，我经常抱着她入睡，也因此被那两只羽兽“啄”伤过。现在，她已经可以一个人睡了，虽然很欣慰，但也感觉有些寂寞呢。
dialogue_tracker.char_4195_radian_CN_009: 博士，你累了吗？好吧，看在你今天努力工作的分上，来，握住我的手，感受自己神经的跳动，想象它是一支柔和的乐曲。现在，让我们随这温暖的节拍轻轻摇曳——直到所有疲惫烟消云散。
dialogue_tracker.char_4195_radian_CN_010: 通讯终端已经调成静默模式了。放心，有我在，你不会错过任何重要的消息。
dialogue_tracker.char_4195_radian_CN_011: 根据阿米娅的授权口令，接下来我会直接听从你的指挥，博士。我主要负责通讯和情报处理的工作，当然，如果你有生活管理方面的问题，也可以来找我。
dialogue_tracker.char_4195_radian_CN_012: 双方的信息差很明显呢，胜负一目了然。
dialogue_tracker.char_4195_radian_CN_013: 对一个通讯情报人员来说，最欣慰的莫过于提供的情报被运用到极致。博士也要再接再厉哦！
dialogue_tracker.char_4195_radian_CN_014: 博士、煌还有其他人，都出来吧，你们想给我准备惊喜还早着呢。还不出来吗？你们想和我玩捉迷藏？哎，真是一群长不大的孩子。那就先从博士开始吧——
dialogue_tracker.char_4195_radian_CN_017: 我会在适当的时候提建议，继续作战会议吧。
dialogue_tracker.char_4195_radian_CN_018: 无论你们身处什么样的险境，相信我，我一定能找到你们。
dialogue_tracker.char_4195_radian_CN_019: 东西都带好了吗？那么，出发吧。
dialogue_tracker.char_4195_radian_CN_020: 发现敌人的信号了，各位，准备战斗吧。
dialogue_tracker.char_4195_radian_CN_021: 博士，你想要传递什么讯息？
dialogue_tracker.char_4195_radian_CN_022: 博士，我截获了一些有趣的情报。
dialogue_tracker.char_4195_radian_CN_023: 放心，只要我在这里，对方就不可能进行高效的信息传递。
dialogue_tracker.char_4195_radian_CN_024: 所有我方单位的位置确认完毕。一切正常，别担心。
dialogue_tracker.char_4195_radian_CN_025: 抱歉，这边不是生路，是我为你们设下的陷阱。
dialogue_tracker.char_4195_radian_CN_026: 请你们在信息的孤岛上逗留一段时间吧。
dialogue_tracker.char_4195_radian_CN_027: 我来干扰他们的通讯，迅速行动吧。
dialogue_tracker.char_4195_radian_CN_028: 很遗憾，单靠武力，是无法左右战局的。
dialogue_tracker.char_4195_radian_CN_029: 博士对指挥这场战斗的自己有什么评价？我的评价？“小树”和“小轴”已经给出来了哦。
dialogue_tracker.char_4195_radian_CN_030: 区域内已经没有敌人的踪迹了，任务完美完成。呼......好了，博士，来击个掌吧！
dialogue_tracker.char_4195_radian_CN_031: 我已经记住了那几个家伙的电信号，他们跑不了的。
dialogue_tracker.char_4195_radian_CN_032: 博士，别气馁，下次我们一起赢回来，好吗？
dialogue_tracker.char_4195_radian_CN_033: 还是罗德岛上的电信号让人安心。
dialogue_tracker.char_4195_radian_CN_034: 博士，我说过不可以随便这么做的吧？
dialogue_tracker.char_4195_radian_CN_036: 博士也要去开会吗？那么，一起走一段路吧。
dialogue_tracker.char_4195_radian_CN_038: 谢谢，博士，到甲板后就好多了......不，我没醉，只是每年的这个时候，大家发出的电信号都承载了太多喜悦和兴奋，会让我感到有些晕眩，这就是所谓幸福的烦恼吧。新年快乐，博士。
dialogue_tracker.char_4195_radian_CN_043: 博士，我给你传了一份地图。这是今天本舰上所有想要为你庆生的人的位置，我已经为你设计好了一条最短线路，顺利的话，应该能在晚饭时结束。终点的问号？那是我准备的礼物，可以期待一下哦。
dialogue_tracker.char_4195_radian_CN_044: 我们失去了很多人，但也总有新的人加入我们。渐渐地，新人们继承了前辈的理念，自己也变成了前辈。博士，从电信号的角度来看，我有时候甚至会产生错觉——和我一起作战的人从未改变。
dialogue_tracker.char_4196_reckpr_CN_001: 您是在找这份文件吗，博士？笔，请。如果伏案疲劳，也可口述，我来为您记录——抱歉，吓着您了？呵，您还没有习惯，容易忘记我的存在。我会一直在您的桌边工作，有任何需求，请随时提出。
dialogue_tracker.char_4196_reckpr_CN_002: 大家对宗师的生活感兴趣也在常理。我得反复解释，我只是他的录武官，不是助理。老师再忙，生活琐事也从未叫我代劳，反倒常来叮嘱我按时吃药——他们听得津津有味，却又难掩失望。
dialogue_tracker.char_4196_reckpr_CN_003: 早，博士您已经起了吗？我？我跟着军队近十年，作息早已定型了。每天来训练室看看，才觉得安心。啊，您说这些记录？请放心，这些只是个人兴趣，或者说，学习资料。不会外传的。
dialogue_tracker.char_4196_reckpr_CN_004: 跟随老师外出时常遇上挑战者，老师有时便叫我先去会会他们。我只能据实相告，并问对方能否指出他们的破绽便算我赢，他们多会一口答应。于是我一拳不曾出，却莫名有许多手下败将。
dialogue_tracker.char_4196_reckpr_CN_005: 仇白师姐虽然从来不端架子，可我和左乐从小都有些怵她......别人都说她运气非凡得遇良师，可她靠自己走过的那些路，才是真正的修行。如今我也离巢，心生迷茫的时候，也会想起她的。
dialogue_tracker.char_4196_reckpr_CN_006: 一个不能习武之人却将心血都倾注在武学里，有何意义？武学又有何意义？人生若浮萍，只有用心血浇灌过什么，才算是有了依凭。为什么会在意这些？大概是因为，我找到的这一处依凭格外珍贵吧。
dialogue_tracker.char_4196_reckpr_CN_007: 左乐兄小时候？和现在可不一样。那时他听说我闷屋里养病，就想带我溜出城玩。玉门那城门，凭他的轻功出得去却进不来。后来我俩一道挨骂，他还从口袋里掏出城外采的沙棘果给我。没熟，很酸。
dialogue_tracker.char_4196_reckpr_CN_008: 老师曾教过许多学生，不论出身地位，只要人们在武道上有所求，他都会倾囊相授。我偶尔会想，如果不是这样病弱，也许有机会成为老师最得意的那个学生呢——这话只在你我之间，博士。
dialogue_tracker.char_4196_reckpr_CN_009: 博士想要听江湖故事？有户人家仗义疏财，却被贼人所害，只剩一孩子被路过的大侠救下。大侠问少年是否想要复仇，少年却说，只希望世间不要再有这般惨剧......嗯，只是一个江湖故事。
dialogue_tracker.char_4196_reckpr_CN_010: 吵到您了？这是老师教我的吐纳之法，气足则本固，空闲时就会练的。我尽量轻一些，不打扰您工作。
dialogue_tracker.char_4196_reckpr_CN_011: 您好，我是云青萍，为协助司岁台的工作而来。我并非秉烛人，只是跟着左乐兄过来长长见识，能让我参与的地方，我一定会尽力而为的。
dialogue_tracker.char_4196_reckpr_CN_012: 进退攻守，此消彼长，与武功招式也有相通之处。
dialogue_tracker.char_4196_reckpr_CN_013: 晋升？担任录武官时，从未想过这事呢。我的前辈们也是，往往一记就是半辈子。只要记录的武学能精进将士们的武艺，那就是对我们最大的嘉奖了。
dialogue_tracker.char_4196_reckpr_CN_014: 老师常说，共生死的情谊最为可贵。那我们可算是至交了，博士。
dialogue_tracker.char_4196_reckpr_CN_017: 何时以眼看，何时以心看——
dialogue_tracker.char_4196_reckpr_CN_018: 实战的记录更为珍贵，我会尽力。
dialogue_tracker.char_4196_reckpr_CN_020: 放心，他们的恐惧与招式一样容易看破。
dialogue_tracker.char_4196_reckpr_CN_022: 我只记录，建议......不应由我来提。
dialogue_tracker.char_4196_reckpr_CN_024: 将士们看到的，原来是这样的景色。
dialogue_tracker.char_4196_reckpr_CN_025: 过刚易折，先别动，我带了跌打药。
dialogue_tracker.char_4196_reckpr_CN_026: 云兽穿林，片叶不落，好身手。
dialogue_tracker.char_4196_reckpr_CN_027: 骤雨临渊，青松常立，好深厚的功底。
dialogue_tracker.char_4196_reckpr_CN_028: 先有意而后有形，不必拘泥于一招一式。
dialogue_tracker.char_4196_reckpr_CN_029: 滴水穿心，寸劲断金，您的御敌思路已入新境了，博士。
dialogue_tracker.char_4196_reckpr_CN_030: 观势于微，于已然知其未然，难怪老师让我多观察您的处事方式。
dialogue_tracker.char_4196_reckpr_CN_031: 论大局，而非纠结于那一两处细节——博士的眼界值得我学习。
dialogue_tracker.char_4196_reckpr_CN_032: 以我的见识来看，世上并无不可解的招式。博士若不嫌弃，我们可以一起复盘刚才的战局，胜利的可能一定就在其中。
dialogue_tracker.char_4196_reckpr_CN_034: 总用同一招容易被看穿，博士。当然，对付我足够了。
dialogue_tracker.char_4196_reckpr_CN_036: 只闻风声，不闻征鼓，沙地上的蒿草又绿了。
dialogue_tracker.char_4196_reckpr_CN_038: 在玉门的时候，我也常常盼着过年时那几天热闹日子。百姓带着酒菜来军营犒劳将士，大家一起比武斗酒，难得佳节，一时恣情享乐也是被允许的。博士今天想要做什么呢？我不会告诉阿米娅姐姐的。
dialogue_tracker.char_4196_reckpr_CN_042: 啊，博士！抱歉，我总改不了边走边记的习惯。
dialogue_tracker.char_4196_reckpr_CN_043: 我第一回喝酒，就是在某次生日。将士们的热情实在难却，我知道，他们只是怕没有亲人的我寂寞。后来我们都被老师好一顿教训，哈哈。暖酒让人心热，我这有玉门的烈刀子，博士来一点吗？
dialogue_tracker.char_4196_reckpr_CN_044: 卡西米尔的骑士竞技，莱塔尼亚的源石技艺......我在罗德岛确实增长了许多见识。如不嫌弃，接下来的时间，也请多指教了。叙拉古的饺子？这还是有点......老师喜欢？那，我试试。
dialogue_tracker.char_4198_christ_CN_001: It's fine enough in this office, but it's not much of a dalliance if we're stuck with work for days on end, you know... Unless, say, you'd let me lap at your emotions a bit?
dialogue_tracker.char_4198_christ_CN_002: I hear you calling for me, I'm just not obliged to heed. Oh, don't startle the little pink ones, I worked ever so hard to train them as cushions. They were cajoling me into lava surfing before that. So uncouth—you might as well subject me to rap or put me in one of those smoking mechs.
dialogue_tracker.char_4198_christ_CN_003: Listen to that. The little operators are rehearsing? I met Lucian when he was around their age. So vexed by all the emotions he had to portray—such a tasty little snack. I chose him. He sates my appetite. He's been fun to spend time with... Mm? Odd. When did he go and grow so big?
dialogue_tracker.char_4198_christ_CN_004: Of all the places to run into this menagerie. Mine? Don't lump me in with these debased louts—Zaaro, stay. You there, little silver wolf, are you their pack leader? Make Zaaro shush, and by the way, you have special permission to scritch my chin.
dialogue_tracker.char_4198_christ_CN_005: The femme fatale of Wrankwood? The Durin clockwork curiosity? The shadowy priest of Sargon? Those were little pastimes of mine. Put on a different look, and people shower you in fresh delights. Little games like that are never more fun than when they've just begun.
dialogue_tracker.char_4198_christ_CN_006: Why stop playing? Because after long enough, no one shows me anything I haven't seen before. Emotions and words on repeat, it bores me like nothing else, and I hate boredom. Hm? Insolence! You haven't earned the right to scratch my belly yet, Doctor.
dialogue_tracker.char_4198_christ_CN_007: Doctor, over here one moment? I'm off to try that multimedia escape room. Tell me, which one looks better on me, the ruby lavallière, or the sapphire? —*HISS*!!! ...Excuse me, my true form was meant to frighten you just as it does everyone else. Typical, I didn't even get a taste...
dialogue_tracker.char_4198_christ_CN_008: What a fine lavallière, this scrumptious mix of bashfulness and timidity... did your operators make this? I do quite love them... I'd love a taste of each of them. Pft, don't fret, only the special kind of emotion interests me. For example, that nervousness you just flashed in front of me, at long last. Oh, I like that.
dialogue_tracker.char_4198_christ_CN_009: Here, let me have a look under your hood—don't hide, do you think that stops me seeing? You know, you swallow up your operators' emotions too, don't you, Doctor? How your presence puts them at ease. *yawn* Move over, I'll have a catnap here myself.
dialogue_tracker.char_4198_christ_CN_011: Eyes down here, Doctor. Cat got your tongue? You can hear my voice now. Long time no see. You can pet me more than last time, I permit it.
dialogue_tracker.char_4198_christ_CN_013: Doctor, I can trouble you to set this in that red lavallière for me, yes? It'll look better on me that way.
dialogue_tracker.char_4198_christ_CN_014: Are you done with the photoshoot? Let me see... Hm? You'll have this framed and put up in the middle of the dormitories? Very well, I do like these shots. I'll allow it.
dialogue_tracker.char_4198_christ_CN_017: Let me see. Are you in trouble of some sort?
dialogue_tracker.char_4198_christ_CN_019: Any moods out here to pique my interest?
dialogue_tracker.char_4198_christ_CN_022: Petting a cat on the battlefield? That'll be one petting voucher.
dialogue_tracker.char_4198_christ_CN_023: (The lady looks around, elegantly swishing her two tails.)
dialogue_tracker.char_4198_christ_CN_024: (The lady stretches out, seemingly very at ease.)
dialogue_tracker.char_4198_christ_CN_026: Despair, excitement, yearning... the emotions here are delectable.
dialogue_tracker.char_4198_christ_CN_027: What other knotty emotions could there be?
dialogue_tracker.char_4198_christ_CN_029: Flavors fit for a gastronome. Thank you for entertaining me.
dialogue_tracker.char_4198_christ_CN_030: A fine snack. I'm satisfied. When's the next?
dialogue_tracker.char_4198_christ_CN_031: Oh my, there goes the afternoon tea.
dialogue_tracker.char_4198_christ_CN_032: Stay on my tail, Doctor, don't let emotion's whirl suck you in.
dialogue_tracker.char_4198_christ_CN_038: Ah-choo! Not even you're free of all these... sickly sweet emotions... oh, I almost feel dizzy... Doctor, come, we're finding Lucian. I want to see how these feelings look on his face.
dialogue_tracker.char_4198_christ_CN_042: I smell a note of delight, Doctor.
dialogue_tracker.char_4198_christ_CN_043: (The lady has left a dew-slicked rose on your desk. You look down, only to find that unbeknownst to you, a warm fuzzball with its four paws tucked in has nestled within your lap.)
dialogue_tracker.char_4198_christ_CN_044: Your operators really want to see me do this, do they? ...Oh, fine, special permission just for today. You can rest me on your shoulder while you go round the landship.
dialogue_tracker.char_4199_makiri_CN_001: 接下来只要把这几页文书整合好就可以。参考文献我放桌上了，列了具体条目，备注也在上面。呼，今明两天的工作这就能收尾了......你不介意的话，我稍微睡一下......
dialogue_tracker.char_4199_makiri_CN_002: 对，抢御机银行时瞎的。嗯，当时有两三千人参加。没错，确实血流成河了，我护着我的摊子，用一根竹签杀了一千人......什么假不假的，别聊我了，博士，我是来听故事的，快说说你的事。
dialogue_tracker.char_4199_makiri_CN_003: 今天碰到打工的学生请教我情报学的问题，我也不太会，只好跟他讲了些我四处兼职、从客人嘴里套话的事。虽然他说很难写进大学的暑期作业里，但他看起来好像还挺满足的。
dialogue_tracker.char_4199_makiri_CN_004: 特别播报！博士，建议你今天早点去食堂，有好事。还有记得去体检，不然会承受怒火。另外，路过上层甲板的时候当心头顶。好了，收费一千。什么时候学的占卜？嘿，只是碰巧听了大家的闲聊。
dialogue_tracker.char_4199_makiri_CN_005: 每年我都在那间神社许同样的愿，今年倒不知该求些什么了。真羡慕那位宫司，与“神明”相伴，生活会不会比较容易？但转念一想，各位“神明”性格不一，万一撞见一位难搞的......
dialogue_tracker.char_4199_makiri_CN_006: 追着泡影的这一路，我以为经历的只是“故事”，却结下了实在的“缘”，御机城的各位老板、常客，星熊，还有你......咳，总之我不会因为是在抢银行时认识的就不把你们当真朋友！
dialogue_tracker.char_4199_makiri_CN_007: 啧，当年压得人几乎得从高楼跳下才能喘口气的数字，在如今的商界，不过是分秒间的得失。嗯，我决定了，博士，我要成立一个助学基金，帮助像我这样的失学青年......哎哎，你别走啊！
dialogue_tracker.char_4199_makiri_CN_008: 当初踏入黑道，为了些不算线索的线索，惹了不该惹的人，付出了一只眼的代价。不是什么奇谈，反倒真的很蠢。见笑了，人生的转折点居然是这种事。呵，怎么，有兴趣？那是个雨夜......
dialogue_tracker.char_4199_makiri_CN_009: ......今天陪太多人聊天，听了太多故事，也说了太多话，有点累而已。不必在意。在橘红色的天光下和你一起发发呆，已经是休息了。
dialogue_tracker.char_4199_makiri_CN_010: 人呢？忙得忘记时间了？唔，下一杯我喝点什么呢......
dialogue_tracker.char_4199_makiri_CN_011: 欢迎光临，这位客人。代号“松桐”，只是一个酒保、一个流动摊子的老板，或许还是一个很会找东西的人。现在，你想从我这里得到些什么呢，博士？
dialogue_tracker.char_4199_makiri_CN_012: 嗯，确实是精妙的布局。以后兼职应该用得上。
dialogue_tracker.char_4199_makiri_CN_013: 承蒙厚爱！能帮到你就最好啦，看来我那几份闲工也没有白打。
dialogue_tracker.char_4199_makiri_CN_014: ......啊？又升职？又是我？博、博士，这里没外人，你跟我说实话，你到底想要我做什么？我先声明，北院的机密，我可打探不来啊！
dialogue_tracker.char_4199_makiri_CN_017: 好，好，我来照应各位。不过，打架我不太擅长，打听事嘛，你倒是找对人了。
dialogue_tracker.char_4199_makiri_CN_018: 我来指挥？指挥这些全都比我能打的大人物？饶了我吧......
dialogue_tracker.char_4199_makiri_CN_019: 我是情报屋，不是万事屋，打架这种事......唉，既然你都这样拜托我了，看我再单杀个一千人回来。
dialogue_tracker.char_4199_makiri_CN_023: 到我了？别急嘛，这手牌得慢慢打。
dialogue_tracker.char_4199_makiri_CN_024: 呃，这里安全吗？我怎么感觉有人在暗中观察我们？
dialogue_tracker.char_4199_makiri_CN_027: 大家和和气气在这里对局，怎么总有人这般扫兴？
dialogue_tracker.char_4199_makiri_CN_028: 不识趣的可就不算客人了，我来“请”他们离开。
dialogue_tracker.char_4199_makiri_CN_029: 博士，你......先歇会儿。要在这种局面下带着我们全身而退，甚至还打赢了......你耗费的心力，绝非寻常。这次真的辛苦你了。
dialogue_tracker.char_4199_makiri_CN_030: 今晚，竹轮、白萝卜、驮兽筋和煮羽兽卵，随便加，全免费！各位好好庆祝一下！不过酒钱还是要另算哈。
dialogue_tracker.char_4199_makiri_CN_031: 还好啦，跑了几个而已。不慌，我放点假消息出去，不会有什么隐患的。
dialogue_tracker.char_4199_makiri_CN_032: 当心！别追了，安全第一。博士，其实我在御机城还有一个小店面，实在不行......
dialogue_tracker.char_4199_makiri_CN_033: 嚯，这——么气派，简直就是为了让我多摆几个摊子而设计的。
dialogue_tracker.char_4199_makiri_CN_038: 欸，你也在？新年快乐啊，一般来说我这天都休假，但早起也习惯了。习惯走很远的路，爬很高的台阶，看看那位是不是回......哈哈，不提这个。博士，来都来了，要不要一起去登个高？
dialogue_tracker.char_4199_makiri_CN_042: 博士，欢迎光临，老位置，这是你的特调。
dialogue_tracker.char_4199_makiri_CN_043: 生日快乐，博士，喏，酒吧餐馆便利店小摊的今日限定一折券......开玩笑，看看背面，“有求必应券”，怎么样，还够意思吧？放心许愿，我在御机城的人脉那么广，定能找人替你实现。
dialogue_tracker.char_4199_makiri_CN_044: 可算抓到你了，博士！我为我们相知相守的这一年作了首俳句......哈，怎么能是油腔滑调呢，那新的短歌呢？反正也是背的？啧啧，我猜你一定是有什么烦心事了，不怕，我在呢，我听你说。
dialogue_tracker.char_4202_haruka_CN_001: 我以为我的偶像工作已经很累了，没想到你的日程比我还满呀。这个划掉，这个也划掉——喏，适当的休息也是很重要的！
dialogue_tracker.char_4202_haruka_CN_002: 刚出道时为了省钱，制作宣传海报、裁改演出服这种琐事全要自己负责，不过我也因此学到了很多实用的技能......嘿嘿，你瞧，我在工作服的袖口内侧绣了一只小鳞兽哦，很可爱吧？
dialogue_tracker.char_4202_haruka_CN_003: 这个布丁看起来好好吃......以前事务所从来不让我吃，现在没人管了——不行，为了健康着想，这个时间也不能再摄入糖分了——博士，你不要故意当我面吃啊！
dialogue_tracker.char_4202_haruka_CN_004: 小时候听长辈讲了很多恐怖怪谈故事，导致我一直很害怕这些东西。结果出道后，好多恐怖片导演都来请我当女主角，理由是我尖叫的感觉最真实......可恶，唯独不想在这方面被人认可啊！
dialogue_tracker.char_4202_haruka_CN_005: 罗德岛的保密工作做得真好呀，这么多天了都没有八卦小报发现我的踪迹......欸，不会是我过气了吧？我不会真的过气了吧？不行不行，我明天就要回去！
dialogue_tracker.char_4202_haruka_CN_006: 这是我第一部电影杀青后和当地居民们的合影，对，锻冶町的居民......也许有一天，当我去过足够多的城市演出，我会在台下欢呼的人群中，再次见到他们的身影。一定会的。
dialogue_tracker.char_4202_haruka_CN_007: 鳞兽真的很可爱呀。我很喜欢那种金灿灿的观赏鳞兽，用灌满水的透明袋子装起来后，朝着阳光，观察它们吐泡泡的样子。就像这样，啵，啵——啊，嘟着嘴就没法讲清楚话了！
dialogue_tracker.char_4202_haruka_CN_008: 昨晚我梦见一团泡泡慢慢把我托到天上，我越飘，离家就越远。我知道最后一定会掉下去，但天上的景色真的很美，所以我就拼命飞，拼命飞，哪怕后来已经只能靠我自己吐泡泡了，我也要飞下去。
dialogue_tracker.char_4202_haruka_CN_009: 我记性本来就不太好，一到上司面前更是紧张得什么都想不起来。按理说你也是我的上司，我在你面前怎么——呜！我、我是说你以后也别凶我，不然，我、我就要——做什么来着——呜......
dialogue_tracker.char_4202_haruka_CN_010: 快点睡着，快点睡着......睡着了就不会饿了......真是的，为什么博士就能倒头就睡呀！
dialogue_tracker.char_4202_haruka_CN_011: 等等，虽说是熟人推荐，但签这些合同前，请让我先研究一下条款——没有超长合同期，没有超高违约金......看来不是黑心事务所，可以放心签字了！
dialogue_tracker.char_4202_haruka_CN_012: 以后能不能把我的演唱会录像加进去......别这么快拒绝啊！
dialogue_tracker.char_4202_haruka_CN_013: 这边的晋升速度比我想象中快多了，当初我从练习生到正式出道，花了好长时间，还得交学费给事务所......唉，罗德岛什么时候进军偶像产业啊。
dialogue_tracker.char_4202_haruka_CN_014: 终于又有机会和星熊一起行动了，之前在御机给她添了不少麻烦，这次我肯定不会拖后腿了！
dialogue_tracker.char_4202_haruka_CN_017: 欸？！做偶像都要先练习几年才能上台，战斗这种事我才接触这么点时间......真、真的要我上场吗？
dialogue_tracker.char_4202_haruka_CN_018: 比起指挥别人，我可能更擅长给大家加油打气......
dialogue_tracker.char_4202_haruka_CN_019: 博士，我双腿有点发软怎么办......？
dialogue_tracker.char_4202_haruka_CN_021: 上场前的最后准备——深吸气、吸气、吸气！
dialogue_tracker.char_4202_haruka_CN_022: 现在复习战斗技巧还来得及吗......？
dialogue_tracker.char_4202_haruka_CN_023: 我、我会努力把眼睛睁大一点！
dialogue_tracker.char_4202_haruka_CN_025: 拔刀斩！不对，这不是刀——管它呢，看招！
dialogue_tracker.char_4202_haruka_CN_026: 横竖都是死，我和你们拼了！
dialogue_tracker.char_4202_haruka_CN_027: 偶像包袱？这种时候谁顾得上啊！
dialogue_tracker.char_4202_haruka_CN_028: 我参加了那么多活动，也没见过这么混乱的场面啊！
dialogue_tracker.char_4202_haruka_CN_029: 博士，刚才的作战录像记得发我一份哦，我要剪进个人宣传片里！嘿嘿，“战斗歌姬”，想想还挺酷的！
dialogue_tracker.char_4202_haruka_CN_030: 我知道，这都是博士和大家一起努力的结果啦，不过，那个，博士，有没有哪个敌人是我打倒的？帮我指一下嘛！
dialogue_tracker.char_4202_haruka_CN_031: 果然不能闭着眼拿武器一通乱挥......我刚刚没砸到什么不该砸的人吧？
dialogue_tracker.char_4202_haruka_CN_032: 呜......豁出去了！博、博士，我来——断后！！
dialogue_tracker.char_4202_haruka_CN_033: 这个房间好宽敞，吹的泡泡能飞这么高啊！
dialogue_tracker.char_4202_haruka_CN_034: 哇，不要突然从身后冒出来呀！
dialogue_tracker.char_4202_haruka_CN_036: 我背后的蝴蝶结摆正了吗？
dialogue_tracker.char_4202_haruka_CN_038: 新年通常都是我最忙的时候，但今年格外想来罗德岛见见星熊和你，“万事顺遂”这种祝福还是当面说比较好——喂，我真的推掉了很多不错的工作机会，你可以表现得再开心点吗？！
dialogue_tracker.char_4202_haruka_CN_042: 嗨，博士～我刚刚遇到了一件超——可爱的事，你想听听吗？
dialogue_tracker.char_4202_haruka_CN_043: 这里面是我亲手做的一些小饰品，还有巡演时买的各地特产，最底下是一封信......我为什么会知道你的生日？我、我也是昨天才知道，你看这不都是临时准备的......我记性很差的啦。
dialogue_tracker.char_4202_haruka_CN_044: 罗德岛欢庆的日子，我给你带来了东国的消息——御机一切安好，而我最近陆续接到一些别的城市的演出邀请，也包括你的邀请。博士，明年的庆典，我们还会像这样分享彼此的快乐吗？
dialogue_tracker.char_4203_kichi_CN_001: 博士？你还要在这儿坐多久啊？不出去玩儿吗？工作......？工作有什么好做的，来，把这些放下......带你去找点乐子！
dialogue_tracker.char_4203_kichi_CN_002: 御机城可是个好地方，好吃的和好玩的都有，漂亮的小伙子和姑娘数之不尽，更重要的是，无论你喜欢什么、想玩什么、想买什么，他们都能给你弄来——只要你不在乎真假！
dialogue_tracker.char_4203_kichi_CN_003: 这个，还有这个......这样大概够了......嗯？博士你也在这儿啊？我正在给我的铳重新贴贴纸呢，还有多余的，你有什么想贴的东西吗？我分你几张？
dialogue_tracker.char_4203_kichi_CN_004: 到最后一圈了！对！跑快点，再——啊......真可惜......嗯？我？我可没钱押注给任何一方，我月初就把工资花光了，现在不过是看直播热闹一下，找找刺激感~
dialogue_tracker.char_4203_kichi_CN_005: 这块地方的长度、宽度都刚刚好......而且平时很少有人路过这里......挨骂？挨顿骂而已，有什么可怕的？等我打个电话，会叮叮当当掉小珠子的游戏机明天就到！
dialogue_tracker.char_4203_kichi_CN_006: “真实”和“路径”是最不重要的东西，这是奶奶教我的第一课。她检验出的假宝石最终会出现在贵妇人的脖子上并卖出高价，而我们私下做的假铳一样能让我保卫“吉星”不受威胁。
dialogue_tracker.char_4203_kichi_CN_007: 我光是看着“吉星”就觉得麻烦了，你居然要管理这么大一个罗德岛......嗯？你说我之前捡回家的人？那......那些人也没什么麻烦的，给点药让他们躺下睡觉就好了......
dialogue_tracker.char_4203_kichi_CN_008: 糟了，看看这个！御机城又有新的偶像被推出来了！萌萌香的粉丝俱乐部已经跑了不少人——我？我当然不会变心啦！我可是她的忠实粉丝！虽然我没什么钱买周边，但我对她的感情可是真的！
dialogue_tracker.char_4203_kichi_CN_009: 泡沫堆起的高楼摇摇欲坠，人人都想在最后关头紧抓住一颗星星......而我的星星，在亲生父母把襁褓中的我丢弃的那个晚上，在我冷得发抖快要一命呜呼的时候出现了，是她给了我一个家。
dialogue_tracker.char_4203_kichi_CN_010: 嗯？今天Dr.{@nickname}居然不在办公室啊......看来我得去找个别的搭子了......找谁好呢？得是一个不会挑三拣四、出手大方还足够疯的家伙......
dialogue_tracker.char_4203_kichi_CN_011: 百发百中的吉星——向你报到！如果日后有时间、有意愿进行珠宝鉴定或是销赃洗白、购买情报，都可以联系御机城“吉星”店铺，在店铺营业时间内，我随时为你服务~
dialogue_tracker.char_4203_kichi_CN_012: 真正的铳......他们的用法，和奶奶并不一样......
dialogue_tracker.char_4203_kichi_CN_013: 哇哦~真大方，给你们干活果然比伺候那些道上的好多了~
dialogue_tracker.char_4203_kichi_CN_014: 放心吧，你们永远是“吉星”的VIP客户。
dialogue_tracker.char_4203_kichi_CN_018: 我当队长？......算了，给你干活总比给别人卖命好。
dialogue_tracker.char_4203_kichi_CN_019: 跟我来吧，我知道一条小路。
dialogue_tracker.char_4203_kichi_CN_024: 前方两百米处有可疑对象。
dialogue_tracker.char_4203_kichi_CN_025: 铳是假的，但你要完蛋了是真的~
dialogue_tracker.char_4203_kichi_CN_029: 啊哈——做得好！刚刚那一幕有人拍照了吗？我得把这张照片放大打印，挂在“吉星”的大门口！
dialogue_tracker.char_4203_kichi_CN_030: 做得好！我们原地解散，然后爱干嘛干嘛吧~大家再见！
dialogue_tracker.char_4203_kichi_CN_031: 看起来已经完事儿了，我能去玩......不，我能去游戏机那儿休息一会儿了吗？
dialogue_tracker.char_4203_kichi_CN_032: 惹到不该惹的家伙了，快跑——！快快快——把腿动起来！
dialogue_tracker.char_4203_kichi_CN_033: 这片空地倒是不错，也许下次我可以把那些街机也搬......不，没什么，你听错了。
dialogue_tracker.char_4203_kichi_CN_034: 唔！动作轻点儿......我又不是坏了的自动贩卖机！
dialogue_tracker.char_4203_kichi_CN_036: 哎呀，你来得正好，我现在正准备溜出去喝点东西......你去吗？
dialogue_tracker.char_4203_kichi_CN_038: 今晚“吉星”会彻夜开门的，虽然这个时候大家都在家里休息，没什么客户会上门，但“吉星”常伴——好运傍身嘛！这是我奶奶留下的规矩！
dialogue_tracker.char_4203_kichi_CN_042: 老板随便坐，有事儿直......啧，这破嘴，到底什么时候能改了这个毛病......你坐吧，找我有什么事儿？
dialogue_tracker.char_4203_kichi_CN_043: 喂、喂喂......博士，你想不想知道今天你的生日会都有什么流程？只要这个数，我就告诉你阿米娅准备的惊喜是什么，极境的“惊喜”又是什么......
dialogue_tracker.char_4203_kichi_CN_044: 过了今天，就是明天，但过了明天，还有明天——博士，明天也记得找我玩哦~
dialogue_tracker.char_4204_mantra_CN_001: 我不会滥用你的许可。从现在开始，我保持聆听。
dialogue_tracker.char_4204_mantra_CN_002: 一直以来，我都通过“筛选”来处理使用源石技艺导致的精神重负，阿米娅也一样。这过程类似于在无休止的坠落中寻找能将自己安全托举的对象。你注意到了？是你给了她坠落的勇气，博士。
